title: Excellent experience
review: Stayed one night before a cruise.  The entire staff was friendly and very courteous.  Clean and spacious room.  Balcony with view of water and partial view of Ocean ! Nice breakfast.  Nearby mall with many dining options.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent Hotel - Excellent Management
review: Management and staff are exceptional! The front desk manager, Ryan, took great care of us during our stay. He went above and beyond in many cases. He was even standing in the lobby to greet guests on their way in, and thank them on the way out.   He is a consummate professional and I can't help but give him (and the other managers) a great deal of credit for how efficiently this hotel is run. We were very happy with every aspect of our stay, and the hospitality extended to us only makes us want to return faster.  There are many hotel options in Fort Lauderdale, but a professionally run property makes all the difference. Thanks for the great stay Ryan!

title: Nice place, clean and friendly
review: Dear GlobesMine, It is always a pleasure to hear from our local guests and you know the beach area better than anyone.  Thank you for you review and for mentioning one of our outstanding team members.  We to see you next FLL Air Show if not before.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Not clean
review: Stayed on a Friday night prior to a cruise.  Taxi from FLL was $30 with tip.  Staff was friendly and the room clean and fresh. Room was well decorated and up to date. Will stay again. The breakfast buffet was $25 but cooked well and fresh.

title: Angela is a GREAT house keeper
review: The hotel is located in a very nice area. Many restaurants and a shopping mall in a walking distance . Rooms are spacious but the only problem is that it is not clean at all. The carpets are dirty and the bathroom has a funny smell.

title: Excellent Location, and Experience
review: Only a short walk to the Beach, Restarauants, and Shopping. The Boat activitiy going by the Hotel is entertainment on its own. The Water Taxi is a great site seeing experience and takes you to many great stops. One of the stops is at the Hotel. This Hotel has a great staff willing to help. Rooms are comfortable and efficent but a bit tired. No hesitations of staying there again.The view from the InterCoastal Rooms are awesome. Kitchenette is really a bonus. The whole staff were always willing to help. Oscar at the Front Desk was great, he helped us get in our room early after a long night flight. Max was as well!  The guys at the front door would always greet you when you returned to the Hotel with a Welcome Back !

title: Great TeamAlways go the extra with smiles.Customer service saavy!!!
review: Warm welcomes Professional team Superior service from everyone!! Love this property.  Great location near business and leisure activities... Large rooms and suites with kitchenette and ocean, pool or intercoastal views!!

title: Home away from home!
review: We had to book this stay at the last minute because of flight issues. The hotel was over and beyond hospitable. We didnt have any luggage, toiletries, etc, and they were very helpful! They provided us with some basic necessities to make our stay comfortable!

title: No food??
review: Seemed like a decent place. Checkin lady was very nice. They closed the restaurant for two days so we couldn't get food and the bar tender called out the second day, so we couldn't get drinks outside. Seems like a small but important detail.

title: Fantastic Place!
review: Dear X209KVtim,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve from our restaurant and bar. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned in the hopes they are not recurring for future guests. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.

title: Probably better choices in Fort Lauderdale
review: We would not stay at this particular hotel again.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite which overlooked the highway/bridge (with all of the expected highway noise day/night) and then some partial intracoastal views (we booked a 2 bedroom suite w/ Intracoastal views).  The food was not great and room service was not much better.  The outside patio was beautiful as it is expansive right on the intracoastal waterway.  I suppose if our room was on a different side of the hotel it might have been better.  The cleanliness of our room was not up to par.  We complained at the front desk and a slightly more thorough cleaning was performed although it was still not what we would consider "clean," just the more obvious places (shower/sinks) were slightly better afterwards.  Not worth the $1500…

title: Several things wrong
review: Dear RealThreeGs,  Thank you for sharing this invaluable insight into your recent visit. We are truly disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy your stay due to the concerns mentioned. Our goal is to create a rewarding experience for our guest and based on your feedback it seems as though we have fallen short on this occasion. We understand we have room for improvement. We agree; it's the attention to detail and proactive service that separates one property from another. We strive to ensure your every need is met, but it seems we can do better. Please know our team is reviewing your comments as a way to better serve you going forward. We hope to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale.

title: Great for Ft. Lauderdale Boat Show!
review: Problems with this hotel: * The in-room safe was broken. The repairman was not able to reset it.  * The air conditioning was also dysfunctional and chilled the room to the coldest temperature (like sleeping in a refrigerator) You could not change the temperature. The repairman could not fix it. I figured out that if you turned the heat on, it would reset the system and then you could set a new temp for the air conditioning. But I had to do this every time I wanted to adjust it.  * I asked for a different room and they said there weren’t any so I had to stay in the room with the broken safe and dysfunctional air conditioning. * I was offered a bottle of wine as a consolation. The hotel sells this wine (Whispering Angel rosé) for $90. But you can buy it at any local store for $20.…

title: Great hotel for the boat show
review: Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms.  We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.

title: Galleryone = Great place to stay
review: Great location for the Ft. Lauderdale boat show. You can take the boat show water taxi from this location and skip the parking drama at the Boat Show. Taxi brings you back to this location also. Lovely trip down the intracoastal. Close to restaurants, and shopping which is a plus.

title: Dirty!
review: I stayed during the FTL boat show and paid way too much for the room we had.  First of all, the floors were not clean and the elevators were disgusting.  The room itself was a nice size, but it was also not properly cleaned.  The outdoor porch area had cigarette butt ash marks all over the place.  While not related to cleanliness, everything seemed to be painted by an amateur.  There was paint on counters, cabinets, and there was not a straight line to be seen.  They also have ONE ice maker for the ENTIRE hotel.  We will never stay again.

title: My FT Lauderdale Stay
review: Dear drcrobb,  Thank you for taking time to review your experience with us. We sincerely apologize that we did not provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems you encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

title: Unclean
review: Wonderful place which accommodates all types of traveler.  Friendly staff conveniently located close to shopping center, excellent view and also provide tours to which you can sign up for. The valets are helpful and will assist you in providing a taxi or give advice on cheaper options of transportation available to you

title: Rough around the edges!
review: The bed sheets were not clean.  Had blood on sheets from prior guest.  They made the bed but didn’t put fresh sheets on the bed.  The side tables in living room dirty.  Location was excellent for taking the water taxi to the boat show.  Group that was with us had noisy rooms located on the street side of hotel.

title: Hotel is deteriorating!
review: Dear KPSeattle, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning the condition of your room. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members so this will not happen again. Again, please accept my apology. Sincerely, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Outstanding !!!
review: I have to say this is the best doubletree by Hilton that I ever stayed at. The staff is the best. From the minute we walked in , they went above and beyond to make our stay pleasant.The location is perfect. It’s very close to the beach and lots and lots of restaurants and shopping. The buffet breakfast was excellent. At night there is music by the bar area which overlooks the water. This place is the best.

title: Quick getaway
review: Dear rpstrobel, Thank you for your comments regarding your time with us. Sincerely, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Nice breakfast
review: The only downside was lobby bar was never open. They upgraded us to a suite since our room was not available at that time. Dropped our bags and sat at outside bar. Bartender was nice and I'm sorry I didn't get her name but it was a Sunday. Walking distance to Capital Grill, Season 52 and Blue Martini Bar.

title: Beautiful, Conveniently Located Hotel with Superior Staff!
review: Dear Surfclam2003, Thank you for your review.  I do apologize that the indoor bar was not open.  With the weather being so nice most of our guests have preferred to remain outside with the view of the water and the boats.  We do hope you will return soon.  Regards,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Very nice hotel well positioned for the beach or the nearby Mall
review: The hotel is a bit in need of some TLC,also when we got there at 7pm the pool was open but if you wanted beer/ lager it was out of a can not very good for a 4 star hotel.The staff were friendly & the buffet breakfast was lovely,good size room.Really good location especially been next to the river.

title: Good place to stay
review: Great location, great staff.  Get an ocean view! The patio is nice, Plenty of space to sit, outdoor bar, great feel.  Valet only for parking.  If they are busy, great crew, but be prepared to wait a few minutes.  Breakfast is good.  A little pricey, but if you get a free breakfast, take advantage of it. The rooms are good, comfortable beds, excellent dark blinds for keeping the sun out so you can sleep in. Very good stay overall and a good price too!

title: Horrible Experience! Smell!
review: Dear Omar W, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed our team, location and the views.   Sincerely,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Disappointing!
review: Staff need to be retrained in hospitality services. Not the Hilton Honors experience I am used to. What happened to customer service. Not only the front desk but the valet staff. Hallways stink of musk odor. Find another hotel fast! I didn’t even get my usual Hilton Honors bottled water! Highly do NOT recommend!

title: Horrible experience, stay away
review: Dear SaltLife2, 					 Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the issues you encountered. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future for a much better experience.

title: Suite!
review: We have stayed at this hotel before and it’s definitely gone down hill. We asked 3 times for bedding for the sofa bed - we’re still waiting! As previously mentioned in some earlier reviews the AC sounds like a steam engine and don’t get me started on the parking charge. They have a huge garage a few meters away but feel it acceptable to charge $37 for valet parking and no option to self park. Last time we were here there excuse for no self park was they were recovering from a Hurricane, which we completely understood, I’m not sure what the excuse was this time!  Ok a plus side the included buffet breakfast was good but I’m certain I wouldn’t have paid the $100+ that it would have cost me if it hadn’t been in the overnight rate.

title: I love this hotel!
review: First off I want to give certain people thanks Krysta at front desk made my day she is polite and super helpful she really went out of her way to make our stay the best stay we had and we been to a lot of hotels she is the best also want to really thank all the staff as well like Valet even though it’s a high fee for valet but Ernesto, Costa, Brian, Josh and John really step to the plate and get u in and out and don’t forget super friendly you will have no problems at this hotel and the view is speechles

title: Great stay but pity about the service afterwards
review: Dear george d, Thank you for such warm comments.  It is a pleasure to read how many of our team members made your stay special.  We are all looking forward to your return.   Sincerely,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Way less than expected!
review: We stayed for 2 nights prior to embarking on a cruise. The hotel itself was adequate for our needs & we enjoyed our stay. The check in service was efficient & the reception staff were always friendly & helpful. However, on the day we were checking out we received an invoice for parking which wasn’t ours (we travelled from UK & used a shuttle service from the airport). I pointed this out to reception & was assured this was a mistake (no apology!) & had been removed. I was even provided with a new invoice with a zero balance. On return from holiday I checked my credit card statement & the charge had been debited. This has now been refunded but shouldn’t have happened in the first place, so my advice is to check everything carefully. The hotel takes a credit card number as an…

title: nothing special
review: Dear 869clarel, First thank you for your business.  I do want to apologize that this error occurred.  I know that this caused you inconvenience and please again accept our apologies.  We have made sure that our GSAs understand the correct process to ensure that this will not happen again.   Thank you for letting us know and to be able to correct this.  Regards,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: outdated Hotel. Dirty and dusty, outlets didn’t  work the USB PORTS Didn’t  WORK. Balcony doors barely worked. Parking fee is $37 a night Beds need replaced, I can go on and on. If you want to stay in a place that is dirtier than your own place, go ahead and book

title: Very nice hotel, great service
review: Proximity to beach, shopping and restaurants was awesome.  Water taxi stop at this resort.  Nice pool and bar area.  Staff were very friendly, text messages sent about activities at the hotel.  Outside seating was also available for breakfast and lunch.

title: In the middle of it all with a great view!
review: Dear Dawn S, Thanks for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  You are correct that our location cannot be beat.  Hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Outstanding location and price for this area.
review: We were in town for a friends' reunion and chose to stay one night here before we joined the rest of our group. The views were great and we were located near lots of shops and restaurants and could get a good feel for the rest of the town.

title: Great place !!!
review: Dear Deborahk68, So happy you found us on the way to your reunion.  It is a pleasure to hear your enjoyed your stay and got a good feel for Fort Lauderdale.   Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Service
review: PRO-Outstanding location on the waterway!!  The water taxi stops at this hotel. Very good price for this area.  Great front desk service and porters.  All suite hotel was very roomy and comfortable. CON-Needs a little update. However, the price for this great location is more important to me than an update.  The buffet breakfast, $25 per person, in my opinion is very overpriced. Therefore, we did not eat at the hotel. A more reasonable price would likely generate more business for the restaurant.

title: Not a traditional Doubletree
review: Although this hotel was a great value and overall stay, it did not feel like a Doubletree. Typically Doubletree hotels are more comfortable and cozy and homey, this one was not. Maybe because the building is really old or maybe it just needs a paint job. It could be the Florida humidity that makes the room feel less cozy and more like a patio. I will say it seems they do a great job of maintaining the property. The customer service is amazing! My husband told the staff that we were there celebrating my birthday and they sent us some complimentary wine! Pool area is windy because of the inlet location. Overall this place is great! Close to shopping! Housekeeping was my only issue.

title: Great value!
review: Dear iitalyp, Thank you for your comments and so happy to hear you found our team's service to be amazing.  I do hope you will return and hopefully with our new lobby and restaurant renovations you will find that cozy feeling you are looking for.  Sincerely  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Best Doubletree Team!!!
review: We stayed here for a business conference and were very impressed! It was super nice everywhere in the hotel from the front desk to our room. The location was great too. There was a mall close to one side and a beach close to the other.

title: Outside bar is the bomb
review: Dear Jennifer J, So happy to hear your enjoyed your business conference with us.  We hope your group will return soon.   Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Place
review: Love this Hotel!! I stay here often and the Staff is just stellar! Special shout outs to Pavel, Krysta and Max. They always remember me and make me feel special. Renee and Carmelo at the inside/outside Bar make some very tasty Pina Coladas and provide GREAT conversation. The location could not be better. Because the Suites have full Kitchens, it's very handy to have a Grocery Store (Publix) across the Street. There is a Mall a block away with a lot of restaurant choices. Breakfast Buffet is awesome and they serve till 11AM!!!  Beautiful outside area right on the canal. They have Valet parking,  but I used UBER/Lyft during my stay. I honestly wouldn't  stay anywhere else. It would be like cheating on your friends!! Cant wait to go back!! Thank you Doubletree GalleryOne for…

title: Excellent restaurant representation Nicole Newman
review: As a very frequent business traveler to the Doubletree GalleryOne- my travel is always enhanced by the excellent service by the Vue Restaurant server -Nicole Newman. She is a wonderful example of hospitality ,remembers my name, my drink and favorite food choices.  Thank you Nicole and Doubletree!

title: Excellent customer service!
review: Dear X361FAkarenh, We are always happy to see you return and certainly appreciate your loyalty and your business. You are so kind to mention one of our outstanding team members that made your stay.  Again, we hope to see you back again soon.  Sincerely, Bob keesler General Manager

title: Prasing the master of customer service.
review: We just checked in this afternoon. All staff have been so welcoming. My husband and I were checking out the amenities, walking around the pool and outside area.  Carmelo greeted us and invited us to happy hour.  We spent a pleasant hour enjoying some adult beverages and pleasant breeze.  Very nice start to our stay in Ft Lauderdale.

title: September Getaway
review: Dear  Valdez831, Thank you for your comments and glad your vacation got off to a great start. Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Mr. Jarett Loperfito and mrs. Cari DeCoeur
review: I stayed at the property from 18 -thru the 22nd,Max at the front desk has perfected the meaning of customer service. If any one ever complain on max in regards to his performance, that means they are extremely incompetent and slow. Darnell at the valet is an extremely nice guy. Darnell is always hands on along with the morning crew. The parking G.M. is beautiful no nonsense type of guy. That's someone that you'll enjoy to work for. There's a mixologist bartender name Jennifer she was born to be a perfectionist when it comes to bartending. She has a natural gift to create drinks that are master piece. There's no other mixologist either in Broward nor Dade county that are in her league in retrospect to her profession. After tasting all the competitors drinks, I truly believe…

title: Business Tree at the Double Tree
review: This hotel was excellent for the price paid. Everybody was nice and the facility was super clean. If you wanted to dinning with no travel the hotel restaurant was a excellent place to grab a bite to eat.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Dear  Monroefl, Thanks for letting us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear that your enjoyed the restaurant.  Hope you will return soon. Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great staff, internet, electrical, toilet issues
review: Hotel staff was wonderful, specifically, Mia the Supervisor, Nichols in the restaurant, Krysylta at the front desk, Jennifer at the bar and the valet crew...best hotel stay experience ever because of the customer service!  The view was awesome!  Location was awesome!  Room was clean!  Will come again!

title: Best experience
review: Dear  affordableloan, Thank you for your comments and for recognizing so many of our team members that made your stay.  We hope to see you again soon, Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Visit
review: The staff are kind and everyone was great to work with, however there were several issues with room amenities during a 3 night stay which reduced my rating.  The toilet broke, the phone broke, and the internet was faulty a few times and several light fixtures went out.  It seemed to have a lot of issues for a short 3 night stay.

title: Pool side bar at Gallery One Hotel
review: We stayed at the hotel in September 3019. Very nice outside bar by water taxi stop at Gallery One Hotel . Great view of intercostal waterway  Visit Carmelo at the poolside bar. Excellent service. We will be back .

title: Breakfast served with a smile
review: Dear  Tom L, thank you for your comments and for your recognition of one of our outstanding team members.   Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Attempt But Falls Short
review: Andrea was great!! our food was served HOT as requested, nothing like a hot meal to set the day in motion.  She didn't miss a beat in thinking of what we'd want next from one moment to the next! we joked that she was the Breakfast Fairy Godmother!! I've had breakfast here before since I'm always in and out but this is the first time I felt inclined to write a review as I had a proper meal. I will be back to try the lunch

title: Mold, Filthy and Bugs!
review: Dear Don-Blandon, Thank you for your review.  You are very kind to let us know about a team member that made your stay and your time with us special.  Thank you.  We hope to see you back here again soon.  Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: No attention to Details.
review: Sometimes you just don't live up to the Hype!  We enjoyed our 3-Day Stay; however, the Hotel didn't quite live up to it's billings.  Rooms were OK......but as the commercial says......Just OK!  Facilities / Amenities showing wear and tear and through in $37,00 per day Valet Only Parking.  We will not be back.

title: Good Location. Poor Timing
review: Decent property. Good location. Poor timing - meaning renovations were taking place and it was inconvenient. Many more renovations are needed.  Most furniture and decor was plain and outdated.  Since it is a down time for travel, staffing at hotel was low and therefore service was sub-par.

title: Gallery One is a very good deal
review: Dear Robert W,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered due to our renovations, and we are working with our team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

title: Excellent stay
review: I have lost count of the number of times I have stayed at Gallery One over many, many years. I would not stay anywhere else as it is so convenient for everything.The location is fantastic. 5 minutes walk to the beach,Mall or Publix. There are 2 reasonably priced restaurants just over the bridge - and that is only a couple of minutes walk. Yes, the valet parking is $35 a night, but that is a bargain as there are other hotels in the area that charge $45 and you have to remember - this is South Florida !!!  Gallery One has no resort charges, but some 56 hotels in the area do and they range from room cleaning charges of $125 per stay to resort fees of up to $35/45 per night for the use of pool towels, loungers, internet access etc. All in all Gallery One is a very good deal and a…

title: Old, Tired and Dirty
review: Dear  Stewart1234567, Thank you for pointing out some very things that make our hotel special.  It is nice when someone recognized that our valet charge is less than most and our hotel does not have a resort fee as most of the hotel in the are do.  We want to thank you for your business and look forward to your next stay with us.   Regards,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great hotel!
review: Hotel was clean, fresh and inviting. Comfortable beds with spacious rooms. Management runs the restaurant and bar with a decent selection of food and drinks.  Dana is the best bartender in Ft Lauderdale! Friendly, talented and easy on the eyes. Makes the best Long Islands outside of Long Island!

title: Good size room clean but is dated
review: The room was large we had a bedroom and front room icl kitchen it was a condo suite in Gallery. Con one mirror in whole place not very convenient when getting ready in the morning for two people. We had a nice view of intercoastal, we use the ferry taxi that come to the door basically very handy. Staff was very good and helpful they booked some excursions for us. They looked after getting us a shuttle to airport when needed.

title: Best Staff !
review: Dear Joe C, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  I wish you had contacted our housekeeping department as they would have been happy to bring up and extra mirror.  Overall I am glad to hear the rest of your stay was pleasant.   Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: A Sunshine Hotel in the Sunshine City!!
review: I can't say enough about the amazing & welcoming staff.  Everyone at the front desk, in the restaurant, bar and sales office that we came in contact for my daughter's wedding weekend went over and above the call of duty!  We will definitely be back!!!

title: Service with a Smile
review: Dear Caryl P We are so glad to hear that your daughter's wedding weekend went so well.  Congratulation to the happy couple and we look forward to your return as well.  Regards, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Love the stay
review: Wonderful stay! We had a great time in this hotel! The location was just perfect for everything the beach, mall, transportation, a supermarket near by.. The friendly staff, and hotel decoration in this lovely hotel deserves a 10!  Without a doubt!  Thanks!

title: Used to be a wonderful property
review: We’ve stayed at this property several times in the past and it  was a good experience and a wonderful suite. This time, check in was fine, but when we entered the room we were extremely disappointed. The carpet looked  stained in some places. The chair at the table was worn. The paint on the bathroom wall was not finished. To top it off, my husband needed a car service to get to the airport at 4:15AM, and the valet service workers told him they could not help him until 11PM. Since my husband needed to get to bed early, we called the front desk for help, and they said, that was the valets responsibility. They also said, I could drive him at that time and come back because the valet are out there 24 hours. We will never return to this property. It certainly does not provide the…

title: How interesting room in summer goes for170 but over 300 in the winter....contravention of the Competition Act.
review: Used to be a great place. Now bug infested, poor customer service, poor condition, poor value for the price. Price in summer is 170....still too high. Room only available at supper time.....not acceptable. Rate in winter during cruises and Canadian travel was over 320$....

title: Vacation
review: Dear Sylviemuise,  We regret that your experience with us was anything less than ideal and that you faced such complications with your room. We're also disappointed to hear the service you received wasn't up to par. This is not typical of our hotel and staff; providing our guests with exceptional service is something we take seriously. Please know these issues have been addressed with the appropriate members of our team. Safe travels.

title: Inside bartender
review: The bartender, Dana, was professional, friendly and personable. Very knowledgeable about the city and offered many good suggestions for my wife and I. Our drinks were made to perfection and caused us to stay here and patronize the bar just because of her mixology skills.

title: Delight At Double Tree !
review: Dana (New York) was the absolute BEST bartender I’ve EVER encountered!!!! She’s friendly, and funny!!!! I wish there was one of her in every state. Her personality is amazing. She was the highlight of our visit to FL.

title: Great stay
review: Lovely hotel, amazing breakfast options! Wish they had an airport shuttle for Fort Lauderdale airport, but quick Lyft ride did it. Awesome views and balcony suites. Warm cookies that were delicious as always.

title: Lots of positive elements
review: Dear Kayra23, Thank you for leaving a review about your time with us.  It is a pleasure to see you enjoyed your stay. We hope you will return soon. Regards  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Amazing!
review: The staff, location and amenities are fabulous, as are the roomy one-bedroom suites.  Leave teh car and walk to the beach or a nearly mall with many restaurants and bars.  Lots to see and do nearby.  Weekend deals are great.

title: I loved this hotel and the staff were the absolute greatest
review: Dear Virginia C, Thank you for your review.  It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your stay and our location.  Regards,  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Treated like Royalty!
review: We stayed here for two nights in July and have to confess were rather worried about the levels of cleanliness and the standard of the rooms generally having read quite a few negative reviews.  I emailed the Manager and based on his assurances that the room would be clean we decided to stick with our booking.  I am so glad that we did. Our two bedroom suite on the 11th floor was immaculate and all of the furniture was of a good standard (none of the ripped chairs I have seen photos of in other reviews).  I guess the hotel is currently working through all of the floors updating and replacing fixtures and fittings where necessary. All of the staff we spoke to were super friendly and helpful and we really enjoyed our stay!

title: Diego is the Best helper
review: I spent the last weekend running a seminar at the hotel, Diego and Andres were always amazing with a great attitude and a fantastic smile all the time that I asked for something!! Really helpful!!!!!!

title: Best Hotel Ever
review: Dear Arturo O, As a;ways it is a pleasure to have your seminars with us here at GALLERYone.  Thank you for mentioning two very outstanding team members that made your seminar go so well.   We all look forward to your return soon.   Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great
review: The Staff was very friendly and helpfull. Everything nice and clean. Food delicious! We really enjoyed our stay. The view to the canal is very pretty. The shopping mall is just beside the hotel. Perfect location.

title: Just as Great on Return Visit
review: Dear NN P, It is a pleasure to have had you with us.  I am so glad to hear our team was helpful and friendly.  We hope you will return soon and thank you for choosing GALLERYone.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Shocked at check in
review: Came Down for a tennis tournament , and stay here was the best I idea I made . Not only the location was perfect and in the middle of everything the staff was great . The Valet guys were great . Especially my boys Brandon & Darnel . They always made sure that my car was up and ready to go by the time I was outside .

title: Awesome Stay
review: Solid hotel. Great view of water. Location is nice - water taxi stops right at hotel. Took the water taxi to Stop 2 and walked a block or two to Piazza Italian restaurant - the best Salmon I have ever had in my life. Hotel wise, the staff was extremely gracious and helpful. John the Valet was our favorite. Smile worth a million bucks. Gave us great advice during our stay and made the stay personable. See you next time John :). Shane and Diana Kelley

title: The best thing about the DoubleTree Fort Lauderdale
review: Dear ShaneAdvisor, Thank you for your comments.  It is great to hear comments about our team members and we thank you for pointing out the people that made your stay special.  We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: 3Generation Girl Trip
review: We arrived super late and very tired for our check in on July 24th, but were greeted by Dooshima whom immediately understood we wanted to go up to our room as quick as possible, so she swiftly checked us in, provided us with water bottles and the warm cookies. Dooshima’s warmth made us feel at home, and for the next three days we were lucky to run into her each night for a quick chat. Her genuine care and attention to detail is above and beyond anything we experienced in Ft. Lauderdale. Thank you for your hospitality, Dooshima! A special shout out to Clayton and David, the shuttle drivers, and our bellman who’s name I forgot, as well as the young lady that works the day shift at the Front Desk as well, who was kind enough to bring a package all the way to my room. Thank you all!

title: Beautfiul property with kind and caring staff
review: Dear Giovanna L, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It is always a pleasure to hear about our team members that made you feel at home.  We will certainly let everyone you mentioned know about your kind words.  Thank you for choosing GALLERYone.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Overall Good
review: Having read previous reviews, I was concerned about our stay, but we LOVED everything about this trip!  We came for a wedding & stayed a total of 6 nights. If we ran out of anything, I just called the front desk & whatever we needed was supplied!  We used room service for a few meals & were NEVER disappointed in quality, quantity or expediency!  My daughter, granddaughter (13) & I have made trips together for on Texas to Seattle, DC, Nashville, Vancouver & now Fort Lauderdale & this one did not disappoint! I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Wedding at Galleryone
review: Galleryone and Sun Dream Yacht collaborated for a lovely and memorable wedding experience.  Couldn't be more pleased with the location, staff, accommodations, food, courtesy and hospitality of both.  We would definitely return!

title: Great stay during rough weekend without water!
review: Dear Douglas R Thank you and we hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: We'll be back soon!!
review: Galleryone bent over backwards to make certain everyone in our party was comfortable and cared for during a watermain break in the city of Ft. Lauderdale.  They boiled and packed in water for everyone, they kept the rooms clean and had a back-up for air conditioning- all with patience and a smile!! We especially commend Mickayla in the in house restaurant.  So courteous, knowledgeable, and helpful to answer all of our questions about the town and how to get around.  Her suggestions were beyond compare- what a gem! THANK YOU Galleryone!

title: Doubletree Vue/Gallery Lounge Restaurant
review: Dear Climber789190, Thank you for your comments during a very challenging period.  It not often an entire city loses it water.  I am glad we were able to succeed in meeting your expectation and keeping you comfortable.  Thank you also for mentioning one of our team members that help make your time with us special.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Far Cry from ‘Worth It’
review: A special thanks to Neisha!! anytime I come to this property she's always willing to help with a smile I think its amazing how she remembers my family and myself by name. She is just a wonderful addition to this hotel! she upgraded me to a beautiful two bedroom for an amazing price. she's honestly one of the reasons I continue to come here outside of the location and restaurants. I would love to thank Mia as well for her outstanding performance. I'll see you ladies again really soon.

title: Awesomeness
review: Best place to stay when in the area...  Will most definitely be coming back!  The views are so beautiful, the access to the beach is walking distance, travel with ease, shopping near by as well.  A Great Place to Stay

title: AMAZING business trip!
review: Dear Melissa T, We are looking forward to your return.  We are happy to hear you feel we are the best place to stay.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Lovely hotel!
review: The hotel was clean, the customer service was incredible and my view was wonderful! The cookies were an added bonus. We took a yacht cruise directly behind the hotel. The pool was clean and I enjoyed taking a nap pool side! I will be back!

title: Outdated
review: Dear kfelder83, It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are all looking forward to your return.  Regards, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Wonderful check-in!  Great breakfast server!
review: We loved this hotel! Everything was exceptional from the immaculately clean room to the hospitable, accommodating staff. I really wish we'd been able to stay more than one night. The rooms are basically apartments and are like being at home. I'd highly recommend staying at this hotel!

title: Service is above and beyond
review: The hotel itself is nice and in a great location, but the staff are what set it apart from all the other hotels. Dana and Mia in particular provided outstanding service, and helped make our experience truly memorable.

title: Needs Updating!
review: Dear ihatetrepadvisor, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  We appreciate you telling us about two of our team members that made your stay memorable.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: An OK place to stay with a few perks.
review: I stayed at this Double Tree while attending a wedding. The rooms are large and spacious and it is in a good locations.   However, the furniture was tattered and worn.  There was black mold growing in the shower. I changed rooms and the shower was cleaner.  All of the chairs must be tattered because they had removed all the chairs except 1 from my 2nd room.  My friends said all the rooms were like that...  I gave them 3 because the staff were nice and accommodating.

title: Great Staff
review: Dear sjjrb1115, We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment with your room. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Glory Days GONE?
review: The value is OK because the room do have kitchenette. Very convenient and saves on room service. Decent private balconies and separate bedroom helps you feel like there is breathing space. Staff was nice. Hotel was quiet.  The parking cost is $35/night. Rooms are very dated. Giving rooms a 4 because they are jr suites. Hotel needs a complete remodel. Somewhat decent location. For a hotel in Lauderdale it is reasonable because of the positives. But don't expect luxury.

title: Pretty Awesome!!!
review: The BEST service I've received in a really long time! Nothing short of amazing. The staff from front desk, bar, breakfast restaurant and valet were all very professional and accommodating. The a/c went out overnight on our floor but we couldn't find ANY reason to complain outside the a/c failure! Pretty awesome, will stay again!

title: It was ok
review: Dear marrisadavis, Thank you for your comments.  It is a pleasure to know that even during a challenging situation our team performed. Hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent experience
review: The room wasn't clean properly and I had requested to upgrade it about a week or two before our stay but because we arrived around 6pm the upgraded room was no longer available.  The best thing was the view from our room! it was beautiful!.

title: Not my expectation!
review: Dear travelerS2533ED, We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your your stay was just OK. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort.

title: Nice location but not worth the money
review: Overall this was a great experience for the value. Laurito at the front desk was more than helpful and even followed up to make sure all was well! I would recommend this hotel above and beyond to any traveler!

title: Great stay!
review: The staff was extremely benevolent. The facilities was clean and everyone was very helpful. The stay on the waterway was pretty and walking distance to beach. I felt like i was valued as a consumer from the staff retrieving our vehicle to front desk.

title: Rooms not clean and outdated
review: Dear Maps638143, Thank you for your warm comments and letting us know about your stay.  I hope you will return soon. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: I was shocked at the disrepair of my room. Mold in the bathroom and living room, kitchen cabinets unusable, chairs falling apart, dirty towels and trash in the bathroom cabinet. Super disappointed.  Would not recommend.

title: Service was great
review: Dear Discover35881555516, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  Because of you letting us know we have been able to take corrective actions with in our housekeeping department.  Please accept our apology as this is not our standards or what we expect from our team members.  Again, I apologize and hope you will give us one more chance to earn you business back.   Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: great property under renovation
review: Went for a three night holiday . I’ve been ill and looked forward to a top notch experience. This hotel leaves a lot to be desired. The hallway carpets are heavily spotted. They should be replaced. The Airconditoning is old fashioned and should be replaced. The rooms are dark and are from the last energy crisis. I travel and was impressed upon entry . The front and the outside waterfront area have been remodeled. Now they need to do the upstairs. The worst was the attitude they displayed on a midnight fire alarm. There was a sign upon entering that said they will be conducting fire drills from 9am to 5pm. Everyone came downstairs at mid nite. We sat outside with many others. There was a fire truck. The nan in dust July 2 was not a people person. He was not truthful. He said…

title: Views are beautiful
review: Everything about our stay exceeded expectations. The property is very clean, conveniently located and offers excellent customer service. Our suite had views from every window. Really enjoyed the stay!  Lots to do within a short walking distance.

title: 50th class reunion
review: Dear WR358, Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Dana is awesome!!
review: Had 50th class reunion at hotel and staff was wonderful. Our events were great and the lower lobby made for the perfect spot. One reason for hotel was a yacht pulled up right behind on intercoastal and took us on a 4 hr ride.

title: Lovely
review: Dear TrailBlazer285262, Thank you for telling us about your stay.  I know i speak for our entire team when i say we enjoyed your group so much.  We hope you all will come back and see us for year 51.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Not clean and is in need of repairs
review: Dana and Mia at the bar are the best!! They did an incredible job and have the greatest personality!! The food was served promptly, the drinks were taken care of quickly and they managed a very demanding customer with incredible patience. Love these girls!! Will come back just for their great service.

title: Great Hotel with a boutique vibe
review: The location, welcoming and professional staff, and hotel amenities create  a hotel experience similar to what you would expect at a boutique type hotel absent a chocolate with a turned down bed.   The gallery collection of artwork is not over bearing.    Also, the menu is not over bearing either.   Will definitely stay again when in the area.

title: Nicole
review: Dear  Daydream14433885134, Thank you so much for your kind comments.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and current exhibition of FLOW.  As you know the art is from an international group of artists.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Not a great start.
review: Nicole went above and beyond the Call of Duty for me and my family and then the next night I saw her single-handedly handle 30 or 35 guest by herself as a waitress and she was also the barista for the Starbucks Coffee station and I can't remember what else she did but she also did that to perfection with Southern Charm and a great work ethic and a total positive mental attitude hats off to you Nicole

title: weekend with family
review: Dear Davidlocke, Thank you for letting us know about your time with us.  Also, thank you for mentioning one of our real super stars, it is great to hear how she helped to make your stay specila.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Made business trip a pleasure
review: I had booked a 3 night stay here via British Airways. No problem with any part of the booking with BA until arriving here. Where they had no record of the booking on their system. They went away to call BA, I also called BA via my mobile, and got through straight away while the hotel were supposedly still trying to call them! After passing my call over to the reservation supervisor, BA resent the booking over, which according to their records was originally sent in January! After finally getting sorted I was allocated a room. On entry the first thing I do is put anything of value, passport etc in the room safe and anything that needs to be kept cool in the fridge. The safe was locked, surely housekeeping supervisor should check this! The fridge was frozen up, and would not have…

title: Excellent Staff -Friendly, courteous, helpful and efficient.  Hotel is clean and pretty, great location!
review: Very perfect  for walkers, runners, to bike,  ride the water taxis!!  Excellent place to unwind with family.  Safe area / great staff. Front Desk Managers are outstanding and all staff are perfect for their help and courteous manner.  Doormen are helpful and friendly, professional.  Cleaning staff are  courteous,efficient and friendly. Great place to meet with friends and stay with family for visiting and family fun and memories.  Near all beaches, restaurants, food shopping (Publix) and Galleria Mall. Also near a Nature Preserve Hugh Taylor National Park.  Near Bonnet House, Las Olas, and lovely to walk near all above.  Bikes are also nearby to ride near the beach.  Water Taxis pull up on the dock of the Hotel and are really fun to ride.

title: Nice location
review: Dear jared g Thank you for all your comments.  We are glad to see you enjoyed your time with us and our very special location in FLL. Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: GALLERYone A Double Tree Suites by Hilton in Fort Lauderdale Florida is an awesome hotel.
review: The pictures of the hotel didn’t quite match the reality but was still nice. The restaurant food was amazing and our server Nicole is such a breath of fresh air she went above and beyond to make me and my kids feel at home. The views are amazing here and the water taxi was great!! Will definitely come back here

title: Love it here
review: Dear lilred1321, Thank you for your comments.  We continue to make strides in the renovation process.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed the chefs selections.  You are kind to mention one of our team members that made your stay with us special, we agree she is outstanding.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Just okay
review: The staff at this hotel is exceptional! Dana at the outdoor bar is a very accommodating bartender. She is an asset. Occasio who tends the pool is also amazing. Marie, who was my custodial worker is totally amazing. After 30 years on the job she is a very dedicated worker with a smile that warms your heart. Highly recommend this hotel. Thank you all for a great stay!❤

title: GREAT SERVICE- WORN FURNITURE,  CARPET SMELLS
review: The service was great, the room was clean, the furniture was ripped, carpet smelled like mold and stains on sofa and recliner in guestroom. I could not take the smell of mold on my last night and checked out early.

title: Hotel just ok
review: Dear mckayterri,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and while we’re so happy you received great service, we are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.

title: Winner
review: Contrary to the photos, this hotel is very dated and the rooms are very old and smell. Upon arrival, we changed rooms twice, all of the rooms had an old smell. Although the rooms were horrible, the bartender Kitty was awesome. She was able to help us get around to popular spots and she made wonderful drinks. Our housekeeper Desline was great as well she sprayed air freshener several times to help with the smell. I wouldn’t recommend the hotel but I would recommend the bar.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Shana E,  We regret that your experience with us was anything less than ideal and that you faced such complications with your room. We are glad to hear that members of our staff have stood out to you. Providing our guests with exceptional service is something we take seriously. Please know the issues that you encountered with your room(s) will be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future. Safe travels.

title: Great Service, great location
review: I will admit after reading the previous reviews I was nervous...  Let me start with the bad! The shower was a little slippery for our 1 yr old. We just bought a bath mat across the street at Publix. Problem solved. Also a couple tiles at the pool were loose which did not cause us a problem but definitely a liability issue.  Lobby beautiful, pool beautiful and not crowded, room was just as pictured. I did not think it looked dirty whatsoever or run down. The staff was amazing! They were helpful, happy and always greeted us with a smile when we left or came in. They texted me several times during the stay to make sure we were happy.  The location is awesome too! If I was rating this hotel its definitely a 10 out of 10.   Also I will add that the manager was very helpful as well…

title: Excellent stay!
review: Great service at the hotel. Mia Cora went above and beyond to help me with a special request. Look forward to staying here again for business travel. Rooms are also very clean and comfortable, beautiful location!

title: Vacation - Staycation - Business Perfection
review: Dear Smacmoy, How great to read your review.  We have shared your comments with Mia as it is always a pleasure to hear when we have made our guests happy.  Thank you and come and see us again soon.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: VERY POSITIVE AND FRIENDLY STAFF
review: The Galleryone property is one of the secret gems of Fort Lah Dee Dah.  I recommend it to all of my visiting family, business colleagues and friends.   It's our personal go-to staycation hotel and the staff is FANTASTIC!!!

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: Dear GoPlaces34722276672, Wow, this is so great to hear.  Thank you so much for your review and thank you for your recommendation. Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Wedding guest
review: I love when staff is friendly and very supportive.  In particular, "Soliner" who valeted my vehicle was very friendly and knowledgeable about the general area.  The personnel and staff within the hotel were friendly.

title: Dirty Room!!
review: I don't know how this place manages to get a 4 out of 5 star rating.  Our room was dirty and the furniture threadbare.  The balcony was sticky from spilled drinks.  The walls and appliances had splash stains, the carpet was filthy, the bathroom walls and floor were disgusting.  I am shocked it has a HILTON brand on it.  The staff was very nice and the outside area is nice.  My husband had planned to work and the entire computer system was down for some time.  The hotel did give us a compensation for that.  Sorry...those nice things didn't make up for the filth of the room.

title: Had fun, enjoyed ourselves.
review: Dear fstanhope  We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment with room. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Stayed for a wedding
review: Furniture needs updating and was worn.  Stained ceiling tiles or missing tiles.   Parts of wall wasn't finihed being fininshed. We were on 14th floor and ice was on the 4th.  Pool and pool bar were great!

title: Great location but that’s all
review: Dear Curiosity03653164199, We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment with room. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Billing Issues
review: We spent 2 nights here for a family wedding weekend.  We were cordially greeted and given warm chocolate chip cookies.  Our room was ready early.  We enjoyed our stay and all the staff were very friendly.  The hotel could use some updating/remodeling as the furniture shows significant signs of wear.  The outdoor bar and patio are very nice.  The restaurant offers typical hotel food...nothing too exciting but acceptable.  Love that they have a Starbucks on site!

title: Yummy Lobster Cobb Salad!
review: Stayed overnight prior to leaving for our cruise; we were booked here by our travel agent. Welcomed very wamly (with cookies!) and shown to our room. Very spacious suite, clean and well appointed washroom. The dining area was closed already for lunch but we were shown to the bar area and ordered this fabulous lobster cobb salad. It was pouring, pouring rain so we took a taxi next door to the Galleria for a walk around and dinner at Seasons 52. Next morning we got a limo to the pier after a brief discussion on the prices we thought we had agreed upon. That was the only glitch. Would definitely stay again if we were in the area.

title: Nice hotel, but broken air ruined it
review: Dear Susan S Thank you for your comments and happy to read that you will return. We hope to see you on your next cruise. Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Convenient location
review: I stayed at the hotel for 2 nights (May 17 & 18) for a wedding. The first night was nice. By late morning the following day, the room all of the bridesmaids were getting ready in was extremely hot. We though maybe the AC froze. It started to get unbearable. Then the room we were held in prior to ceremony had no air on. We were all sweating, including the bride. During reception, many guests were forced to leave because of the heat. I personally held back from dancing because I was so hot. I have worked in the wedding industry for 10 years and have never experienced a reception room that hot (I wasn't even drinking alcohol). Come to find out, the air in the hotel was not properly functioning and nothing was done about it. The poor bride and groom were so embarrassed.

title: Great
review: We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment. Unfortunately the chiller went down due a mechanical problem.  While we had a crew working on the problem at 6am by 10 we had the problem resolved.  Then again the chiller had a mechanical failure again at 9pm.  Again, our repair company was back but could not get this working until 1am.  Unfortunately this was out of our control and we responded each time as quickly as was possible.   Again, I apologize.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great location
review: The hotel is located within walking distance to the beach and the mall. There are plenty of amenities to take advantage of. The restaurant has decent food (a bit pricey, but tastes good.) The views from the room were great...ocean, downtown, canal.

title: Two night stay before cruise!  Decent, don't worry.
review: I booked this hotel via priceline in a bid.   For the price and location, it was a good deal but before arriving, I was concerned about the condition of the hotel from the reviews I was reading on here.   No need to worry too much about the reviews.  We had more of an apartment style room overlooking the intercoastal.  Loved being able to look out of the window and seeing the boats pass by.  There is a stop for the water taxi outside the hotel.  Our room was clean and we had a handicap bathroom.   The water pressure was great and it was nice to have a small kitchenette in the room.   There is also a small coffee pot with coffee.  There were two tvs.   The bed was super comfortable.   The hotel does need to be updated.  It is very gray and feels more like an apartment building. …

title: Too pricey for dirty room.
review: Dear 296gregorph, Thank you for your review.  It is nice to hear overall you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are in a constant state of improving the hotel as we have just completed rebuilding the dock, refurbishing the patio and are currently painting the building.  Soon we will begin the refurbishment of our corridors, lobby and restaurant.  We hope you will come back to see the improvements.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Room with a view
review: There was thick dust inside the vents and on the sprinkler head that looks like it has been there for years. The chairs to the table were ripped and falling a part. The handle on the microwave was broken. I didn't dare to take my shoes off because the carpet was dingy. I won't go back there especially at 175.00!

title: Vacation Stay
review: Dear Tour51453646753, We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment with your room. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Beautiful place
review: Here for a Mother’s Day visit, and I slept in a very comfortable bed . Wonderful views from my room. Front desk was very welcoming! Great food and I had a great stay!! Close to the mall too, just a short walk from the hotel.

title: Weekend Getaway in Ft. Lauderdale
review: This hotel is our go-to place in Ft. Lauderdale.  Conveniently located on the Intercoastal, with a water taxi stop, adjacent to the mall, and two blocks from the beach.  The suites are clean, and a balcony on the ocean side is worth the uptick.

title: Easy Walking to Beach
review: Dear John F K, Thank you for making us your go to place in Ft. Lauderdale.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.   Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Outstanding experience for the Air Show
review: We had a sales meeting here.  Angela helped our group the entire time.  She took great care of us!!!!!  You should request she works your event.  The property was helpful and the services were excellent.   Thanks!

title: I hate to agree..
review: Dear GMAC523, Thank you for your kind words and we enjoyed having your group.  You are kind to point out one of our stars that made you time with us special.  We hope to see you back with us again soon.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Avoid this hotel
review: This is my go-to staycation hotel! We were here over the weekend for the Fort Lauderdale Air Show. The kids age in range from 10-15. We all had a blast and it was a convenient location to the beach. The kids loved the cookies and the staff was generous with them. The boys even made up a song about getting cookies! I would like to mention Ryan provided us with exceptional service this trip, even checking with the family to make sure they were having fun. Can’t wait for the next “reason” to visit.

title: Awful Experience
review: Horrible check in. Toilet broken. Carpet is gross. Vents full of black stuff, hopefully not mold. Balcony door broken after I went out to see the view. No usb plugs work. Room not ready upon check in. Check in experience horrible.

title: My Wedding
review: Dear Passenger31118570749, We really appreciate your taking the time to share your disappointment with your recent stay. I want to personally apologize that the room and furnish- ing were not of the high standards we expect. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything is like new, in-place, of the highest quality, and in perfect working order. I am sorry if that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts with us. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Wouldn’t recommend
review: The staff is very professional and welcoming. Hotel is clean and in close proximity to the beach. Food in the restaurant and bar is good! Love the cookies! They help to make my wedding wonderful! Me and my Husband enjoyed our stay. We will stay here again

title: Poor hotel and far below the value of the night rate.
review: Dear MocteMa, You are so kind to let us know about your time with us and congratulation on your wedding.  We were so happy to be a part of this wonderful occasion.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Aliona
review: The Hotel lobby was updated but the floor and room were not. The hallway was actually kinda creepy. The carpet looked dirty and the floors looked dirty in the corners and by the walls. The overall experience was average to poor. Also you cannot park your vehicle in the lot and you are forced to use valet parking which is $30.

title: Exceptional Service!
review: The hotel is right on the intercostal waterway and has a great patio for having drinks and dinner! Our server, Aliona, took great care of us all three nights we were there! Clean rooms and great stay!

title: Great location on the intracoastal
review: Dear Adolfo D, Thank you for letting us know about your time with us.  It is a pleasure to hear that your stay was up to your expectations.  You are very kind to mention one of our outstanding team members who made your time with us special.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Shabby and not Chic
review: Very nice accommodations,  Very clean.  The food at the restaurant was very good.  We had Aliona on three different occasions.  She was very professional and quick to take care of all our needs.  Very friendly and great smile.

title: Great Location and Service
review: Dear William W Thank you for letting us know about your stay here at GALLERYone.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you for letting us know about one of our team members that made your stay special.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Disappointing experience
review: Probably the 10th time I’ve stayed here: I only do it because my elderly folks have a condo next door so it’s convenient. The place is in desperate need of refurbishing. I don’t think they have laid new carpets etc here for over 15 years. It’s not inexpensive either.  It’s grungey. Be sure to check your texts when  you check in and your room isn’t ready yet. They said they would “call”me instead they texted me .

title: Nice hotel!
review: Thanks to Rose for the lovely check in! Very nice hotel and clean room. My girlfriend and I had a great time on the 14th floor wich has a beautifull view. Good location if you want to be close to the beach. Shopping mall on walking distance as well. Thank you!

title: Another fabulous stay at this hotel
review: Dear Jackschuller, Thank you for letting us know about your time with us.  It is a pleasure to read how one of our team members made your stay special and you are gracious to mention her by name.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Horrible experience
review: This was our 2nd stay at this hotel and we had a fabulous stay.  We stayed in room no 1107 city view/water view.  The room was clean and tidy.    The perks of staying here is the location, Publix, The Galleria Shopping Centre and the beach are very close.  The only criticism i will make is the decor on the landing/floors and carpets need updating and better lighting would give a nice bright look.  Restaurant food exquisite, bar drinks tantalizing.  Will definitely stay here again

title: South Florida Great Spot
review: Dear Smiler1969, Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay.  We are glad to hear that overall you enjoyed your time with us.  I am happy to let you know that in a few months we will begin refurbishing our corridors and other parts of the hotel.  We look forward to your return to see the new improvements.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Home away from home
review: My family and I booked a suite to stay overnight for an early am flight out of FLL.  We checked in at around 2:30 pm and was told our room would be ready in just a few minutes.  We decide to put our luggage at the bellstand, have the valet park the car and wait outside on the patio for our room to be ready so that we could get situated in our room before other plans.  After an hour, I went back to the front desk to check if I had missed the text about our room being ready and was told it would be at least another 1.5 hours.    Now, I understand it is a busy time and that it was Easter but the wait should have been communicated correctly. I would have made plans to have my girls go for a swim, or we could have gone to the beach while we waited if I knew it was going to take that…

title: disappointing
review: The suites at the hotel were extremely shabby, some furniture broken and a mattress that dipped into the middle which was difficult to sleep in. The kitchen was badly equipped, not even enough for one person let alone two. There must be many hotels in Fort Lauderdale  which are cheaper and better fitted out than this one. the staff at the front desk weren't always that helpful although those working outside were extremely helpful. Some serious upgrades are needed.

title: Three good reasons why this is our 8th year at Gallery One.
review: Dear friedman, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We are embarking upon a number of projects of painting the building, refurbishing the corridors and doors along with the lobby and the restaurant. We hope you will come visit us in the future to see the improvements Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Horrible experience
review: 1/. Why ? Because having a suite is a hundred times better than a room with a TV and a solitary table. We have a living room and a kitchen and when my Mother comes with us a second bedroom ( we like the south facing suites ). Absolutely ideal. It is like having your own condo but not having to worry about it, or pay for it when you are not there.   2/. Location. A few minutes walk to the beach and the same to Galleria Mall with its shops and restaurants. With the trolley nearby and the water taxi at the hotel dock, there is hardly any need for a car.   3/. The hotel has excellent amenities and the staff could not be more helpful. Gallery One is a 5 star example of excellent hotel management. See you all again in the fall !

title: Completely disappointed
review: Dear Stewart1234567,  Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It is a pleasure to know you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Unacceptable cleanliness
review: I found out this hotel does not have an option to do a check-in via APP.  Once I walked into room, back room had a bad water leak and fell when I walked into bathroom, horrible service from staff, only action from staff was to send me a maintenance to fix the leak, never cared if I was OK or even offer a different room.  Staff needs to be re-trained or manager does not have sufficient capacity to run that hotel or any hotel.

title: Wedding - terrible experience at this hotel
review: Do not recommend staying there. The service is awful. People are rude!  Wish we had selected a different venue! Cafe waitress Victoria was rude. Concierge Ryan was awful. I felt it was important to warn fellow travelers what to avoid!

title: Very nice view of the intercostal
review: I really appreciate your taking the time to share your disappointment with your recent stay. I want to personally apologize for the frustration you experienced when the actions of the staff did not meet your expectations. We want our guests to be met with a well-trained staff that puts guest com- fort and satisfaction before everything else. I am sorry if that was not your experience. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts with us. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Short and to the point
review: We love to come here before and after a cruise. So peaceful, close to everything. Great to have a kitchen and the perfect view of the intercostal with the big boat passing by. Go for it, you will be well treated.

title: Friendly staff but hotel needs some TLC
review: Dear DabuekkeP3087, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  It is nice to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your return.  Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Disappointment
review: This place is an absolute dump. Hasn’t been cleaned in years. This includes common areas and rooms. The hotel surroundings are extremely noisy especially the marina side.  I would never book here again. This place should lose it’s status as a Hilton product.

title: OMG Don’t Stay Here
review: We stay at many Hilton properties all over the country. When we checked in to the gallery one in Fort Lauderdale, we were treated very rudely. We have diamond status with Hilton but we’re not even greeted. Our room was not ready when we checked in, so we went to grab some lunch and they text us to let us know when the room is ready. That was perfectly fine, however, when we pulled up at valet they were very pushy and rude, when we got to the front desk we inquired about any upgrades and were told this property does not give upgrades without charging for them. Even though as we stated we are diamond members and have been for a very long time and it states we should be able to receive space available upgrade. We contacted the diamond desk with Hilton and were told, yes, we should…

title: Hotel needs updating in service and condition
review: Dear Stabbrown810, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning the condition of your room. In addition, I apologize about your interaction with our team as in most cases they are caring and go above and beyond. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment, painting of the building, refinishing of the dining room seating and other enhancements to the lobby and restaurant.   I personally appreciate speaking with you.   Again, please accept my apology. Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Total Disappointment!
review: Front desk staff is great (Krysta, Pavlo, etc.). Door guys are great (Esidre? John), albeit they recommended terrible places for brunch. Food and Beverage Supervisor (young woman with curly dark hair) was rude - really rude. Met her in the elevator and she mocked us for thinking we were on lobby floor (actually on 2, where she was getting on elevator) and then didn’t acknowledge us AT ALL - not even a “hello”. Then she got off the elevator before us by blocking the door instead of permitting us to get off first. Bartender at the inside bar (from New York) acted like it was a total inconvenience that we came to the bar asking for a drink. Apparently, being on her phone is top priority. Two female bartenders outside were too comfortable with guests and were drinking behind the bar…

title: Almost the perfect hotel
review: I really appreciate your taking the time to share your disappointment with your recent stay.
