I want to personally apologize for the frustration you experienced when the actions of the staff did not meet your expectations. dear TXSweetHrt214, We want our guests to be met with a well-trained staff that puts guest com- fort and satisfaction before everything else. I am sorry if that was not your experience. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were. Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts with us. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort.  Sincerely, Darraneisha  External response sent

title: Excellent Experience!
review: Well we stayed at this hotel for one night after coming from a cruise out of Miami and going on a cruise the following day out of Fort Lauderdale. First of all the location was perfect as we wanted to use the water taxi which we totally enjoyed but certainly didn’t enjoy the hotel.   This hotel is in dire need of updating, there was a large hole in the ceiling over the table around the light. The appliances in the room were all dirty with finger prints and just nasty looking. The furniture was very old and well worn and to even open the sliding door to the balcony was a task in itself as it was so rusty and old. There was not a single piece of information in the room that informed you of where anything was located in this hotel, you had to call down to the front desk. We called…

title: Poor conditions
review: This is an update to previous post. This hotel needs urgent remodeling and updates. Yes, it’s conveniently located and easy access. You can walk to the mall You can walk to the beach However, the amenities needed major update on remodeling. The rooms are old All rooms and hallways haveA particular odor which is typical of damp and moldy places. It smells of moisture. I have no doubt that there is mold accumulating in this hotel. Also the hotel had two out of the three elevators damaged which created somewhat of chaos and long wait times in order to go up-and-down this hotel. @hilton @hiltonhonors #hilton

title: Greatest staff ever!!! Hi
review: Dear GMP,  We really appreciate your taking the time to share your recent experience. We want to personally apologize for your disappointment with room service. We want our guests to have the best stay possible where everything exceeds their expectations. We are so sorry that was not the case during your stay. You can be confident that we will follow-up on your concerns so that others are not disappointed as you were.  Again, thank you for making the effort to share your thoughts. We value you as a guest, and I do want you to know that your concerns are our concerns! Please stay with us again soon so that we can demonstrate our commitment to your comfort.

title: Great place to enjoy Lauderdale
review: What a wonderful hotel and staff! Everybody was amazing, but I would like to especially mention 2 people: Juliana and Diego. They took such good care of us. Everybody was amazing, but I would like to especially mention Diego, who treated us like we were the only people that mattered!!   He was a great server, host, problem solver etc.   And Giuliana took incredible care of us even though we were always late turning in the lunch orders!  She is so gracious.  Thank you all

title: TERRIBLE PLACE DONT STAY !
review: Dear Lisa C, We are so glad everything went well with your conference.  Thank you for pointing out some of our team members who made your time with us special.  We want to thank you for your business and hope your group will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: WPN Business of Speaking
review: Hotel rooms are excellent for family and groups. Kitchens are great. Hotel location walking distance to beach and shopping.   inter coastal  taxi is fun way to see sites.  Pool is great. Home away from him.

title: today
review: this is not a review.  We have booked this hotel for next winter.  On sights where travelers have booked and stayed at the Gallery One, they all report a dirty, shabby rundown hotel.   This is very discouraging.  I would like to hear from the manager what renovation plans are before this winter's season.  We would like to keep our reservation because we like the location, but we want to be happy and comfortable.

title: Excellent staff
review: Dear babylene, Thanks for your inquiry.  We are continuing to work on the hotel.  Here is quick list of approved projects.  We have just completed rebuilding the dock on the intracoastal, refurbished the patio with fire pits, We will begin painting of the building in May and will be re-facing room doors and adding new carpeting in the corridor.  We are working with our new designers to redo the lobby, lower lobby and restaurant.  In the rooms we are refinishing dining chairs and other items.  I hope this answers your questions.   Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Thank you Diego
review: I attended an event here and although I didn't stay at the hotel, the quality of the staff shone throughout my experience, from the concierge outside to the restaurant staff.   I've worked in hotels as housekeeping and know how much goes on behind the scenes and without fail the amazing Diego kept our room functioning, beverages flowing, and all the things we didn't notice too I'm sure.    Thanks Diego and everyone

title: Diego is awesome!
review: Dear JQ73c Thank you for your comments and letting us know about the outstanding job one of our team members did for your group.  We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Diego was fantastic!
review: Special thank you to Diego who took care of our meeting with him the entire time and did an extraordinary job. Thank you  for your constant attention, your detailed support, and for doing everything we needed even before we knew we needed it.

title: WPN Speaker Conference
review: We had a conference at the hotel today and just wanted to shout out to our Server Diego who took care of all of our needs and went beyond expectation in making sure our group was taken care of. Thanks Diego!,

title: Very Accommodating for Conferences
review: Dear LoveTravel463342, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us during your conference.  It is always a pleasure to hear about one of our team members who made your time with us special.  Thank you for recognizing his hard work in making sure everything was right for your group.  We look forward to your conference returning next year and I personally want to thank you for your business.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Service from Diego at our WPN event
review: I am attending a four day conference at this hotel, so all I can speak of is my conference experience. I just want to say that Diego, the hotel staff member taking care of our group did an excellent job of juggling people‘s needs. Whenever I walked by him he smiled, and asked if there was anything that I needed. Super friendly service to us all. The kitchen staff also did an excellent job of providing food ordering options in advance so that we could eat lunch in a timely manner. So thank you to Diego and Doubletree staff!

title: WPN training
review: Dear LEGoldstein, Thank you for letting us know about your experience with us during your conference.  It is a pleasure to hear how our team reacted to your needs and did this with a smile.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: WPN Business of Speaking
review: Diego has been such an awesome service minded employee for the entire event. He truly represents hospitality in its purest form. Competent and courteous. He has been there whenever we have needed anything. Great job!

title: Diego was AWESOME!
review: We were here for a conference and Diego took such good care of us. He was so attentive with our needs in the conference room! Great service! He was attentive to providing all we needed with the coffee service and the ac adjusting. Thank you Diego!

title: Thank you Diego!!
review: Dear Alexandra V Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us during your conference.  It is always a pleasure to hear about one of our team members who made your time with us special.  Thank you for recognizing his hard work in making sure everything was right for your group.  We look forward to your conference returning next year and I personally want to thank you for your business.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Amazing View, Food and Service
review: I am part of the Women's Prosperity Network business conference and want to recognize our server Diego.  He was so helpful and sweet to all of us. Several times he popped in to see if we needed something.  Such a nice guy and very professional. Thank you Diego!!

title: Excellent Service and great location
review: Dear Geri B, We were honored to have your group with us.  It is a pleasure to hear your enjoyed you time with us and you are kind to point out one of our special team members who made your time with us special.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: GalleryOne services
review: Today was my first experience with this hotel and I was very impressed. The food was great, valet was fast and courteous and our “go to guy”, Diego was amazing. I attend the last leg of my conference tomorrow and definitely look forward to coming back.

title: Excellent Option for Large Suite for Family
review: We stayed two nights after our cruise. The GalleryOne was in an excellent location and the two bedroom suite was more than enough room for our family of five! We enjoyed the pool, bar service and the water taxi right out back.The view from the balcony included the waterway/bridge with yachts and a peak of the ocean. We walked to Publix for some essentials we needed. We just loved it!

title: Food was amazing
review: Dear Bobbosue H, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.  We hope you will return soon.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Pubic hair in shower
review: Stayed there  8 nights for a work event and had catered food for breakfast lunch and snacks.  The food was not only delicious and varied but the staff, Diego in particular, were amazing. Would definitely go back just for the food and service.

title: Perfect for families!
review: Dear Alex392, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us during your conference.  It is always a pleasure to hear about a team members who made your time with us special.  Thank you for recognizing his hard work in making sure everything was right for your group. It great to hear how much you enjoyed the food from our chef. We look forward to your conference returning next year and I personally want to thank you for your business.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great stay!
review: Yep pubic hair in shower, couldn't believe it, took over 2 hours to get a cleaner up there, eye roll at the front desk by one of the workers, I thought I was relatively nice Nd calm about it but I guess any complaint is not, beware of this place much better places out there

title: Amazing staff
review: I stayed here for a work conference. We had a suite for one week and were provided breakfast and lunch each day. The room was spacious, comfortable and clean.   What I enjoyed most about the trip was the staff here. They are so accommodating!   Diego and Jamie were the servers for our group all week. They are so kind and hard working.   Diego was very attentive and always asked if we were okay and how the food was. It felt good to know that he cared. It really felt very genuine. It turns out we are both from New Jersey!   I liked that the kitchen mixed up the food options. The food was tasty.   Thanks Gallery One for having great staff and great coffee!!   Your team rocks!!

title: Great location
review: Dear SoniaKim_29, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  You are kind to let us know about two of team members who made your time with us special.  We will be sure to recognize both.   Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Customer Service
review: Stayed for 4nights after cruise rooms spacious with mini kitchen  Next to galleria mall where you can pick up trolley for a dollar takes you round Fort Lauderdale  The hotel is very clean and staff are great  We had a great stay

title: Krysta and the GalleryOne Doubletree Hotel are both amazing!
review: Dear Masums, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We are all glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us. I hope the next time you are in town you will once again chose to stay with us.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Suite Life!
review: There was a team of approximately 10 of my colleagues staying at this hotel in which we reserved a Conference Room where approximately 10 other colleagues arrived for a meeting, we order lunch and the service that was provided by Diego J was outstanding, professional, humble and most of all friendly. Coming from someone who travels almost every week and stays in numerous hotels, the service render by Diego is to be recognized and rewarded. Thank you Galleryone, for choosing people like Diego to represent your business and create great memories and experiences for all visitors.

title: Amazing service from Diego
review: We held corporate meetings and recruiting events at this venu and received exceptional service from Diego. He was extremely attentive and made it a priority to provide us with anything we needed or requested. His pleasant personality made all the difference in the world and we will likely do business with this venue again. I highly recommend this place for any business meetings and be sure to have Diego assist you for a smooth and seamless process or event.

title: Diego
review: Dear dmes84,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your time with us for your meeting at GALLERYone. It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay. You are very kind to single out one of our team members who made your visit memorable. We look forward to your return and I personally want to thank you and your group for your business. Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Wonderful time!
review: We were at the hotel for a 3 days business meeting and the experience was very good. I would like to highlight the very good service of our host- Diego J who was always very helpful, smiling and willing to assist.

title: Friend reunion
review: Thank you so much for letting us know about your time with us for your meeting at GALLERYone. It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay. You are very kind to single out one of our team members who made your visit memorable. We look forward to your return and I personally want to thank you and your group for your business. Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Such a disappointment
review: Beautiful hotel!! The staff was so nice, helpful and accommodating. Everyone from the front desk, valet, bartenders and housekeeping made our stay so enjoyable and easy. The room was nice and clean and the location and views were amazing!! Such a convent location, near the water taxis.  Will definitely be back! Thanks for a wonderful experience!

title: Embarrassing
review: Stayed at this hotel several times. Had 2 rooms on 2 different floors. Paid  near 300$ can. Expected more. Rooms dated and needed update...baseboards tattered, bathrooms dated. Vents dirty. ... room not ready at 4pm. We had been travelling since 2 am from Canada. Resto on patio served wine in plastic cups! We are not children! Common areas dated and dirty. This hotel has been resting on its laurels af great location....time to look after your paying clients! Fort Lauderdale in general has dorky hotel accommodations because of cruise ships. This is not Orlando. Come on time to spruce up the place. I won’t go back. Too bad my favourite mall is there.

title: Good - and could update
review: Dear Sylviemuise,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning the condition of your room. Unfortunately due to the pathway to the pool and risk of broken glasses we do have to use plastic on the patio to ensure safety to all of our guests.   We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intracostal l waterway. Again, please accept my apology.

title: What a Disappointment
review: Hotel is in a great location- on intercoastal, short walk to the beach.  Excellent, friendly staff, eager to make your stay perfect. Nice suites with balcony.    But, the hotel needs some updating.  Hallway carpets - and in room need replaced.  Everything needs a facelift- but still good much outweighed the need for renovations.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Debi J, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. Overall I am glad you enjoyed your time with us.  We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intracostal l waterway.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Solid Value for All-Suites Stay Close to Not On Beach
review: GalleryOne is in a great location – next to a major mall, across from a grocery store,  and within comfortable walking distance to the beach.  But this hotel is way below what I've come to expect of Double Tree. The rooms are dated with furniture that is worn and chipped.  Carpets throughout the building are stained, ripped.  Staff aloof and unhelpful - my calls to the front desk for assistance with a broken and noisy thermostat at midnight went unanswered.  When I walked down to the front desk at 2:00 in the morning, my issue was "added to the list" and I was told it would take 30 - 45 mins to get a maintenance employee to my room.  No apology, no expression of regret.  My issue was clearly an imposition.  Definitely not what I have come to expect from the Hilton brand.

title: The views are awesome.
review: Trying to put some sugar on spice, hotel staff was lovely, Shay, Amy on down to Angela and Diego.  Was there for a business conference and there were some hiccups along the way, but they tried their best to remedy it for us. Hotel was a cluster of not knowing what anyone else was doing when getting ready for 60+ folks on top of all of the Spring Breakers there. Overall though, I walked away with a positive experience.

title: Nice location on the intracoastal waterway
review: Dear laura_WMM, Thank you for your comments and letting us know about your stay.  I do apologize for the few errors that occurred during your meeting.  This time of year is always a challenge during spring break.  You are kind to mention so many of our team members that made your stay.  We will be sure to recognize each and everyone of them.   Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Oh Hilton what happened?
review: We enjoyed our stay here. A very warm welcome and they checked in every day to see how our stay was going. We enjoyed the pool, the water taxi stop right there, being able to eat inside or out, and of course the cookies! We were worried Friday night when the weekend crowd arrived for spring break, but the noise from the hallway was drowned out by our fan and closing the interior bedroom door - much appreciated! Lots of stuff around the hotel as well.

title: overpriced and dated
review: Dear Heather S Thank you for letting us know about your stay and we are glad you enjoyed your time with us.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Dirty! Dirty! Dirty!
review: At $368US a night I wanted to love this hotel. It gets a three for proximity to the mall and to the water taxi. The valet desk gets a five. Front desk a four although calling my home to let me know my room is ready is probably not going to reach me. But here is the thing. This is the absolute dirtiest Hilton hotel I have ever seen. Ever. In fact I really have never seen a Hilton that dirty. This hotel is nasty dirty. The carpets are so dirty they are shameful. They need to be ripped up now. Obviously nobody from Hilton head office has ever seen this hotel. They need to. This is prime location. Doubletree is a good brand. This hotel brings it down so many levels it is embarrassing to the brand. It needs serious investment. Our kitchen has a hole in the ceiling. The bottom of the…

title: Great Location/ Great Service
review: We’ve stayed here before and we were excited to be back. Upon our arrival we did find out the room we booked was no longer available but they immediately found us another room and said if we didn’t like it as much we could move the next day. The new room had a nicer view both ocean and coastal waterway but too much street noise from bridge for my liking. Next day they moved all our bags while we were gone to a wonderful room that had a gorgeous view of the inter coastal waterway and was quieter. We were also concerned about all the spring break kids staying in the hotel but the hotel must stay on top of them because we experienced no noise from all these college kids. Our 2nd night the manager bought us drinks to compensate for a bit slower service at the bar which really wasn’t…

title: Thank you Diego Jamillo
review: Dear 1toppump, Thank you for your comments and letting us know about your time with us.  We are looking forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Good location, hotel tired
review: A special 'Thank You' to Diego Jamillo who did a wonderful job taking care of our needs during our meeting at the Galleryone.  He is so professional, kind and resourceful.   He anticipated our requests and was very proactive in making sure things were done properly.  Thank you Diego for making our meeting so successful. All the best. Jacqueline

title: Not Family Friendly
review: Dear kittycatjaq, Thank you for letting us know about your time with us.  You are kind to mention one of our outstanding team members who assisted you.  We look forward to your return.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Good location, large rooms, terrible service
review: Reception did the best they could and we don't fault them but the room was not ready by check in time (not cleaned from previous occupants), room grimy and in need of a proper cleaning (surfaces of doors, walls, counters dirty, cupboards in kitchenette dirty, cigarette butts on balcony, etc.), furniture torn and completely worn out (could get better at local thrift store!), air conditioner loud, 4 towels in a 2-room suite with 7 guests.  Positives: Front desk staff did their best to accommodate the unexpected late check in due to room not ready. Location is good with easy walk to beach.

title: Fun Time
review: We arrived March 10 and departed March 13. I really like this hotel a lot. The workers are kind and energetic. They great you at the front desk with bottled water and cookies. A great gesture. Each room is a suite with bedroom, living room and kitchenette. The room is basically very quiet with minimum street noise when windows are shut. I truly enjoyed the bar off the lobby. Kudos to Dana, the bartender. Because of her caring nature and generous personality, I will return to this venue. Did I mention I was here during Spring Break?  It was fun. I am 79 years old and enjoyed watching the young people enjoying themselves.

title: Not Great
review: Dear 318RichardF, Thank you for such a kind review.  I am glad you enjoyed your time with us and thank you for mentioning one of our outstanding team members.  We hope you will return soon and i must say you may be 79 but you your attitude will keep you young forever.   Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Organized chaos
review: We stayed at GALLERYone for one night prior to flying out of Ft. Lauderdale. We had high expectations based on the reviews and proximity to the beach. However, the hotel was oversold causing a delay at check-in, the room was older with torn furnishings, and the kids next to us partied all night and the pot was so thick we nearly got a contact high.   We’re routine Hilton customers and needless to say, we’ll avoid this hotel the next time we’re in town. Too bad because the views and location are great.

title: Prime Location.
review: Dear DeringerSEK, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room and noise disturbance encountered. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Spring break is always a challenging time for all of us and I apologize that you were disturbed.  I hope you informed the desk or security? Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.

title: Avoid at all costs
review: We were there for a wedding, so didn’t need this to be so difficult for guests. The staff tried, but they were clearly inexperienced and understaffed The whole experience from checking in, trying to have a quick bite to checking out was chaos.  It seemed like no one knew what they were doing.  It’s not fun always having  to get a a supervisor to “make it right”.  The supervisor/manager was just plain rude.  Since it was 4 o’clock and 3 out of 5 rooms were still not available , he told me check in was NOT at 4 but anytime after 4!  I guess they should change their website.  We requested early check in several days ahead and although I certainly understand not guaranteed, at least I should be able to have room at 4.  We had guests who didn’t get their room until after 6.  We were…

title: Great hotel
review: We chose this hotel because of location. Publix and a average size mall is about a 5 minute walk. Everything inside the hotel is up to date and nice, staff is great. The only complaint I have is they offer no parking, it’s valet parking only at 40$ per day which is outrageous, but we rented a car about a 5 min walk across the bridge and the car rental place will let you park the car there whenever you need which is very cool. I would have gave 5 stars but with the valet parking price I can only give 4

title: Excellent service
review: Dear Seaside42943674094, Thank you for letting us know about your stay and overall glad you enjoyed your time with us.  Unfortunately as in all the other hotels along the coastal section valet is the only choice and our $35/night fee is one of the lowest.  Unlike the other hotels we do not charge a resort fee.  I hope the next time you are with us that you will once again stay with us.  Regards, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Avoid
review: Our company worked at the Gallery One Doubletree in Fort Lauderdale.  The staff was great!  From the front desk service (Krista) to the banquets service (Diego) everything was great.  The entire staff was helpful, courteous and professional.

title: Unbeatable at the price!
review: Dear Michael C, Thank you for your comments and taking the time to let us know about your time with us.  You were very kind to mention several team members that made your stay with us outstanding.  Again, thank you Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great location of an acceptable hotel
review: This hotel was a real disappointment.  It is in desperate need of a complete overhaul.  The carpet in the hallways needs stretched at the very least because the lumps and waves are a safety hazard. The carpet in the room is stained and disgusting.  The sheets on the bed need to find their way to the dumpster.  As a Hilton Diamond member, I expect great service and a clean, comfortable room.  This hotel is really old, tired and just wore out.  If the TV show "Hotel Impossible" was still on, I would recommend this property to them.  They would be the only recommendation I would give.  Ownership and management needs to do a thorough walk through with the maintenance and housekeeping departments and make a checklist.

title: Lovely hotel, good location, and a good Pool.
review: We Stayed there for 3 night, and had a good Stay, the hotel was cleaned, and the services was good too. You have all around you, 7 min to the beach, shop for Food 600m to walk, and the Galleria shopping Mall 500m and a lot of good restaurant.

title: Great February break in the sun.
review: Dear Sightseer33014787171 Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and we hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Horrible
review: Perfect location. Just out of the constant traffic of the beachfront, close enough to walk down there in ten minutes. Close to some awesome restaurants around the Galleria, Publix a 5 minute walk away for any requirements. Beautiful outdoor area on the waterway. The Water Taxi stop is right outside. The pool can be a little ‘fresh’  as it’s in the shade for significant periods, but given the heat most of the year that’s very welcome. We enjoyed the reasonably priced breakfasts. Our room was nice and big with everything needed. Including a good pressure shower. Would stay again.

title: Wedding Block Hotel
review: Dear Sean C, Thank you for your comments and letting us know about your time with us.   I am glad to read that you enjoyed the hotel, our location and our team members.  We hope the next time you return to Fort Lauderdale you will again stay with us.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Nice Stay!
review: We came here for spring break and we’re actully being respectful people keeping our music down and not making a mess. However the staff has somehow “recived” noise complaints. Although I would expect us to be loud, we really weren’t. I’ve really never wrote a review but they are really trying to screw us for absolute now reason. The last straw was when they “revived” another complaint for us being too loud as 3 of us were talking outside on the balcony with no music playing at all at like 11:00 PM. We have been nothing but respectful to the staff employees and we have recived none of it back in return and it seems as if they are trying to kick us out and strand 6 kids for their spring break, real disappointment.

title: Hotel in runned down and needs major renovations to be considered the quality I would expect from a Hilton hotel
review: The staff was very nice, and the outdoor area was wonderful.  Love the location, but could not recommend this hotel due to the poor conditions on the hotel interior.  There was mold in the bathrooms, the room was not cleaned well, and even the carpeting in the hallways was coming up.

title: Beware that this Hilton Property falls short on what you would expect for a Hilton Property.
review: I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity.  I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially concerning your suite.  This is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and just completed rebuilding the dock and access to the intracostal waterway.   Regards, Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Diego Trujillo - BEST STAFF
review: Was giving the wrong room that was originally booked. Beds and pillows are in a major need of an upgrade. AC system doesn’t cool correctly. Make sure you check towels. We didn’t have enough for the amount of people we reserved for.

title: Diego did an Amazing Job!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future. Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Medical Seminar
review: I’m so happy with the service that I got in the hotel, Diego Trujillo helped me any time that I needed and always with the best atitud!! Thanks Gallery One for a great experience!! Looking forward to be there again!!    Arturo Ochoa

title: Great Customer Service
review: I was onsite at the property for an Empire Medical Training seminar that takes place on the second floor. I was in need of a hand and assistance with regards to setting up for a business conference. As I had my hands full, a gentleman by the name of Diego Jaramillo who I believe is the head of Banquet Services, offered to assist me with my things. He was very helpful, personable and offered to assistance with regards to the entire setup process. Being that I am onsite at various hotels for events quite often, it is always nice to have courteous and attentive staff to assist in the setup and breakdown process. With that said, I definitely appreciated Diego's efforts.

title: What a gem!
review: Dear laserman305, Thank you so much for your review about your meeting with us.  We value your business and the long relationship we have with Empire Medical.  You are very kind to point out one of our team members whom made your time with us special.  We look forward to your next meeting with us.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Staff
review: This is my second time staying at the Gallery One Fort Lauderdale. Love it here. From the moment I checked in to check out time everyone was so friendly and helpful. Wanted to give special thanks to Lauren who was able to hook me up with a last minute spa day. A super special thanks to Krysta who was just amazing. Anything I needed she was there. Loved her little messsges to see if we needed anything. My room was like a little apartment with an amazing view. You feel like you are at home. The location is perfect. Close to the beach and the Galleria Mall. This place is a gem. I plan to be back.

title: Great location but the hotels needs a facelift
review: Dear Mariagd1, Thank you for your kind comments and letting us know about your stay with us.  Thank you for pointing out several team members who made your stay special.  We are looking forward to your next stay.  Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Needs a do over ...
review: Stayed at the DoubleTree the week of February 18th and the staff was absolutely wonderful. They are so eager to help with anything you need. Especially Diego, Amy and Shay! Diego will go above and beyond for guests. Amy and Shay are real problem solvers. Had a great experience because of them.

title: Beautiful accommodations and helpful staff
review: We traveled here the day before departing on a cruise.  Even though we arrived late and during a rain storm the staff was great!  The suite we chose was perfectly clean and the bed was inviting after a long day of flying.  In the morning breakfast was delicious and the staff was friendly.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Check your charges on your credit card
review: Dear Safari26448634612, Thank you for letting us know about your visit with us.  Even though it was short I am glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great location
review: We stayed at this hotel on February 14th... The hotel itself was great, no complaints... BUT beware of your credit card charges... I was charged for my room PLUS 3 more charges were put on my card for rooms... Yes I did say 3!!!   I have called the hotel at least 8 times and talked to different people who assured me the charges would be reversed and nothing has been done as of yet.... This to me is fraud and if nothing is done within the next day I will be contacting the local police!!   BE SURE TO CHECK YOUR CHARGES BEFORE LEAVING!!!

title: Property that’s improving...be careful of too critical reviews
review: Dear Nicole, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning billing errors. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. I do understand that your billing errors have been corrected. Again, please accept my apology.   Regards, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great property for groups! Awesome CS!
review: The room was dated and somewhat rough.  It needed some serious cleaning.  Dust and other items were in plain view and should have been addressed by housekeeping.  If you stay here, request the pool side of the hotel.  The Sunrise Blvd. side is very noisy with traffic and the draw bridge.

title: The Really Bad and Some Good
review: What a mixed bag this stay was- although there was more bad than good.  I am a Hilton Honors member and I booked a water view room with a balcony amd two queen beds directly with Hilton, but when my son and I arrived at the hotel they had given away our room, even though it was reserved with a credit card, All they had for us was a room with one double bed. The nice night clerk could not understand why someone in their hotel had made the switch. He confirmed I had booked a room with two beds. He told us that he would make sure we got the right room the next night.  My son, a grown man, ended up on a terrible sleeper sofa which was concave and hurt his back.  The next morning I called down and spoke with a woman, I believe her name was Shanieka and she was in operations, but I’m…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Dream803231  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews of all this items that seem to go wrong. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Stay somewhere else
review: Amenities, hotel, etc. very good- had room issues with sliding glass doors and heater/cooler- both were not new issues and should have been fixed previously.  Meals in restaurant very good- except they ran out of two items from the menu each day.  Service staff excellent.

title: Mediocre at best
review: Dear Nancy B, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  Thank you for letting us know about the issues in your suite as we always are working to improve upon our hotel.  It is nice to hear you enjoyed the hotel amenities. Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Very disappointed
review: This was the dirtiest Hilton family hotel I have ever stayed at. If you’re an Honors member, pick another Hilton hotel in the area. The room was dirty, bathroom, floor, curtains, towels everything was gross.  I will say, the staff was very friendly however not very helpful.

title: Not happy with this HIlton
review: We stay at Hilton hotels all the time.  The front desk staff and cleaning people on our floor were all gracious, especially the cleaning crew.  We rented a 2 bedroom suite for our family.  The carpet in the suite was so dirty...it needed to be replaced, no vacuum could clean this carpet.  The rooms face a busy road and the noise is constant, not relaxing at all.  The buffet breakfast definelty not worth the money, very poor.   Thankfully since we are diamond we are comped breakfast for two but had to pay for rest of family.  Not happy with this Hilton experience.

title: Nice Experience
review: Dear coldnortheast,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room and noise disturbance encountered. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future to see the improvements  Sincerely, Bob Bob Keesler General Manager   .

title: Is this really a Hilton property???
review: The stay I had at this property was excellent! John at Valet set up transportation the day before we arrived with Dynasty Limo.  He went above and beyond to be sure we had a good experience from the moment we arrived.  We arrived very late in the evening and the front desk met us with a smile and a professional attitude.  (We always enjoy our cookies upon arrival each evening, as well!)  Breakfast in the morning was great! Keep up the good work!

title: First Impressions Count for alot!
review: Dear NanSab Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  It is great to hear that your time with us was pleasant.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Aweful
review: 3 night stay for a medical conference. The room with mandatory valet parking was over $300/night. The carpet is old, dingy and dirty. The toilet tank top was coming off and I asked for a repair as it would not fit down on the tank and it was never repaired. The chairs were old and dated with peeling leather to the point the padding was showing. I asked for a different room because all 4 dinning chairs were in this condition. I was told by the manager they were all in this condition. The next room I was switched to had 1 chair opposed to 4 chairs in this condition (go figure) Horrible horrible overpriced hotel that was well  below Hilton's standards!! Hotels.com confirmed a price but I was charged a different price at checkout...what a RIP off😡

title: Experience
review: The rooms had a feeling of motel not a hotel, the television was not working in the living room. The bar was out of Tito’s, was told to go to the fourth floor for snacks out the vending area. No Red Bull’s.

title: What a week!
review: Dear  Venture46307403845  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services.  I do apologize that we were out of Tito's and that you did not find the other 5 vodkas that we offer acceptable.  As for the red bull the bar is the only area that has red bull so I apologize that you were directed to the vending area.   Again, we appreciate you feedback in our efforts to always be improving  Sincerely,  Bob, Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Fantastic Location and Staff
review: So started off staying in the deluxe suite. Massive size, patio with a great view of the dumpster but only on the patio for a little anyway. The chairs are dated or maybe theyre vintage leather? Hardly sat down so wasnt too much of a problem. The sofa bed below par. The shower in the double bed room had low pressure..but other than that excellent! I came to see friends, family. Every employee at the hotel was beyond excellent. Especially Dana, and Josh. They deserve a raise. We do not suggest eating breakfast here. I think the chef makes it with his eyes closed. 110$ for slop. The other food was good though. The pool is coverd by the shadow of a building for most the day so i bet in summertime during peak heat its wonderful. Get your water taxi tickets at the front. Do the water…

title: Outdated ...
review: Dear Mobile04404162848 Thank you for your comments about your week with us at GALLERYone.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed the service you received from our team members and you are very kind to mention two of our team who made your stay special.  I do apologize that you did not enjoy your breakfast and we will take up with our culinary team as we continue to improve our restaurant.  I am glad to hear you found your other meals to your liking.  We hope you will return the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Outdated Hotel-Good Service
review: Great Location - near all amenities; 5 min. walk to beach; on the inter-coastal waterways; water taxi at the hotel; Galleria Mall next door; great restaurants. The hotel staff is priceless - the valet staff are incredible. Nice way to be welcomed. Good things in the horizon for this hotel - would definitely keep in on your radar!

title: Excellent Staff
review: Hotel is a bit older and could use an update to the furniture and carpeting but the staff made our stay enjoyable. The breakfast was very good and a good variety of breakfast options. Location is not on the beach but a short 3-5 minute walk. The Inter-coastal ferry does make a stop at the hotel back patio deck which is very convenient.

title: Roaches. Search the word ROACHES before considering staying here
review: Dear Kokko1, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed our service and our location.  We hope the next time you are here you will again choose our hotel.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Noisy and overpriced
review: Roaches everywhere.  Roaches in the kitchen. Roaches in the closet.  Roaches in the bathroom.  Roaches near your luggage.  Roaches on the walls.  Roaches on the headboard.  Roaches on the toilet paper you are about to use.  Roaches on the light switches.  Roaches in the cabinets.    9 nights of outdated and dirty hotel. I didn’t sleep well because I was paranoid that roaches were crawling on me.  Carpeting throughout hotel is stained and dirty.  Elevators are gross.  Walls need fresh paint.  The place needs a major facelift.  I am not excited to bring roaches home.  I wish I would have read more reviews before subjecting myself and my husband to this.  Save yourself sleepless nights and nightmares and stay elsewhere.  Just read other reviews and search the word “roaches”.  There…

title: front desk staff and housekeeping make up for Hilton standards.
review: Dear Meagan O, Thank you for your comments.  I must admit that we are very confused that during your stay at no time did any one inform the hotel of any problems.  That said it seems you had rented your unit from an individual owner that is not part of the Hilton Program at GALLERYone Double Tree Suites.  Unfortunately we do not have control over these units as again they are not part of our program.  I do however wish that you had informed us of this situation as we would have tried our best to assist you.  We are always concerned about the state of our hotel and I must say at no time in the last several years has anyone complained about any type of pest problems.  I do thank you for bring this to our attention as we have had this unit inspected and informed the owner of this unit about your concerns.  Certainly if you have any questions please reach out to me.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager  Hilton Hotels

title: Do not recommend
review: This hotel is located between a busy road and the water which is beautiful but it's also near a bridge so the noise of the road or the noise of the bridge raising to allow boats to travel through is fairly loud.  Plus the noise of the autos going over the metal bridge sounds like a lot of loud wind.  Too expensive for the lack of sleep.

title: Great Hotel
review: The service/people were awesome. The location fantastic and central to a lot of different activities. Properties furniture is a little dated but comfortable. The only negative is there is no self parking option and the valet is a little pricey.

title: Second to none!
review: Dear sigkearney, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your return.  As for your comment about valet I will say that all of the major hotels in Fort Lauderdale are valet only and our price is one of the lowest.  You will also notice that most of the other hotels also charge a resort fee that we do not charge.  Again, thank you for your comments. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: John @ Valet
review: Had a great visit. Service was awesome! Justin C at Valet had my visit start and end with excellence! I’ll definitely be back. The food was great. The room was clean. They view was great. The check in service was quick and friendly.

title: Watched the Boat Parade
review: Dear Berkley B Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your time with us and we hope you will return soon.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Nice hotel, great staff, within walking distance of the beach.
review: John at the valet was amazing. My phone died after leaving a wedding party yacht and I was unable to call an Uber. John not only tried to help charge my phone, but also he called an Uber for me on his phone. Totally deserves 5 stars and a promotion. Thank you John!

title: Hotel with a view
review: We stayed here for a few nights and enjoyed the trip. All of the staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. The room itself was very nice, but as others have mentioned there is definitely room for some improvement. The chairs in the dining area were a bit worn, the safe’s batteries were dead, and light over the shower would turn on and off every once in a while, but otherwise no issues. The view of the water from the balcony was really nice, and one of my favorite parts of the hotel. I also loved the bathroom, particularly the shower. We had a king bed and I could lay in it forever. It was so big and comfortable. The sheets and comforter were spotless and very comfortable. I liked having s bedroom separate from the main area, and I liked that I had the option to cook in the…

title: Staff wasn't friendly, hotel wasn't clean.
review: Dear DBernard1029, Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  Overall I am glad you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to you coming back soon. Sincerely Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Don't do it !
review: The hotel was dated, rugs seemed dirty and old. The front desk was less than helpful, blamed cleaning crew, but was really their mess up in forgetting to pass a message along. Not a friendly staff. Short walk to the beach, but can be loud outside as hotel off the main road.

title: Neveragaininlauderdale
review: Dear Tbert5623, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: The only place we will stay when visiting Fort Lauderdale
review: Molded ceilings, broken toilets, ripped furniture and carpet. They are expecting renovations, but not yet. Staff was great but they knew the conditions were poor.  The rooms we really dark.  Would not go back.

title: Wonderful
review: We were treated as a Diamond member should be . We felt appreciated from the time we checked in til we left .  Very convenient location , short walking distance to mall and cafes. Breakfast made to order omeletes were very tasty.  And we ❤️ The warm cookies !

title: Not worth your money
review: Dear conniedaltonga, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is pleasure to hear how you enjoyed your time and I personally want to thank you for your business and your Diamond status.  Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Management needs to get their act together.
review: Stayed here with my family for two nights. For the money we payed, not worth it. Very uncomfortable pillows that left our necks sore.  The kitchen sink had a leak which meant the cupboard under the sink where the trash can was, was all wet and dirty.  The only option to park your car is valet, which costs $35+tax, and they literally park it two feet away from the hotel entrance. You could do it yourself for free, but you can’t.  The corridors where the rooms are, are filthy and dark. Since the day we arrived until we left, the carpet had the same dirt, which meant they never vacuumed it.   The only good thing about the hotel: it’s a 5 minute walk away from the beach.

title: OK hotel
review: Dear 651lulim,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning the leak under your sink.   This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. As for our valet service, most Fort Lauderdale hotels are valet only and our charge is one of the lowest.We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intracostal l waterway.  Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Great location and helpful staff, building needs a refresh
review: This was my third stay at this hotel. I booked online on the 1st August 2018 for my stay which was 29th December 2018 to 3rd January 2019. The day I booked I was immediately charged $355.95 for my Intracoastal View  Balcony suite - 2 Queen which covers one night. I arrived at the hotel around 5.30 pm on the 29th. I was told my room was not ready and to go and have a drink at the bar and they will call me when my room was ready. I said my wife was not feeling well and please get us set up as soon as possible.  They then said a King was available. I agreed to take that as my wife just wanted to get to bed. On reaching the room there was no balcony and no intracoastal view (See Pic) but a car park view. I went back to the front desk and said this was unacceptable at which time they…

title: Good service
review: I had a wonderful help from John that works at Valet. Dedicated, helpful and good humor :) (I needed some help to find a cab, and uber was overpriced, so he helped me to get one from Lift. Even though was his lunch time, he was a gentlemen).

title: Maintenance lacking, Housekeeping marginal, at least front desk staff were 75% awesome
review: Dear Claudia T Thank you for taking the time to let us know about you time with us.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: A missed opportunity
review: I'll begin this review as I began an email to the front desk manager dated 31 December 2018.  The GalleryONE Double Tree has three redeeming qualities: the front desk staff are pleasant and attentive, location is good although not right on the beach, Jackie in the dining room is an asset to the hotel.  When booking Hilton properties I've come to expect a certain consistency of brand and attention to detail, especially at Double Trees.  This hotel was a disappointment.  Simple maintenance issues could so easily fix some of the cosmetic issues that were glaring in room 818.   The property is tired, but nothing that caulk, paint, and thorough elbow grease wouldn't fix.   Stretch the carpets. Replace chairs that are torn up around the edges. Fix doors that have either settled or…

title: Pretty decent
review: Dear  wtklemp,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review.  This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intercostal l waterway. Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Staff was very nice.....
review: This was a disappointing experience because of one factor NEGLECT!!!! The problem stems from management. They do not inforce clean common areas which is very important when you are sleeping in a place. The room was tidy but the towels smelled moldy. We complained to management that the elevators were utterly disgusting and that the hallways went days with out vacuuming, ( which was evident by passing the same pile of crud daily)!!! It’s obviously not new but it has good bones a good location and a good layout for large families like mine. Unfortunately, the filth and the lack of maintenance is a huge deterrent!! When coming into the hotel entrance every light is out. It’s not just the posts ( that they claim were damaged in a hurricane), but the lightbulbs in the entry are out…

title: NEVER AGAIN!!!!
review: Let me first start by saying that this was the worst experience EVER. I frequent Hilton properties regularly when traveling and this has definitely been a horrible start to my vacation . After traveling hours I couldn't wait to shower and relax. Upon getting to the hotel (at 4:45pm)we were told that our room was not ready, that we would have to wait another 30 to 45 minutes. We were offered drinks at the bar, which was fine except for the fact that we had to carry our luggage with us. After finally settling in our room I kept smelling a foul odor and noticed the trash underneath the kitchen sink was overflowed with trash. You would think, given the extra two hours they made us wait, the room would have been in pristine condition. Not at all... not worth $332 at allllll.  I will…

title: Outdated hotel with great views/location
review: Dear Rita B,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially with the wait and condition of the room. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: A grand experience of Service and attention to guests needs....
review: We picked this hotel because of its great location and amazing views, unfortunately that is all we got. The rooms were very outdated and the couch was pretty disgusting. We told 3 people that our phone didnt work and they never helped to fix it. One day we ran out of toilet paper and we had to Google the hotel, call from our cell phone - just to get someone to bring us tp! So incredibly frustrating to go through at a Hilton Hotel. I have not been this disappointed by Hilton before.

title: Walking distance from beach and shopping
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room and the fact that your phone did not seem to work. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future. Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Not up to Hilton Standards
review: We are just finishing 11 days over the Chritmas holidays. We. Keep coming back year after year. This is our 6th year.Particular mention goes to Jackie and Aliona for the superb restaurant service daily. Wow it felt like home! Also mention to the chef for a superb Christmas special dinner menu. Just amazing.  Last Dana in the bar greeted us every night for happy hour. She was the best. We love the space of a suite , the location and amenities but the deal breaker for us was the staff, professional, kind and very attentive. We will definitely return.

title: Beautiful hotel and location
review: Excellent value and so much to do within walking distance of the hotel. I wish we were there longer, just stayed overnight for a cruise so we missed the beach which is within walking distance from the hotel and a lot of beach with loungers. Close to shopping and banks and lots of restaurants to chose from.

title: Location Location Location!
review: Dear 783judye, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  We hope the next time you are with us you will stay longer to enjoy all that the area offers.  Again, Thank you for your business.   Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great Location and Views
review: I stay at this hotel because of the location. You are right on the river, walking distance to the beach, walking distance to some amazing restaurants, and the views are pretty spectacular. This hotel has been through some storms and is not in top condition room or property wise, but they try really hard to keep the hotel looking good. The staff is friendly and like I said earlier, it's all about the Location!

title: Not Worth It And No One At Hotel Cares!!!
review: Dear Brad G Thank you for your comments and we are glad to hear you enjoyed our very special location.  We are continuously working to upgrade the hotel with our owners and look forward to you seeing the improvements. Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Happy stay with a beautiful view
review: This hotel was an awesome bargain and very spacious. Convenient to shopping and lots of great restaurants. It’s on the water so the views are amazing! You can walk to the mall or across the bridge to A1A 👍

title: Get what you pay for
review: Cheaper Hilton property, and I understand why it was half the points.   Rooms need updating and dusting.    Heater won’t go above 65.  Loud street, especially with draw bridge outside.    Valet only is a pain.    Got walked in on twice by cleaning crew becUse they can’t understand someone yelling OCCUPIED!

title: Great hotel
review: Dear  Excursion08138056705, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room and noise disturbance encountered. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.  Regards Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Boat Parade
review: Great service and conviniently located to mall, beach, supermarket, bus route.  Cookies that you receive st checking are delicious. The water taxi stop stops right their at the hotel do you can hop on and off.

title: Excellent conference facility and service
review: Dear ryanrpa, Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your time with us and I hope you will return soon.  Regards,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great location, friendly staff.
review: This was our first time ever going to the boat parade and the hotel treated us like family. My daughter and i dressed up for Christmas and we were the hit of the night. I havent had that much fun in years. The prices of food were a little high, but besides that it was awesome. Sorry if tbe picture is a little dark, but its me and my elf.

title: Good News...Bad News with this Hotel
review: This hotel has alot going for it.   Location on the waterway is great for viewing yachts coming and going.  And water taxi stop.  Plus plenty of shopping nearby, Publix across street, restaurants in the area - TRULUCK's is FABULOUS!  And beach is walkable within 10 minutes.  Don't rent a chair from the guy who charges $15 a chair plus another $10 for umbrella.  Either go to CVS and buy chairs or go to the store on the corner by the beach and negotiate a price for a couple chairs if you are going to stay for longer than a day or two.  We paid $19.99 for each chair, used them 3 days and then gave them away to another family to pay it forward.  Management could make this place terrific with some minor tweaks.  It is noisy facing the bridge so sound proofing could be a huge…

title: Consider The Wildlife
review: Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms.  We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.

title: Birthday Trip 2018
review: Please ask the construction crew to not throw dirt clogs at the wildlife and to be more aware of the consequences of what they are doing. Cutting materials that will get caught around the necks of the wildlife is UNACCEPTABLE !

title: Beach hotel
review: Dear Go40739412340, Thank you so much for your comments and letting us know what you observed.  We immediately discussed this with the outside construction worker who understand the importance of protect our waterways.  Again, thank you for your comments.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Clean and Well Staffed but....
review: I stayed at GalleryOne from 12/1 - 12/05/18 for my annual birthday trip. I am a big fan of the Hilton Brand (I am a Hilton Honors Gold Member)- but this hotel is not what I have become accustomed to under the Hilton Brand. The staff was great, we had a wonderful view (Suite 920), but the hotel needs some major updates.The kitchen cabinets were peeling, as were the dining room chairs in our room (the peeling kept sticking to our clothes), our shower was leaking to the floor (they did come and fix it as soon as I alerted them), and one of the kitchen cabinets was hanging off partially. I had higher expectations. I loved that we could catch the water taxi right at the back of the hotel. There is a mall right across the street and dining in the area. There's also a Publix…

title: Galleryone
review: This hotel has a great location for walking to the mall or stepping onto the water taxi. It’s time for a update/remodel. If your eating there like we did, we thought it was over priced for a continental style breakfast. Other than that nice hotel.

title: Perfect for a wedding weekend get-away!
review: Dear Jet36804470570, Overall i am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  You are correct that our location is very special in only being a short walk to the beach, having our own water taxi stop and next to the mall.  I hope the next time you are in town you will once again stay with us.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great property
review: We loved the location of the hotel and amazing views from our hotel room balcony. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. I definitely recommend this hotel and would stay in it again. Our bellman, Justin Vakt, was extremely helpful and took excellent care of us. From the car to our room and back again we hassle free!

title: Fabulous location, but problems
review: Dear Alex U Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to read your review and we are so glad you enjoyed your time with us.  We all hope you will return soon.  Sincerely  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: 3 night Birthday weekend stay.
review: This is a lovely property, with a great location.  So convenient due to the proximity of the Galleria Mall next door (lots of restaurants) and only a few blocks from the ocean.  We particularly loved that the water taxi made a stop at the hotel...we used it all day long.

title: Good hotel - Broken Lights throughout
review: Hotel is improving.  First impression is bad as every single light leading up the drive is smashed.  Someone actually put a coffee cup upside down on a broken light.  When walking to the restaurants, you walk in almost complete darkness, which is dangerous.

title: Great stay-
review: Dear WS Thank you for your comments.  Yes we are still fighting an insurance claim for all the lighting destroyed by hurricane Irma.  We are happy that you can tell the many project that are under way to improve the hotel.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Needs a facelift
review: Wonderful property- perfect location - helpful/friendly staff. Close to the ocean, shopping, restaurants, etc. Room was huge with kitchenette and living room area.Loved the Vue restaurant  on site  and palm tree lined pool

title: Noisy and dated
review: Dear NorthStar58406092035, Thank you so much for your comments.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and loved our restaurant the Vue.  Sincerely, Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Good hotel but probably wouldn't choose again
review: The service was fantastic but the property is old and generally unkept. Additional cost for mandatory valet should be considered for the stay value. Great location but cleanliness is an issue. Place need a complete whipedown.

title: Well
review: Bit disappointed. Came a long way. Only here as a stop before cruise. Vending machines for mixers and food weren’t working. Tried card and notes. Air con didn’t work into room, only into kitchenette area. Bed was very hard and woke up with a sore back. Called front desk for light that wasn’t working in living area and no one came to fix it. Tv signal kept dropping out. On a positive, the lady working the bar we were there in the 10th November 2018 was fantastic. Very vibrant and accomodating.

title: Pre cruise stay
review: We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned.  We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.

title: Very suspicious activity on front desk. and disgusting treatment of my mother! I wouldn't use again!
review: Used this hotel for pre cruise stay, location location! Easy walk to beach , restaurants and grocery store. Little farther away then some hotels about $25 cab from airport. Friendly staff nice clean rooms some with view of water. Water taxi stop right at hotel and nice outer pool and patio

title: Great View, Great Location, Poor Upkeep
review: Dear cruiseproblem, Thank you for your comments about your stay with us.  It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to see you returning soon.  Sincerely  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: An amazing hotel in transition
review: We stayed in this hotel on 13th October 2018   This hotel was booked for me via BA Holidays. My mother decided to join us on  our trip so I booked her a room separately using my Hhonours account.   All was fine at first, but when my mum decided to pay cash they cancelled the original reservation I had made and gave her a room in someone else name. We wouldn't have noticed until my mum was locked out of her room at 6am. Because the room they gave her was in a different name they refused to let her in and treated her like a criminal.  I thought it was strange they when they told us they were unable to print a receipt for the cash payment we made but were able to print out everything else. My mother waited in the lobby for 3 hours with her stuff locked in the room. she was not…

title: Hated LEAVING This AWESOME Hotel !!!
review: I have been to this hotel with my wife and kids twice and we cant wait for another visit. The staff is very well mannered and very helpful especially the valet JOHN, He made us feel like we were visiting family or visiting your old neighborhood where you grew up . I look forward to him getting a position on the inside of the hotel soon, he surely has customer service mastered perfectly. The rooms we got both times were facing the ICW (The Intracoastal Waterway), they are ABSOLUTELY stunning. It is so interesting to watch the various boats and yachts passing by, along with the Water Taxi which you can ride like a tour boat ( Carry Your Camera ). This Hotel ( Home Away from Home ) is positioned perfectly from everything you can need for a good time in Fort Lauderdale, all the…

title: What a View!
review: Dear dreadest1, Thank you for such a wonderful review.  We hope to see you again real soon.  Regards, Bob, Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Perfect Location & Large Suite Rooms
review: My family and I arrived at the hotel by Uber. I didn't want to pay for parking. A Uber ride from Ft. Lauderdale airport was $20. When we arrived our rooms weren't ready but it didn't take long. The check in process was fine, and yes you get a cookie but cookies aren't Keto so we passed. Valet helped with our bags and first impression was great. Now to the room! We were in rm 1132, 2 qn intracoastal view. We were welcomed by a Complete kitchen, pullout sofa, table for 4, nice bathroom, balcony, and a view!!!! Watching the boats go by was really nice and my son loved seeing the bridge open up.  For the first half hour we just sat on the balcony looking out at the water. Walk to the mall, publix, and a restaurant or 2. The hotel has a bar and a great outdoor sitting area. Breakfast…

title: Treated like a criminal
review: Dear Renea G, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  Overall I am glad you enjoyed your stay and loved our location.  Yes it can be a little noisy as people forget that Fort Lauderdale  and Broward County is almost 2 million people.  I do hope that you will return and personally want to thank you for your business.  Regards  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Bachelorette Weekend Getaway
review: The GALLERYOne Doubletree is situated smack on the Intercoastal Waterway with it’s own Water Taxi stop (#7) & in the other direction on Sunrise Blvd. lies the Galleria Mall a mere 5 minutes walk away. The actual beach/oceanfront is about a 10 minute walk over the Intercoastal drawbridge. You will find a handful of bars & restaurants clustered near the intersection of Sunrise & A1A.   I took an easy Lyft here and back to Ft. Lauderdale Airport for about $13 each way-the trip only takes 20 minutes. Once arriving in the early afternoon my pre blocked room was waiting. I am a Hilton Honors Diamond member and my preferences were definitely met (high floor, away from elevator. I was placed at the end of the hall on floor 11 of 14 looking out on Sunrise Blvd. with the Atlantic Ocean &…

title: Bad.
review: Staying here tonight and I’m highly disappointed in this property. I work in the hospitality industry and what they DIDNT do is very upsetting. I am a paying customer and this is how you treat me. I will NOT be staying at a double tree/Hilton property if this is how it continues. First, the restaurant service to forever when we were having dinner tonight. There was only one waitress that was running the entire front of the house & room service ? WAY understaffed. She was friendly but the time it took to get out food (Over an 1 hour) is ridiculous. SECONDLY what upset me the most is that my husband and I went to lay down and pulled the comforter up to get in bed and there was dry BLOOD and/or poop remains on the comforter! We call the front desk to have them come replace the…

title: Nice property in need of updates
review: Dear susieavalos,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially concerning the amount of time to receive the service that you expected. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and had been addressed with the concerned team members.  Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Excellent customer service
review: Stayed at this hotel for a night. First room we got had leaking A/C unit with mold. Second room was better, although some remodeling was going on in the units nearby. Rooms are comfortable and spacious. Although they could use some updating. We had a view of the nearby mall and the parking lot beneath us. We used the pool, it wasn't heated and cold for the time of year we visited. Don't miss out on the complimentary cookies.

title: Great Service and Accomodations
