review: Dear anlof9, Thank you for letting us know about your time with us.  I do apologize for the A/C.  I hope the next time you are with us you will choose a water view and enjoy the passing boats on the intracoastal.  I do want to say that the pool is heated and currently at 85 but I do apologize that you found it to cool for your liking.  Again, thank you for your comments and I do hope you will return again.   Sincerely, Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: NOT a GOOD experience
review: Special thanks to Cleopatra and Diego for their excellent service for our 2 day Pincus Professional Education seminar.      I also want to thank Eliane and Mariana for great service and support of our event.

title: Best Customer Service
review: Cleopatra provided customer service with a smile. She provide the best customer service and made sure that we had everything we needed during our meeting lunch. Keep up the good work and keep your smile.

title: Great hotel in an excellent location
review: Dear g4hicks,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your meeting.  It is very gracious of you to mention one of our very outstanding team members who provided you with outstanding service.  Thank you.   Regards,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Do you really want to spend your money this way?
review: Right on the intercoastal waterway, just blocks from fort lauderdale beach and one block from the galleria, the premiere upscale shoping center in the city, it is an excellent suite hotel with large rooms and many great views ftom the room balconys.  The rooms ate well equipped and the staff helpful.  Parking generally requires using the valet at 35 per 24 hour period.  You can eadily walk to both upscale and not so upscale shops and restaurants as well as the beach.  If you need or prefer a duite yo a dinhle room this is a great choice.

title: So much potential
review: Dear charlesgolden, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  it is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your time with us and our very special location.  I hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent Staff
review: I am used to Double Tree in Europe being a great experience but a chain link fence in front of the inter costal?   Not only did my room feel unclean but the common areas as well.    This place honestly should be shut down.     I left early after one night and transferred to the Hilton on the beach.   This is not a four star hotel and agree with the other one star givers.   Who ever is writing these good reviews must be urged to do so by management.

title: Precruise stay with large family
review: We had a two bedroom suite which was great for a family of 8. Great location where you can walk to the beach. Plenty of good restaurants with walking distance like BurgerFi. Room was noisy and hard to sleep with nearby highway and our room overlooked highway and drawbridge. Horrible smell right off the elevator which left a bad impression on the way to our room every time we got off the elevator. Overall a good stay but could have been better.

title: Birthday
review: Dear szohrlaut, Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your stay.  I do apologize about incidents you encountered during your stay.  We have discussed this with our housekeeping department.  Again, I apologize that you found the city noises to be obtrusive during your stay but certainly want to thank you again for your review.  Next visit we will make sure you are on the quieter side of the hotel.  Sincerely,  Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Nice place for business or fun!
review: Justin of the valet service couldn't be nicer I'd give him a 10.  Nice hotel, Ryan the bellman should be recognized for his courtesy and hospitality. Check-in went smoothly and the young lady was so friendly we teased her on her name spelliing.  Our stay was very short we moved closer to family.  The room could be updated and air conditioning more manageable 69 constant temp.Also construction across the parking lot was very loud.

title: Nice property
review: Dear Al M, Thank you for letting us know about your stay and for mentioning several of our outstanding team members whom made your stay special.  I personally want to thank you for your business and hope you will return soon.  Regards, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great valet
review: Double Tree Hotels have never dissapoint. This location has large suite with all the comfort needed weather its a business trip or family vacation. GalleriaOne is very close to the beach and has an awesome Mall and good amount of quality restaurants in area won't let you go hungry!

title: Stay
review: My family and I was very impressed with the staff and the appearance of the hotel.   The staff was very professional and attentive to our needs. The went above and beyond to make sure my son birthday celebration was an enjoyable event for a d the entire family.

title: Wonderful Customer Experience
review: Dear denise w, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at GALLERYone.  We are so glad your stay was pleasurable and that your son's birthday was a success.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Staff
review: From the moment I entered the property the quality of service was superior. The valet area is the first experience - John, Robinson 'the Great', Justin, and George take pride and demonstrate stellar customer service. Ryan at the front desk was awesome, he helped tremendously with all that was needed. Even housekeeping Mary E., was great to deal with during our stay. Finally, Sunday morning brunch with Jackie confirmed that I will be back. Highly recommend - I am Hilton Diamond and this location is top on my list!!! Thanks so much :)

title: Excellent location
review: Dear  Myra F, Thank you so much for your warm review.  You are so kind to mention so many of our team members whom made your stay special.  We will be sure to recognize each of them for their efforts.  As a Diamond Member I personally want to thank you for your business and your loyalty to Hilton.  Sincerely,  Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Way overpriced
review: The rooms here are good. Had underwhelming  A/C but room was comfortable. Staff makes the stay! Felt very welcome and taken care of by the professional and courteous staff. Stayed for 45 days on business and the staff has made this a home away from home. If you stay here you will be happy I would stake all I have on it.

title: Wonderful Staff, Nice/Comfortable Suites
review: We stayed at GALLERYone before and after our cruise.  Very good experiences both times.  Before getting there I texted them via the Hilton app and asked if, by chance, anyone had left any beach toys that we could use so that we wouldn't need to pack any . Lorraine managed to hunt some down for us and while not something that would have cost a ton to go get...it was fantastic customer service for them to hunt some down.  The breakfast was very good, lots of options, and tasty.  Our waitress Jackie is wonderful and super friendly. The front desk staff were always welcoming, helpful and kind.  Since these are all suites there are kitchens and my mother has 1 dish that my family can't seem to live without but we forgot to buy salt, Neisha managed to get that for us to!  So helpful. …

title: Gallery "Nice" One!
review: Dear medako, Thank you so much for your review It is a pleasure to hear about the service you received from our team members.  You were very kind to mention so many of our outstanding team members who made your stay extra special.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Much needed upgrade !
review: A few mixed reviews on this hotel,but I can honestly say it's been a pleasure staying here.On arrival we were upgraded and had a room facing the intercoastal waterway,probably the nicer of the two outlooks ( the other facing the city) you do get a little noise from the road bridge,but it does not stop you sleeping well in a lovely bed.Its in a prime position for shopping (Galleria/Publix) The beach (less than ten minute walk)transport( water taxi,local buses 36,40,sun trolley)But what makes this so nice are the staff, courteous, professional,and always smiling.Special mentions to the following staff,Max on reception,Mia in the bar,Marianne our fantastic housemaid and Brian the valet,even though we did not have a car he was always greeting us with a smile.Well done to you all,we…

title: A fantastic hotel.
review: Dear  ShaunC576, Thank you for such a warm review.  It is a pleasure to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  I especially want to thank you for mentioning so many of our team members who made your stay special.  We will be sure to recognize each of them.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: The hotel needs ALOT of serious updating. From the outside area, to the rooms it didn’t not feel like a Hilton hotel. It felt more like a motel which is sad for what I paid for the room.  Some of the lights in our room did not (first light once the door is opened), and the tv remote didn’t work. Things that ought to be discovered easily by housekeeping.   I booked this hotel to get the points with Hilton but if you’re thinking about doing the same, don’t. They are too many other options for a similar price that have much better quality and luxury than this hotel.   3stars - the view is great, rooms are big, two TVs, couch and kitchenette.

title: Pre-cruise
review: Came to Fort Lauderdale one day early for a cruise. I was looking for a place close to the beach without breaking the bank (since I'd already did that with the cruise. Lol). This place was exactly what I wanted. I could get to shops or the beach area with a 10 minute walk. As a bonus, the rooms were awesome. Very generous amount of space. Also loved, loved the pool and patio/terrace. Great choice.

title: Lauren Gamber made my stay remarkable.
review: Dear Wendell F, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your time with us.  You are correct that our location is the best; short walk to the beach, Galleria Mall, other shops and restaurants all within a short walk not to mention having a water taxi stop on the property.  Thank you for choosing us and we hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Double Tree on the Inter-coastal Waterway
review: We have a corporate account with GALLERYOne, and I stay there often. It’s rare that anything negative ever happens, so when I was charged a regular rate for my room instead of the corporate rate, Lauren showed up and credited the difference back to my credit card even though I was at fault. Great customer service.

title: Gem
review: Dear damonc1578, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  Yes, service is important and you are kind to mention one of our team members that made a difference, she is a star.  Looking forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Second stay at this hotel
review: Great Hotel. Clean and staff was great. Take the Water Taxi and ride around the inter-coastal  waterway. Parking is only valet. Would recommend working with the front desk on suggestions to local restaurants and activities, they were very helpful.

title: Regular guest. Can’t recommend enough
review: I stay at the Gallery One every three weeks for the past 5 months. As a Hilton diamond member I am used to a level of customer service and quality I feel that is only possible through the Hilton brands. I am not an easy guest to deal with. I have many items shipped to the property and many times where I have the hotel hold bags and boxes and tools for me. Their personable attitudes and “yes sir” attitudes keep me coming back. The staff as a whole is exceptional but I want to mention specifically Elizabeth, John, Brian, Costa, Ernesto, and Ryan. Being in customer service myself and a bachelors in hospitality management I understand the pressures and standards. It is my recommendation to management and ownership that these employees get properly recognized for top tier performance…

title: Employees are wonderful
review: Dear Matt R, First let me thank you for your business and becoming on loyal fan.  We know how much you travel and your comments are taken to heart as someone who stays at many hotels.  You are so kind to mention so many of our outstanding team members who day in and day out make our guests stays with us special.  You can count that each of these team members have been recognized for the service they provide.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your time with us and we look forward to your return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great location.
review: Location next to the Galleria and Water Taxi is great! The service from the employees was exceptional. They are friendly, always have a smile and offer to help. The only reason I didn't rate this higher is the rooms are starting to show their age. My dust allergies were bothered by the carpets and air conditioning. Some additional attention to cleaning back of doors, and around light switches where the paint is either fading or needing touch ups would improve the look of cleanliness. I loved the convenience of the kitchenettes and being close to the 7-eleven. Even the city and construction sounds are muted by the quality of construction.

title: Thank you Elizabeth
review: Dear Allison M, Thank you for letting us know about your stay here at GALLERYone.  I do apologize about the items you noticed in your room. We have discussed this with our team to better improve the condition of this unit.  I am happy to hear how much you enjoyed our location.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Off to a bad start but improved dramatically
review: The property offers a great location, and we chose the water view, which was great. The rooms are sound proof, so the traffic going across the drawbridge, or bells ringing when the bridge raises, you won't hear it

title: Poorly Maintained and dirty!!!!!!!!
review: The A/C is terrible and the shower faucet leaked out the side, the iron holder hanging off the wall, all of this mentioned to front desk at 8 am .... none of it addressed by the evening when we returned. The showers leaks under the glass... this place needs a lot of maintenance.   Wait it gets better blood stained sheets on the bed.. that’s disgusting. Housekeeping does not clean well at all but I know they use chemicals they left the bottle next to the toilet and we found out when my son was playing with the bottle on our second day .....  $35 Valet that’s really about $20 too much the garage is close enough self parking should be an option.   When a hotel is this poorly cared for I’m amazed the double tree flag is still here.   Only plus was location.   I hope someone steers…

title: Unclean, unkempt
review: Dear Joseph G First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially concerning your room. This certainly is not the standard your expected or the standards we keep for ourselves. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and has been addressed with the concerned team members.  Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Needs updating
review: We stayed in this hotel as part of a cruise holiday, and were massively disappointed. For starters, upon arrival we were told the pool area was closed. I fully understand the impact of hurricane maria, but it woudl have been nice to have been informed prior to arrival about the pool closure. We were told we could use the facilities at Hilton hotel on the beachfront, but upon arrival here the poolside staff told us that they had no knowledge of this! Sunbeds here were all (understandably) taken by clients of the hotel. But the worst part od the stay for me was the fact that the room was unclean. We had unknown substances and marks encrusted onto the headboard of the bed, and the bin was covered in a sticky substance. We informed reception who arranges to have it cleaned, but our…

title: Can't wait to go back!!!!
review: First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. I am a bit confused as you address the conditions of the hotel after the hurricane Maria.  While Maria did not do any damage to Fort Lauderdale we were greatly impacted by Hurricane Irma in September 2017, just over a year ago.  If this review is from last year I do apologize and hope you will return to see the hotel again. Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Friendly staff, close to mall.
review: Door would not lock (used chair to block). Bathroom wall stained, cabinetry damaged, light fixture broken, shower door handle broken, hair dryer barely working, minimal towels, etc. Friendly staff. No self-parking even though spaces are available, only $35/day valet. Room service is minimal but good restaurants nearby.

title: Great hotel!
review: Right next to the Galleria Mall. Excellent size suites with the ability to cook inside your room. After a long flight the bed was EXTREMELY comfortable. Arrived too late in the evening to enjoy the restaurant but the view is EPIC any time of the day.

title: Friendliest Staff
review: Dear Mia W, Thank you for your comments and so glad you enjoyed your time with us at G1.  I hope the next time you are with us you will have a chance to have dinner in the Vue or on the Vue Patio.   Sincerely  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Friendly Staff  Convenient to Mall
review: This hotel has the nicest staff. Always smiling and willing to assist you. Room suite was spacious and laid out nicely. We had a inter-coastal view, which we could see the ocean in the distance. Located near shopping, eating and entertainment. A short walk, drive or water taxi from the beach and downtown. Definitely recommend this place and will be returning!

title: Great location, spacious suite
review: Dear pkbiscuit, Thank you for your comments concerning our team members.  They are our secret weapon and do such a wonderful job in servicing all our guests.  I hope you will return soon and again, thank you for your comments.  Sincerely, Bob Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Better than home!
review: The hotel is conveniently located in walking distance to the beach and the mall! I had beautiful view of the Intercoastal Waterway (beautiful yachts galore) and the Atlantic Ocean. Unfortunately, I was also on the side with the highway and drawbridge. Annoying but not much traffic after 10.The staff including the Frontdesk staff, Valet Parking, Restaurant & Bar Staff and Housekeeping were all great! The food was good as well!The rooms are dated and the hallways have old musty carpet. It's not unbearable but could be updated.

title: Great Location
review: Overall, I have to say this was a great place to stay. The location was just right! You can take a walk just about anywhere.....the beach, Publix, the mall, Blue Martini and other nearby restaurants. Just like many of the Hilton or by Hilton Hotels, the only major turn off was parking. It is valet only and it is pretty pricey for hotel guests. Other than that, everything else about this hotel was great.

title: Bugs galore
review: Dear Yauny G,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  You are correct that our location on the intracoastal with only a short walk to the ocean in one direction and restaurants and shops in the other.  I personally want to thank you for your business and hope you will return soon.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Good place
review: We traveled here for a wedding and because it was pricey we thought it would have been really nice, unfortunately its not updated or maintained well. My sister woke me up about 4:30 am and told me she was itchy and something was biting her. I thought she may have gotten bit by something when we were outside. Then my back started itching but I thought it was just in my head until I went to pull up my covers and there was  huge bug. We called the front desk and were told someone would be up. We took pictures and videos and the bug looked like bed bugs....Management came up quickly and put on gloves to collect the blood sucker for their pest control company to examine. He would neither confirm nor deny that it was a bed bug, yet all the images I found showed it was. They moved us…

title: Great customer service...
review: Dear Khori C, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity.As you are aware our extermination company came and unfortunately did not find any evidence of any intersects.  I do acknowledge that in Florida we have our share of insects that seem to get everywhere. Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Valet only! All Suite Hotel.
review: Amazing stay will stay again and i will tell everyone about how amazing this place was will always  recommend this place first !!!!!!!!!  Bed was very comfortable great stafff and very very clean and at a great price

title: Room to stretch out
review: We were a family of 16 people needing room for cribs to walkers.  We also needed 5 people per room for some rooms.  The facility was definitely kid friendly with a nice pool and helpful cheery staff.  We dined in because moving the crowd was more than difficult.  We had a private dining area and the food service staff even provided puzzles to amuse the kids ages 1 to 10.  I would definitely stay there again.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Rich_C313,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  I am glad that we were able to accommodate everyone in your group to your satisfaction.  I personally want to thank you for you and your extended families business.  We hope to see you back with us again in the future.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Amazing rooms, staff, and location
review: This hotel is very nice..the rooms are very big.I stay on a Suite..very comfy beds and have everything like an apartment.Very clean..The location is Perfect..very close to the beach...very nice pool with a great view.I do recommend it

title: Beautiful, Comfortable Property
review: Dear Eduardo C Thank you for letting us know about your stay here at GALLERYone.  I want to thank you for your business and hope that you will return soon.  Again, thank you for your kind words about your stay.  Sincerely,  Bob Bob Keesler General Mar

title: Good Place - Couple of Issues
review: This hotel truly caters to your every need! It was close to everything, the staff was extremely amazing especially Mia! Mia ensured our vacation was one to remember! The view from our rooms made going to sleep and waking up a pleasure !

title: Extending my Stay in Ft Lauderdale at G1 Doubletree expected more
review: Hotel is located in a great area plenty of shopping and fine dinning, I had a balcony suite #830 with great view of the inter coastal, draw bridge and ocean rooms were nice good set up plenty of room you could easily accommodate 4 people has a sleeper sofa. this hotels also provide you with fresh chocolate chip cookies the best, You can catch water taxi in the back of the hotel if I were staying here again I would not rent a car they charge $35.00 to park there is a rent a car place where you can get cars and scooters just a short walk across the drawbridge. Hotel personnel are friendly yet this is not a 4 or 5 star property more like a 3.5 star property, had I paid for my stay I would have rated it just a 3 star..I used points through a third party.

title: Dissapointed
review: Dear stricklyg,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. It is nice to hear you enjoyed our location and you are correct that valet is mandatory at all the beach hotels in the area.  I will say our price is one of the lower charges.  We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intracostal  waterway.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Great location
review: I booked this hotel through my Hilton app because I wanted to get a beautiful room with a view. This was my first time 5 days off this whole year!! I was thrilled to learn I could use points to purchase a room, so I did. BIG mistake!  There are some great things about this hote.  The proximity of the beach. They have a lovely restaurant and a bar They have a business room with a beautiful view and can take a water taxi from their dock. (Both were not found until my checkout date)  *None of these were pointed out or even mentioned  during check-in. * The only thing that was mentioned I was a Blue member and that I was using money and points to pay for my room! In a judging voice. (As if that is any indication if I have money or not)  Welp I do! Guess what I'm Silver now!   Of…

title: $35 Valet Mandatory
review: Dear Hummingbird76,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially the lack of a true warm welcome to the hotel. This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. In addition, the maintenance issues in the room are unacceptable and again please accept my apologies.     Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: No way this is 4 stars
review: Loved our overnight stay at The Hilton Doubletree before we boarded our cruise. The location is fabulous, close to a Mall with all the essential shops and the Publix supermarket. The apartment had a kitchen and was very spacious. Breakfast was delicious and served with a smile which always makes a difference. Highly recommend this property. Cheers - Jules

title: Affordable Beach Adjacent Hotel
review: We were here for a wedding and found the hotel to have a convenient location and clean spacious rooms.  What We Loved: - Suite Style Rooms: It was very convenient having a kitchenette. We used the refrigerator and the microwave for leftovers from our meals dining out. I always enjoyed having chilled sparkling wine to come back to after a day at the beach. - Location: I travel to southern Florida frequently to visit family and we usually aren't this close to the beach. GALLERYone is not on the main boulevard that runs parallel to the beach. However, it's a short 10 minute walk away. It was a good location considering the price. There are restaurants, a mall, a grocery store, a nail salon and spa, and other convenient services within 5 mins walking. - Cookies: The Doubletree…

title: Great short stay will definitely come back again
review: Dear fullmoonslay,  Thank you so much for taking so much time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to read so many positive comments.  I personally want to thank you for your business and hope you enjoyed the wedding you were attending.  We are looking forward to your return when you are back visiting family again.

title: Avoid valet
review: I stayed at this hotel with my boyfriend for his birthday due to it’s a great location next to the beach, the awesome restaurants and big shopping center. We got a room overlooking the water. From beginning to end we had a great experience. Dining on the deck was great as well. The staff was extremely helpful from the valet, front desk, to the maids everyone had a great attitude which isn’t always the case. Our main valet guy was John and he was awesome, quick and knowledgeable about the area  not only was he swift with my car service and luggage service  but he also helped me find a lot of great locations in the area that we weren’t aware of which we really appreciated. Over all my boyfriend and I had a great time and he really enjoyed his birthday stay here. We would…

title: Wonderful!!!!
review: Dear Tashenao22,  Thank you for your review.  It is a pleasure to hear how much you enjoyed your stay.  We hope you will return soon.  Regards, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Mixed emotions
review: Hotel is clean and has great restaurant service. However, valet is mandatory and the valet staff is poorly trained. Damaged the rental vehicle my family used to travel over 900 miles with and tried to conceal that it was done.

title: Great location, terrible rooms with AC Leaking on Carpets
review: Would love to say that we enjoyed our stay, but a 2 night stay should not involve sleeping in 3 different rooms. After dropping off our luggage after checking in, we noticed a weird odor. We thought it was moldy, but placed our luggage in the room and went downstairs. We returned to our room for the evening but we still noticed the odor. We looked around the room but we assumed that we just needed to get some air freshener. At this point, we discovered the TV didn't work, so while investigating why we then noticed the carpet was damp. Based upon the stain on the carpet, it appeared that the AC was leaking. The front desk told us that the hotel had no rooms with the view and beds size which we reserved. So at 2 am - we were packing up and moving to a different room type (which…

title: Great Location! Quality Hotel
review: Dear purple1red, First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially with the issues with the A/C unit. This is certainly not acceptable and is being addressed with our maintenance team. In addition we have employed an outside vendor to inspect and repair all room A/Cs. We are also embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock with access to the intercostal waterway.  Again, please accept my apology.   Regards, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Very nice hotel
review: This hotel is in a great location. Walking distance to the beach, and the Gallery Mall. The hotel also has a nice view. There is only valet parking offered. The restaurant and gym were very nice and the quality of service is outstanding.

title: Dining Staff is AMAZING
review: Dear Darren, Thank you for letting us to know about your stay with us at GALLERYone.  Thank you so much for your kind words.  You are correct that our location is so perfect for all the activities Fort Lauderdale offers.  Sincerely, Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: SBAC Retreat
review: Carmen, Diego, Fritztroy and Makayla were very helpful and friendly to our sorority retreat attendees.  Thank you for such nice service.  The waitress at (8:00 pm) the Vue restaurant was also very nice.

title: Fabulous Room!
review: This hotel! Love me some Doubletree, the gentleman, Gui, who checked us in, and the room was just incredible! Loved it. :)   Except for... my ONLY fuss that prevented a 5 Star review is how the front desk handled the fact that 'someone' who obviously had a key to our room, tried to enter late in the evening (around 11ish PM) and for what, we have no idea. Immediately called the front desk and Joe brushed it off like it was no big deal, it was a mistake... blah, blah, blah.   However, it was a big deal. It scared me half to death, and fortunately I had instructed my son prior to going to bed to close the inside lock, otherwise the person would have been able to walk right into our room. After calming down, settling everyone back in and going to sleep... upon check out at very…

title: Amazing service/All in the details
review: Dear reeactionevents, Thank you so much for letting us know about your time with us.  Overall, I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  As for the incident that occurred I want to thank you so much for letting me know about this.  The reaction you received was not acceptable as both the night manager and security should have responded. By letting us know about this I can assure you we have provided the proper counseling and training so that this will never happen again.   Thank you again for your review and especially helping us to improve Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Great Stay Looking Forward to Bringing the Family
review: This has been our second time interacting with Amoy. Amoy has been nothing short of amazing. The first time we stayed, we came to celebrate our anniversary. And she made sure our stay was as remarkable as possible. This time, we came to exhale because of a death in the family. And again, she not only made us smile but sent a special gift with a note, extending the condolences of the hotel. It truly touched our hearts. We just wanted to say... THANK YOU, MS. AMOY. You truly deserve to be recognized.

title: Always excellent
review: Dear Eric C,  Thank you for your note and again our condolences on your families loss.  We hope you will return again soon on much a much happier occasion.  Sincerely,  Bob  Bob Keesler General Manager

title: Loved our stay, will return
review: I don’t write reviews very often and honestly, I prefer to write ones like this.  This hotel is AWESOME!!  I travel quite extensively for work and for my daughter’s softball tournaments and I can’t say enough about this experience.  This particular stay was the first one for me at this hotel, one of my co-workers and I were in town for work and this is a new site for our company. From check in all the way through the stay it has been great!  All of the staff have been excellent.  Guyvanel and Pavel were at the front counter when we checked in, they were very welcoming and made sure that we had the ability to contact them at anytime during my stay.  They continued to check in with us every time they saw us through the entire stay.  Lauren, the sales manager, also came out when we…

title: Amazing rooms.....expensive parking
review: Rooms looked amazing and the staff friendly. The 35 dollars a night for valet parking was way too much especially for having to wait 30 mins every Time I wanted my car. Needs a self park option. The pool is way too small for the size of the hotel and the dock was damaged and closed.

title: PHENOMENAL HOTEL! BOOK IT NOW!
review: Dear colincK5499EJ,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. I am disappointed to read that we did not meet your expectations.  We are enhancing the dock and access to the intracoastal waterway and I apologize that you found this an inconvenience.  As for the valet parking our rates are very much in line with the area and you will find all beach area hotels are valet only.  I do apologize that you were not aware of this.   I am glad to read that you found our accommodations and team members to be amazing and friendly.   Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Ehh it was ok.
review: I choose this HOTEL based upon the spectacular reviews of guests, and negated any less then stellar review that did not have a room number in which they stayed to alert management for reference. Having said that, I was a guest for 7 nights in room 920, middle of July, and absolutely fell in love not only with the staff from Guyvanel who checked me in to Ann Marie, Ryan, Layton, and all of the others, including my housekeeper who helped make my vacation a 10+.   This is an older HOTEL situated on beautiful canal with some rooms, like mine, having a view of the canal, and ocean. It does pay to upgrade and go for the top of the line if a view is very important to you. All rooms in the photos are exactly the same, with every needed convenience to make your stay relaxing, and stress…

title: Poor Maintenance/arrogant staff
review: Dear ShaNewYorkCity, Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay with us here at GALLERYone.  It is a pleasure to hear how you enjoyed your stay and you are so kind to mention a number of our team members who made your stay special.  We will be happy to recognize them all at our next rally.   Again, thank you for all your comments and we look forward to your return to the hotel.  Personally I want to thank you for your business.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Incredible location
review: Stayed for a couple of days for business. The room was ok , it had all of the amenities I wanted fridge,microwave,etc... But there was a rusty lamp and dirty glass and plate. Housekeeping definitely needs to step their game up. Price wise it was decent. Pro's was the location beach, stores,etc... Con's cleanliness was below average, especially for a mid level Hilton brand. No shuttle to aiport which is kinda disappointing. Also the gym is disappointing not a lot of equipment especially for a big hotel. Not sure if I would stay again here , but maybe if they improved on certain things.

title: Seen its better days. Balcony view was of construction debris and overturned abandoned shopping cart.
review: Seen its better days. Bridge side was super loud. Balcony view was of construction debris and overturned abandoned shopping cart. Construction noise in morning was obtrusive - back hoe crushing rocks and pushing dirt. Rooms have been painted or papered over dozens of times. Door surfaces were filthy. Toilet ran non-stop and leaked. Whole experience was rather sad as this used to be one of my favorite properties for its artsy feel and location. Needs a complete shut down and overhaul. On the positive side, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful.

title: Moody Family Reunion
review: Dear MJP-ATL,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review.  We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and the construction you experience is the rebuilding the dock and access to the intercostal l waterway. As we continue to make progress I hope you will give us another chance to win back your business.  Again, please accept my apology.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Worst Hilton Propery I've ever stayed at
review: Galleryone Hotel created an amazing experience for my family and I. From the moment we secured the hotel Nicole and Amy worked with us to ensure our family would have a memorable stay. The hospitality given started far before the first guest arrived. Special thanks to the banquet supervisor Eliane, and her excellent staff Cleopatra, Diego, Mickayla, and Shaquille. The bellman John for always assisting us with moving luggage and decorations. Brian for securing the Water taxi tickets and giving us drink passes!!! Layton (supervisor) and Marie (housekeeping) for keeping our room so clean. It felt like we were at a relatives house and special thanks to Elizabeth for assisting in making a room handicap accessible. Everyone treated us with respect and dignity.   If you are thinking…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Ambryjo,  Thank you so much for such a glowing review.  I know I speak for our entire team when I say we enjoyed your family so much.  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  I personally want to thank you for your business.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great sea views, fancy accommodations ,walk to beach and mall
review: 1)  Charge for parking runs about $40 per day 2)  Long wait for the mandatory parking valets.  Plus they adjust your seats and mirrors. 3)  Maintence is a joke.  My alarm clock was broken, and it took them 2 days and 4 phone calls to fix it.  The afternoon manager said that the hotel manager would call, but never did. 4)  Lots of kids stay here and run unsupervised. 5)  1 ice machine on the 4th floor to serve this whole hotel. 6)  Food and service at the restarunt is sub par.  I ate most meals away from the hotel.    Lots of other nice hotels very close.  Pick someplace else and avoid the problems with this hotel.

title: Great Rooms and Service
review: This was a great room and not very expensive.  The rooms were very clean and well maintained.  I would definitely stay here again.  I will be sure to recommend this hotel location to my friends and co-workers.

title: Fabulous
review: Dear lbr0wning,  Thank you for taking the time and letting us know about your stay with us.  In addition you are so kind to place us on your recommended list to your friends and co-workers, we truly appreciate this.  We hope you will return soon.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Favorite Location in the Solarsystem!!!
review: I'll make this short and sweet! Every aspect of my stay was excellent. All of the staff was extremely helpful . Plan to stay there agaiagain n. Water taxi stop is at this hotel. Room faced intercoastal.  Valet parking on l.j y but even they were too notch and helpful.

title: Don't expect $300/night quality...
review: Dear  Clarence H,  Thank you for your review.  It is a pleasure to hear that your stay was excellent.  We hope you will return soon and thank you for your business.  Regards, Bob Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Never Again
review: I travel to 43 hotels each year to judge bodybuilding shows & this is my favorite location! Next to GREAT mall, 15 restaurants from casual pubs & 24 hour sandwiches-pizza to VERY upscale ALL GREAT, beach, grocery etc. SUPER staff!!! Multi-lingual Guy (pronounced Ghee) the consummate epitome of customer service- problem solver, super efficient Ryan, breathtakingly gorgeous Ann Marie (owner relations). Perfect location, perfect staff!

title: In need of cleaning  and maintenance, but great location
review: First, I want to say that the staff was very kind and helpful.   And the location of this hotel is about a 5 minute walk to the beach and a 2 minute walk to all the fabulous restaurants at Galleria mall.     The rooms are spacious.  But as you will see form the photos, it is in need of some repair.   The first thing we noticed when we entered the room was torn/frayed carpet and dirty and cracked baseboard and grout.   The showers definitely need a deep clean.  I think if they stepped up the maintenance and cleaning in the rooms it could be a great property.  The location is superb and the staff has it together, they just need to work on the aesthetics.

title: Birthday Celebration!
review: Dear Darlene L,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  First, I am glad to read that you saw our team as kind and helpful and that you found the location of the hotel to your liking.  I do apologize that the housekeeping and maintenance was not up to standards that you expected or the standards we hold ourselves to as well.  You can rest assured that this has been discussed with both of our teams in these areas.  Thank you again for your comments and I hope you will return to see the improvements.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Men Having Babies - 2018 Conference HUGE SUCCESS !!!!
review: Again a very positive experience! When mentioning my wife’s Birthday not only we had a wonderful quiet and clean Suite, but were welcomed by very friendly staff and with a beautiful Bottle of California White! Great 3 Day stay and as always an unbeatable great location, close to extraordinary bars and restaurants as well to the Atlantic in walking distance! Thanks again Hilton for giving us a good time!

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Rainer Friedric... G,  Thank you for your review and letting us know about your stay here at GALLERYone, Double Tree by Hilton.  We are so glad you enjoyed your time with us and we hope that you will be back to see us again soon.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Not worth it!!
review: We held our first ever Florida conference at the GALLERYone in June and it was a fantastic experience – for our organization, our sponsors, and our attendees. Organizing an event of this type – over multiple days, with several hundred people, and many moving parts – is no small undertaking.  Amy Luczak, Events Services Manager, proved invaluable throughout the entire process of planning and executing our conference.  She continually went above and WAY beyond to see that each detail was looked after; even checking in on her days off, coming in early, staying late and communicating needs to all other departments effectively and fast.  We booked nearly three times the number of rooms that we originally planned for, and with the assistance of Bill, Eduardo, and Amy, we were able to…

title: Check your room
review: I came to the hotel with my family and was told the suite was ready and new linens on sofa bed. My family went up to the room to turn in for the night, I took cushions off sofa bed and found crumbs on top of pullout mattress. It clearly wasn't clean before arrival. I inspected further and found a hair tie on the floor under the sink.  Sheets were stained, and a questionable curly hair in the corner of the shower. The dresser drawers had a missing handle too. Not terribly impressed.

title: A room with Amazing cookies
review: Dear hbt341,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity.  This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Fantastic Hotel!
review: I had the pleasure to stay at Hilton it was amazing a very comfortable one. Near to the mall which offers a good range of shopping options . The check in was fast and we were welcomed with warm chocolate chip cookies , I had to go back again to reception to ask more mor they were amazing. Thank you Hilton for a wonderful stay.

title: Excellent Valet parking service!
review: Dear saurabh007singh, Thank you for your review of your stay with us at GALLERYone.  It was a pleasure to hear how you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your return, especially for a few more cookies.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Very dissatisfied
review: Lovely hotel...near everything, easily accessible to highways, shopping, food and most of all the beach.  Great staff and very clean.  The view of the intracoastal waterway is fantastic and the yacht parade makes for great entertainment.

title: Fort Lauderdale Gem Vacation
review: The room was spectacular, clean and very large.  The view from the balcony was wonderful I couldn't have been happier with the accommodations.  The staff except for an overworked waitress in the restaurant was excellent and very helpful. My only 'gripe' was you have to pay an additional fee daily for valet parking, and there is no other parking available.  I wasn't told about that prior and it's not inexpensive.  On the upside however the valet team is very responsive and always ready to help.

title: Nice Property and Conveniently situated
review: Dear Richard T,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  As for your comments about valet it is nice to hear you enjoyed the service, as for the price we are one of the lower priced hotels for valet.  All the hotel along the beach only offer valet.   Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Good service that made my stay great
review: I liked this hotel. Most of the staff was friendly and helpful. My room had a nice balcony with a beautiful view of the port. It was really nice to have a kitchenette. And the hotel was in walking distance to a Publix grocery store, a nice mall, and good restaurants and night life. Everything was well kept and staff was attentive to your needs. I have no complaints about my stay, I just wasn't wow'd. I believe I left a couple items and the front desk keeps forwarding my call to housekeeping and housekeeping has never answered the phone. It's been a few weeks and when I speak to someone at the front desk they are really friendly and make me feel like I'm going to make progress and then nothing. So nice hotel. Make sure you have all your belongings before you leave! :-)

title: Good cookies
review: Dear ReliableAssessment, Thank you for your review.  It is very disturbing to me that no one has responded to your calls from our housekeeping lost and found department.  Please feel free to contact me directly if they have not responded and I will assure you an answer.  Please accept my apologies for this and I hope to hear from you.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent Service
review: The room we were put in barely had a balcony. The hotel was nice enough to give me a way better room with a nice balcony and great view. Cookies were sensational. Also, had a toilet issue & the plumber came within 5 mins. Experience is everything. 3-5 min walk to the beach. The layout of the rooms are really nice.

title: No semblance of a DoubleTree or Hilton Hotel.
review: This hotel does not live up to the DoubleTree or Hilton name.  Grime on vents, baseboards, torn chairs, stained carpet, sticky kitchen floor.  Shower and air conditioning vents look like they have never been wiped cleaned....I have pictures to show and tell.     Great location, if you're luckier than I in your accommodations.   Best wishes.....  I'm not showing up again.    Receptionist was a sweetheart and did her best to please and appease.   The receptionist was sweet to do everything possible to accommodate me.   Not her fault her fault the room is not to Hilton standards.   Where's the head of housekeeping?   Is there one?  Use your little finger to swipe the baseboards and vents t

title: Great place, great location, great staff
review: Dear alcarlsbad,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review. This level of housekeeping service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. This is not the standard that you expected or the standard we hold ourselves to either.  Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Right size of rooms for big families. Coastal view from the balcony is beautiful.
review: Had a great time and loved the food and staff. Worth a stay. Close to the beach, close to the activity of the town. Room was nice and big, and clean. Priced well. Nice view out back. The restaurant was great.

title: Room smelled and never saw housekeeping
review: Dear  pinkyknowsnaples,  Thank you for letting us know about your stay here at GALLERYone.  It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and your comments about our restaurant.  I hope you will come and see us again soon.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Ask a lot of questions before you stay here....
review: I checked in at this hotel along with my family of seven people. All of us got to stay in the same place with two big rooms and attached bathrooms. Overall experience with the accommodation was good except for few areas of improvement like Smelly hallways, doormats in the bathrooms etc. We were given a room with a beautiful view of the ocean backwaters from the balcony and that was most awesome thing. Front desk staff were extremely understanding and allowed us for a late check-out as we had senior citizens in the group. Another shocking thing at this hotel was 35$ daily valet parking fee. We did not opt for the breakfast as the hotel was willing to provide complimentary breakfast only for two people in the group. My kids has great time at the swimming pool and they could get to…

title: Never Again
review: Reservations for 2 nights.  Mislead on room reservation. Was expecting an Intercoastal view with balcony and did not get it.  Changed to a non intercoastal balcony room only to be up all night due to noise.  Very disappointed and checked out next day. Did not stay 2night. They would not refund the 2nd night.

title: A truly amazing hotel! 5 Star customer service
review: Dear 348sgoodwin,  Thank you for reaching out to us.  As we did discuss you were only charged for one night as well as receiving an upgrade to the actual room you booked.  I am very sorry that there was confusion and that somehow we misunderstood each other.  In addition, as you know we did make your parking complimentary as a way of trying to make it right for you.  I do apologize that the noise you encountered was of such a disturbance.  Again please accept my apologies that there was so much miscommunications.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Needs a remodel, lots of wear and tear, $35/night valet
review: As a Diamond member, I stay in a lot of Hilton properties over the course of the year and I was truly amazed by how amazing this hotel was! The number one thing that really makes a hotel stay enjoyable, regardless of the amenities and rooms, is the customer service. The customer service provided by a hotel can truly change ones experience! This hotel may not have be a five star rated hotel with five star rooms and amenities but the customer service and ambiance of the hotel is spectacular and definitely a lot better than even five star hotels I stayed at previously! From the moment I called to request early check-in, to the upgraded room I received when I arrived, Neisha was there to make sure it went smoothly! The valet John was awesome with his great sense of humor and wishing…

title: Highly Recommended
review: Dear Yitzi P, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay here at GALLERYone.  It is a pleasure to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and I want to thank you for mentioning so many of our team members that made your stay special.  I know I speak for our entire team when I say thank you for your business and we all are looking forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Very Accomodating
review: Do not come here expecting luxury. This is simply a bed to sleep in at night. You won't want to walk barefoot on the carpet--it's old. You won't want to sit in the chairs or couches in your room--they're old.  They're doing construction near the pool.  The bathroom is simple and fine.  The A/C is very loud.  The front desk is very friendly and helpful.  Just suck up the extra expense and go stay at the W.

title: Not at all what I expected
review: As a travel business owner, I typically stay at another hotel brand because I always know what to expect when it comes to quality. However, my company hosted an event at the Doubletree Suites this weekend so I decided to stay on property for convenience. I have to say I was very impressed with the size of the suites, the cleanliness, the fully stocked kitchenette and more importantly the customer service from the valet, housekeeping and the front desk staff.  The 6 minute walk to the beach was icing on the cake. This location also has a Publix right across the street and a mall right next door so the location is perfect!  I would definitely recommend this property to my clients and I plan to return for a family getaway. ~ Tanisha Burke

title: Great hotel and location
review: Dear Tanisha B,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay with us.  It is a pleasure to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us. We enjoyed your group and look forward to your return next year.  Again, thank you and especially thank you for your business.   Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Room Too Funky
review: Choice this hotel before leaving on a cruise.  The Joel Has a great location.  You can walk to great restaurants, the beach and if you must, the mall.   The staff make you feel Welcome and like being at home.  They hotel is clean, rooms spacious and comfortable.

title: One of the most amazing hotel
review: Dear JanetS Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We hope the next time you are in town you will once again stay with us.  Regards, Bob Robert Keesler

title: Don’t drive to Hotel
review: Furniture needs to be cleaned room need to be deodorized white ball guy up front is racist valet is pointless Pavel has great customer service housekeeping staff need to clean rooms better cookies are delicious

title: Great Service at Front Desk (Guy and Neisha)
review: Guy and Neisha went above and beyond during our 5 day stay.  We had a ton questions and each time they both were extremely helpful.  From the moment we walked into the hotel they made us feel welcome and their attitudes were very pleasant.  I would recommend this place based the interactions that those two.  Thanks

title: Well worn luxury
review: Dear  pritchfam,  Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  You are so kind mention two of our outstanding team members who made your stay welcoming and special.  We hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Vacation
review: This hotel, at one point,  was obviously extremely luxurious, but it is definitely showing its age.  The staff was pleasant, the room was clean, the bed was comfortable,  the hotel was quiet, but run down.  My biggest complaint is the exorbitant fee for parking. $33 + tax and a tip per day is absurd and offensive. As much as we enjoyed the stay, we will not book here again as we felt the parking policy is borderline unethical.

title: Was what we needed it to be....
review: Dear mactrekr,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at GALLERYone, As I am sure you observed there are many projects underway at the hotel.  The new front drive is completed, new carpet in all meeting rooms and ballroom along with the rebuilding of our seawall and dock that will open the grounds to the intracoastal waterway.  We will soon be embarking on the refurbishments of our corridors.  As for the parking our valet charge is one of the lower ones on the beach.  Unfortunately all the hotels in our area are valet only. I hope you will return to see the improvements we make over the summer.  Again, thank you for your review.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Don’t be fooled....
review: Nice hotel, friendly staff & excellent food.  Groundskeeping could use some TLC.  Excellent location; 3 minute walk to beach, Mall, Publix, etc.  Water Taxi so much fun - definitely take a day to take advantage of this!

title: Absolutely Loved This Hotel!!!
review: I just returned home from a 3-night stay at the GalleryOne hotel and was honestly sad to leave. It was such a delight to call this hotel "home" for the weekend. The front desk staff was welcoming and even straightened out a little mix-up with my rate for the weekend without giving me a hard time. I stayed in a 2-room king suite that had views of the waterway and the ocean. It was incredible!!!  The proximity to the beach, the Galleria Mall and Publix made the location wonderful. I admit to doing my part in helping the Fort Lauderdale economy while at the Galleria Mall. LOL!!! I'm hoping to return to Fort Lauderdale, again, this year and planning on staying at the GalleryOne again!!! God bless you all!!!

title: Very Beautiful Hotel
review: Dear sssunshine,  Thank you for your review.  It a pleasure to read your review and we are glad you enjoyed your stay. You are correct that the location of the hotel near restaurants, shopping and a short walk to the beach is a great location.  We hope you will return soon.  Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent receptionist
review: I enjoyed my stay and got the best service.  I will definitely be staying here again when i am in town for business or pleasure.The room was comfortable and spacious.  The view was great of the intercoastal.

title: Kind receptionist
review: Dear bridgesoflifetravels,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  It great to read that you enjoyed your time with us and I know I speak for our entire team when I say we are looking forward to your return.  Sincerely  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Noisy  & pricey hotel
review: GalleryOne was not our original hotel of choice; however, our receptionist made the stay worthwhile. Her name was Neisha and her customer service is tip-top. She took care of us starting at the check in. Thanks Neisha for the room, 328 and the hospitality. I rated the hotel a 3 bc it is worn and outdated. My husband and I were celebrating our 16th wedding anniversary so the area was great. We couldn’t enjoy sitting on the balcony bc the view was a brick wall unless we stood up. The water in the sink is slow to go out. There is no information book in the rooms regarding services at the hotel. The housekeeping is subpar and there are no cards left by them to know who cleaned or half cleaned the room. The location is great with the mall, Publix, and the beach within walking…

title: "Just" okay  for one night pre Cruise Stay
review: GalleyOne has been since 2008 my go to hotel pre cruise and usually, it gets an Excellent rating but. I cannot in all honestly do so after the last visit. It has nothing to do with the staff or service. As all staff we interacted with were stellar and professional. But the hotel does NEED an update. The two bed units would be nice if there were toaster and kettle in them. And please supply some dish soap to rinse out drinking glasses and cutlery before use. Pretty sure it used to be supplied.  We had 5 rooms in total for 19 people on a family reunion cruise.  This review is to focus on expectation... the hotel is a great pre cruise location, but the rooms are showing wear and tear. And in particular, the 2 bedroom suites which in retrospective most likely get the most traffic.…

title: The entire resort staff was very friendly, professional and helpful.
review: Dear Chelseafcgal,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us and your experience.  I want to thank you for your comments about our team members who do a great job in servicing our guests.  We have passed along your comments concerning housekeeping which I apologize that did not meet your or our standards.  The hotel is embarking some major improvements or a corridor renovation, rebuilding the dock on the intracoastal and other upgrades.  We hope you will return next year to see the progress.   Sincerely,  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: As expected almost...
review: The outside noise was very frustrating. The BRIDGE was very NOISY. The lobby of the hotel is nice. The hotel really needs to update the livingroom furniture. The kitchen should have a medium size toaster oven. Each floor should have ice room on it. The Laundryroom equipment needs to be updated. The fitness room was OK.

title: Tired property
review: Dear  ronaldscott04, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  You are correct that while only being an 8 minute walk to the beach we certainly have an urban setting and are located on the intracoastal waterway.  We also appreciate your suggestion of how to improve the hotel and I can assure you we will pass these suggestion along to our owners.  I want to thank you for your business and next time we will make sure that your room is away from the street.   Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Over rated at best
review: Great location with the typical Hilton customer service and room amenities you should expect. Room was not cleaned well but was overall was a great stay. Pool, bar and restaurant were all very nice. Lovely water views as well!

title: Awesome property!!!
review: Recently stayed for 4 nights and it was a great place to stay! Hotel has a great property and very clean with nice pool and a Starbucks.  Rooms were very clean and everyone at the hotel was very nice and helpful. About a 5 minute walk to the beach and great restaurants! Across the street there is a Publix and a very nice big mall to do some shopping. A nice bonus with this property is that is has the water taxi stop at the back of the hotel which was very nice and convient, which is a must do if your in Ft Lauderdale. I highly recommend this hotel if your staying in Ft Lauderdale

title: OUTSTANDING VACATION
review: Dear Jordan H, Thank you so much for letting us know about you time with us here at GALLERYone.  It great to see how much you enjoyed your stay and the great location the hotel occupies offering so many choice.  We want to thank you for your business and hope you will return to see us soon.   Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Awful hotel!
review: My husband and I just spent one week for our anniversary. Elizabeth at the front desk was professional, very helpful and accommodating, and so sweet! Ryan, the Hotel Manager was amazing, He arranged for our early check-in, personally brought us our keys by the pool, and arranged for us to be greeted by balloons and a bottle of wine in our room!!! The staff at the VUE Restaurant was great. We especially want to acknowledge Ram, the omlette chef (the best omlette ever!), and our servers, Jackie and Gallina. All the staff was wonderful! We enjoyed the great accommodations, the exercise room, the pool, and very short walk to the beach. Lovely!

title: Five minute walk to beach - very clean
review: Dear coffeebreakrn, Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  It is a pleasure to read your review and wonderful to read how many of our team members made your stay special.  I personally want to thank you for your business and hope you will return soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keeseler General Manager

title: Staycation
review: This hotel is unfortunately run down and dated.  The bathroom in the lobby and in my hotel suite was not clean.   My suite did not have the basic utensils to make a simple meal for a family.  When I called for more utensils I could not get ahold of housekeeping, and when I finally did, they did not bring what I requested.  The service is also poor.  The bellman will not deliver your luggage to your room unless you are there in hopes they get a tip.  I really hate when service staff play games like that.  I did receive good service in the hotel dining room which was appreciated. There is only two umbrellas beside the pool so shade is extremely difficult to find.  And if you’re trying to be in the shade and watch your children swim at the same time, good luck!  I would never stay…

title: Last minute getaway!
review: Two friends and I decided to stay the night in Ft. Lauderdale after a day of adventure. We found Gallery One hotel at great rate.  Cool hotel, great location, excellent & attentive staff. Enjoyed everything!

title: Great hotel
review: Dear BrianZGuertin, We are so glad you found us and that you enjoyed your time at GALLERYone.   We hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: awesome stay!!
review: Pavel at the front desk is awesome - very accommodating! We enjoyed our stay. Great location - Short walk ( 10 minute) to the beach. Wonderful breakfast buffet and attentive staff.  Beds are comfy, full kitchen and living area.

title: Excellent experience
review: Dear ohappyday19,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  You are so kind to mention one of our team members who made your stay special.  You are correct that our location is very special and we all hope you will be back to see us again soon.  Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Friendly and Fun customer service
review: Neisha was AWESOME !!!!!! everything was so perfect anything we needed she provided ! she was very friendly and has a beautiful smile she made us feel welcomed and i just beat cancer and she made me feel as if i never had it! Thank you so much Neisha !! hope to see her on our next staycation!

title: Trip
review: I enjoy doubletree.  However, I was disappointed this trip based upon the quality of the suites. Customer service was excellent outside of one waitress in the dining area. I would like to return but I am uncertain. ....................

title: Mental Note - Never Again In March
review: Dear deeN2810EB,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very pleased to read of your experience during your stay with us about our service and team members. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock with access to the intercostal l waterway, as well as other enhancements to the grouunds. I do hope you will return in a few months to see the improvements.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Excellent location and hotel
review: Have stayed here many times in the past before going on cruises and love the hotel, location and staff - however, being from the UK  I was ignorant about something quite big here called Spring Break !!  To be fair the hotel was quite busy with younger people but had no noise or issues and at check in Caylin, who was very helpful throughout our stay, told us to report any problems immediately. I think the location of the hotel being a few blocks from the main drag made it quieter for us but getting a drink or food on the waterfront was almost impossible. Anyway, the hotel rooms are always good and the staff in particular are a reason to keep coming back. Paval on reception very professional - eat in the hotel bar area on all four nights we stayed - on the first night Angelo the…

title: Great Stay!
review: Dear Courtgazza,  Thank you so much for staying with us again all the way from the UK.  We really appreciate your returning year after year.  It is wonderful to read so many of our team member's names that made your stay with us special.  We are happy to hear that our spring break guests were well behaved as they do most of the time with us.  Again, thank you for your comments and we hope to see you next year.  Cheers  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Wedding Weekend
review: We were in Ft. Lauderdale for a week of training for my husband's work.  We upgraded to a suite with a balcony overlooking Sunrise Blvd.  It was .6 mile walk to the beach to watch the sunrise each morning.  We enjoyed walking along the beach in the evening.  Our room was well cleaned and straightened daily by our wonderful "maid", Angela.  We were on the sixth floor.  There was never a lot of noise.  It was a peaceful and relaxing place to stay.  It is within walking distance of not only the beach but multiple restaurants, grocery store, Starbucks and a Mall.  Great location. Pricey but worth the money.  Shout out to Angela (Floor 6 Room Attendant and Jesus (Maintenance)

title: Outstanding visit. Balcony views of the intercoastal
review: One knows from the moment you pull in that it is going to be a great stay from valet to front desk to breakfast staff  Notable employees include all the front desk forgot the name of who upgraded me when i arrived( ouch) but elizabeth checked me out. Andrea was an exceptional breakfast server and btw the omelot was exceptional   And smoked salmon. Rasberries&blackberries  I hated to leave

title: Wonderful stay!!
review: Dear Richard K Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  It is great to hear so many of our team members mentioned who made your stay special.  Thank you so much for your business and we all look forward to your return soon.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Excellent Service!
review: Great stay!! Location is great. Out Walking & just minutes away from the beach & galleria. The entire staff was great. They were able to accommodate all our needs. We will be staying here again. Great times!!

title: Issues need immediate attention by general manager.
review: Dear mwild42,  Thank you so much for your review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your next visit.  Regards, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Fans of Baths and Peace and Quiet - Not for You
review: The service provided at this property was exemplary. In particular, we enjoyed our breakfast hosts Jackie, Allie, and Galina; and concierge Brian. It was great see the Director of Operations, Erik, available in public areas to confirm guests' positive experience.

title: Close to water Taxi.
review: Will never go back.....  The pool was closed for renovaiting in easter. Ac did not work the first night. Did not got a new room until next day. Rooms are a bit worn..  Valet parking, expensive to park there.

title: Couples weekend at the Tortuga Festival
review: Dear Per E  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially concerning the pool and your room A/C. Unfortunately the pool had to be closed due to an emergency repair and was beyond our control.  The safety and well being of our guests is our most important mission and I apologize for this occurring during your visit.  I am happy to report the pool is open and in perfect condition. Likewise I apologize for that your AC was not working properly. As for valet you will find all of the hotels in the beach area are valet only and our charges are some of the lowest.    Again, I hope that you will give us another chance to redeem ourselves in the future.   Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Nice location, terrible service
review: Excellent location from the Tortuga Festival, enjoyed the water taxi, the ambiance of the lobby, and outdoor bar area at the hotel was great.  The accommodations and view from the room were stellar. Would stay again.

title: decent doubtree with nice sized room and kitchen
review: Dear claracuente, Thank you for your review of your time with us during Tortuga.  Hope you enjoyed all that the festival offers.  We look forward to your return next year. Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: After cruise stay
review: The location of the hotel is nice (next to the intercoastal, clubs and shopping) although the service was terrible. It started off with the current day put down of 'I'm sorry you don't understand' regarding a local property policy that was completely different from the norm of Hilton and there was nothing written in the reservation about this. After more than two hours of my day wasted getting past this over chat sessions (because I was in the air to the hotel and couldn't call) and phone when I finally could call I had a room and a sincere apology on arrival, but not without yet another 'I'm sorry you didn't understand'.  The next adventure was on checkout where the base rate was different (higher) than my reservation. When I brought it to the attention of the front desk it was…

title: Exceptional staff and great location.  Special thanks to Doormen; Pieter, Daniel and Erick!
review: We recently spent a week golfing, shopping and beach.  This location has everything withing a 5 - 7 min walk.  A water taxi at the door and an Uber app on your phone eliminates the need for a car (we never waited more than 5 min for a ride).  Groceries are within sight  of the front door of the hotel.  Nearby restaurants by water taxi or walk is a lovely way to spend the evening. Our suite was without a view but had everything we needed (incl. a full kitchen) Beds are great and linens are of good quality. Last but certainly not the least is that every single staff member we met was happy, smiling and very helpful.

title: Helpful front desk staff
review: Dear kathywhite153,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  You are correct that our location is perfect to shopping, restaurants, water taxi and of course an eight minute walk to the beach.  It is great to hear you found our team members to be helpful and friendly.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to your return.  Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: First vacation in Florida
