review: I stay at this hotel for business purposes.  When I arrived at the front desk, I asked Shekeria if there was any possibility of getting a room with a balcony.  She was extremely pleasant and actually switched my room to one with a lovely balcony and view.  In addition, I love the location as it's an easy 2 block walk to the beach and has a nice choice of restaurants within a short walking distance.

title: Staff Kuddos
review: Dear lindabR9053TE, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you were so kind to mention one of our team members who made your stay special.  We look forward to your return soon. Regards, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Amenities  are great for the price and Location
review: We traveled all day to get to Fort Lauderdale this evening for a week of fun.  We were so fortunate to meet Elizabeth, who was working at the Gallery One checking in guests.  We had asked if there is any chance we could be booked into a room with a water and ocean view.  She worked her magic and set us up with a room that we are totally thrilled about.  She is a great ambassador for the Gallery One and for Fort Lauderdale and Florida.  We are off to an awesome start to our vacation.  Thank you, Elizabeth for your hospitality and great customer service.  This is going to be an amazing home for us this week. Thank you!  The view is beautiful at this hotel.

title: Just like me....past it’s prime and often grumpy
review: I booked two days here for a recent business trip. When I got into my room, I immediately jumped on a series of work calls. While on these calls, I noticed that the noise from the road was very prominent. I called the front desk and asked if my room could be changed. I was placed on hold for 15 minutes, and then when finally addressed by the front desk, was told ‘come downstairs and we will see what we can do.’   I declined, and asked them to let me know if they could place me in a quiet room. I was placed on hold for another 5 minutes and then told to come downstairs and pick up new keys.  I gathered my bag and went downstairs, where a set of new keys was tossed across the counter at me. No smiles, no engagement, no hospitality. I made my way to new room, which was very quiet.…

title: Valet service.
review: Dear Jyoungblood,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review. The experience you had is certainly not our standard and certainly not the training our guest service agents are trained to do.  I would personally like to make this right for you.  If you would be so kind to send me your confirmation number and email me at Robert.Keesler@Hilton.com so that we can make this right for you.   Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Felt dirty
review: Costa provided professional and courteous valet service upon our arrival and each time we needed our car.  In addition he provided great recommendations for dining in Fort Lauderdale beach and offered contacts to help us on our way.  Robenson  was excellent as we saw him multiple times during our stay. Highly recommend, thank you for excellent service each time we arrived and departed the hotel!

title: Formal Event- Katz
review: Dear JLRoche,  Thank you for your very kind review and for mentioning several of our outstanding team members.  I personally want to thank you for your business and hope you will return soon.   Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great location, good people!
review: Trash remained in hallways for days! Foul odor in the hallways. I even think our cleaning lady picked up our towels from the floor and re-folded them for another use. I don't believe I will be staying at this hotel anymore.

title: Great location and very friendly staff
review: So let’s start with the positives.  Location, location, location.  Easy walk to the beach and the hotel is part of the water taxi system, well worth a trip to see the area from the water and all the beautiful homes. You can also easily walk .75-1.25 miles to the restaurants on the beach.  This is a definite perk given the lack of parking by the beach.  Being Hilton honors gold we received a free breakfast every morning and it was truly outstanding.  Our waitress Alli, was also wonderful and truly went out of her way to make us feel welcome.  She’s a true gem, always smiling and making guests feel welcome.  Most guests knew her by name due to her excellent attention to detail.  Our room was large and quiet in the evenings, which we greatly appreciated.  The pool area was nice,…

title: CHECK YOUR BILL!!!
review: Dear cschoch778, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your self and the hotel.  You were kind to mention one of our team members who helped make your stay special.  In addition, glad you enjoyed our very special location.  We are embarking on corridors being refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the inter coastal waterway along with improvements on the patio and pool.  We hope the next time you return you will again stay with us and experience the improvements.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Old friend looking Tired
review: Here’s the positive: it was in a nice location and easy to walk to the mall, which is across the street, and the beach which is 10 mins away.   Now the bad:  First they tried to put someone else’s parking on my bill meaning they charged me for my 2 days plus someone else’s. Luckily I still had my parking ticket so they could take that off.   Then, I paid for my room 2 months in advance since it was during spring break. When I got my bill I could see that they were trying to charge me again. Initially I was told the finance manager would call me, never happened, and I called the hotel for 4 days straight. So I went over their head and went to corporate and now they are in the process of refunding me the money.   Moral of the story: if you chose to stay here, check your bill! And…

title: Great people, great location!! One small hiccup...
review: Dear 412laquitah,  First I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone.  It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience about the billing errors that occurred.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity.  This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members who did not respond.  Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely, Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Bad Service wrecked my stay
review: Hard to put my finger on anything in particular.  Stayed here about 4 years ago and pretty impressed.  Good value, good sized rooms, helpful staff, but it just looked as though it needed a make over this time. Still has lots of pluses like a great location . Needs some money and love to add that extra pzazz

title: Nice hotel in a great location!
review: I was in town for a wedding and we stayed here. The hotel is very nice and sits on the water. We lucked out and got a suite with a balcony that had a view of the water, pool and the city. The room it self was nice. We had clean towels daily and nice clean sheets.  There were any issues that occurred with the room at any point during our stay which was nice. There is also a mall next door to the hotel, as well as restaurants, shops and a grocery store all within walking distance. They had a breakfast buffet every morning that had a nice selection of items to choose from. FYI if you drive they don't have self parking, they only have valet which is $15/hr or $30/day.  I would stay again if I find myself back in the Fort Lauderdale area.

title: Spring break mess
review: Dear Rhoyaldiva22,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is nice to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, the view from your room and our location.  Next time your plans call for visiting Fort Lauderdale we hope you will select us again.   Thank you for your busienss, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great Location and Comfortable Stay
review: We unknowingly came during the peak of spring break, it was a mess...A loud annoying mess the hotel was party central   The shower had mold and most of the water just leaked out and onto the bathroom floor.  I really think this hotel has potential but we were happy to only be spending one night.

title: Excellent location
review: Dear slcbritt13,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity. Yes, spring break is a challenge for every hotel in Fort Lauderdale and works our security team and I am sorry that you were not aware.  I have passed along your other comments to our housekeeping and engineering department to make sure that this does not happen to anyone else.   Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely Bob  Robert Keesler  General Manager

title: Good stay/ Great service
review: This was our third pre-cruise stay at GalleryOne. We were in room 1107. Very clean and comfortable. Furnishings do need updating but hotel is renovating rooms. Breakfast was very good and was free as I have Hilton status but very expensive otherwise. Food is not bad for a hotel. Great having water taxi stop right at the hotel. Can walk to the beach in about 10-15 minutes. Parking is expensive but all hotels near beach charge about the same or more. Staff was very pleasant and helpful. Good restaurants within walking distance and Publix Supermarket is also short walk. Another very comfortable and convenient stay. Will definitely stay again.

title: Well located but needs a refresher
review: Loved the location of the hotel right next to the Galleria Mall making shopping a breeze. Also conveniently close to a lovely french bakery for breakfast and convenient shops across the street. The hotel itself is not much to write home about since the rooms are a bit run down and the ambiance in bar and breakfast room are downright depressing. But if you’re on a mission in FLL other than romancing it at the hotel, it works great!

title: Great Location and Staff!
review: First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intercostal waterway. In addition we are continuing to upgrade our rooms as well.  I hope you will see the difference when you return.   Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Overpriced and unimpressive
review: This hotel is situated in a great location.  Beautiful balcony views of the inter-coastal river and the ocean!  The staff is super nice and they give you these warm and awesome cookies upon arrival! I would have given this hotel a 5 star rating but my room fridge was dirty.  Also the lobby bathroom smelled like urine and it was dirty too.  Overall, great large suite rooms.  Water taxi stop too!

title: Stayed twice
review: Dear sofigigi,  First I would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone. It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests. I am glad overall you enjoyed your stay.  You can rest assured that the comments you made have been addressed with our team so that corrective action and training has taken place.  I do want to thank you for your business and hope you will return soon.   Sincerely,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great Staff , Great Location, Great Rooms  VIP Living without the Price!
review: Stayed one night in between a trip to the Keys and our flight home. searched for a nice place to stay to end our vacation and was well-located. Galley One seemed perfect. Booked a two bedroom room w canal view for higher $$ than we wanted to pay but, the location was nice. For almost $400/night, I suppose we expected great service, nice amenities and customer service. We have stayed at many other upscale hotels and those expectations are not out of line. When we arrived, we had to locate someone to valet our car and to help w our luggage. Normally, that happens automatically without effort. I had requested extra towels and shampoos when I booked the room as there were five of us in the room. I mentioned that at check-in and was told that everything was in the room. Our room was…

title: 4 cruising buddies
review: We stayed at this hotel prior to our cruise. We had a 2 bedroom/2 bath room on the 9th floor. The views from the windows & balcony were fantastic. Our room was clean & quiet. All the staff was accommodating & cordial. The front desk was awesome!The Galleria is a short walk with several nice restaurants on the outside. The trolley stop is also at the Galleria. There's a grocery store across the street. The beach is a few blocks away. We will return to this hotel when we return to Ft Lauderdale!

title: Find another hotel to stay at!
review: Dear CruzinBuddies, Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay at GALLERYone.  It is a pleasure to hear how much you enjoyed your stay.  I want to thank you for your business and I know I speak for our entire team when I say we look forward to your return.  Hope you enjoyed your cruise.   Regards, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Fantastic hotel
review: This is one of the worst experiences I have ever had. Poorly run, not kept up, staff isn't treated well buy management. Extremely overpriced for the lack of quality they provide.  Go somewhere else.  Trust me!

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: Dear cskickbox,  Firstly i would like to thank you for taking the time to advise us of your recent stay at GALLERYone.  It is only through feedback such as yours that we are able to maintain and indeed, where necessary, improve upon the service that we provide to our valued guests.  I was very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, I do extend it with all sincerity.  I certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially in your other reviews concerning billing errors.  This level of service is certainly not acceptable and will be addressed with the concerned team members. We are embarking on corridors refurbishment and rebuilding the dock and access to the intercostal l waterway.  I do understand that your billing errors have been corrected.   Again, please accept my apology.  Sincerely  Bob Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Great Concierge Made my Stay!
review: Stayed here for 4 nights prior to our cruise and we had a great time! Hotel is in good location,only few minutes walk to beach,plenty of bars and restaurants nearby aswell! Staff in the hotel were exceptional and helped with everything! The hotel itself is lovely and spacious,the pool area is big with a bar and plenty of sun loungers available! Our room was a suite which was very big,champagne and chocolates were in our room upon arrival which was a great touch by the hotel! All in all this was a great hotel with great staff in a good location

title: a dump!
review: disgustingly dirty, carpet outside my room was disgusting, room smelled very musty, kitchen was filthy, refrigerator so cold the apples froze, towels were stained.  Room never cleaned, called to get fresh towels, coffee, etc.  Girl who answered said would bring up, hour later called downstairs, she left fro night and never relayed the message.  Remotes were sticky, no guide for channels.  Hotel full of spring breakers, was loud, unkempt.  No one managing the noise levels.

title: In my 7th Year staying at Gallery One
review: Dear adrianacX7528NI,  Please accept my apologies for what was certainly not a good stay.  We have passed your comments to our entire team for review and action.  We will soon be refurbishing all our corridors but what you found is not our standards or the standards you expected.  The lack of service that you experienced is again not our standard and again i must apologize.  I hope in the future you will allow us to show you the improvements that we have made because of your comments.   Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Don't stay here
review: I return to Gallery One  year after year. Why ? Location, location and location. In minutes I can  walk to the Mall, to the Supermarket, to the beach and along the lovely seafront. I can take a water taxi from the hotel and the  bus trolly is only a few minutes walk away. A change and a rest is what a vacation is all about and Gallery one has it all including a lovely outdoor area right on the river and a heated pool. The staff are excellent and the suites are well presented and very clean with a living room/ dining room and a kitchen. That´s why I am in my 7th year at Gallery One.Try a 2 bedroom suite for that little bit of extra room. Excellent value for a family. Nearly forgot. Just over the bridge there are two very good restaurants that are lovely and very reasonably…

title: Attended Wedding
review: Dear Stewart1234567  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay at GALLERYone.  It wonderful to read your review and so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  I know I speak for our entire team when I say thank you so much for your business.  We are all looking forward to seeing you for year 8.   Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Wow! Great place for business or vacation!
review: We are here from the UK on our honeymoon this is the second hotel we have stopped in. This hotel is in urgent need of refurbishment, especially the bedrooms, the furniture is very old and tired, very bad lighting and just not very clean, there was dirty streaks down the window frames, dirty hand marks on the inside of the main door, very dusty behind the bathroom door, stain of the wall by the bed, having the kitchen was good, although the microwave door was greasy on the outside, but was clean on the inside, the carpet needs replacing, look tired and dirty. The room said to have a balcony, which it did, but was a Juliet balcony, which I think should have been mentioned, as I was expecting a balcony to sit out on.  At the moment there is building work being done below our room…

title: Great location Great service
review: Our concierge Brian was more than accommodating anticipating our every need. Stephanie our bartender was super and front staff! Try the new Chef!  There are multiple options fir dinner in this area however we thought we would stay in the hotel for dinner on the intracoastal. We were not disappointed!

title: Weekend in paradise
review: Dear  margesasso,  Thank you for your review.  It is a pleasure to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you are so kind to mention several of our outstanding team members.  I am also glad that you were able to enjoy our new chef's menu and happy to read how much you enjoyed our new cuisine.  Thank you for your business and we are all looking forward to your return.  Regards,  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Rooms, rate and location were acceptable.... the restaurant was not!
review: We had a very positive experience from the beginning.  We arrived hours before check in.  I asked if there were any upgrades for Hilton Hours members and acknowledged that we were very early and would have to wait.  The young lady told me that she did in fact have an upgrade available and she would have the room ready as soon as possible.  We were in our room by noon, hours before check in!  We were absolutely delighted when we got to our room.  It was a king suite on the twelfth floor with sweeping views of the Intercoastal and the Atlanta ocean.  The room was well appointed with kitchenette, living room, dining room and a separate bedroom and bath. The pool area was lovely with plenty of chairs in the sun as well as the shade.  I received a text message from the hotel a couple…

title: Our Fifth Year...and counting
review: Dear U8320WYcarolyns, Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay with us.  It is a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and found everything you needed. I personally want to thank you for staying with us and I know I speak for our entire team when I say we are looking forward to your return.  Sincerely  Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: The lobby is misleading
review: I recently stayed at the Gallery One, a Doubletree Hotel in Fort Lauderdale, Fl.  I booked it because frankly everything on the beach was outrageously priced (granted it was in middle of high season).   When in Ft Lauderdale I prefer to stay at the Hilton Ft Lauderdale Beach Hotel or even the new Hilton Conrad, both of which are MUCH more premium properties, but they were charging upwards of $450 a night for a most basic room, even with my HHonors Diamond upgrade this would have been too much for my weekend-Gateway budget.   So I came across the G1, it had an inviting “walk-to-beach” location and a long weekender package that kept the rate to around 265/night.  The Check-in experience was pretty smooth with a very attentive front desk associate named Guy, who was pleasant and…

title: Stayed for 3 days
review: Then new restaurant was Amazing, Wow even the lobster bisque was fantastic.  Lobster Cobb was so delicious. We had ac great time at the pool bar Steph and Ben at the inside bar.   Thanks for the cookie!!!

title: Return stay--2 yrs later
review: Dear Stephanie H,  Thank you for your wonderful comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree! We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy some of the great new menu items at our Vue restaurant. Our new Chef Angelo has done wonders with the delicious new items we are now providing. We hope to welcome you back soon to taste any new creations he may have and of course for the wonderful drinks served by both Ben & Stephanie. Please let us know if we may assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Hotel needs serious updating
review: Our family once again chose to stay at Gallery One for 3 nights, 2 prior to and 1 night after our cruise. Our first stay we were on the 6th floor and facing the front of the hotel (Sunrise Blvd) and the second stay on the 9th floor facing the pool and waterway with slight view out to the ocean. The first room had a bit of a mildew smell to it. We MUCH preferred the second room. The service in the hotel was still good and most notibly the ladies who served us breakfast. At all 3 breakfasts, we were served our coffee and juice and chocolate milks for the kids promptly. Both ladies working were hustling as the dining room was full. They were kind, smiled a lot and insured we had what we needed. The other employee that helped me out was the kind young lady that worked in the outdoor…

title: Adequate for night before cruise lodging. Gets the job done.
review: Dear RunningM,  Thank you for your response regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are happy to hear that Stephanie was able to make you and your children comfortable while awaiting your room to be ready. We appreciate your understanding and hope you will return for another visit in the near future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Nice all suites hotel
review: We stayed in the two bed/two bath suite with two queens and one king and furniture is worn. The couch in the living area is uncomfortable (has a pull out in it also).   It’s nice that the kitchen has a stovetop and dishwasher, dishes, silverware.   The balcony is nice to sit and watch the waterway.   The pool needs to be re-done completely. The tiles that are situated around the pool move when you walk on them, some are cracked and split.   Overall, I am not impressed with a Hilton property.

title: Quirky room, hot tub didn't work, and no bathrub in room
review: I stayed here for two nights while in town for a conference. The layout of the suite is definitely a bit quirky. The dining table and the kitchen are well designed and add a thoughtful touch.  I was very disappointed that the hot tub was not working during my stay. There is a nice pool but not heated enough and the water was quite cold when I went in the evening time. Also, there was no bath tub in the suite itself, only a shower, which is the first I've experienced in a suite.  I've stayed at many Doubletrees all over the world as a Hilton Gold member and unfortunately this location falls short.

title: SADLY NOT WHAT YOU EXPECT FROM A HILTON PROPERTY
review: Dear Hamdan A,  Thank you for responding on TripAdvisor regarding your stay. We are sorry that the layout and the hotel design was not to your satisfaction. Unfortunately, we did have some repairs taking place on our hot tub and pool, but we are working hard to get our pool in pristine shape for our guests. We hope that you will allow us a chance to show the changes we are going through here at our hotel during a future visit. Thank you again for your response.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director Of Operations

title: Girls Night Before Cruise
review: I hold Diamond Status with Hilto and Platinum Elite with Marriott. In 2017 I spent over 278 nights in a hotel with the majority being a Hilton property so I'm qualified to tell you that this isn't a typical Hilton property.  First and most important it is dirty, poorly maintained and badly in need of a refurbishment.  Of the three guest elevators one of them drops uncomfortably before it begins to rise which caused more than a few people to utter some type of concern.  No matter which elevator you ride in it is dirty (tile, wall paneling, etc.) which would indicate that there is a need for some supervision in both maintenance and housekeeping.  My room was a 2 room suite om the 9th floor. When I stepped off the elevator to go to my room I was amazed at just how dirty the carpet…

title: Friendly wait staff
review: Dear P K,  I sincerely apologize that your stay was not a satisfactory one. If you could please provide me with your confirmation to my email at erik.mendoza@hilton.com, I would like to Make It Right for you. I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Disgusting room on arrival.
review: We had a group staying here before we went on a cruise, the check in staff was not very helpful or friendly and the hotel needs some updating.  The location is great - to the beaches and water taxi but for the cost, I would look elsewhere

title: OK, but renovation needed soon
review: Gallery One Double Tree The hotel is ok, but they need a renovation ASAP, it looks a bit old. All the staff is very kind and helpful.   Our room had a very odd layout, it had a kitchenette, and a living room, but the TV in the bedroom was not in front the bed. The bed is comfortable, but you can hear what is going on, next door.  The motor lobby looks a little bit dirty and out of shape.  We realize that it was a restaurant behind the Starbucks desk, serving breakfast until the second day, breakfast was ok, buffet was a little pricy, so we decided to order a la carte, but the egg sandwich was a little dry, I think they can put a little more passion on the cooking.

title: Great location and service but getting a bit tired.
review: Dear Raul L,  Thank you for taking the time to let others know of your stay. As you may have noticed, we are working to update and repair our hotel from damage that occurred during Hurricane Irma. We hope to have all of these repairs completed in March. Unfortunately, we can only do so much about the layout but will look into addressing the television concern. We just had a new chef start and he is currently working on training and a new menu for our Vue Restaurant.We hope that you will visit us again in the future to see the changes after they have been completed.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great location
review: The service is always wonderful here and so are the views. But the carpet is quite old with multiple stains now. The apartments are large and well appointed with a nice kitchen. But extremely scratched up cookware from years of use and needs to be changed out. I rang and asked for a new frypan and they bought me up another one that was only a little less scratched then what i already had. Big TV's and large bathrooms which is great also if you have kids.  Great proximity to the beach, shops, and restaurants. Parking is expensive as they only valet now for $36. So if you have 2 cars it sure adds up for a 7 night stay.

title: GalleryOne
review: Dear domstar007,  Thank you for your response here on TripAdvisor. We apologize that your stay was not an excellent one. We are in the middle of having some upgrades completed in the hotel and will address your concerns within a timely manner. We hope that you will allow us a chance to show you the updates with any future reservations you may have when visiting Fort Lauderdale again in the future.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Excellent location, very friendly staff
review: The hotel has a great location near the beach.  The room I stayed in needed some updating but it was generally clean.  The nearby bridge was easily heard when trucks drove over it.  Also, they were working on the dock so during the day there was a lot of construction noise.But that will be temporary.

title: Really? No toilet paper?
review: No cookie or "make it right" information given at registration. No toilet paper left in the hotel room after the maid had cleaned it; and it took not one but TWO calls to get it sent up. There were no working ice machines, except for the one in the restaurant. A $24 breakfast buffet. Fake sawdust/rubber cement shaped "bacon" that was completely inedible at the conference breakfast. Fitness machines weren't working. Given a room that was NOT what had been confirmed at registration. This is entirely substandard.

title: Excellent Location and pre-cruise hotel
review: Dear Kenneth G,  We sincerely apologize for the unsatisfactory stay you incurred at our hotel. We will be addressing this issue with our Housekeeping team as this was far from the service we should be providing. Please contact me directly at erik.mendoza@hilton.com so that I may address your reservation and find a way to Make It Right.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Gallery one hotel. And Concierge Brian Nissan!!
review: This is the perfect pre-cruise location.  Did not need a car, can walk to everything you need.  Our room was 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with kitchen and that was perfect for not having to eat out.  Stores all close and walking distance.  Hotel was under construction, however was still at Hilton standards.  Staff were very friendly and responsive.  Water taxi right there too!  I highly recommend this hotel - everything was up to expectations and beyond.

title: Brian is the BEST CONCIERGE ever
review: Dear sherryp60,  We sincerely appreciate your wonderful comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We greatly appreciated having you as a guest and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Okay if you need a kitchen, so so for conference meeting
review: Brian Nissan, the hotel consierge, was fantastic!! What a great guy. Gave us fantastic recommendations of what to do pre-cruise. Took the water taxi which is right at this hotel. Went down to dinner at Bokampers. Then took water taxi the next day again to Hollywood Beach and ate at Nicks. A hole in the wall but fantastic food. All Brian's recommendations. Love him! He is 5 stars! Hotel older but fit our needs fine. 4 stars from us. Daria and Ron.

title: Better than the reviews would have you believe
review: We're staying here now, and I have to say that, after reading the negative reviews here, I feel like we must be staying in a different hotel. Yes, there are still signs that restoration is going on, but our suite is clean, there are no stains or smells, the bed is VERY comfortable (thankfully!), and the staff has been wonderful, thus far.   I'll update this when our stay is over.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear decarillion,  Thank you for the great review regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We appreciate you understanding the restoration process we are having to go through. We have tried our best to get our hotel back to the great hotel it was and in doing so there will be times that there are construction noises and visuals. We look forward to having you as a return guest to see the many great changes that are occurring. Please let us know if you need assistance with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Hotel is in need of MAJOR update. Staff were very helpful
review: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The service was really great. The two bedroom suite was spacious and clean and having the kitchen was very helpful. The pool was nice and it's a short walk to the beach. Really a wonderful time there!

title: 10+ year diamond and 3rd worst stay ever
review: Dear Sharon R,  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide a great response to your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are happy to hear that you appreciated our location & guest room spaciousness. It was a pleasure having you as a guest and we hope that you will visit us again in the near future. Please let us know if we may assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great location and good amenities
review: This hotel is need of MAJOR updates in the rooms, lobby, dining areas and grounds. Walls need repairs, chairs and beds replaced and the general feel of a Hilton property is missing.  If you need a place to sleep, it is fine. However, the staff are excellent and really try to be helpful.

title: Wilting tree
review: Stayed for 2 nights December  Whilst it’s a nice hotel spacious rooms ect  Some areas looking rather tired & in need of The paint brush , it seems to have lost its pazzaz of a couple of years ago when I was a little in awe as you went in as a guest, or cut through off the water taxi stop  , it’s a shame really  Could still be a stunner , another observation  Was the breakfast buffet almost $60 For 2 , I love my brekky but this was of such expensive poor quality, I didn’t bother the second morning . Never done that anywhere before . Front desk wasn’t the friendliest place either when I mentioned on check out, we had no water to drink or bathe ,I was met with  It’s being repaired, but no apologies  Is it much to be polite ,think most people like a drink & a wash or shower before…

title: Motel quality, luxury hotel prices
review: Dear Peter J,  We sincerely apologize for your unsatisfactory stay. We will use your experience as a training tool and address with our entire team on what we could have done better. As for the repairs, we are still in the midst of getting our rooms repaired from Hurricane Irma. We hope that you will allow us a chance to show the progression if you ever travel through the Fort Lauderdale in the future. Please feel free to contact me directly if I may assist with those reservations. erik.mendoza@hilton.com  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Hilton should evict this property
review: Good location close to the beach, though you need to cross the bridge to actually get to the beach.   First room was disgusting. Dirty carpet, stains, broken dish washer. The replacement room was clean enough that we decided to stay but it wasn't great either. An example would be that when I used the dishwasher, it started rotating out of the wall towards me. Turns out it wasn't attached. Having a small child in the room this was rather concerning as kids have died due to appliances toppling over.

title: Pathetic!!!
review: Dear BrendanTheGreek,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a Hilton Honors member, you are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We sincerely apologize that we did not address your concerns in a timely manner and also did not provide you with a desirable room for your family vacation. As you noticed, we are going through some restoration from Hurricane Irma and will not be able to pause the restoration as the need for rooms rises during this time of year. Please look for the email I sent directly to you regarding us Making It Right. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great location
review: Hotel is chaotic, gives no priority to Hilton Diamond members.  Does not permit online checkin so customers have zero input into where they end up.  Hotel claims it cannot offer pre-check in because it is a condo,  Reception is chronically 7 understaffed during checkout.  $35 per night mandatory parking fee is outrageous. Doubletree should provide self-park option.  Hotel is not worth this rip-off fee.  And bottled water is offered only once per visit.  Sadly this is a property that cares more about itself than its customers.  Hilton really should remove its brand as

title: Great location
review: Family of 5 - plenty room for us - with a full kitchen. Hotel is a little tired - carpets in hallways are wrecked.  Location of this was ideal - next to shopping mall and 100m from the beach! Overall, perfect for us we stayed mid December for a week and again from Xmas to New Years.

title: Poor Service
review: Dear Jackie L,  We thank you for letting others know of your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are happy to hear that you had plenty of room for you and your family. Just an FYI, we just received the new carpet that will be installed soon in all of the corridors which will also be receiving new paint and wallpaper to better welcome our guests. We hope you will make a trip back to Fort Lauderdale and visit us again to see the changes. Please let us know if we may assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Well positioned, clean and comfortable
review: We arrived at this hotel after a week on a fantastic cruise with 12 from our family.  We had a lot of luggage and the staff member that greeted us was great and took care of our luggage.  He was the first and last person that we encountered at this hotel that was friendly and helpful.  We knew we would have to wait for our room as we arrived in the morning and they said our rooms would be ready at 2pm.  We went for a walk on the beach checked back to see if our two suites were ready, not yet....went for lunch at the mall...checked back to see if our rooms were ready...no luck.  We went and sat by the pool (with no bathing suits) and kept checking and no one seemed to know what was going on with our rooms.  Poor communication with housekeeping staff!!!  We waited until after 5pm…

title: Beach holiday at good value
review: Dear BethT5,  We sincerely apologize for your unsatisfactory stay with our hotel. If you could be so kind as to either email me or call me directly to discuss your reservations, I would greatly appreciate it. We would like to Make It Right as this is not normal behavior for our team. I would like to get some information from you in order assist and hope that you will allow us a chance to show that we listen to our guest's concerns. I look forward to hearing from you. erik.mendoza@hilton.com  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great Stay!
review: 3 night stay prior to boarding cruise. Room 328 on 3rd floor overlooked road as well as water view. Rooms were large and had  kitchenette (basic cooking, microwave, fridge and coffee making). Walking distance to Galleria shops (which had New Year sales), restaurants and supermarket. $15 taxi ride to Las Olas shopping street and access to cruises around the waterways ('Millionaire district' with large homes and mega yachts). Great breakfast with friendly staff. DInner there (1 night only) was well presented and good variety.Front desk staff always obliging and helpful. Not 5 star facilities but perfect for our needs prior to cruise.

title: Pre-Cruise stay
review: We had a wonderful stay. The staff was great and we had no problems.  The location was wonderful as there was a mall, grocery store, and restaurants all within walking distance.  There was also a water taxi.  We will definitely stay again.

title: Great hotel, prime location
review: Dear phyllisr2018,  A very big thank you for leaving a response regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are very happy to hear that you had a great stay and hope to be able to welcome you back in the near future. Please let us know if we may assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Many Happy Returns
review: Recently stayed two nights - clean, modern and comfortable hotel with attentive staff and a prime location with nearby walkable shops and restaurants.  Would definitely return for another visit or recommend this hotel to others.

title: Nice hotel, rooms not worth the price!
review: Dear franklins158,  We thank you for allowing others to be informed of your wonderful stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your next visit. Please let us know if we may be of assistance with future reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Overcharged at Check In!
review: My wife and I have just spent our fourteenth holiday at this hotel. Why do we return you may Ask? For a start it has a great location on the intracoastal but quite close to the beach and the Galleria shopping centre. Next the staff are so friendly and obliging. They cannot do enough to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. From the reception staff, to the car valets, waitresses and chambermaids, all were helpful and charming as ever.  The suites are spacious and the beds so very comfortable. Most suits have balconies. Full kitchens. Just the shores could do with modernisation.  Breakfast buffet is great.  Look forward to our next stay.

title: Great stay
review: Was able to check in early. Everyone was so friendly. Alley and Jackie  the waitresses was super friendly and helpful.  Buffet was very good wirh lots of choices. Room was clean.  Publix store across the street.

title: Hilton Hospitality at is best
review: Dear Kristy L,  Thank you very much for the great response regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. I will be sure to share your thoughts with Allie, Jackie and the rest of the team. We hope you will be able to visit us again soon when traveling throught the Fort Lauderdale area in the future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great stay
review: With an hotel event scheduled during our stay we did not get our normal room upgrade as we come to expect as diamond members. However the staff made us feel like Diamond member with other amenities...

title: Dirty - Time for an Upgrade
review: Dear Brian C,  We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We apologize for not having a Diamond upgrade available for your stay due to the Boat Parade and a sold out hotel. We hope that you will visit us again in the near future so that we may be able to provide this and the other great services you've come accustomed to.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great Hotel and Great Location
review: We stayed at this hotel for the boat parade. It was a great escape, nice location on the intercostal. Drinks were good at the bar and service was excellent. The beds are extremely comfortable and the rooms were very modern and clean. Only problem was the hallways, they smelled.

title: Great location for exploring the area by public transport.
review: We had a one bedroom two queen bed suite with a balcony with a city view - the bedroom was spacious, bathroom huge ..and fantastic shower - no bath and the living area and kitchen were a real bonus ...the photographs of the room on the hotel website  truly represented the facilities. From the city room balcony you hear and see a lot of traffic noise but once in the room we couldn't hear any noise from inside or outside the hotel.   House keeping was a bit random ...no coffee left but 8 bottles of shampoo!! We were able to get coffee for the room from reception staff.   I enjoyed the pool and towels are supplied in the pool and there is a bar for refreshments.   There was no information booklet in the room.  There is a shopping mall and supermarket in easy walking distance from…

title: Paper Thin Windows
review: Dear Gaily377,  We are very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us here at the GALLERYone DoubleTree. As yourself and other have mentioned, our suites are very spacious and great for stays with families. I will communicate with our housekeeping team to be sure all amenities are fully stocked on a daily basis. We hope that you will join us again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Location amazing!
review: The windows seemed to be made of paper as I could hear all the noises outside. The wind was blowing so hard I thought my window was open. Having a bay view sounds like a good thing until you hear every vehicle that drives over the bridge.

title: Good and bad
review: Dear nela490,  We apologize that you were not satisfied with the location of the room during your stay. Unfortunately, with 60+ rooms still out of order due to Hurricane Irma, we are very limited on what we have available. We hope to have these rooms back fairly soon and will also have some upgrades to the property. We hope you will consider allowing us a chance to show you these changes upon your next visit to the Fort Lauderdale area.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great stay and we will return.
review: We were delighted with the amazing location on the IntraCoastal waterway.  To explore the incredible Ft Lauderdale area is so easy from the fantastic water taxi which is accesble from the back of the hotel.  Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Rooms were large and well appointed with kitchens.  Across from shopping mall and grocery store. I’d stay again and wish we’d could have had a longer stay.  Nice location close to cruise port and airport.

title: Nice but a little worn from the summer storms
review: I recently stayed at this hotel and had a nice stay.  The staff was excellent and extremely helpful.    The hotel itself is a little worn from damage from the last huricane.  The front entrance is closed from mainteance, making entry and vallet parking ackward.   I had a room facing the main road passing the hotel and drawbridge going overwater way, which generated alot of highway noise that you could hear in the room and made the balcony un-useable.   I would recommend asking for a room on the far end of the hotel, away from the street.    I am hilton honor member so breakfast was free for me, but if not, I would not have paid the $28 they were asking for a very plain breakfast buffet.  The food was good, but not $29 good.  Save your money and walk a block to starbucks.  …

title: 3 Night getaway for my wife
review: Dear Lexguy2003,  Thank you very much for the comments regarding your stay at our GALERYone DoubleTree. We have completely opened our front driveway after updating it. We are about to start repairing the seawall/dock at the beginning of January and will also be replacing the corridor carpeting and meeting space carpeting in the first quarter of 2018. We are working on the repairs from Hurricane Irma with updated carpet, paint, etc. to many rooms. We will also take a look at what we may be able to change with our breakfast items and also stay within the DoubleTree standards. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Disappointing
review: We cannot say enough good things about this property. All the staff were pleasant, approachable and extremely helpful.  Loved the room that we were given.  It can get a little loud from the traffic on Sunrise Blvd but the view was amazing.  My wife and I love to walk.  We didn't have any problem getting our 10K steps in every day.  Very convenient for the water taxi.

title: Great All Around Experience
review: Dear Jeffrey A,  We are very happy to hear of your wonderful stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. It was our pleasure to provide you with a great view and helpful staff. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: First Impressions: Hotel Marquee is 1/2 Lit
review: Friendly staff, but really poor breakfast and the hotel gym is a joke. For anyone who is used to international standard hotels, this one most definitely falls short of the mark. The breakfast could do with some salad items, or cold meats or fish. The gym needs a total refurb, and a LOT more equipment. But the staff were very nice.

title: It hs to be the location.......
review: It has to be the location that makes Gallery One the only place to stay in Ft. Lauderdale and why I stay here twice a year and have done for more years than I can remember. A few minutes walk east and I am on the ocean front with its magnificent beach. A few minutes walk west and I am at Galleria Mall with its shops, restaurants and there is even a Publix nearby. I hardly use the car. The hotel staff are warm, courteous, efficient and I always get a warm welcome from maid Cynthia. I like a 2 bedroom suite with a living room and a kitchen - far superior to a  solitary small hotel room with a chair in the corner.  All this adds up to why Gallery One is my home away for home when I visit Ft.Lauderdale. The hotel  has an elegant new forecourt.

title: WHAT A DIVE
review: Dear Stewart1234567,  We greatly appreciate your wonderful comments and look forward to having you as a guest again in the future. Our location is a prime spot for shopping a relaxing at the Fort Lauderdale Beach. We will be sure to share your comments with Cynthia and the rest of the team. Please let us know if we can assist with future reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Nightmare of a stay
review: It was smelly, old and disgusting. I would never stay there or recommend that anyone stay there until they have completely renovated. I feel bad for anyone who books this hotel for their vacation. What a waste of time.

title: Noisy and dated old property
review: Dear Eloisa V,  We sincerely apologize for your unsatisfactory stay. We would like to Make It Right and ask that you contact me at erik.mendoza@hilton.com to discuss. I look forward to your email.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Worst DoubleTree I have stayed at in 5 years
review: When we arrived there was an overwhelming smell of Raid or some type of bug spray greeting you. I guess that is better than a swarm of roaches.  We get to our room, which is very worn out and we smell weed in the hallway and the room smells like it has been masked with a cheap room perfume spray. The sink did not drain, the water coming out was yellow. To top it off, there were stains on the towels and blood drips on the comforter. The room was located on the street side so we heard cars and yelling all night. I will avoid this place like the plague.

title: Nice little getaway
review: Booked this hotel since my 18 year old had tickets to the Tortuga fest country music festival. The taxi boat picks you up at the hotel and drops you right off at the event. That was awesome. My hubby and I enjoyed some alone time and ventured out. Walking distance to so many restaurants and a mall as well as a shopping center with a Publix. Also a 5 minute walk to the beach. Hotel was very clean, we had a great water view. We watched the boats pass by and watched the sunset at night. The service was great except for the bartender we had by the pool. He was so rude, and just looked like he hated his life. Luckily, the service was so great, they would text me asking me how everything was, I let them know and they took care of it. Other people complained as well. It was pretty bad,…

title: Few days pre-cruise
review: Dear Dnice24,  We thank you for the response about your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are glad you enjoyed the location and slept comfortably. We apologize that you did not receive the best service at our pool bar. Could you provide me with the date that this occurred so I can address with our F&B manager. This is not the type of service that we expect from our team and would like to use your comments as a training tool. You can contact me at erik.mendoza@hilton.com. I look forward to your email.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Very friendly staff
review: Great place, friendly staff, location was great easy access to beach. Right on the inter-Coastal waterway. Water taxi stop right out the back door. we had a great view of the Atlantic Ocean. If you want to hit other beaches just head to A1A there are a bunch of cute beach communities in that direction and if you head south you will eventually hit Miami and south Beach. It is a little convoluted because you have to loop around the port but the route is pretty well marked and there are a number really nice state beaches along the way.

title: What a treat
review: Dear Alittlelost702,  We sincerely appreciate your feedback regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our great location, water taxi stop at our back door and great views. We look forward to your next visit when traveling through the Fort Lauderdale area in the future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Perfect stay..
review: I stayed at the GALLERYone during a week long business trip. The rooms are clean and spacious, with separate kitchenette, living and bedroom areas. My room had a balcony but I'm not sure if all rooms do. The hotel is two or three blocks away from the beach, next to the Galleria Mall, near a Publix supermarket, and is also a water taxi stop. What made my stay great was the friendly staff: the cleaning ladies, the front desk staff and most of all the valets. Only rating a (solid) 4 star because there's no complimentary breakfast.

title: Dolphins Game
review: Stayed in the 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom suite with some buddies during our weekend trip to watch football. Staff was friendly and pointed us in the right direction to have some drinks by the beach. Great stay overall!

title: Great location/room was just ok
review: Dear UAjordanh,  Thank you for your review.  We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope the next time your plans bring you this way you will again stay with GALLERYone.    Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: We stayed at Gallery One the day before we sailed out on our cruise.  The location was wonderful.  The mall was within walking distance, along with Publix, the grocery store.  The toilet gave us problems the entire time, but in all fairness, we didn't report it to the front desk.  The entrance to the hotel was beautiful.  The guys we called for a taxi in the morning were very friendly.  The hotel had a breakfast buffet, but I didn't want to pay $23 a person for it.  I loved that we could open the door to the balcony & get fresh air.  Our room was nice & clean.  It needed some repairs in the bathroom with the tile, but it wasn't a big deal.

title: Extreme delay with check in
review: Dear Dntutley,  We thank you very much for your response on TripAdvisor regarding your stay at our location. We apologize for the toilet issues and hope you will join us again in the future when traveling through the Fort Lauderdale area again.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great location...walking distance from grocery, great restaurants, spa and right on the ICW.
review: This was our 25th anniversary celebration.  Unfortunately both pool and hot tub closed for maintenance the entire 5 days of our trip.  They offered use of sister facility's pool and hot tub which was 1.5 miles away.  In addition, the intercostal was fenced off with a black screen/drape blocking view.  We envisioned 5 days lounging at pool and hot tub on intercostal.  They should have offered a discount for not being able to provide major amenities.  Or at least offered breakfast.  Executive leadership obviously does not value guests time and money.

title: Great location and Service
review: Arrived with own vehicle and valet service was excellent. Was greeted by Ann-Marie at check in. Check in was fast and friendly, she was very helpful and courteous. Suites were small condos with kitchen and separate bedroom and bath with balcony. Very clean and modern with small kitchen. Great view of the intercostal. Starbucks in lobby or across the street with Publix grocery store. Walk to beach is short; 2 blocks. Will be back soon!

title: Good Location but Hotel Worn Out
review: Dear Joe V,  We greatly appreciate your wonderful comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We will be sure to share your comments with Ann-Marie, the valet team and the rest of the hotel team about your excellent stay. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Hotel needs a good earthquake (knock it down and start over)
review: Nice location on canal.  Water taxi stop at the hotel is handy.  Happy Hour has good drink prices.  Beach is easy walk and is a very nice beach.  Hotel and room has a very worn out feel.  Pool was down for repair but did not look very well maintained or very nice anyway so I went to the beach instead.

title: Nice hotel, pleasant view, but...
review: Dear Toby M,  We thank you for the response to your stay at our hotel. We apologize for our pool malfunctioning during your stay. We are hard at work to get the pool back up to allow our guests to take advantage of the cool water during the hot temperatures. Please allow us a chance to Make It Right by visiting us again in the future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Very nice hotel
review: Tired old hotel that's poorly maintained and poorly staffed.  Too many problems to mention.  Very noisy, tired, and in need of major renovation.  They had no idea how Hilton Honors program worked.  The fact that the valet smoked in my rental car is inexcusable.

title: Awful experience
review: Hotel was under construction. Pool was out of service with dust flying everywhere. We were not notified and not credited for our stay. Never again! We would of appreciated notice that the pool was going to be filled up half way with rubble everywhere.

title: Hotel was dirty and stunk
review: Dear nicoleN7232SU,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations and apologize that you were not notified of the repairs going on prior to your arrival. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Hotel is great and staff is wonderful
review: I have stayed in numerous hotels including Double Tree's in other locations and this was by far the worst hotel I've stayed in. It smelled like mold and mildew, the walls were dirty and our friend reported cockroaches in her room. I would definitly stay away from this hotel.

title: Excellent service
review: Dear 821randyf,  We sincerely apologize for your unsatisfactory stay at our location. If you would be so kind as to contact me directly, I would like to Make It Right for you. You can contact me at erik.mendoza@hilton.com or simply by calling the hotel.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Top Notch!!
review: I would recommend the hotel and staff to anyone.  It was reasonably priced and the staff was so helpful.  It made for a very positive experience.    An extra special touch is getting the chocolate chip cookie, which tasted great.

title: Sleepover
review: We had an amazing time. The staff was very knowledgeable. I just didn’t like the fact that there was valet parking only at a fee and that we couldn’t check in early but other than that we had a great time.

title: Spacious Accommodations with Kitchenette
review: Dear crystall284,  Thank you for your response regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. The valet only is common in the area, but we are at a slightly lower rate compared to the other hotels nearby. As for the early check-in, many rooms are out of order due to Hurricane Irma, so checking in early is a little harder until we can get those rooms up and available. We hope that you will revisit us again after all repairs have been completed. Please let us know if we can assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Excellent Service
review: Nice large rooms; mattress on the bed worn. Agents at the front were helpful and polite, missing sometimes. Close to the beach & shopping areas. Angela (housekeeping) was excellent. Fitness centre with three treadmills and two other pieces of equipment, tv, music but would have been nice to position treadmills infront of tv and not having you back to the door. Nice large HD tv in entertainment space with sofa and dining table with chairs. Was able to connect laptop with HDMI cable. Nice TV also in bedroom (smaller than the other)

title: Nice but...
review: Very welcomed when we checked in and employees remembered our names. Everyone very kind. Really impressed with the Valet folks. They took very, very good care of us, always pleasant and called us by name. It's amazing because this is a big hotel!! Already planning another family trip to this same hotel

title: Average Stay
review: Dear kathleenpB7140JO,  We greatly appreciate the comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We are looking forward to your next trip to Fort Lauderdale. Please let us know if we can assist with any future reservations here at GALLERYone.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Exceptional guest service
review: Caylin at front desk was friendly had great guest service. We were warmly greeted with a smile. I also received a text from her even before we checked in on our arrival day to welcome us and to offer her assist. She made sure we received a special amenity to celebrate our anniversary. Myself and my wife also want to recognize Jethro and Robinson from valet. Jethro for his friendly and prompt service. Robinson for his knowledge of the area and helpful manner. my wife and I had a wonderful anniversary thanks to the outstanding staff at the Gallery One.

title: choose another hotel!!
review: Dear shakennbake,  Thank you so much for the wonderful comments regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We will be sure to share your comments with Caylin, Jethro & Robinson. We are very lucky to have them on our team. We hope that we will be able to welcome you back again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: poor value
review: started bad and got worse   too many things to mention here-sent complete list to their corporate email  Rude front desk women-Ann-Marie Knott.valet damaged rental car.microwave didn't work.garbage disposal didn't work.2 of 3 lights in living room did not work.appearance of mold in hallway.hotel lost our laundry and switched blame to us.dirty doors in room.

title: Great customer service
review: Dear debrak142,  We sincerely apologize for your unsatisfactory stay. I do know that our Front Office Manager was in contact with you regarding your laundry. It is not a common practice for guests to leave their laundry outside their doors for pick up. It should be delivered to the front desk. Anything left outside of the front door would be considered waste. We will have a discussion with our team to avoid this happening to another guest and we apologize for the inconvenience. As our Front Office Manager stated, we will be providing the Hilton Honors points to you account as compensation. As for the damage to your vehicle, was that reported to the valet? They have a process for claims and would be happy to assist. We will have our maintenance team address the concerns in the room you occupied to make sure other guests do not experience the same inconvenience. Please let us know if you have any other questions.  Sincerely,  Erik mendoza Director of Operations

title: Amazing
review: Ms. Knott, As a business owner myself, I appreciate all feedback from my customers and hope you do, too. I want to report what a disappointing experience my recent stay was at the Gallery One FLL hotel. My son and I stayed Sat night (Oct 15) to attend a conference there. I booked with Hotels.com and my mistake put me in a 2 bdrm suite, but the price made the experience even more regrettable.  I normally book based on reviews on sites like Trip Advisor but thought the convenience of staying at the conference hotel would be worth it. Let’s start with the check in.  No room was ready, so we were directed to a 2nd floor restroom to change clothes and put our baggage back in our car for safety.  The valet, in your very cramped entrance was handled OK, but there is room for improved…

title: Desperate need of renovation
review: The hotel is in need of major improvements, including interior and exterior. Clearly this property has not been adequately maintained. The hallways and elevators are poorly kept. I’m sure the hallway carpets are not regularly vaccum cleaned or shampooed. The room was awful - the refrigerator door looked disgusting like it has never been wiped down. The dining table is scratched up. The couch is extremely old and makes noises when you sit down. The linen was questionable. A handle is missing on a drawer. The walls had stains (like really touch-ups would just kill the budget). I killed a bug in the living room. The cafe was a joke. I can go on and on... I will not stay at this hotel until there is a 360 renovation. The only positive experiences was service from a young tall black…

title: No hot water; Hotel under construction; poorly lit and dirty
review: Dear Tabitha B,  We sincerely apologize that your stay was not satisfactory. Please fell free to contact me directly so that I may be able to retrieve some more information about your stay. I would like to Make It Right for you. erik.mendoza@hilton.com  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Great experience booking a group stay and wanted to share!
review: Extremely dissatisfied with this hotel -- I expect so much better from Double Tree.  When we drove up the hotel was dimly lit.  Upon check-in we were not advised that the hotel did not have hot water but were advised 5 minutes after walking into our room.  We were told that they were working on the issue and hoped to have it resolved shortly.  However, we did not have hot water before we departed the following morning at 9am.  For the amount of work that needed to be performed for this remodel, I would expect it to close in order to complete the renovations.  Remodel the front entrance, replace tile floors/ carpets, repair/replace boiler, paint, replace loose doors... I would expect a remodel of this magnitude to require closing in order to complete the work.

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Dear E2524UZdavids,  I sincerely apologize you did not have a satisfactory stay at our location. As we are going through Hurricane Irma repairs and a few updates, it is not very easy to close the hotel completely in order to get these repairs completed. We hope that you will visit us in the future after the repairs and updates are completed.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Stayed 9/24 - 9/26/2017
review: I coordinated a group stay with the sales team, and worked with Amy and Bill directly. THEY WERE BOTH AMAZING.... and I wanted to give them kudos for a job well done.  We had to make changes up to the very last minute and Bill/Amy were extremely accommodating and patient, no matter how many times I reached out to them.  They got everything down correctly and there were no mishaps with any of the reservations.  Both Bill/Amy  made it a point to meet with me in person, and thank me for choosing to have our meeting there. It was very personable and I wanted to make it a point to share my experience by writing this review.   It also happened to be my birthday week during our stay and they made it a point to recognize it and send some  chocolate covered strawberries and champagne  to…

title: Excellent
review: Would highly recommend this hotel. The king suite room was spacious and clean. Staff were friendly and helpful.  Booked via British Airways and would definitely return here. Breakfast was included in the room rate I had and was a good selection.

title: This Hotel SUCKS! Nightmare!
review: Dear PaulBird1962,  We greatly appreciate your kind words regarding your stay at our GALLERYone DoubleTree. We hope to see you back again in the near future. Please let us know if we may assist with reservations.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: What a disaster
review: Customer service is terrible, is freaking raining outside and they have umbrellas and they said that they simply can't borrow them to customers even if I'm registered at this freaking hotel. They charge you for everything, if you buy something through Amazon is $5 dollars just for receiving the package. The freaking pool have been in maintenance for 2 weeks now and is so hot in Florida right now. The rooms weren't ready when I got in. The bathroom was broken and I found somebody else's stuff in the bedroom (so they don't even clean it well). The safe was locked and I had to wait for a "safe specialist" to show up so I can store my stuff. The location is the only good thing I can say is fine because is in front of a Publix and next to the Galleria mall and 2 blocks away from the…

title: Lovely customer service
review: Dear silentvico,  We apologize for your unsatisfactory stay. If you'd like to contact me directly to discuss your stay, I'd be happy to speak to you.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Too much for an old place
review: We came to this hotel time and time again in the past for years, because we have family living just blocks away. This is probably the worst state of the hotel since I remember, and I don't mean it happened because of the hurricane.  While we were here: -we booked water view suites and we got city view suites.  -in the two nights we stayed,  housekeeping never did our room. After we asked. Twice.  - the pool stopped working and they didn't explain why nor did they give us an explanation.  - one of the elevators stopped midway, we had to pull the alarm button.  - the nighttime barman took his keys with him after his shift so the daytime barman could not serve us any drinks.  -they're fixing the entryway and it looks like a mess.   So unless you pay very very little money for your…

title: Our Fourth year...and coming back
review: We are looking forward to our next stay at Gallery One soon. Based on previous reviews, it seems that those much needed upgrades to the entrance are taking place. Our only hope is that Irma has been kind to the property and its staff. Its a great place!!

title: Great view, spacious rooms and pleasant helpful staff
review: Dear uncleirv,  Thank you for your concern about what Hurricane Irma may have done to our hotel, but rest assured we will be providing the same great customer services and comfortable accommodations as always. We are almost completed with our front drive upgrades and will be making some additional upgrades throughout the hotel in time. We look forward to your arrival. Please let us know if you have any special requests before your arrival so that we can ensure an excellent stay.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Very nice stay
review: Our air conditioning went out and we decided to stay at the nearby Doubletree. Although they have some entrance renovations there was staff there to help, check in was smooth and pleasant and although we asked for the lesser expensive city view we were upgraded to a water view. What a pleasant surprise! Our waitress at dinner and breakfast couldn't have been more helpful and even gave us a pitcher of water to take to our suite because we were parched from being without AC. The food was very good at dinner and both breakfasts. Although they have a buffet you can order off the menu.  It was a very pleasant stay and I definitely recommend this hotel, especially if you are looking for a hotel on the water.

title: Great locale
review: Dear Florida563,  We thank you very much for the wonderful response on TripAdvisor regarding your stay at our GalleryOne DoubleTree. We hope all is well with your home's AC issues, but know we will always be here just in case. We will be sure to share your comments with our team and look forward to providing our services to you or visiting family in the future.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Run down
review: Very nice hotel; located near A1A, Las Olas and the Galleria Mall. Staff go above to provide customer service. Room was clean with an amazing view. Hotel front is currently under construction and the only parking is valet, which makes for a challenge entering and exiting the hotel. This is definitely a hotel to keep on your radar when travel to Ft. Lauderdale. I would revisit after the construction just for a full experience. Oh forgot to mention this hotel is also 1 of the stops for water taxi, just make sure you pay attention to discounted times or look for deals on Groupon if you decide to utilize this service.

title: gallery one Ft lauderdale
review: Nice place just off of the water close  to everything great for business, Clean, Hilton property. Friendly staff....Could be a bargain so close to beach, No Beach noise but close enough to walk to....If you want to find it ...Blue Martini restaurant/Bar next door

title: Hidden Gem
review: Dear markb2016,  We appreciate you taking the time to let others know of your great stay at our GalleryOne DoubleTree Suites. We agree, it is a great location with easy access to Fort Lauderdale Beach, shopping, restaurants, nightlife, etc. We look forward to your next stay. Please let us know if we can assist with any future reservations at our location.  Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Excellent Front Desk Staff but be wary of the Food/Beverage Staff if you can find them.
review: I truly enjoyed the time at the GalleryOne Double Tree in Ft Lauderdale.  The rates were awesome and the views spectacular.  However, I felt the required valet parking costs at $33.00 a night were a little high.

title: HORRIBLE
review: Dear Patricia R,  We thank you for leaving a response regarding your stay at GalleryOne DoubleTree Suites. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here. As for the parking, we have researched the area in regards to what other hotels are charging for their valet parking. We are actually priced in comparison, if not a little lower than comparable hotels. Unfortunately, as parking is a hot commodity in the area, we have to ensure that we are in line with what other hotels are charging. We hope this will not keep you from visiting our hotel in the near future. Please let us know if we may be of assistance for any future reservations at our location.   Sincerely,  Erik Mendoza Director of Operations

title: Gallery One Strattles the intercoastal to give you the best of both worlds
review: This is the second time I've stayed at this location, I previewed it before bringing my relatives from Spain because I wanted them to have a good experience.  Unfortunately several things changed during the 2 weeks between the 2 stays.  The handicapped parking (which we counted on) was being used temporarily as the valet area because of entrance construction.  This made it both inconvenient and dangerous to enter. The restaurant staff was no existent at the Pool Bar which we planned to use. The staff was hard to find in the Lobby Bar and restaurant with very bad service when you found them with more the 1/2 items on the menu unavailable.  The saving grace is the excellent Front Desk Staff who work very hard to make it right. Sadly they shouldn't have to over compensate for the…

title: Valet your own car, but pay $35 +taxes
review: Just don't stay here. I've stayed here in the past and the stay has always been pleasant. This stay was terrible.  The front of the hotel looks like it was not by a hurricane and they just decided to leave it. VALET -TERRIBLE.

title: dissapointed
review: Dear VEESALLTHAT,  Thank you for taking the time to review your visit with us.  I do apologize for the construction that is occurring on the front entry.  This project, soon to be completed, will enhance the whole arrival experience.   Again, I apologize for the inconvenience that this caused but invite you back to see the improvements in the hotel.  Sincerely, Bob  Robert Keesler General Manager

title: Valet parking only $33 per night
review: This hotel does not deliver on what is advertised! we got the right room in a location that was sub par. The room was older and the entire hotel was not well maintained. We were put near a swamp type of area near a loud roadway WITHOUT the view of the intercoastal waterway. we looked at a huge tree hiding the view of the bridge with no water view at all!

title: Won't be staying again.
review: Dear I8122PRanthonyt,  Thank you for your review and please allow me to apologize for the view.
