We would definitely recommend this property and would like to come back again!!

title: Awesome stay
review: The location is so nice! Beach is 5 minutes away. The breakfast was sooo delish. Very beautiful views. The pool was great! and the beds were nice! the room was very nice. Our waitress Alllison was so sweet and helpful! She also gave us great tips on where to go and was super attentive.

title: Beautiful property
review: Manager took care of 2 minor problems that we had very quickly and we were upgraded as Hilton Honors members. The restaurant on site is very very SLOW. My advice is to skip eating any meals there except if you have a complimentary breakfast as Hilton Honor members. Pool is fine and seeing the water taxi dock at the hotel was fun for the kids to see, they also liked seeing the draw bridge.

title: Great find
review: We had a tough night at the Westin and we changed over to the Double tree on a prayer.  The room was lovely and the staff could not have been nicer or more helpful.  Outside of traffic noise, I had not issues with this hotel and highly recommend it.

title: Hotel Review
review: Hotel has excellent location and generally stay was a very positive experience, rooms are clean and staff very friendly. Internet in rooms very poor and valet parking @ US$30 per night a bit steep. i would consider staying here again

title: Stay close but not too close to the action
review: We were the lucky winners of a silent auction prize at this hotel.  We generally know this area even though we live about 25 miles to the north..  Still we do a lot of traveling.  We are not always sure where to stay to be able to enjoy any given city of the world.  This hotel is very close to all of the exciting things that there is to do in Ft. Lauderdale, FL.  However, it is far enough away from the stuff that you don't need to be close to.  This hotel is a great choice for someone who doesn't really know the area but wants to have a good time in a city that is exciting.

title: One night family stay
review: Stopped here with the family before heading out on a cruise. The kids loved the two room suite as they got their own room. The pool and hot tub were very nice and well kept. The breakfast buffet were pretty good. The rooms could use some tlc.

title: King room with balcony
review: With view of the canal, loved the balcony. Fully équiped kitchenette, all the dishes and implements. Included. Dishwasher. We enjoyed breakfast on the suite, and you many ordrer room service. Valet knowledgable and HELPFULL. Excellent location 10 minutes to Beach and same to Galleria Mall. Water taxi stops at Hotel. Pool and chairs are clean and set in lovely gardens. Will définitly Come back

title: Great Location
review: Love this hotel. The location is great. Get a room with a water view, it's fantastic. The beach is close, walk or take water taxi. The breakfast is very good. Lisette our waitress for almost every morning was wonderful with our 20 month year old. The only downside, is this hotel is not a great place to have dinner. But, there are some incredible restaurants within walking distance; Trullocks,Capital Grille, Season 52....

title: Pre cruise 2 night stay
review: After a long flight we made it to our hotel and it was nice being greeted with water & cookies.  Our room was very large & well equipped although the wifi didn't work well.  The next morning we bought the water taxi tickets & the pick up spot is right outside-so convenient.  Later returned & used the pool.  There were a couple of minor issues but the front desk staff were very helpful.  I'd stay here again if/when we return.

title: Excellent customer service and great view -- can get water taxi right at hotel-food was decent for breakfast
review: Room was large with kitchen which would be good for a week long stay - convenenient to mall and Primanti Bro pizza- small bar was convenient in lobby for quick drink - fromt desk staff was amazing and checked in several times

title: Very Welcoming Place to Stay
review: Everything was perfect! Guy, Dee, Stefan, Cleopatra, Mikayla and Alyssa all made our stay very warm and welcoming and could not have done more to make sure we had everything we needed throughout our trip. We felt like we were among friends after only a few short days,  greeted daily with genuine smiles and pleasant conversations. Our room was very clean and comfortable and the housekeeping staff was also wonderful. We enjoyed several meals in the hotel restaurant, but keep in mind that they use fresh ingredients so just like your own pantry may not have everything you need, they may improvise to ensure the best quality ;) We would definitely return and recommend GalleryOne to anyone looking for a great place to stay with an amazing staff, conveniently located within walking…

title: Lissette in the restaurant Was Amazing!!
review: The hotel  is what you would expect, and the majority of the reviews are accurate.  Excellent: Lissette who works in the restaurant is a lady who does an excellent job, and goes beyond the call of duty. Not only is she prompt, courteous and efficient, but she provides an unparalleled level of service, with a BIG SMILE on her face. She is a credit to this hotel, and without her the start rating would have been much lower.  Not So good: The rooms are dated, and little things like shower caps are missing. They could do with updating, and being CLEANED properly.  The bathrooms in the lobby area were also dated, and were missing soap on a number of occasions. It was not possible to wash one's hands hygienically before eating, for this reason.  The barman in the pool area as simply…

title: A great 5 night stay
review: we stayed for 5 nights and the property and the people were great.  We would like to give a special kudos to the front desk managers Ryan and Jeffery who went over and above to make our stay as pleasant as possible and to the server for breakfast on weekends Jackie who was also awesome.  Thank you again !!

title: An beautiful spot!
review: We stayed for 4 nights and had a wonderful stay.  The rooms were spacious and the hotel staff very helpful.  Jeff the front desk manager  helped take care of an internet problem and checked up regularly to make sure all was well.  The location is beautiful - right by the water taxi and the view is great.  The awesome cookies at the front desk are a nice touch. There is a $30 daily charge for parking which is on the high side. All in all though, the facilities and service were great and I would definitely return.

title: great location but rooms could use renovation
review: What this hotel lacks in 5-star room quality it makes up for in location and amenities. We had a 1-bedroom suite which was a little beat up, but we adored our large balcony from which we could watch boats go up and down the intracoastal waterway. We spent a ton of time around the very nice pool on luxurious padded lounge chairs. The outside area of the hotel is top-notch and a great place to relax. The breakfast was adequate and the staff were friendly. Our suite had a kitchenette with a small stove, dishwasher, microwave, fridge, and plates/silverware/pots/pans. Be aware you need to bring things like dish soap if you plan to use the kitchen.   The best part of the hotel is its proximity to the following 1. Hugh Birch State Park - a great nature park to hike 2. intracoastal…

title: A Beautiful Place
review: We stayed here on March 19th after a 7 night cruise.  We were looking for a room close to the beach where we could wind down and enjoy some sun.  The Double Tree was the perfect place.  It's located on the intracoastal waterway just 2 blocks and a drawbridge from a beautiful stretch of beach.  The suites were large with a tv in both the living and bedroom.  There is a small kitchen with appliances and serving ware.  The bathroom was huge with a large walk-in shower.  The suite was very clean.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  We had a suite with a balcony and a wonderful partial view of the ocean and canal.  There is a mall next door and a grocery store across the street with everything you'd need for a one night or extended stay.  There is a water taxi stop right outside…

title: Weekend trip for a baby shower
review: Hotel was excellent, very friendly staff, especially at check in and with the valet staff. Location was perfect for our trip and allowed us for a walk along the beach during our downtime. Did not have time to take advantage of the water taxi stop located within the hotel property for a ride along the intercostal.

title: Enjoy
review: Location was perfect! So many restaurant options, great walking to the beach, helpful services (nails!) across the street. Everything is at the hotel,so you really don't need to roam. But it's nice to be able to walk to all the options.

title: Wonderful Staff
review: We've been staying at the GalleryOne DoubleTree in Ft. Lauderdale for a few days every March over the last 10 years because we go on cruises that leave out of Ft. Lauderdale.  The staff at this hotel are very friendly and helpful.  They have some long-term staff that have worked at their Vue Restaurant for many years who are wonderful especially Galena, Jackie and Evan.  The hotel is right near the Galleria Mall so in addition to their great staff, they are also in a great location.

title: My go to hotel in Fort Laurderdale
review: Galleria Double Tree is usually where I stay in Fort Lauderdale for several reasons. It is usually very reasonably priced, its close to the ocean and the Galleria has several high end restaurants. Trulocks and Capital Grill are a short walk away. One of my favorite barber shops is just over the bridge The staff is pleasant and helpful.

title: Great stay even with spring breakers.
review: The hotel was sold out with about a. 30 percent college crowd. The day manager at the front desk was very helpful with room selection and making sure we were always happy. I would recommend a room which does not face the road since there is a pretty good echo when traffic or people talk between the two buildings. Breakfast is good and the suites are great with family because you get a fridge small cooktop and two seperate rooms.

title: Great turn around, to give us a great vacation
review: After a bad start to our vacation, management moved us to another of their hotels and we ended up having a great vacation and a great place to enjoy our stay, with all the things we wished for in the first place. We had a great Vacation in a great hotel. Thank you.

title: all around excellent venue
review: Great hotel set up, nice rooms. Needed a couple rooms for local wedding, stayed here as I generally prefer Hilton properties. Nice location if you want walking to shops, higher ed stores, and about half mile if that to beach/strip. I was just staying to change for wedding on the beach, and overnight. What sets this apart is that all rooms are one bedroom suites, with doors closing the bedroom, very large room, with small kitchen. I generally get suites, not for kitchen but for the separate room, very roomy.  Entire venue was great, nice area outside with patio bar, seating etc, on the intracoastal, very busy part of city(as all surrounding area), but nice relaxing area outside to sit. Added bonus, while small, each room does open to a small balcony, again, much more room thatn…

title: Great Return Stay
review: Great experience - outstanding customer service, great views, perfect location. Stay here pre cruise. There are so many things to do close by within walking distance. Top notch staff, service and facility. Wish my stay would have been longer.

title: Soft Reno Would Make Hotel 4-Star
review: Location great if you like shopping. Galleria Mall next door. Number 36 city Sawgrass Mills bus goes by hotel to Sawgrass Mills. A soft renovation of fresh paint and new carpeting would make room 4-star quality. As it is now, I would say it's 2 1/2 - 3-star. Re-grout shower to deal with mould. Beds comfortable. Kitchenette with dishwasher, microwave, fridge and cook top. Public a five minute walk for groceries. Water taxi nearby. Great homemade cookies upon check-in.

title: Great Return Visit
review: This was our 4th visit with 3 of them being long term stays.  We love the location as it is within walking distance to shops, restaurants, and the beach.  Another plus is the Water Taxi stops right outside the door.  The staff gave us an incredible "welcome back" which was absolutely delightful.  Jeffery, the Front Desk supervisor , regularly expressed a sincere interest in how our stay was going thus far.   There is however some upgrades to be made to the property - it is looking tired.  Dee, the hotel manager took the time to outline several scheduled upgrades that should be completed by the time we return next January. I would suggest that No Smoking signage be placed on balconies and around the pool area so as to clear up any confusion regarding the Hotels Policy on…

title: need sleep dont get a room near the bridge side its horrible
review: stay here one horrible sleepless night for to much money, and i paid to upgrade,rooms were nice beds comfy,room was clean also,traffic outside was a joke. the balcony is tiny,worn,noisy 24,7   the traffic and bridge opening and closing allday and night long.has VFD s that make a huge humming that echos threw the whole bldg.

title: Location, Location
review: We had a great experience at this hotel which is centrally located near everything!  The staff was very accommodating and made customer service their #1 priority.  I would highly recommend it to family and friends.

title: Not great customer service
review: Shower leaked.  Air conditioning was not working properly.  Staff at the bar not friendly at all.  Continental breakfast was great.  Pool was nice, but the hot tub did not work.  Fitness center was nice.  Internet connection in the room was terrible.  You could not get Wifi in the bedroom.  You had to go in to the other room to get on the internet.

title: Loved every moment of my stay
review: Home is the best way to discrible my stay at "The Gallery One"  Comfort met my eyes as I entered the suite.  Clean, well appointed room with all the fixings of home, but there was no salt & Pepper...I'm told that will be there on my next stay..which will be soon😆💐🏆💐

title: Great location
review: Wonderful location with beautiful views and very good customer service. A special shoutout to Jeff at the front desk who went out of his way to make sure we were happy with our room. We were able to walk or take the water taxi wherever we wanted to go....we will definitely be going back to Gallery One Fort Lauderdale!

title: Roaches and spring breakers
review: If you like sharing your room with cockroaches and listening to drunk spring breakers then this is your place. 5 roaches killed the last time and 2 down this time. One by me and one by the manager. They moved me from the first room to a room next to spring breakers. Then they moved me to a third room and as the manager opened the door a roach ran across the floor and the manager took out that one. This is a shame as I have stayed here for years and never had a problem until last month.

title: 3 night Pre Cruise stay, we will return
review: We stayed at the Galleryone Doubletree Suites Feb 15 - 18 pre cruise and enjoyed our time there.  We had a nice room on the 6th floor overlooking the Intercoastal where enjoyed drinks on our balcony watching the boats.  Staff were all very friendly and the location is great - walking distance to Galleria Mall (lots of food choices) as well as Publix across the street.  Uber was $20 to Port Everglades the day of the cruise.  We would not hesitate to stay there again when in Fort Lauderdale.

title: My 7th Year.
review: Location, location  and location and Gallery One has it all, close to the beach and Galleria Mall with it´s restaurants and shops. A Publix supermarket is within walking distance and there is even a dock at the hotel for the water taxi and nearby a stop for the mostly free Sun Trolley to take you around town. What more could anyone want for a great vacation!  From the valet to the receptionist to the bar tender and on, there is always a warm greeting every day from all of the staff. In my opinion only a few hotels continuously strive to improve, but Gallery One has repeatedly done so in the 7 years I have been staying there twice a year for several weeks at a time.  I like a 2 bedroom suite for a little extra room and the wonderful maid, Cynthia on the 11th floor, always gives…

title: Great Location, Nice Views, Often Overwhelmed Crew
review: Overall this is a very good value with a caring and friendly staff in a good location, with massive rooms, which is well-suited to families - like mine.  But the staff, as much as they try, can't keep up with a full hotel.  Housekeeping could be very late and potentially missed.  The Breakfast service left many guests looking around for food and waiting for the check.  I let the front desk know and Jeff, a supervisor, went well out of his way to try and help and connect with me, which is appreciated.  So they do care, but like others have written, there needs to be an investment in staff and service to offer a more seamless visit to the hordes that descend on what could be a fantastic hotel.

title: great family fun
review: The staff was very professional and helpful and the hotel is at a great location.  A walk to a great beach, great outdoof pool and bar, and a stop for the water taxi.  My kids loved all of these experiences and I enjoyed not having to drive to the restaurant area downtown and enjoy the water taxi ride with my wife as we looked at all of the mansions on the water.  Our room was great with a nice view of the waterway.

title: Great for Business or Pleasure Trip
review: Thank you so much for sharing your terrific experience on Tripadvisor. We strive to provide our guests with world class service and beautiful accommodations and, we are elated to hear that our mission was accomplished. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our pristine views in the near future.

title: Great location and fun staff at an affordable rate
review: I enjoy staying at this DoubleTree.  The service is excellent, the rooms are suites and the proximity to the beach and shopping are unparalleled in Fort Lauderdale.  The staff is gracious and accommodating.

title: Wonderful location but upgrade and TLC sorely needed. Not up to Hilton Standards
review: Nice location on the ICW with only a short walk to the beach. Watertaxi stop is also at the hotel, which is nice to take a relaxing water taxi ride and see the city from the waterways.  Nice and friendly staff livened up the trip. They also provided lots of helpful recommendations on what to see and do in Fort Lauderdale. Aly was a hoot!

title: Amazing location
review: This all suite hotel is fantastic. It gave us a better ocean view from the waterway than a hotel claiming to be Oceanside.  Steps away from the Galleria Mall, Publix, and car rentals. 2 blocks from the beach (minutes to walk) Very close to the Hugh Taylor Birch State Park The Water Taxi stops at the hotel.  All around great hotel.

title: Great location and staff!
review: Good value, location and staff. I have stayed there many times. The hotel has made some big improvements. The breakfast, wifi, and room quality have all improved. I will stay there again when I'm in Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Privately Owned Suite
review: Checked into the Hilton doubletree hotel....they said they had no reservation for me. Gave them my confirmation number and she said...oh those are our privately owned suites...I have to go to another system to pull it up. So....don't be alarmed if they say they don't have a reservation for you. 😀 So.....these rooms are not as up to date as should be. The carpet was a little grungy. No ice bucket and they could not tell us where the ice was because we were not part of the hotel. View was nice and pool area was okay...not very big. Has an outdoor tiki bar which was also nice. Not a bad stay but not sure I would stay again in suites...not knowing what kind of room you might get if they are all privately owned.  We had 6 people which worked out good on space. Big bathroom also. Our…

title: Owners and Hilton: get your act together!
review: Having stayed here before, we knew a fair bit about the area and the official description is pretty accurate. Some of the suites are owned by private individuals and when you book such a one, Hilton (Doubletree) do not have a record of you booking. So, walking up to the front desk, you are asked for you name, which they do not have. You may show them your confirmation, which does not look like the hotel confirmation so you must wait as they try to track it down. The phone number on your confirmation goes to voice mail, so no help there. Eventually the hotel folks find enough info to get you registered so you're in. There is apparently no housekeeping service so you call the only number you have and this time you talk to some fellow that says the confirmation says that…

title: Nice atmosphere, would go back again to this hotel
review: We got a very nice room with a balcony, gorgeous views. Room was pretty old but extremely clean,   Staff were amazing and very helpful. all along we had a great experience and we would return to this hotel.

title: Choose something different
review: From the reviews we decided on this hotel because we needed a room for 6 adults. We were staying in the hotel once we got off our week long cruise.  We had no vehicle so proximity to stores & restaurants was important. This hotel was so disappointing. We called months in advance trying to get an early check in- we were told to call 24 hours before our reservation to request this. So we did, but it didn't matter. Room was not ready till 3pm and someone checked out at 11am.  We arrived at 8:30am.   We booked the biggest and most expensive room with the "best view".  Water front view meant a dumpster, alley and pool view with a sliver of the intercostal. The room was so dated and dirty. Giant carpet stains everywhere, stains on furniture, stains on one comforter, rips and holes on…

title: Nice staff but property needs repair
review: Dear katinez13,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping and maintenance problems. Unclean rooms in poor condition are not typical at our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention so we could help make it right. We have discussed this with our staff, and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet the highest standards. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Customer service (Eric)
review: Visited this hotel this past week. The hotel location is great. Right next to grocery store and mall. The 2-bedroom suites are perfect for families, HOWEVER...the property is incredibly understaffed. Everything takes a long time-valet, ordering a drink, getting your bags. Early check-in/late check-out are not even an option (granted it is busy season). As far as the rooms, the layout is great but old carpet, showers drain poorly.   I feel bad because the staff was very nice and seemed to try but just a below average experience as a whole. Left very disappointed.

title: So Much Wrong Too Little Right
review: Dear Chase C,  Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We’re sorry that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and we’ve shared your comments with our team so we can do a better job of providing our guests with quick service. I've also addressed the issues in your room with our maintenance and housekeeping teams. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you’ll be our guest again.

title: Warm weather holiday in Ft Lauderdale
review: Eric was on a full run to fetch a car for a customer  when he must of noticed we were lost !and stopped and helped us tremendously! Such a great face and personality for the hotel . We actually are going to stay there on our next trip because of the friendliness of Eric . .

title: Not My Best Stay
review: We came to Ft Lauderdale President's Day weekend and all hotels had top of season rates including this one.  It was walking distance to the beach so I decided to give it a try.  We checked in at 7pm and were told that we already checked in.  After we paid we were told to wait in the lobby so the front desk person could check our requested room to see if it was occupied.  After about a 30 minute wait we were told that it was and we were going to have to get another room but this would not have a waterfront view as requested.  We had dinner reservations in 30 minutes with friends and took the lesser room to not miss dinner.  I think management should have upgraded our room to a nicer suite since they gave away our room to someone else which is strange considering they id everyone…

title: Close to beach and very clean
review: Dear gatorcindy,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are very sorry that you weren’t happy with your guestroom during your recent trip. We try to accommodate all reservations but occasionally we can’t meet every room request. Additionally, I apologize for the conditions encountered in your room and have addressed these with our team. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Our 4. Stay
review: We were a group of 3 couples and found our room to be very spacious for our needs. It was clean and the staff was pleasant and friendly. It is a short walk to the beach and lots of shops. I will definitely choose this hotel again if I'm in the area.

title: Overpriced
review: Super location. All things we felt were not OK in our suite, was on the first day fixed by mr. Ryan Kopp excellent service. The same excellent service was given  from mr. Phillip  in the valet service when renting a car. Both professional and efficient. Otherwise a very changing standard of cleaning and front desk service. But overall we will sure be coming back - we feel at home in our suite.

title: Too good to be true...Is this property really a part of the Hilton Honor programme??
review: For $350/ night you expect much better. No free parking. Long line to check in. No complimentary breakfast. Noisy traffic at night. Next door room has loud TV till 3am.  Great chicken wings and bar. Our friends room had "toilet back up". Thankfully we didn't have that! In room coffee has only decaf. Thermostat is old and unresponsive.

title: Comedy of Errors, which were never fully rectified
review: I stayed here due to a work event, however I am a Hilton fan.   It started at check in, the woman in Front of me was being moved to another hotel apparently because she booked on Priceline and the hotel was short of rooms. Which naturally made me nervous they didn't have a room for me, but they did. The girl behind the counter looked overwhelmed.  They were running out of water so I only got one or my two bottles.  Going up to the room I try to use the light switch in the living room to turn on the lamps by the couch. Switch doesn't work. I try to find a switch in the bedroom to turn on the lamps by the bed.  Can't find a switch. So at 9:30 a night after a day of flying I have to use the flashlight on my cell phone to find light in my hotel room besides the little light above…

title: Different Stories from Different Employees
review: Dear Amy G,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered in your room, and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. As well, we’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service from the front desk. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Good Hotel. Bad Service
review: I spent 2 hours of my time arguing with hotel staff to obtain the rate that was supposedly guarenteed by Hilton's lowest cost rate by utilizing their website. After total frustration, I succeeded, but it was not worth the aggravation. For my time, I was given free breakfast & when I got to the hotel I had to argue to get that!

title: Great location, needs facelift, get your room off East Sunrise
review: Dear Leonard W,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: worst night trying to sleep that i can remember
review: I have been a customer in this Hotel for several years, last time was the worst. It was crowded, the staff in the lobby is not the best, they keep us waiting long time after 3 pm (several hours indeed, because my flight come early), and I have to keep asking all the time about my room, when all the time I was sitting in front of them, don't even have the courtesy to keep me informed. And did to me twice, because that was my hote pre and post cruise.  I have to let my suitcase with the bell boy and I notice they keep my valius belongings (at least to me) out, yes outside even if they were out busy doing their job, so everyone can take out with them, I was lucky... The hotel have nice clean rooms, a little outdated, big ones, good views, a little kitchen well equipped, a mall and…

title: MERVEILLEUX
review: Hotel is wonderful Staff  is wonderful Suite is wonderful Location wonderful Therefore, this means that we shall be back again. This was our first experience with that hotel and we were all impressed with the DoubleTree Galleryone.

title: Great Location Helpful staff
review: My wife and I stayed at this all-suite hotel for a 5 day getaway in the sun. We prepaid the flight and hotel through Air Canada Vacations and upon arrival found out that there was no record of our booking. The staff member at the front desk, Cindee, was very helpful and after contacting the third party provider the matter was ironed out. After that, the experience was all good. The king suite was spacious, clean, and well appointed. It had a great view of the intercostal waterway, the adjacent state park and the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel grounds were immaculate. There is so much in the area that we did not bother renting a car. We enjoy walking and the beach is two blocks away. Fort Lauderdale Boulevard running along the beach beautiful and seemingly endless. Not to be missed is…

title: Great location, friendly staff
review: The location was great - right near the beach, restaurants and shops.  The hotel staff were very friendly as well.  But the hotel was a bit quirky.  My room had many light switches that didn't turn anything on/off, and there also were several bulbs that were out.  While the room was a suite, they didn't have a desk and I ended up working on the dining table, which was ok, but I didn't have a chair that I could adjust so it was hard to type. Housekeeping was very stingy with the toilet paper.  I actually ran out (have NEVER had that happen in a hotel) and had to get some from a cart in the hall.  The same with the tissue.  One day I had phone calls, so I stayed in the room with the "do not disturb" sign until 11am.  I told one of the housekeeping staff that I was gone for the day…

title: Get Balcony ABOVE Fourth Floor
review: We booked a water view balcony. It was on the fourth floor and on this floor, the balcony railing is a concrete wall, which means you cannot see out when seated unless you are VERY tall.  I recommend getting fifth floor or higher, as these balcony railings are made of metal balusters, so you can see through them and see the view when seated on your balcony.  In general the property is tired and needs some refreshing, but that is true for most hotels in this cruise-intensive town.   Hotel did offer to move us to a different room after the first day, when a higher floor became available.    Location is 7 min walk to beach and 5 min walk to Galleria mall with great restaurants. Water Taxi picks up at the hotel and is more like a tour than a taxi - great fun. Also Euro Bread Cafe is…

title: Unbelievable staff and experience
review: You will not find a cleaner, friendlier hotel in Ft. Lauderdale (or anywhere for that matter). The staff took care of some special needs that we had and did so with a smile and thanked us for our business.

title: Very nice for the price
review: Stayed here for two nights in January 2017.  I was very impressed with the hotel.  It is very quiet and relaxing.  It is located next to the mall where there are a lot of restaurants.  The beach is nearby and walking distance (long walk).  The hotel is also located on the canal and you can sit out and watch the boats go by.  There is a water taxi that goes up and down the canal.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are a little outdated.  The bathrooms have been renovated, but they are lacking exhaust fans so they steam up.   I thought the suites were spacious and had everything that we needed and more.   My one complaint is the lack of parking.  We had to valet our car which was a $30 a night charge.  It was easy to get the car though, just call a number and give…

title: Double Tree Galleria, Ft. Lauderdale, FL
review: Property is near airport, port and there is a mall next door for shopping at popular stores (Macy's, Dillard's, etc) and dining.  The rooms are all suites; the kitchen area is very well appointed.  The view from our room was a vacant lot next door and city lights.  The shower needs updating; water ran out in the floor while showering, and the shower head did not have enough pressure to rinse hair well.  Overall, the property is nice, but pricey (high season?).  Personnel very friendly and helpful.

title: Everything was great minus weak water pressure . Staff was great & rooms were always cleaned properly upon return
review: The location was great. The staff was super friendly. The room was spacious for 4 but the water pressure needs help as toilet would clog up every time we would go. We were there for work and didn't get chance to go to the restaurant so can't comment

title: Doubletree by Galleria experience.
review: The hotel is very well located to shopping and dining as well as the beach. It is in need of an upgrade to the rooms. The kitchens need to be better equipped. The refrigerator is too small. The internet needs to be improved. This is a problem that has existed for some time now.  I stay here because of its location, cleanliness of the rooms and the great staff who work there.

title: Good Hotel
review: This hotel is beyond great. First of all, the location is just PERFECT. It is so close to the beach. Walking distance. And close to just about anything. Again all with in walking distance. Lots of restaurants, cafes, shops and more. The hotel it self is very nice. There's a Starbucks in the lobby, for those who enjoy Starbucks. The front desk staff are friendly. The room was really nice and many have great views. The bed was super comfortable. My only complain about the rooms that come with a balcony is that the balcony is not well insulated. I wake easily when there's any sound and in this room, I was able to hear every car driving by even though I was on the highest floor. That it my only complaint about the room. The other thing o was disappointed about was the $30 charge to…

title: Enjoyed this Hotel!
review: Stayed for three nights. The staff here is Outstanding!! Guy provided the best check in experience I have ever had. The valet staff, were friendly, helpful and quick. I needed a repair in my room and maintenance came in less than five minutes and resolved. Housekeepers were kind. Bartenders were friendly. Seriously above average staff here! The view looking out at the Yachts going by is fabulous and relaxing. I actually really enjoyed the change of a view from a beach stay. Water taxi stops at the hotel and was a great ride! It is a must!! The room was spacious but a little "beat up" and some things could have been a little cleaner, but the bed was super comfortable. The only real two negatives I have are the room service was really bad, took a long time and then came cold one…

title: Not good
review: First we were checked into a room that was already occupied. Then we waited at the bar 25 minutes for drinks during the superbowl. It's a large spacious hotel but the service is lacking. The employees don't seem friendly. Not a hotel I would recommend.

title: Amazing Experience!!
review: Dear Heather S,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and will reach out to you shortly to further assist. We hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Absolutely Fantastic Stay
review: Stayed only for 3 days but I had a great experience with how happy and helpful the staff were.   I would still highly recommend it even though I ran into a few issues, with valet parking being expensive, but the valet was very quick and so cheerful.  The internet was a bit slow sometimes. Lastly, one room smelled like smoke but Im guessing it was because there was a balcony in the bedroom that people smoked on. The manager quickly changed my room without hesitation and gave me option too. Those issues didnt bug me enough to ruin my stay. I would still stay there again!

title: Amazing place
review: This hotel blew us away. It started with the very welcoming valet staff, proceeded by the AWESOME front desk staff. The young lady checking us in upgraded our room to one of the large full water (intercoastal and ocean) view suites. The room couldn't have been better. It was a great surprise for my partner's birthday. We wish we stayed more than one night but we were finishing up our vacation from the Keys here.   Next time, we know we want to stay here longer and will definitely be back. You can walk down to the beach, watch the huge yachts and boats go by from your balcony, and feel the fresh air breeze with your sliding patio doors open. The day we departed we even saw manatees and dolphins from the balcony while we were packing up - so very cool!  Thank you again to the…

title: Helpful
review: I was very impressed with Guy, one of the Front Desk Managers with his assistance and willingness to help me resolve any issues that occurred during my stay. There appeared to be charges posted to my credit card that were not suppose to be. Guy was able to remove these unwarranted charges and correct the amount that was rightly suppose to be charged to my account.

title: Great place to stay!
review: My husband and I have stayed hear numerous times. The staff is helpful and friendly. Two of the valets were exceptional-Brian and Epriss (spelling?). The rooms are very nice and exceptionally clean. The water taxi stops right at the hotel and will take you to restaurants, bars, and shopping. Nice pool and you can't beat the warm cookies at check-in!

title: Vacation Stay
review: Our 3rd or 4th stay, but first review. Always impressed with their customer service attitudes and smiles. This stay we especially want to thank Guy for going the extra mile for us. Great people, great facility, convenient location. We'll be back.  This is our Hilton property of choice in Lauderdale.

title: Exceptional service on the Intracoastal
review: I highly recommend GALLERYone for two reasons: the location and the service. We stayed here for a long weekend. Our daughter was able to join us at the last minute so I called the hotel to see if an upgrade to a suite was possible. Jason graciously accommodated us, even offering an unsolicited upgrade to a water view. I received pre-arrival and mid-stay text messages from staff who wanted to assure that our stay was perfect. Jeff, Guyvanel and Cindee at the front desk were all especially courteous and helpful. Breakfast was really good and the omelet chef was talented and fun! Make sure you try his avocado pesto! You cannot beat the location; a quick walk to the mall next door and several dining options, not to mention the water views. We would definitely stay here again.

title: What A Great Team/Property!
review: My wife & I spent 2 days at this wonderful property before our cruise.  This was our 2nd visit.  We were treated wonderfully the first visit, & even better this last time!!  Even before arriving, I was contacted by Front Desk Manager Jeffrey, who asked if there was anything he could do before arriving.  When I asked for a water-view room, he didn't hesitate to secure one for us.  During our stay, everyone we met couldn't have been more helpful or pleasant.  From the bell staff who greeting us at midnight after a nightmarish trip from the airport (our taxi broke down mid-trip), to the check-in process, everything was great!  We highly recommend this hotel due to staff & location, & will certainly stay again next time we're in the Fort Lauderdale area!

title: Split review
review: To make this a worthwhile review, I have to split it into 2 parts, the property and the staff.  First the good: the staff.  I've stayed at many hotels and many brands and these were some of the most efficient and friendly staff.  Our check in clerk was pleasant.  The other woman at check in overheard us talking about our dinner reservations at Truluck's and said if we mention we were staying here that we'd get a free dessert.  Well, that turned out to be something nobody at Truluck's had ever heard of, so we looked a bit foolish.  But overall staff was on point.  We called for extra hangars and they were at the door within 5 minutes.  We called for fresh towels the 2nd day and they brought us 4 sets of fresh towels within 5 minutes.  So the staff gets 4 stars.  Now the bad: the…

title: Great Rooms Water taxi picks up at hotel
review: Dear 360Rosso,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry for the condition of your room and that you previously had a bad experience with a valet staff. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon so we can provide a wonderful visit.

title: Room not ready
review: Hotel was great and it is water taxi stop, so great way to see intercostal. The breakfast was horrible and not worth the money. The dinner was ok.  Overall I would I stay again but not with the breakfast package. They gave us free water if asked at front desk.

title: Double Tree Florida
review: I had to wait over an hour for the room to be ready after check in time and this made me very late for an event that I couldn't be late for. I asked to be compinsated in some way because it was the hotels error and was told it was not there fault the room wasn't ready

title: They gave my room away
review: Dear Miki K,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We’re very sorry your experience at our property wasn’t up to our usual high standards. We’ve addressed the room not being ready at check-in with our team so we can improve our guest experience. We’ll reach out to you shortly to further assist. Thank you for alerting us to this issue, and we hope you’ll give us another chance to make it right.

title: Thank you to Jeff Katz and his staff for providing me such a wonderful experience.
review: I had a wonderful experience. I've been a Hilton honors member for many years and Jeff Katz and his staff went above and beyond to make sure everything was fantastic. I love Fort Lauderdale is the city and I certainly love my warm chocolate chip cookies when I checked into the Doubletree. The Hilton brand has done such a phenomenal job of providing the best hospitality of any company and the electric...

title: Proof how a manager can make the difference in your stay!
review: We had a two-bedroom suite, booked with friends who were traveling on a cruise with us the next day. Jeff, the manager, sent text messages to my husband before we arrived - a very welcoming thing to do!  While there he "checked in" with us...and even took care of our friend's breakfast charge (we got it free since we are Gold).  Clean, well maintained. Just know to book a nearby restaurant ahead of time if you want dinner...the Galleria is busy!

title: Great Location
review: This Doubletree is i8n a great location, everything is walkable. To get to other desired placed this hotel has a water taxi stop. And all the rooms are suites- no wonder we're happy. Don't forget your warm chocolate chip cookie!

title: Thankfully, it was just for one-night!!!
review: Stayed here the night before our cruise.  It wasn't the closest hotel to the cruise port, as it ended up being a good 20-minute drive to the terminal.  They have a sign at the front desk about a shuttle but unfortunately, the front desk had no clue when we asked about it. Check in was quick but sadly, I had to ask for DT cookies as it wasn't offered to me.  Also, I was told I was "upgraded to a suite," that would've been nice but all of their rooms are suites and I confirmed a one-bedroom suite...I'm not a newbie to this.  Upon entrance to the suite, it was weird as that all the lights were on, and every single drawer and cabinet were pulled open, it was like a scene from Poltergeist!  I'm guessing the housekeeper did that to ensure no personal items were left but didn't close…

title: Great place
review: Dear norcalnick,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered at check-in and the state of your room when you entered, and we’ve addressed these with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Not impressed
review: Hotel was very old and not well updated.  Looked like they tried to update our room but did a poor job.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom waterview suite.  The bathtub in the 2nd bedroom did not work, sink in the main bedroom was leaking and the shower leaked all night long.  We had to close the bathroom door in order to get any sleep.  WiFi never worked.  I was told I could go to the front desk to "check out" a hotspot.  Would not stay there again.

title: Post cruise
review: Dear melkay1174,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms. We apologize for the issues encountered with maintenance and our Wi-Fi connection, and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.

title: BAE's Bday Weekend
review: We enjoyed the staff and managements efforts for us to enjoy the three days after our cruise at the wonderful located property. The rooms and cleanliness of this property was great.  We have stayed here often after previous cruises.  It is located so close to a mall nearby in addition has so many options for nearby restaurants and convenience to a supermarket. (Publix)  I also enjoy the fact that the property is a waterfront taxi stop along the channel. If you desire to take the water taxi from or to from there, all the options for lunch and dinner or  shopping along the water taxi areas have many routes available from the hotel for the entire waterfront entertainment areas. You could cruise all day if you want.  Thanks Doubletree staff.

title: Luxury all the way
review: Had a beautiful weekend with at this resort. I'm a Gold so I frequent the Hilton brand. Ft. Lauderdale is my fav south Florida destination but I normally stay at the Bahia Mar Resort. I decide to try the double tree. Upon arrival I was hooked from the sunrise strip that has the Galleria Mall & tons of dining options on the strip. Courteous Valet staff with efficient service. The front desk from Guy at check in ,Amor during breakfast, but I must say the supervisor Jeff I think he is just superb. I never had an interaction with him but he knew me and my partner by name. it made me feel so special. In the restaurant for breakfast Jackie offered exceptional service, she always remember what we drink, the omelets are amazing... only error I had was when I was checking on a package i…

title: Weekender in Fort Lauderdale
review: This was a last minute reservation, handled perfectly. Arrival and checking were smooth and they already had my HHonors data in the system. The room was perfect and everything we requested was in place. Bags dropped off within ten minutes and picked up within five at the end of the stay. Car was waiting for us when we came down to check out. Bill emailed by mid-day. Experience could not be better.

title: Loved the room and staff
review: Would have loved to have stayed longer! It was really nice to have a room with separate bedroom/kitchen/seating area (we'd been on the road for awhile).We dined in the bar and the food and service was very satisfying. Our bartender (can't remember his name, but he's heading to Colorado for a skiing trip) was very friendly. The outdoor area looked nice, too (the weather wasn't the best so we stayed indoors).

title: Overpriced
review: I was extremely disappointed in Galleryone.  Very difficult to check in.  Had requested room with view of intercoastal..didn't happen.  Room very average for an exceptionally high rate. High valet parking fees.  Slow service..won't return.

title: Awesome hotel
review: Dear vickieelaine,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are very sorry that you weren’t happy with your guestroom during your recent trip. We try to accommodate all reservations but occasionally we can’t meet every room request. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

title: Convenient with caring staff
review: I stayed again at this hotel in Dec. 2016 for two weeks. The front desk staff was very courteous, knowledgeable in assisting me to get settled in my unit. The unit # 1205 I stayed in was quite, clean, with a well equipped kitchenette and the view from the balcony was breathtaking.  The breakfast staff was extremely attentive, courteous, always on hand to fill my coffee cup and orange juice especially Allison, Jacky and Rhem who make a fabulous omelette.

title: Thiefs at the GalleryOne hotel
review: I stayed here during a recent conference and enjoyed the proximity to good restaurants, the outdoor deck with water taxi stop, a nice little pool and jacuzzi, and the caring staff.  The breakfast was nothing to write home about, but the suites have a kitchenette.  The hotel appears to be a mix of time shares and hotel rooms. Many of the well-heeled guests are greeted by name when checking in, generally adding to the 'friendly neighbor' atmosphere of the lobby.    The front desk is staffed by polyglots.   I noticed Spanish, Russian, and French ...

title: Location
review: If not for location, across from Publix, next to Truluck's, I probably would stay elsewhere but location makes up for other shortcomings for a pre-cruise stay.  Still beats other options in similar price range.  I'll be back next year

title: COCKROACHES
review: Fridge froze our fruits n veges. Laundry Room had COCKROACHES and only one washing machine working. Coin operated laundry and the coin machine not working. Front staff didn't have change. Staff were quite pleasant and helpful. Great location and access to local stops.

title: Great location and customer service
review: Dear Kamara T,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered in your room and with your refrigerator, and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Enjoy Every Minute of It!
review: Easy walk to beaches, dining, and shopping.  Hotel is also a water taxi stop.  Hotel staff was very attentive and friendly and always willing to go the extra mile.  Our room was spacious and the beds were very comfortable.  Only negatives to report include spotty wifi performance in rooms and parking costs of $30 per night.

title: Great location, amazing views!
review: Thank you so much for leaving a nice review on Tripadvisor. Our hotel is located in a great central location to several shops and attractions and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your time. We hope to welcome you back to the hotel very soon.

title: Good location
review: Water Taxi stops at the hotel and it is an easy 10 min walk to Fort Lauderdale Beach.  Hotel is acceptable but a lack of attention to detail prevents it being any better.  Housekeeping left coffee but forgot to leave creamers, doors were black with finger prints, the hairdryer was good but in a dirty bag.  We only ate breakfast at the hotel and on some mornings the service was so busy the staff were unable to cope, meaning juice did not arrive and there was a 10 min wait for hot food.  On checking out there was a $160 discrepancy and while there was no argument about refunding it, more care of the details would have prevented it from happening in the first place.  Our stay was between Christmas and New Year when I am sure getting staff is difficult, but that should not be an…

title: A Good Value With Highly Attentive Staff
review: I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed the water taxi stop and the beach. I will share this review with the housekeeping team since it looks like we dropped the ball on servicing the room. I really do apologize and I will make sure it does not happen in the future. We hope to welcome you back to the hotel very soon.

title: Fantastic family experience in Fort Lauderdale
review: The GALLERYone staff goes the extra mile to make sure that guests are well taken care of. When they were out of lox for breakfast, the chef personally came out and asked us how he could make it right. He ended up searing salmon on the grill as a substitute. That's just one example. The breakfast staff in particular are extremely generous and courteous, and so is management. Things aren't perfect--for example the wifi tends to drop the connection--but overall it's a clean, well-kept, well-located gem of a hotel. We are regulars, and we appreciate how well they treat us.

title: Christmas Failure
review: Thank you so much for leaving a review. I will share this awesome review with the entire team, it looks like our cook went above and beyond to exceed your expectations and we strive to do that all the time.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel very soon.

title: great location, great service and great price
review: We have made this a family yearly repeat for a reason. Each room is a 1-2 bedroom suite with full kitchen, (no oven) breakfast buffet has been upgraded this year. Heated pool and hot tub, washing machines available, effecient fitness center, and business center, walking distance to hi end shopping, restaurants, full line groceries, and birch state park. Ocean is 5 minute walk unless the drawbridge is up. Prices are family friendly,,and the staff goes out of their way to help, when needed. We don't rent a car because everything is so close. Year 3 of our visits.

title: Good location
review: We stayed at the in GALLERYone for five nights before a cruise from Port Everglades and enjoyed our time there. We booked a water view balcony suite and were given a suite on the 14th floor which suited us very well.  We found the staff to be very helpful and friendly giving us ideas for places to eat and where to buy the items we needed.   The location of the hotel was good for us as we didn't have a car, it was a short walk down to the beach and close to the Galleria Mall, restaurants and a Publix store for any groceries we needed. The suite was very clean and comfortable especially the large king sized bed but perhaps some of the other furnishings are ready for a bit of a revamp.  The suite had a kitchen area which was well equipped apart from a kettle for making a quick…

title: Great Place - Except Breakfast
review: This is a fantastic place to stay. Staff are courteous and apply the signature Hilton hospitality. The distinguishing factor is access to the water taxi which takes you anywhere on the inter-coastal waterway to shops, bars, restaurants or beaches for a fee.   Warning a dinner cruise ship now stops at this hotel which can really screw up departures and returns of the water taxi service. We found ourselves trapped for an hour awaiting its departure so we could get back to our hotel.  Beautiful pool and upgraded rooms have balconies with beautiful views.   We stayed here a year ago and one noticeable change is there restaurant. Last year the restaurant was a gem, with great food and service. This past week the hotel was sold out, yet insufficient staffing levels at the restaurant…

title: Wonderful staff and great place to stay
review: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The staff could not have been better.  They were responsive to all of our requests and helpful whenever we needed anything - very welcoming. The cookies are great and the rooms were clean and very nice.

title: Pre-cruise
review: Thank you very much for the wonderful review about our property. I will share this review with the entire team and we hope to welcome you back to the hotel very soon.

title: Good clean fun
review: Just what you need, nothing fancy but fills your need for a two night landing in Fort Lauderdale before jumping on s cruiseship. Great location, right next to a shoppingmall and the water. They also have their own water taxi stop which is very nice.

title: Noise and they charge for receiving packages
review: Rooms are very noisy since it is in a mayor road. I went the day before Christmas and they charge for every packages that was shipp to the hotel. No self parking staff was great but rather go to the Marriott next door

title: Lovely rooms, very nice staff, but BADLY UNDERSTAFFED
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. Hopefully you will give us a second chance in the future so you can experience a better us.

title: Very good hotel with resort like fees.
review: We spent Christmas weekend at Galleryone-- two families with kids.  Everyone we met was nice and trying hard, but at every turn things went wrong, presumablyl because there weren't enough staff.  Our rooms were ready two hours late (and they offered a coupon for free drinks as an apology!);  then we waited 45 min for them to bring our bags up; the housekeeping manager asked if I really needed my room cleaned since I was leaving in two days; the gym and the pool ran out of towels; we waited literally an hour for our food in the restaurant (by the last day, we learned to bring board games to with us for the meals.  we'd order, play games for an hour, and then eat).   Again, every person we dealt with was nice, and yet....

title: Fabulous Location
review: Thank you so much for leaving a review on your recent stay at our hotel. I do apologize that you felt that we were understaffed and were not able to serve the guest. I will make sure to speak to my operations team and see what happened that day so we can prevent it from happening in the future. I really apologize for the problems you had. Hopefully you can give us a second chance in the future and come experience better us.

title: Unsatisfactory
review: When it comes to staying out of town, I am very picky with where I reserve my stay. My first impression of the hotel was that the exterior sign was missing some bulbs. Wouldn't expect that for the price I was paying. Entering into the location, it gave a very welcoming feel. Very nice decor, spacious and clean lobby area. The staff was professional and welcoming. The room was the best part of the stay. I stayed in a king suite. Very roomy with a nice kitchen space. The view (facing the water) was nice. Enjoyed watching the yachts go by. You do however face other large buildings, so a view of the Ocean is limited. The shower leaked pretty bad, with noticeable moisture stains on the floor/wall. They attempted to fix the leak, but it continued to leave a large pool of water on the…

title: Bartender
review: Stephan our bartender did a fabulous job Christmas night. We were here on business and not only did he tend to the bar, but he worked the whole room as wait staff. They seemed to be terribly understaffed for a holiday.

title: Perfectly adequate; good location
review: WOW.. Thank you so much for the 5 star review. I will share you kind comments with Stephan and the entire team. I apologize that you felt that we were understaffed on Christmas night and I will make sure to speak to the operation team so it does not happen again.  Thank you.

title: Mr Walsh
review: Stayed at the GalleryOne for a winter break with a large group of family members.  Each of the rooms is a suite.  Some larger than others.  The 01 line is a nice corner suite with a king bed overlooking the Intracoastal & the drawbridge (no balcony).  Larger than others. The 32 line is two queens overlooking the boulevard with views of the intracoastal (balcony).  The 22 line has a king bed and overlooks the intracoastal (balcony).  All have kitchenettes with a undercounter fridge, & stove (no oven or freezer)  Overall the property is a bit dated, despite renovations.  The restaurnt is average, no frills.  The pool is average, no frills (or poolside water).  Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  There is some noise from cars going over the adjacent drawbridge.  Location is…

title: Pre-cruise stay
review: Thank you so much for leaving a detailed review on Tripadvisor. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed our suites with full kitchens. It is very hard to find rooms as spacious as ours in the fort Lauderdale area. I will also share your kind comments about our staff to the entire team. Thank you

title: Nice Hotel and Location
review: the hotel is in a great location 3 blocks to the beach ,restaurant's in walking distance, the only downside to the hotel is the pool area has a lot of shade from the building next to it not great for sunning.

title: Great service very noisy hotel
review: Be aware not a good hotel. We travel with my family to Fort Lauderdale for Christmas and we choose this hotel base on the reviews. The two rooms were facing the street and the noise is terrible. The windows are not sealed and you can hear everything. We bought the gifts in amazon and they shipped to the hotel. Big surprise they charge me $5 per package....not good. Staff is great

title: Do not stay in this hotel if you want to watch the boat parade.
review: Dear Paola L,  We’re very sorry for the noise issue you encountered during your stay at our hotel. Your comfort is our number one concern, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. Your review will help us correct similar issues in the future. We hope that the next time you’re in the area, you’ll consider staying with us again.

title: SUCH A SHAME
review: I booked this room simply to watch the boat parade, and did not intend to sleep there.  There were 5 of us, and I was extremely clear that we wanted only to watch the parade and went so far as to confirm that we could sit on the balcony to see it and would not have to stand. (we had one bad knee and a bad back in the group).  We could not see the water never mind the parade.  We were told we could not be moved.  I contacted the manager the next day and the result was far less than satisfactory.  He refunded the two wrist bands that we were overcharged for and did nothing whatsoever to address the issue with the room.

title: Great place BUT expensive parking!!!!'
review: Dear Sandy Q,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Dingy, drab, overpriced
review: This hotel needs a renovation! The bed was lumpy, the toilet was running all night. This was terrible for the price per night!  The only nice thing was being on the intracoastal waterway.  Valet Parking is expensive and it's a long wait every time you want your car.  Very disappointing trip.

title: There are much better hotels in the Fort Lauderdale
review: Service at this hotel is not what it used to be and they definitely do not value their guests! I'm really disappointed in our recent stay and how we were treated. So happy they are building more hotels and newer properties in downtown Fort Lauderdale. This place is sure to go out of business. When the staff hangs up on you and does not return calls you know you have a personnel issue.

title: Added charges galore
review: Dear 543angelines,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. We’ll be reaching out to you shortly to further assist and hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.

title: Breakfast
review: Lots of added charges just to get back into the room I already paid for.  I was not aware of added charges due to ft Lauderdale winter festival.   Nice event but we did not use the extra services so an additional  $20 per person to get back into our already paid room was unfair

title: Server Alyson
review: Dear michaelbC1767BJ,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel. We understand that you were unhappy with some of the charges, and apologize if they were not clear when you booked the room. We value your input as we strive to personalize each guest's experience and keep costs affordable in doing so. We hope you will return to stay with us the next time you visit the area so we may better demonstrate the quality value and hospitality you expect and deserve.

title: Great hotel
review: Alyson was very helpful,  professional,  and accommodating. She made sure I had a fresh cup of tea during breakfast. She was available when needed. We were staying in room 1205. The room is clean, the view is to die for and those cookies are amazing.

title: WOW experience
review: A "WOW" experience - wonderful, outstanding (customer service), welcoming. Plus great views, excellent accommodations, perfect location (close to the beach/shopping, near public transportation) and nice amenities (beautiful suite). The perfect place to relax, unwind. Top notch staff, service and facility. Can't wait to stay there again.

title: Sweet Suites
review: GalleryOne is a great option in Fort Lauderdale, especially if your visit is not primarily for the beach. Even then it's only about a 15 minute walk to the ocean. The Suites are large and comfortable, many with inter-coastal views. The hotel staff, valets, restaurant and front desk all super friendly and helpful. Galleria Mall next door, and many restaurants in the immediate (walkable) area.  I've stayed here a few times before, and it's even better now than before.

title: Better on the Intercoastal waterway
review: This property is on the Intercoastal waterway. Its about three easy blocks to the ocean. We had a room with a view of the ocean and the waterway, twice as nice. It has a nice pool and is a stop on the water taxi route. The property is all suites, a separate bedroom, living room and kitchen. We had breakfast at the hotel as Hilton Gold members. I could walk two blocks to Public for food to prepare in the room and we ate better and for much less. Used Uber to get around, avoiding the parking fees which really add up. Paid about $120 a night, this was off season. Rates here vary a lot so look for the sweet spot and you will be pleased with this property. I rate in large part on value for the dollar and this property delivers. Unlike some properties on the ocean there are no resort…

title: Nothing special  but very clean...
review: This was a last minute stay and we found the room to be very clean,convenient  and the staff very  friendly. The price was very reasonable and would be really  good value for a family,as the room had  a,seperate bedroom with sofa,bed. Wouldn't rush back but definitely  would stay again in a pinch.

title: Hurricane fun in the sun
review: We must have been crazy to be one of 50 people to fly to Florida for a vacation during a hurrican but this hotel took fantastic care of us, giving us the tip floor with a great view of the canal.  Love the updated renovations since the last time we came and the best way to get around is the water taxi that stops right out back by the pool.   Very clean and fantastic friendly staff.

title: Staff attitude lacking, cleanliness issues.
review: Doubt we will be returning, the staff was more interested in checking their personal cell phones than making sure our stay was comfortable.  Food trays in the hallways for 2 days in a row, besides the smell, real tripping hazard.  And at check out, we were billed more than our guaranteed price, when we questioned it, they adjusted our bill but had no idea how it happened?

title: Nice location but rundown and disguesting bugs
review: Dear jamesdF3111RI,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and will reach out to you shortly to further assist. We hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Gran ubicacion, buenas habitaciones
review: The location was great for winterfest to watch the boat show.  The rooms were terrible, noisy, dated, and bugs wandering the room.  Quite frustrating and difficult to sleep!  I would not stay there again!

title: Nice apartment to stay
review: Dear Traveling_addiction,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered in your room, and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Very Very disappointing Rip Off Hotel !
review: Great location and great rooms. Other than that, no complementary anything, including breakfast. The bar next to the pool is enjoyable. The transport service from the valet is good, but rather expensive. Bringing your car is very expensive. they also charge for receiving mail for you.

title: Most Deceptive Hotel in America
review: My stay at this dump has been nothing but a nightmare and it just started.  I booked a waterview room in October 2016.  Shame on me for assuming a waterview room would have a balcony ... of course all the other waterview rooms have balconies except for mine.  When I checked in today I was handed a sheet of paper which informed me there would be a $20 charge for each person to come to my suite, which is no larger than my bedroom.   I thought the $20 charge was due to it being my birthday but I guess it was because of some boat parade.   Don't even get me started on the  $30 parking fee.  There are security guards at the elevators checking for wrist bands.  Hello I am 50 years old not a 19 year old spring break student.  I would have never stayed here if any of this had been…

title: Great upper floor views
review: Dear Carl Z,  Thank you for your honest review of your recent visit with us. I regret that you were disappointed that your room did not have a balcony and apologize if this wasn’t clear when you booked your stay, in addition to the parking and guest fees. At our hotel, we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. Finally, I’m very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. I’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Rooms
review: Located very near the intercostal waterway and in amongst lotsa places to eat. The rooms are excellent and hey have a gym and pool. Suites are even better with all the comforts of home even the pots and pans! Great place for a day or a month.  Close to restaurants on both sides of the waterway, you can't go wrong.

title: Shockingly & consistently sub-par ...
review: The sheets were dirty and fingernail found under my pijjow.  The front desk staff was very nice and helpful. The women in the dining room were very nice and rhe guys at the bar the first two nights went out of their way to make me a drink I could drink. Thank You

title: Poor hotel,
review: The employees here are the ONLY positive aspect ... everything else is distinctly rundown & dirty. I've stayed here on more than a dozen occasions and each time it's some new problem: today, a broken toilet-paper holder and NO TOILET PAPER anywhere! Last time, no A/C.  Time before that, no working Internet.  If you can stay anywhere else, you should!

title: Once again
review: I stay at Gallery One twice a year and with good reason. Location, location and location to the mall, publix, shops,cleaners, restaurants and the beach.Much of the time I do not use my car as everything  is so conveniently close at hand. I love a two bedroom corner suite as I can use one room as a dressing room. Special thanks to maid Cynthia who is so cheerful and always smiling. I will be back in the spring.

title: Pretty Chill
review: Me and my honey stayed there for a day just to relax and we both enjoyed it. It was quiet and we were pretty much in our own world. Although we drove we decided to uBer to the beach to avoid parking woes and it was fairly brief. Had lunch at RockBar about seven minutes away. The bed was so comfy we fell asleep and didn't make our dinner plans so I guess that speaks for the comfort LOL

title: Always a great stay!
review: We cruise every November and after our cruise we always stay at GalleryOne. We love the hotel and the location, the rooms are well laid out and beautiful. It has a water taxi stop right on site. We were lucky enough to get a corner suite this year, room 501 is amazing!!! Can't wait to go back again next year

title: Not worth the price
review: Lots of little maintenance issues with the room I didn't bother to report. Issues with the phone lines in the room and accessing the internet. Elevators not maintained properly. No self-parking. Poor description of guestroom levels and amenities on the website. Good service cannot make up for poor maintenance.

title: Great weekend trip to the beach
review: My stay was awesome and the units look pretty much like you see on the pictures from the various sites.  My unit had a small Foyer, that lead to the kitchen on the left or to the dining room just ahead on the left, that gave way to the living room that had a pull out couch. From the living room you can step out onto a descent size balcony, my room looked over Sunrise Blvd, I had a nice view.  The Bedroom is off to the right, in there you would also find a very nice bathroom, with a nice shower.   The room was clean, and like I said it was just like the pictures, the unit I was in had a few items in the cupboard, like instant coffee, sugar and a few condiments.  The Valet parking was nice too, just call the valet 10 mins before you go down and your car will be at the front door…

title: Thanksgiving Retreat
review: My family and I have stayed at the Gallery One for 2 years now for Thanksgiving. Both times it was excellent, can't say enough about the level of customer service offered by the staff. LOCATION, LOCATION

title: Very disappointing
review: Unfortunately after a few years staying here we will be looking for somewhere else for our next stay.  Standards have dropped and service poor in the main, reception and valet staff excluded. We will be looking elsewhere- noisy and average.

title: A different experience
review: Dear Carolyn O,  We’re very sorry for the noise issue you encountered during your stay at our hotel. Your comfort and safety is our number one concern, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. Your review will help us correct similar issues in the future. We hope that the next time you’re in the area, you’ll consider staying with us again.

title: Great stay
review: I called a few days ahead of my arrival and spoke with a very nice gentleman at the front desk. I advised him of my request for a water-view room and that I had two reservations and would like to stay in the same room. I also advised him of my late arrival. He was very friendly and stated he would pre-assign my room to the 12th in understanding this was not a guarantee.  When I arrived at the hotel there was a vehicle in front of us with about 4 women inside. The valet was more interested in talking with then helping us with our bags. When I went to the front desk the gentleman who checked me in was extremely friendly and quick to check us in. He placed us in a room on the 6th floor.  When we arrived in the room it was very dusty and looked somewhat clean. The furnishings were…

title: Location, location, location!!
review: Dear Dale G,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping problems and an unacceptable level of customer service. Unclean rooms and a rude front desk team are not typical at our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention so we could help make it right. We have discussed this with our staff, and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet the highest housekeeping standards. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Traci Lynn Jewelry
