review: Jason was excellent staffer every time I came to desk he greet me by last name . Jason ask what else could he do make your stay better .  Jason gave out direction to the local market and mall and nail shop

title: Good size suites
review: We booked the king suite with water view but the room was on a low floor so we couldn't see the water. We asked to be moved to a higher room which was no problem for the staff. The suites are huge and beds are very comfortable, the best place is the pool you can relax watching boats sail past. Would love to stay there again tomorrow!

title: Unhappy
review: This is my second time staying at the hotel. The first time was the best experience, but this time, first off the room had a plumbing problem so the toilet was backed up. I went to the front desk and the sent and engineer to the room. The toilet was slow but it worked. I hardly stayed in the room, but I went to throw something in the garbage in the kitchen and there was a roach on the wall. I was disgusted at this time, I went to the front desk and told and they changed my room to the room above which had the same plumbing issue. I was so fed up that I went to my friend room use the bathroom.

title: Doubletree Hilton Fort Lauderdale
review: great hotel.  great location  On the inter-coastal and not far from the beach.   Close to a huge shopping center with major stores, food court and several upscale restaurants.   However, the required valet is awful  Expensive and from the looks of surroundings, unnecessary.

title: Location great but a little disappointing stay
review: We stayed here 24-26 Oct. I am Only leaving the review now as I wanted to see what I had been charged for on my credit card.  During our first day we couldn't help but notice the toilet was making an extremely noisy high pitched whine. We complained to the front desk and was told it would be fixed on our return later in the afternoon. Having returned later at night we retired only to be woken at 3.00am with the same noise. We mentioned his again at breakfast and showed the lady on the front desk a video we took of the loo to prove our point!!! She sent a maintenance guy up and he couldn't fix it. When were then moved across the corridor to another room. After this we asked at check out what could be offered for our inconvenience. Nothing was offered not even a smile. In fact the…

title: Pretty band aid on an old building
review: We stayed here the night before leaving for a cruise,we booked months in advance. The pictures you see online are not exactly what your room looks like. They have done a makeover to the rooms but the carpets and floor baseboards are old. The windows are dirty and old, in desperate need of changing.  We booked a "City View" room and got a 3rd floor room with a view of the dumpster area behind the hotel, old mattresses strewn about, garbage everywhere. The bathroom in the room was clean and nicely updated, the toilet is incredibly low (picture toilet in a kindergarten classroom) The bed is what I can assume the equivalent of spending the night sleeping on a trampoline....terrible! All in all, this is an average hotel, good for a 1 night stay. They have no shuttle service to or…

title: Lovely Stay at GALLERYone!!
review: My husband and I stayed at the GALLERYone for 2 nights after a cruise.    Transfer from Port Everglades was reasonably swift, however we were too early to check-in to our suite.    The front of house staff completed the check-in process and happily held our luggage until 3pm when we were able to access our room.    The suite itself was well appointed and had 2 very comfortable beds with tonnes of pillows which I loved!!!  Very good sleep quality during our stay!!    We had a side view of the river from our balcony where we could happily watch boats come and go.    The hotel was very busy during our stay due to the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show, which also meant that the water taxi was not running its usual service.  We therefore accessed a taxi to visit Las Olas…

title: Great Staff - Ideal Location
review: I recently spent two nights at The Doubletree Galleryone.  Right on intercoastal waterway. Great shopping next door with everything you need within walking distance.!   Brian and Eric at the bell station were great. Jason and Cindee made me feel at home.  They need to work on their wifi and figure out better choices for breakfast.

title: Good rooms horrible rates
review: The room was good but the prices for everything was too high. Why should I pay 30.00 plus tax to park my car at a hotel that is over priced? That makes no sense to me or the party that inwas with which was over 80 people! Very displeased

title: Our favorite Ft Lauderdale hotel
review: Dear toccarab984,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel. We understand that you were unhappy with some of the charges, and apologize if they were not clear when you booked the room. We value your input as we strive to personalize each guest's experience and keep costs affordable in doing so. We hope you will return to stay with us the next time you visit the area.

title: Doubletree Fort Lauderdale
review: Front staff and Valet service is excellent. Room doors and walls were below average. Breakfast staff was very good. Rooms need updating and a good overall cleaning.  This hotel is ideally located but location is not everything. Lacklustre, we were only staying I night.

title: Great Location & Excellent Customer Service
review: Frequently stayed here years ago when it was Doubletree, so I decided to book a room for my Mom's birthday. Although we had 1 slight hiccup with the reservation, the Manager on duty rectified the situation immediately. Valet is a bit on the pricey side $30 for overnight), "John from Plantation" was AMAZING! He exemplified top notch customer service from start to finish!! Would definitely recommend this hotel! They truly showed me that Customer Satisfaction is their priority!!

title: Good location
review: Not too far from the beach. Nice suites with views of the inter coastal waterway. Very spacious with small kitchen. Flat screens in all the rooms. Balcony facing the ocean. Lots of traffic however so fairly loud.

title: We stayed during the Boat Show 2016
review: The rooms are up to date and clean, very roomy.  We had a suite overlooking the water for 3 nights at $900+ total.  The employees are polite and professional.  I would not recommend the breakfast as the selection choices are not worth $25/person, and most items were empty.  However, kudos to the omelet man from Trinidad - he makes an excellent homemade pesto sauce for the eggs!

title: Outstanding Service & Room
review: We had a great stay at this hotel. We were there for one night following a cruise. Andrew was very welcoming -- checked us in, arranged a waterview upgrade and we were able to check in early. The room was very large with a nice balcony overlooking the water. The shower was roomy with very good pressure, bed was comfy, and the wifi worked very well. The location is right down the road from the Galleria Mall and lots of great restaurants. We will definitely be back.

title: My faith in DoubleTree was restored
review: I travel constantly usually my preference is hyatt or spg because they are great at spoiling high tier members.  However since I know I will be abroad a lot this year.  I cant ignore the fact there is a multitude of hilton locations.  I have been testing out hilton properties and was matched to diamond.  I had had a terrible experience at another location so I wasnt going to event attempt another double tree however I gave GalleryOne a shot during the boat show.  Let me tell you.. I was more than pleased.  It wasnt necessarily the room or the amenities it was the staff that made this location worthwhile.  Due to the crowded nature of the hotel I wasnt granted an upgrade (didnt expect one bc of the boat show).  The pool is older nothing to write about.  The breakfast area isnt…

title: Travel Agent Review - 1 Night 2 Bedroom Suite
review: Really unimpressed with this property and its cleanliness. As a travel agent I would not recommend this hotel or send any clients to stay here. The lamp in our room had a fine coating of dust on it. Bathroom sanitation was far from being Hilton standard. The bathroom door was dirty with fingerprints all over it and a toothpaste stain on the mirror upon arrival. Also, two conditioners and no shampoo. DO NOT waste your time having breakfast there. The table had a sticky coating and stains on it and needed a serious wipe-down, along with other furniture in the dining room. Breakfast service was poor and it took a long time to put in an order for orange juice and to get silverware. It looks like they just refurbished but done poorly... bubbling carpet and not flush with the wall,…

title: The GalleryOne way!
review: I'm really enjoying my stay! The service is very good and this is definitely a hotel that goes above and beyond for their guest! Ally makes sure my breakfast right every morning! Thanks for it everything!

title: Outstanding customer service
review: We had a fabulous stay thanks to the outstanding service of the staff, especially front desk rep Jeffrey and bartender Stefan. Jeffrey took extra care to make sure we got off to a great start. Stefan did a fantastic job of servicing our ever-growing party that wanted to dine in the bar area (instead of the restaurant). He took care of our every need with a smile, quick response and great attitude.   My only regret is that we only stayed one night. Will definitely return and recommend!

title: Thoughtful staff, lousy food
review: Don't waste your money or time on the food - it was way over priced ($25 for breakfast) and the quality was very poor.  That having been said, the staff overall was great, very kind, courteous, and helpful!  THEY would be what make me come back.

title: Never Again
review: I had no housekeeping for 2 days... even when I complained.  It took an hour to get a salad at lunch and when it arrived it was lackluster.  No one apologized or warned us of the delay and we were late for our meeting as a result.

title: Second stay. Awesome.
review: Dear Susan S,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in our area.  We are very sorry for the problems you encountered. We have addressed the issues described with our housekeepers. As well, we’re sorry the food quality didn’t meet your expectations. At our property, we want to serve fresh, tasty dishes with the caring touches of home. We work continually to improve our menu offerings, and appreciate your comments. We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.

title: Need some housekeeping bartender left at night without saying anything, got charged for valet when in fact one was paid
review: This was our second stay at the GalleryOne. The staff here are extremely friendly and helpful . The location in our opinion is second to none in that area. Water Taxi stop steps outside the lobby. Fine dining, mall, bars grocery all less than 5 minutes walk. Beach about 7 minutes walk. We use the water Taxi extensively to get around and tickets are available from the valet guys. The only reason we did not give service full marks is because one night we sat in a booth in the bar area for drinks. We got no service and the bar was not busy. I eventually had to get up and walk up to the bar to order and get my drink. The barman seemed to be more interested chatting with the 2 people sitting at the bar. We had one drink and then walked to blu Martini. I can state that that is not the…

title: Classy hotel in a perfect location!
review: er left without telling guests valet was paid cash next day for one car still was charged.  The whole thing was messed up. No toilet paper or tissues was the worst!!  One car was credited back, but when reservations were made parking was not additional so upon arrival I asked if we could park are own car and was told no, yet some people said they were asked.  So which is it??

title: Beautiful hotel on the water!
review: Dear 276isabelles,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We’ll be reaching out to you shortly to further assist as we try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.

title: Location is great for the waterway, beach, Galleria Mall, and a variety of restaurants.
review: Melissa Merilier was especially helpful showing this senior how to get the Yahoo app email on my new Samsung Tablet to contact my children. If there is an employee of the month/year, I nominate her.  All employees were gracious and professional. Nice breakfast buffet. Rooms were large and my suite had full length sliding glass doors to the balcony from the living room and the bedroom. Stayed there two nights with friends from our Ballroom Dance Center before we all went on a cruise. The waterway taxi was a great way to get around to restaurants and to sight see. Really liked the free 5 person golf cart that was available for the area attractions as I can't walk very far at a time. The others walked to the beach which was lovely, where we learned to dance the Bachata from our…

title: Absolutely loved my visit
review: Wishing that my 7 day trip was longer, I now have to go. Doubletree was sincerely an incredible place to stay.Very clean environment, Fast  service, very good pricing on cocktails an wine, an very nice an happy workers. One which I saw most was nysheeka,  tall an gorgeous ! Told her that she belongs on someone magazine loll. She was a big help to me an my family. Told her that I was feeling under the weather one morning an she went out of her way an brought me coffee. I really appreciated that , her not knowing little things like that carries great value to your name .!. Front desk staff always knew when I was calling , they answer "hay Mr Shaw, need anything ??" loll .... Loved it. Felt like my money was being appreciated.  I truly am blessed to have been able to stay at one of…

title: A comfort inn would be nicer.
review: We got to our first room and the light in the bathroom only worked intermittently, there were fans in the hallway and it smelled like mold, the vent was leaking, the floors didn't look clean, the toilet barely flushed. Melissa at the front desk was awesome and got us moved to another room immediately.  The new room had food still in the fridge, a cufflink on the bathroom floor, the iron had stains on it and ruined our clothes, a light in the bedroom didn't work.  For $250/night this is less than impressive. One of our rooms has a balcony that you can't even stand on it's so small. The carpet in the hallways is coming up and wrinkled. The elevators are slow and the doors are slow to open. We went to dinner and they were out of almost all wines, the chicken dinner, the soup, and…

title: Needs fixing
review: Dear Jessica R,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered throughout your visit and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Third Stay!
review: Good location, service average, but rooms need fixing/renovation!! Galleria mall next door, about 400 meters to the beach, valley parking good!! Nice to sit outside by the pool, bar and water way. From the 10th floor nice view.

title: Beautiful hotel!
review: We had a very nice hotel stay here. Rooms were large and clean. Had a nice view of the intercoastal. Staff was very nice, helpful, and friendly. We found this hotel because we had our wedding on the yacht Sun Dream and it picked up right from the hotel dock. We had all our guests stay here. Wonderful experience!

title: Great hotel in a great location with great service and good amenities
review: We have stayed at this hotel many times in the past it is consist  with it's good service great location near mall shopping Starbucks and restaurants the service is always friendly the amenities are great the rooms are getting a little worn and could use a freshening

title: Doubletree Galleria Fort Lauderdale
review: Splendid hotel with the best location in Fort Lauderdale on the Intercoastal with water taxi service and easy walk to both the beach and Galleria mall. The staff and facilities are first class. Breakfast is superb.

title: Great gem,  great neighborhood
review: Love this place. Easy in easy out and wonderful team. They could not be more hospitable and authentic. I would not hesitate to return. Best Hilton on the beach by far. Go and see for yourself!!!!!! Thank you

title: Great hotel close to the beach
review: Its location is great... a nice 10min walk from the beach; a block away from Galeria Mall, restaurants and a supermarket, and with direct access to the water taxi from the back of the hotel.  The bed was very comfortable and the staff was excellent.

title: Parking
review: We booked 3 rooms at this hotel for 3 hours just because we had an early flight. There is no where to park a tour bus except on their property. Parking charge for 3 hrs $48 plus tax. NEVER AGAIN WILL WE BOOK THIS HOTEL. The rooms we so..so . I changed rooms 3 times because the humidity level in each room was so high it was like sleeping in a bath tub. The rooms ( all 3 ) smelled of mold, musky smell very unpleasant. I would never recommend this hotel to a friend.

title: Gallery One Double Tree Hotel
review: Dear Cantexan1,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about our hotel. We apologize that you were disappointed with the size of your room and for the odor you encountered, which we’re taking steps to make sure it won’t happen again.  We know that travel can be stressful, and we try hard to make sure all our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. We hope you’ll stay with us again in the future.

title: Weekend away
review: Would highly recommend this hotel if staying in Fort Lauderdale. I stayed at this Hilton local because I was tired of staying at the other locations closer to the cruise port. The over look of the hotel is usually tired and the staff is nothing to right home about. This location is safe, clean, quiet, food is hot and fresh. The staff is extremely helpful and really appreciate your business.

title: Nice, but not great!
review: Meeting family and we were so pleasantly surprised. Service was top notice and the rooms were lovely.  We had a beautiful suite that overlooked the intercostal with a balcony.  Definitely a place I would stay again.

title: Check Your Billing Statement Carefully
review: We attended a wedding there (on a yacht) docked right outside the hotel. Great! The hotel suite we stayed in (for 2 nights) was fine, but not an "ooh-aah" kind of place. Although it had a nice, separate kitchenette with all the amenities, separate bed and living rooms, with 2 large, digital TVs, a nice walk in shower, it seemed like it needed a little more attention to detail. For example, the suite door lock (card slot) didn't work right; the living room had wall switches that didn't do anything; there was a standing lamp in the far corner that had to be physically turned on/off; one lamp on the only end table wasn't even plugged in because the telephone plug was too big...so a lamp with no way to use; and the bottom of the glass walk-in shower was not connected to the bottom…

title: Perfect location. Oversized suites.
review: Even though we only usually travel as a couple, we enjoy all of the room we are afforded at Doubletree Suites ( GalleryOne). A large bathroom, small kitchen area and a very large living room/dining area gives more space to get out of each other's way!  The suite hotel is located on the intercoastal waterway so you can sit and watch yachts sail by your suite. There is also a water taxi stop located at the hotel. It is a short few block walk to the beach. Right next to the hotel is Galleria Mall featuring bars, restaurants, Macy's and other high end retailers. There is a Publix supermarket across the street too. We eat breakfast in our suite every morning.

title: Had an amazing time
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite and our location. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Do not eat the food at the bar
review: The suite was awesome, one bed room king suite water view with balcony, relaxed in the living room area which had a dinning room section and a kitchenette tremendously enjoyed the view, the quite and the hotel staff were amazing. clean room and sheets... Just over all amazing. The breakfast wasn't' free unless you had some stickers from the Hilton honors but I truly enjoyed the breakfast and the view during breakfast and again the wait staff was truly awesome

title: Visit to Fort Lauderdale
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our staff to be "amazing". We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Girls weekend away!
review: I'm not sure where I was most insulted, the fact that we left entirely almost all the food on the platters, or the fact that they did not ask us why we did so.  Like the plague they served, avoid the chefs artisan cheese platter, and the margarita flatbread.  Spent the night in my room with stomach pains, get still foolish enough to leave 20% tip for 2 drinks we had.  Not the bartenders fault.  But still they did not question why we did not eat that swill.  I'm not in a bad mood, nor do I dish out unnecessary insults. This place was just awful for the food. Great view.

title: Place needs help!
review: Elevators are busted up and dirty. Rooms are extremely noisy. Had to switch rooms because sliding balcony doors in other rooms did not slide. Doors were so loud sleep was impossible. Door to room broken. Shower door broker. Toilet broker. AC broken. Stains in hotel room. Stains throughout hotel on floors. Paint over wall outlets. They don't take care of this property.

title: location location location
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review.  Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. We will be undergoing some major updates in the near future which will alleviate most of the issues that you experienced. . We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Wonderful hotel close to everything and a great shuttle service to the cruise port
review: we love this hotel because of location, the Galleria is only one long block, and many restaurants, and the beach is over the bridge to the right of hotel, beach, more restaurants, the rooms are big, cookies on checkin are great and we are staying at GAllery one twice in 2017

title: An oasis
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our location. I am also happy to hear that you found your suite to be "big" and that you took advantage of the World Famous Cookie. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Another amazing Hilton experience!!
review: The hotel is walking distance to the mall, beach, supermarket. Shuttle service to the cruise port for $10 per person, great deal. Very friendly and helpful staffs, very clean rooms, the 2 bedrooms suites with it's own bathroom was fantastic. Warm cookies provided when checking in, ice lime water provided at the lobby. Water taxi stop at the back patio. The only negative thing I can say about the hotel is the weak in-room wireless Internet connection.

title: Doubletree Hilton Fort Lauderdale
review: Good standard,great waterviews,extra large bed.Very good service by staff,including check in.Only dissapointment was breakfast,choice and range was dissapointing.Hot breakfast was cold. Location was good,and ambience ofhotel was excellent,enjoyed our stay.

title: Great location, big rooms
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone on our staff treated you so well. However, I would like to apologize for your breakfast experience. I will look into this and share with my team. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Friendly Staff
review: When we couldn't find anything affordable on the beach, we booked this hotel for a 3 night stay.  It sits directly on the intercoastal waterway, and has a lovely patio right on the water that is wonderful for watching beautiful yachts float by.  We booked a 2 bedroom suite (2 queens, 1 king, sofa sleeper) that came with two full baths and a full kitchen.  The space is nice, but by no means ritzy if you're used to an upscale Hilton.  Also, a few more dishes and a bit more silverware would be in line for a room that sleeps this many.  We enjoyed the balcony, which was located off the double bed bedroom (not so great for parents who want to put kids to bed then sit outside), but could have used a clothesline for wet towels and bathing suits.    As to the hotel's location, it is a…

title: Another great stay.
review: Thank you so much for your 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our decor and balcony pleasing. I assure you that I will look into the "cons" of your stay and share them with my team. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Good hotel
review: This was my fourth stay . . . Great location, friendly staff. Rooms are very nice with fantastic views. Special thanks to Tony Powers! Tony went out of his way to accommodate me and help make my stay memorable. I will definitely be back. "Chubbs"

title: Location style and comfort
review: Picked this hotel for its location in terms of easy access to lots of local facilities.  The first room we were offered was great in side with a lovely balcony and view but closer to the bridge and hence prone to traffic noise.  My wife is an exceptionally light sleeper so we asked for another room.  The staff were great nothing was too much trouble and they put us into a quieter room with a great view across the intercostal and the ocean. (Thanks to Andrew and Eric who did a fantastic job).  The rooms are large with great big comfortable beds nice bathroom with walk in shower and very well fitted out kitchen.  All the amenities of home and we really enjoyed our stay.  Weather was usual Florida with rain in the afternoon but this did not deter the enjoyment what is not to like…

title: Weekend in Ft Lauderdale
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Nice and comfortable place to stay!
review: Great time at the GalleryOne in Ft Lauderdale, nice pool, close to mall & restaurants & Publix. Great family fun 5 minute walk to beach & boardwalk. Also more restaurants across from the beach & kids loved the park and iguanas

title: 5 Star Front Desk Service
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so pleased to hear that you had a "great time" during your weekend stay with us and that you and the kids got to meet one of our friendly Iguanas. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Top tier Hilton experience
review: I stay here for 5 nights. The hotel is nice and we got a room with kitchen and a wonderful view. The staff is really helpful and kind except for the guy in the bar, he was to busy to smile and talk to people. The have a pool, restaurant, a stop for the watertaxi. The beach is close and there are a big mall, restaurant and bars close.

title: Great hotel and location
review: I have been to many hotels.  And this is one of my favourite hotel to stay at! Has always been great and fantastic. Great location comfortable beds great TV Internet in the lobby great pool fantastic restaurant where I discovered Broccolini  great waterfront view from room 501 least but not last great staff.

title: We had a Blast  at the Double tree Galleria. The staff Amazing
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you consider our property to be one of your favorite hotels. I will share your kind words with our entire team and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Reunion
review: We love our stay Andrew who was Amazing.  . Christian (front desk ) , shes  just a beautiful person.  Steffan and Raylan Bartender were very professional and funny. I will surely  be back . You have a great staff. Ms Jackie in breakfast  is a jewel.  Enjoyed them all.   Ava Freeman

title: Back again
review: Wow; thank you so much for your kind words. I am so pleased to hear how well Andrew, Christian, Steffan, Ragland & Jackie took care of you. We are all about service and I will share your comments with the entire team. See you back again soon!

title: The Staff Makes Up for It!
review: The hotel was all I imagined except for the roaches and parking attendants. They offered to move me but I had already unpacked my family and didn't want to pack everything back up and move. For the parking to cost $30 a day, they did not handle the instructions laid out for my vehicle. Nice view, good location, great staff but I personally would not stay there again.

title: Gallory One OUTSTANDING STAY
review: I came to Ft. Lauderdale for my 1st girl trip ALONE!  I had no idea what was to come.  When I arrived, Jeff was so friendly and kind to me.  The service was amazing from the moment I walked in the front door.  Liliana the Concierge is an ANGEL...Aly at the Starbucks counter was so sweet and spoke so highly working for Hilton!  I thank you all for all of your great service and love!  I WILL BE BACK

title: Okay for a night or two pre cruise
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well, especially Jeff & Lilyana. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Don't stay
review: Stayed here before so booked agin for a cruise trip Location is great near beach and Galleria Mall Rooms big and spacious and everything you need  It had gone down slightly since last stay and heard a few complaints but overall it's okay and staff were great

title: Roaches
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am very pleased to hear that you found our suites be be "big" and our staff to be "great". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Wonderful stay at beautiful hotel!!
review: We stayed here for two nights prior to a cruise. I had read various reviews about the hotel some good some bad so was willing to give it a try. The first room we were put in was ok and I mean this loosely tired, old, carpet stained and overall just plain grubby on the second night the toilet wouldn't flush this was at 11 pm rang reception sent up maintenance he couldn't rectify they wanted us to stay in a room with no flushing toilet we asked to move. They moved us one floor up to a room that I only took notice of the following morning as we were exhausted when we moved and went straight to bed. Where do I start carpet was stained throughout bathroom door had black hand prints on it and worst of all there was hair of a personal nature in the shower.  Dishes in the press had to…

title: A bit worn out
review: A double queen suite has one bathroom, a room with two beds, small living room with a sofa and a dining table, a balcony, and a kitchen with a microwave oven, fridge, and a washing machine for the basic cutlery available.  The room is already a bit aged. It works, but don't expect any luxury.  Breakfast was nice and reasonably priced (for a hotel breakfast). Staff is very helpful. Overnight valet parking $30.  The hotel is located close to a shopping mall and a reasonable walking distance to some bars, 7/11, and restaurants.   If you need a room with two separate beds the options in the city seemed to be limited. For this purpose the hotel works ok. Otherwise unless the price is very good you could just as well look for some other places.

title: Holiday
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast and that our team treated you so well. However, I am sorry that you feel our property is a bit worn out. We are planning to complete some upgrades soon and we do hope that you come see us again.

title: Great stay
review: Stayed here for a week in a penthouse apartment really nice & clean. Good views from the 14th floor. The air con was not as cool as it should have been but ok. We had valet parking as well for the week our guy Tony Powers was brilliant& looked after us really well 😄

title: Great hotel!!!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Tony treated you so well. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Great Service
review: Great stay here for a few days before a cruise, had a great room with a balcony with great views, room was spotless and had everything you needed. Great location next to a supermarket a mall and restaurants.  Water taxi stop right at the back off the hotel. Wi fi was very temperamental so not very reliable. Loved our stay here and would love to return at some point. Beach a five minute walk away. Andrew and Geoffrey were great on reception.

title: Family 6 day vacation.
review: Nice stay! Loved happy hour from 3-7. Our suite was nice and comfortable. Hotel cleaning staff was very nice. Loved the free cookies! Galleria Mall is right next to the hotel. Publix and the beach are all in walking distance. No bug issues inside the hotel. I would definitely come back to this hotel.

title: Mgr Ryan & Staff Excell
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone on our staff treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: A great stay at Gallery one
review: The chexk in. Was smooth prompt & friendly. Mgr Ryan was on hand and insured every guest was treated like a star. The room overlooking the bay/ocean was amazing. The bed comfy, the eoom clean and fresh!

title: Brew and a view.
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Ryan treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Excellence, Great Service, Wonderful Property
review: My husband and I stayed for 6 nights while on holiday from UK. Check in was hassle free and we were given complimentary cookies!  We paid for a queen suite with water views, I was unhappy with our 'view' and asked for a different room, which they arranged without fuss, which was great.  Room was a good size with a fridge, coffee maker (a kettle would have been better but that's just my personal view!) hob & microwave. No oven which we realised after buying a pizza from supermarket. (Opted for Dominos delivery instead!).  Pool area which OK, nothing fancy but adequate for a dip and towels were provided.  Restaurant nice and staff friendly - the burger was tasty & reasonable at $14 as it came with fries.  There is a water taxi stop at the hotel which was an added bonus.   A late…

title: Wonderful hotel
review: My wife and I stayed there for 3 nights. The staff led by Ryan was professional and went out of their way to help us with our needs. Ryan bent over backwards to help us and we would give this hotel 10 stars. The room was clean and everything was in working order.Thanks again to the staff.

title: Need to win me over
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Ryan and the rest of our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Great vacation but not so great hotel.
review: The room was HORRIABLE! I was put by the elevator, which sounded like LOUD THUNDER all night. In addition, every time the AC unit turned on it sounded like someone was kicking my door open. Did not sleep at all during my stay.

title: Wonderful stay, great staff
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Good Value and Service
review: I have stayed at this hotel before and enjoyed the stay but not so much this time. The room was not what the reservation listed it as. Street side instead of water view. Paid for an upgraded room with a "bar". The additional cost "bar" is a breakfast nook... not kidding. The interenet NEVER worked (not even in the business center) which caused work and school issues. Kitchen lacked the basics such as knives, sponge, dish towel, etc...

title: Great customer service!!
review: I was here for friends wedding and was mistakenly removed from their list of reserved rooms. But the staff helped out tremendously and found me a very reasonably priced sweet with an amazing view. Thanks guys I appreciate the effort and service!

title: They never miss a beat....
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am happy to hear that we were able to get you into the suite you wanted and I appreciate the kind words. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great visit! If only they'd update their rooms...
review: While I don't get back as often as i would like it is always one of my favorite business hotels to stay at.....Typically working from the room is not a favorite of mine so I usually find a quiet corner of the foyer/lobby and plug in the laptop there....the service form the crew is always spot on and the view from the lobby provide a scenic view while catching up on emails and cond calls.  As always the service was excellent from Brian, Big E, Little E and Ernesto in valet to Jason and Andrew at the front desk (thanks Jason for the room I requested) and congrats to Amy on the promotion...breakfast with Allison in the restaurant is always filled with laughs and she is right with a diet coke as soon as she sees me coming.

title: Awesome stay
review: We are all so happy to hear that you consider us to be one of your favorite business hotels and that our team treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Lovely hotel
review: The reviews for this hotel are so mixed, and after my family and I stayed here on a Sat. night, I think I know why. There are many great things about this hotel. The staff is super friendly, the outside deck with full bar and a pool right out on the Intercoastal is very welcoming, and the location between the upscale Galleria mall and the beach is ideal. The downsides are that the rooms are in bad need of some TLC and the hallways are dark and not very well maintained. The carpet in the common area of our 1bd suite was badly worn, the furniture and kitchen cabinets nicked and scratched, and the glass sliding doors to the decks were beat and made a terrible noise every time they were opened or closed. B/C of the shoddy patio doors, you can hear a sound that sounds like rolling…

title: Beautiful hotel and great staff
review: The hotel stay was great, we booked the room for the night after my wedding and the staff was great in helping with the "turn down service" that's what I thought she said. The toom was nice and big and it was super clean and the shower was absolutely awesome

title: Clean Room, Reasonable Rates, and Nice Staff.
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Perfect view, clean rooms and excellent customer service
review: Stay here for weekend, the room was clean and spacious. The staff made accomendations for any request. The hotel is located in great spot in Ft. Lauderdale with a mall and Publix across the street, it is about 40 mins away from Miami. Would definitely stay here again and recommend anybody staying in the Ft. Lauderdale area to stay here. The only con here is the parking which is $30 per day with valet.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased that you found your suite to be "clean and spacious" and that the staff treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Save Yourself A Huge Headache
review: This is the one of the best hotel in Fort Lauderdale. If you are looking for a family getaway in a peaceful place, this is the right place to be. All staff members are super friendly and helpful. They go beyond to help you and make you feel special. Monique is my receptionist most of the time and I have to stay that I love her. Always do her best to give me th most convenient room. The pool is not that big but its still great. Im very picky when it comes to cleaness because I have a baby, and I have to admit that I never have a complaint. My precious place to stay at Ft lauderdale beach

title: Amazing Hotel!!!
review: From check in to check out we had a great experience!!! We were traveling as a family of four and was upgraded to a two bedroom suite! The rooms are very spacious and clean! We had a water view from every room! The ocean is a short 5 minute walk from hotel. The pool/hot tub area was great as well! We will definitely be back when visiting Ft Lauderdale again!

title: Mixed and Interesting
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Stayed after having cosmetic surgery
review: Hotel is in a great location but property is dated and showing it - staff service is excellent and the best part about the stay!  The rooms rarely are insulated from the noise of vehicles crossing the intracoastal bridge adjacent to the property.  The upside of the location is you can walk to the beach and to ample shopping of all kinds.

title: Hotel with a view plus poke stop!
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so pleased to hear that you found our location to be convenient and our staff to be "excellent". I am sorry that you heard noise from the bridge. We don't hear this too much but I am sure some guests may hear it. Thanks again and we hope to see you soon!

title: Awesome Stay
review: I will recommend this hotel to everyone. I stayed her after having cosmetic surgery and they were so helpful. They supplied a wheelchair upon my arrival and texted me to see if I needed anything once I was in my room. They sent me extra pillows and blankets immediately. I highly recommend this hotel. They made my recovery more pleasurable

title: holiday
review: we had a fabulous time - would recommend it to anyone. Value for money in the summer months and has a lovely atmosphere. This is all I need to say at the moment the weather was lovely and we enjoyed ourselves very much as we expected to do as we had stayed there before

title: WOW
review: We are Floridians that love to have mini vacations in Fort Lauderdale.  Our stay at Gallery One Doubletree was amazing.  From the beginning Andrew exceeded our expectations through text messages BEFORE we arrive.  He continued to wow us through out our stay...thank you  I also give 5 stars to Melissa, John, Marie and Aly...and all that went out of their way to make us feel like we were so very special

title: Outdated...
review: Awesome! So glad that you enjoyed your "mini-vacation" and that Melissa, John, Marie and Aly took such good care of you. I will share with my entire team and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Nice hotel
review: We lived at the 14:th floor room 1409 in a big suite with the balcony against the pool/watercanal. The suite was big with a separate bedroom and ok if you consider that it is built 1986...It also have a good location with the galleria 500 m away and Starbucks and several other restaurants and shops around you... 2 things were not so good and the first was the AC was difficult to get right either it was way to cold or way to warm depending on were you was in the suite, bedroom or livingroom and it also smelled very bad from the drain in the kitchen...I know that we should have pointed that out but you all now how it is, you dont always wont to take a fight when you just arrived after a long flight...For the price i got it for, 100 dollar a night it was good value for the money…

title: Top notch service
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so pleased that you found our suites to be big and that you enjoyed your views from the balcony. However, I am sorry that you did not enjoy the decor. Yes, the hotel was built in 1986 like most hotels in our area, but was updated just a few years ago so I am confused as to what you found to be "outdated". However, I do understand every guests perspective is different and I am sorry it was not what you expected. We do hope to see you again!

title: Great for Business or a weekend get away
review: The Gallery one by Double Tree is one of my favorite hotels to travel for Business or Pleasure.  The suites are roomy and have great amenities for any kind of traveler. You can not beat the location in Fort Lauderdale!  Easy access to shopping or the beach.  Also you are only an hour from South Florida and all it has to offer.  The hotel has a friendly staff that will do whatever it takes to make you happy.

title: Couple stay
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am more than pleased to hear that we are one of your favorite hotels and that our team treats you so well. We look forward to seeing you once again soon!

title: Sunshine and Relaxation 2016
review: It was a great stay until the roach was crawling on my bed covers!  My view was great.  The staff was friendly and very helpful.  If it was not for the roach I would give this a 4 rating With the exception of the roach the room was great.

title: Pre cruise hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. Although I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our spectacular views and that the staff treated you so well, I do apologize that you found an insect in your room. I can assure you that all rooms are serviced on a monthly basis and we hate hearing that this occurred. Unfortunately, just like every hotel in Florida, there may be an insect that shows up and I am so sorry you found this. I will share immediately with our pest control company and we do hope to see you again!

title: Outstanding location and service
review: We arrived and I had the Blessing and Pleasure to be taken care of by Andrew!!!! Andrew was efficient, excellent,and quick!!!! We had a ocean view 728 rm# I have never been checked in this fast before and I loved it 😀 the room was a corner suite , kitchenette and great view plus looking on to the bridge and the boats . The room was clean and very comfortable the air conditioning wasn't cooling good . The staff apologized and resolved the issue, we changed rooms and the hotel gave us a breakfast buffet dining. The overall stay was Excellent and we will return!!!! Andrew had Superior Customer Service, Sharee in Starbucks(which I love the Coffee!!! Plus)Great Customer Service as well Kyle is a Bartender in the hotel is The Man !!!! Makes Awesome Drinks🍸🍸🍸 This hotel has…

title: Ft. Lauderdale at its finest! This is a don't miss opportunity!!!
review: This is the best-kept secret, but soon others will know!!! We had 10 rooms.   As a minister, I visited this hotel to officiate a wedding. The bride and groom selected this hotel, and to my surprise, this hotel is absolutely AMAZING. Very modern and stylish.  From the time we arrived, it felt like a five-star experience. The hotel is sparkling clean, bright, and airy. The front desk leader, (Melissa), was an unbelievable representative and while we had a hiccup at check-in and had a bit of an unexpected wait, she immediately brought in team members to help start our stay off right. The manager, "Claudio A.", called in "Lincoln M", the Food and Beverage (F & B) Manager to make us comfortable. The hospitality shown was simply surprising, never had I had that type of interaction.…

title: Excellent stay, great location
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be "amazing" when the wedding group stayed here. I am also happy to hear that you felt you were "pampered" and that the staff treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again real soon!

title: One Night Stay Before A Cruise
review: It has been many years since I've stayed in a DoubleTree hotel and I'd forgotten how nice it can be when you are staying for a longer trip. The rooms were clean and well kept and service very friendly. And it is a much better value than some of the other places charging similar rates in the area.

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you so much for coming back! I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our rooms to be clean and our service to be very friendly. We look forward to hosting you once again very soon!

title: Vacation
review: Our gang of 12 had 4 rooms.  The hotel lobby was nice and if you walked to the back you were right on a patio overlooking the water.  Our rooms were clean and of a decent size.  For our beach trekkers it was close enough to walk to.  For the more senior folks it was a very interesting run to get across  East Sunrise Blvd.  The art work was interesting to look at, but way beyond my meager art budget.  Had a pricey breakfast on Sunday, but the other restaurants outside of the hotel did not seem to be open.  Dinner at the hotel was convenient and burgers quelled the hunger pangs.  As a bonus we had a chance to watch a wedding on a large boat tied up outside of the hotel.  Unfortunately the weather did not hold out.  I hope it is true that lucky is the bride getting married in the…

title: Excellent
review: The arrival, stay and departure was very pleasant.The staff here was great!  Ryan (Manager), Shareese, Gosney, Marie and Aly made the stay better than expected. They went above and beyond to accommodate us. We also loved the accessibility to the Water Taxi service. what a nice stay and trip!

title: Bday Celebration
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Ryan, Gosney, Marie and Aly treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Forgotten items
review: The hotel is located in a great area... Not too far from the beach and excellent restaurant. The rooms are spacious, comfortable beds, nice view of the water and boat. I would recommend this hotel....

title: A quiet property with good access to shopping & beach
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful . I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay during your birthday & we hope to see you again soon!

title: Get away for a short vacay
review: Stayed for 7 nights with my family, unfortunately our stay ended on a sour note when on realizing we left two items in our room , the manager of housekeeping never returned our calls and eventually  e-mailed to say nothing was found. The person who cleaned the room should be held accountable, this is not a motel. The front desk staff were pleasant and eager to assist Anisa, Jeffrey and Jason really tried to help but nothing came out of it. We were very pleased with everything, however disappointed in how things ended.

title: GALLERYone - A DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Fort Lauderdale, FL
review: What an awesome place to stay, had to come on business but will definitely stay here when I come back to Fort Lauderdale. With only a short walk to the beach you can see million dollar yachts (NICE!!!) and a handy 7-11 convenient store for your last minute items.

title: A little tired, but still a good location
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the spectacular yachts and boats that pass by our hotel. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Stopped by to check the place out.
review: This Hilton is in need of a facelift. Nevertheless, it does offer nice suites, a good location near the beach, and friendly staff.  My biggest disappointment was extremely overpriced parking. $30/night is outrageous. No breaks for Hilton Gold members!

title: Very nice hotel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone on our staff treated you so well. I do apologize if you feel our valet parking is overpriced. The Ft. Lauderdale market charges anywhere between $30.00 - $40.00 per night and we consider ourselves to be very competitive. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Room
review: I live nearby and wanted to see the place and was greeted by a lovely bubbly lady named Aly. She was amazing and showed me around and treated me like a staying guest. Was very surprised to see how wonderful the place was inside and her personality really made me feel welcome.I don't need a room because i live here but will definitely recommend to my friends and family. I definitely will be back however to enjoy the restaurant and views of the intercostal especially with Aly there. Thanks for the great experience .

title: Very accomodating!
review: The staff was very accommodating to my parents on their 50th wedding anniversary. Customer service member Kareen went above and beyond to give them customized service. I couldn't be more thankful for their generosity.

title: Event had to be cancelled
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Just Awesome
review: I chose this hotel to throw my special event and it was pure hell. They charged my card twice without my permission which caused such an inconvenience for me . The sales/accounting department seems to be clueless and lack communication. I've never experienced such horrible service until dealing with this hotel. Now I have to cancel my event .... And I have to wait to get my money back which takes a few days . My weekend is ruined .Good Job Gallery One/double tree . Good Job !   Here's an advice : Just because you have a customer's card on file doesn't mean you can keep charging it without speaking to the customer first .   👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾

title: Great Hotel for Families
review: Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. I understand that the deposit that we posted on your account was inadvertently posted twice to to a malfunction. When we did realize this, we did reverse it. However, it does take a few days to show on your account. Once again, our apologies for this and we do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: My room needs cleaning
review: The staff was great and helpful. Aly in the hotel resturant was more then willing to help make my stay with my children a pleasant one. The valet where easygoing and always got my car to me on time.  Awesome stay alround.

title: Gallery One Hilton
review: Enjoyed the hotel and the staff. They were very pleasant and made our stay very pleasurable.  Would recommend to friends. Close to the beach and facilities met our needs. Enjoyed having the microwave, stove, refrigerator and dishes ij the kitchen. Made bringing leftovers very easy when we did not feel like going out the next day. Excellent value for cost.

title: My anniversary
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone on our staff treated you so well. I a, also happy to hear that you enjoyed the kitchen in your suite. It is definitely a wonderful plus! Hope to see you back again soon!

title: Wonderful hotel with great staff and great views!
review: Love this hotel. Excellent service. Staff very polite. Clean rooms and areas beautiful. Great location. You can walk to the beach restaurants and a beautiful mall. Also the have the water taxi stop right there what a plus! Loved the jacuzzi and the views are breathtaking. The only thing i really  hate the valet parking price 30$ plus tax .

title: great management
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you chose to stay with us on your special day and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: turned away at midnight
review: My boyfriend loved the bed it was super comfortable. Our view from our room gave us access to see the waterway, yachts, and the ocean. The hotel staff was extremely nice (especially Melissa) and welcoming. Upon arrival, they give you chocolate Walnut cookies. My boyfriend got addicted so everyday we left the hotel, he would stop at the front desk for more. They never told him "no" which surprised me because so many places will say it's only for guests at check-in. The valet was a little high at $30 a night but I never had an issue getting my vehicle when I wanted it. I had a problem where valet left my window cracked and it rained overnight. My seat and armrest on the door were soaked. I let the management (Ryan) know and they comped the valet charge for my entire stay.I also…

title: Vacation
review: Enjoyed our room very much.  Had an excellent view of the river and loved sitting out on the balcony drinking my coffee.  Only suggestion I have is checkout time.  I think if we can't check in until 3 or later, our checkout time should be later.  Other than that loved our stay😊

title: Not great, not bad
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our spectacular views and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Expensive and only valet parking
review: We rented a room in this hotel for the weekend. The room was really nice and comfortable. The service was not very friendly. They charged us $30 for parking and we had two cars, so $60 just for parking. They mentioned that because we booked with Expedia, we could not get at least one taken out. We use Expedia a lot, so I will not be returning to them. Also the pool was really small. The one super nice person was the barista at the Starbucks in the lobby. She was very helpful and engaging. They should have more people like her. The other curious thing was the room was not ready and when I asked if they had a secure room for our bags, they say to leave them outside with the valet. Really? Who does that? Eventually they did find space in a locked closet. There are many other…

title: Not a good business trip hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am pleased to hear that you found your suite to be "really nice and comfortable". However, I do apologize that you were not aware about the parking fee. All hotels in our area charge $30-$40 per day. I just reviewed our listing on Expedia and it does state there is a charge for parking. Our website is a bit more clear about it. I would highly suggest that you book through Hilton.com to receive the best rates and service. Plus, you are unable to receive any Hilton benefits (such as Hilton Honor points) if you go through a third-party channel. Thanks again and we do hope you give us another chance!

title: dirty, dirty, dirty!
review: I do not recommend this hotel it cost 30$ a day to park your hotel and you feel obligated to tip the valets every time you retrieve your car. The charge was not disclosed when I reserved the room it was an very unpleasant and expensive surprise when we arrived.

title: Don't stay in a room directly facing Sunrise Blvd.
review: We received an email to upgrade for $16 to a room with a bar, it was a ledge in the kitchen area. Our room also ended up being on Sunrise Blvd, DO NOT LET THEM PUT YOU IN THESE ROOMS (ours was 1234). I had to get earplugs and medicine to sleep. Positive was room size for the 2 bedrooms was great for large families or groups. Love the water taxi that comes up to the back of the hotel and the iguanas that roam the dock area. Staff was inconsistent from shift to shift but some were great. I hate the only option for parking was valet at what I was originally told was $30 a night but at $18 we were charged that was palatable. Valet guys were fast and knowledgeable. Great restaurants within walking distance and old school mall next door with a Dillard's, Macy's, and Niemans. I sure…

title: Excellent stay!!
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Came recommended & wasnt disappointed !!
review: Our experience was great, the staff was extremely accommodating to our needs. The only issue I could point to was paying $30 a day for valet. The proximity to the beach and restaurants are so convenient

title: disappointing
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Crap
review: As a family of four with 2 teenagers this was the ideal accommodation for us.  We booked a suite for two nights and there was plenty of living space and the two bedrooms within it were fantastic. One huge bed for hubby and I in our room and the kids had a double bed each in their shared room. Both bedrooms had bathrooms en suite too. We were on the sixth floor and it was very quiet throughout our stay. Our room looked out over the harbour and the balcony was an added bonus with lovely views.  The staff were very attentive on arrival, complimentary cookies were yummy and very unexpected. However our one criticism was that the valet parking was a bit confusing. We knew we had to pay 30 dollars for our parking before we arrived but didn't read anywhere that the only type of parking…

title: Great experience!
review: Beautiful property and very clean and well-decored room. Extremely easy access to a very nice Ft. Lauderdale beach and great mall and grocery store within a very close walk from hotel. Kitchen and bathroom were very nice as well!

title: Great location though a little worn
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our property to be "very clean and well-decored". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great stay
review: The pros: Great location, close walk to mall, grocery store and restaurants. The water taxi has a pick up at the back of the hotel. It also a doable walk to the beach (1 km?) Lovely view of the waterway and bridge which opens for larger vessels. Has convenient kitchenette.  The cons: Dirty stained carpeting in the halls. Dirty dishes from room service sat outside the room next door for > 24hours.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Thank you so much for your 4-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our location and you took advantage of the water taxi. I am also happy to hear that you found our in-suite kitchen to be useful and you enjoyed our spectacular view of the Intracoastal waterway. However, i do apologize for the dishes and I will discuss this with the F&B team so it does not occur again. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Very good hotel
review: Good Location close to shops (public, cvs and Mall) 5 minute walk and hotel is a water taxi stop. Very comfortable bed and clean well equipt room, we had kitchenette and seating with TV in one room and separate beddroom. Helpful staff. Enjoyed the stay very much.

title: Another dated Hilton property on FT Lauderdale Beach
review: The problem with summer in south Florida is the awful weather, the humidity and buckets of rain. Leisure business drops off tremendously so in order to drive business the hotels look for "group business". Ugh, just awful low end travelers like school trips, youth sports traveling teams and gawd awful bad family reunions. Buyer beware...... I beg for a room at the end of the hall and hope that the noise level won't be bad. Having said all that, it is of course  what happened this weekend too!  One elevator STILL broken long waits, kids pushing all the buttons. Jammed valet at the motor entrance. Just low end all around. The hotel is showing signs of wear and tear, the pool experience could be way better.   On the upside The staff is friendly here and the location is great. The…

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient and that our staff was friendly. However, I am sorry that you were bothered by some of our other guests. Like all hotels, we do host family reunions, sporting teams, etc year round. Not really sure what you meant by the "low end amateur travelers" as all of our guests are valued to us. Thank you once again and we do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Amazing Paradise!!!!!!!!
review: Great experience. Staff was very friendly and accomodating. Rooms were clean and very comfortable. I had a suite overlooking the water and it was awesome. The bartender was very nice and always aimed to please. He even got me an extra cookie :) The views were amazing too. I would most definitely return .

title: This place has improved a little - Hotel needs a facelift
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Thanks!!
review: I love love this property...From the front desk to the room and our STAY...the staff was very helpful and we had a slight issue...and they assisted us so graciously....It was my anniversary....The room was beautiful...and the view was magnificent...I literally stayed on my balcony a lot...especially to see the bridge life up for the for boats passing through...The water taxi was a bonus...PLEASE get groupon to get those deals..Me and my husband stayed 5 nights....so we saw a lot...If ever I am in Ft Lauderdale..this will be my spot...If I had the time to right a 5 page essay on how awesome this hotel is...I WOULD...Please...I am a huge fan of looking at reviews and taking chances inspite of negative feed back.... PLEASE DONT LISTEN TO THOSE REVIEWS and visit this hotel....Its…

title: Good stay, but...
review: Elevator went down entire stay. Large reunion groups, no elevator services and stairs...bad mix. Overall, beautiful property and convenient location. Very friendly staff and customer service in all areas.

title: Family Reunion
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. I am so pleased to hear that you found our property to be "beautiful" with a "very friendly staff". However,  I do apologize for the elevators being out of service. We did have 2 out of our 3 elevators down for a few hours and they had to locate some parts. This is something that we hate to see happen, especially during such a busy weekend. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future!

title: Double tree
review: This facility can not handle 2 family reunions at the same time. A lot of our rooms were given to the other party. I did not receive what Hilton reward members usually receives. I had to ask for it. As well as the room door getting stuck on several occasions.  I would like to add the person working at the coffee stand made our smoothies licked her fingers as she wiped off the access of smoothie prior to pouring our drinks. It took more than twenty minutes for me to get my order.  This location does not represent the Hilton's that I know and love. Probably, well let me say I will not stay at this location again.

title: I love the room, the location, the service, the price !
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Hilton double tree
review: This stay was good but most hotels for the price do offer a continental breakfast I felt the food prices are very expensive.  the hotel was very clean and the staff is extremely nice but as I stated the prices for the food were expensive and I feel for the price it should have been a continental breakfast

title: Not satisfied
review: I had roach in the shower !!I had to wait very long to check in since only one employee was there. Manager is not helpful at all!! I don't recommend it at all! The area is nice tho but it's much over rated, highly priced for the service offered.

title: Love their free cookies
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Great Hotel Near the Beach
review: The place was clean and well maintained. This is very close to sawgrass mills mall. They have a few shuttle as well. The staff was very friendly. The rooms were pretty decent. Enjoyed my stay here with the family.

title: Old hotel, great location
review: We had a great stay at the GALLERYone. When we arrived we requested a change in room and Andrew (front desk) was very accommodating. Andrew escorted us to our new room to ensure that we were satisfied. This a great hotel with friendly staff, CLEAN, and walking distance to the beach. Access to the internet seems to be better in the lobby area.

title: Great stay in Fort Lauderdale
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to her that your room change went well and that Andrew took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice, but crappie
review: This is a nice location, but the price is not. They never tell you that you have to pay for valet service, it's not optional. Also I asked for towels after we came from the beach so we can take showers and it took over an hour to get them. I called 2 or 3 times hearing the same answer that they were coming and they didn't I had to go to the front desk to just find out what was going on. The kitchen area had dirty everything from silverware to cups and all the plates. Everything was over priced. You'd be better staying at a regular hotel because this place is not worth it. $16 for breakfast are you serious?! That's a person. Not worth it. I would never stay at this hotel again and I would not recommend it either. Not happy 😠

title: Great quality - as you would expect
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am so sorry that you were not aware of the valet parking fee. This is communicated on all websites as well as your confirmation and we are a bit less expensive than other hotels in our market. I would also like to apologize for the cleanliness issues. There is no excuse for this and I will make sure I share with my entire team. I see that you were not happy with the price of our breakfast which you paid $16.00 for. Our food prices are very competitive as most hotels in the Ft Lauderdale market can be more than double that. However, we love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes.

title: July 4th Stay
review: lovely hotel in a great location - all the facilities you would expect, valet parking, spotlessly clean, good size quality rooms ( my kids loved the complimentray chocolate coookies in the room) - great swimming pool and bar on site.

title: The best place in Fortlauderdale
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that you took advantage of our wonderful pool and outdoor bar. We hope to see you again soon!

title: World  Class Service
review: The hotel staff were very good. The room was nice and clean. The Air Conditioner did not work well, but we did not report it. The Internet was TERRIBLE, but we didn't report that either. The maid and maid service was EXCELLENT!! The Valet in my opinion is over priced at $30 per day.. Overall we like this hotel and they did accommodate our request when we asked.

title: great hotel near the beach
review: booked through priceline.  great value and nice lobby.  Rooms are all suites and fully stocked with dishes.  Small fitness centre and nice heated pool.  Lobby bar AND pool bar staffed by nice bartenders.  Check in staff was extremely nice.  CAUTION - parking is valet only and $30/per night.  Ask yourself if you really need a car!

title: Relaxing Getaway
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone on our staff treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: My July Visit to Fort Lauderdale
review: Checked into this hotel for a relaxing one night get away from our busy day to day life.  Check in and out was smooth, fast and friendly.  Room was very clean, spacious (including a fully stocked kitchen), modern and had great panoramic views.  Room was quiet that you did not hear neighbors.  Pool area was nice and clean.  Breakfast was decent, waitress Lizzett was the best.  Thank you DoubleTree for making our stay relaxing and enjoyable!

title: Spacious 2 room suites great for families!
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. Thank you also for your kind words about Lizzette. I will make sure I share with the entire team....We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Well located, spacious suite, outstanding staff
review: I am a repeat visitor to Fort Lauderdale and always stay at the Gallery One by Doubletree.  The rooms are very clean, and always ready upon arrival.  There is an amazing pool bar with a great view of the Intracoastal as well as a restaurant and lounge with excellent food.  The location of the hotel is right where you want to be when visiting Fort Lauderdale.  I highly recommend the suites with bedrooms and living rooms with full kitchens.

title: Excellent customer service and great rooms
review: This is an excellent hotel with very welcoming and friendly front desk staff, Amoy you are the best. Amoy’s customer service is unmatched and will exceed your expectation in every way. The Hotel provides a great variety of food and beverages in abundance. My wife and I stayed in suite 1218 which has a spectacular view of the water. The suite was very spacious, clean, quiet and comfortable with modern facilities including the kitchenette; you just don’t want to leave. This hotel is literally next door to the Galleria Mall; as such our shopping was hassle free. The last time we stayed here was June 4, 2016 and we are anxious to return and enjoy all the amenities.

title: Good location
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. Thank you also for your kind words about Amoy. She is definitely one of our "best of the best". We do hope to see you again soon!

title: First family vacation as a single dad
review: The location is what appealed to me. Near the Galleria, walking distance to beach and ferry stops at the door.  However, not supplying drinking water was a bit rich!  The room and sitting room was very comfortable and spacious.

title: Poor management
review: Thank you so much for your 4-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our location. However, I am a bit confused about the drinking water comment. All of the water in the hotel is safe to drink and we have several outlets that do supply bottled water. If you would be kind enough to send me a private message that goes into more detail, I would be more than happy to look into it. Thanks again and we do hope to see you back again soon!

title: If you need just a place to stay the night, it will work
review: I brought my three daughters and my mom to Fort Lauderdale for our first family vacation together in over five years. The first night we got here we stayed in a resort at Lauderdale by the Sea. Which we didn't like at all. So I got on Expedia and discovered this place. And we all loved it. It was perfect. We had five people and it came with two queen size beds and a pull out sofa. And a kitchen. And our balcony had an ocean view. Plus I got it at a great rate per night since it was the last one available. And we ended up in what's called the Private Residences at Gallery one. Which was even better as far as perks. So I'm giving it 5 stars and we will be back!!

title: Great hotel for mature 20 somethings!
review: My boyfriend and I (both 23) wanted a relaxing beach vacation, but still close to some nightlife/shops/restaurants and this hotel was great! I would say for any 20 somethings wanting a party atmosphere to head to Miami, but otherwise was a family friendly hotel and attracted different nationalities. We flew, so we did not have to deal with the valet parking.  Amenities: The hotel lobby had beautiful local paintings and sculptures, which we enjoyed walking around and seeing.
