There is an outdoor bar which was great during happy hour and you could lounge by the pool with your drinks. We were there from Thursday to Monday, and only once had a hard time finding some chairs during a prime time moment. Otherwise didn't feel overcrowded or flooded with kids, as I have witnessed on some…

title: Everyone was so helpful
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you feel our property was a good fit for all of your needs. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice hotel, great pool area
review: I began my stay with my two Sundays it was their birthdays plus Father's Day and it was a getaway for me and my two sons we had a great time stay at your hotel and every time I come back to Florida I will not staying anywhere else everyone was nice park my boat and back every day was great food was great drinks was great

title: A So So Hotel In Need of a Facelift.
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you chose to stay with us on your special days and that you enjoyed it. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Recent experience at the Doubletree by Galleria
review: Nice hotel, good breakfast, great roomservice, and great service from the staff. It was so easy with a watertaxi stop at the hotel, we would stay here again. Crappy wifi though.. The outdorr area by the pool was excellent.

title: The decline of the Hilton brand continues.....
review: I have been either a Diamond or Gold member of Hilton Honors for more than 15 years now and this bad experience has become much more common. I hope Hilton does something to help their reputation soon.  The good: The staff at the Gallery One Doubletree are exceptional. They are friendly, helpful, and genuinely concerned that you are enjoying your stay. The common areas are modern and well kept, and the bar and food is good and staffed with great people.  The bad: The rooms are tired and dirty. Housekeeping here is in need of attention as well as maintenance. My room wasn't clean and in this kind of situation, I refuse to use the glasses provided (with the paper cover on top) because I'm pretty certain the housekeepers didn't replace them and simply rinsed them out with warm…

title: Night before cruise stay
review: Dear anisqoyo,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you felt it would be unsafe to drink out of the glasses provided. As well, I regret that the fire alarm’s light and your air conditioning unit were a nuisance. Finally, we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope that next time you’re in the area you’ll stay with us again.

title: Excellent Value
review: We stayed at Doubletree Gallery One Ft Lauderdale for one night, before a cruise.  Rooms are great- mini suites that include a kitchen which would be great for families.  The outside area is great, we sat in the evening & watched the boats go by. There's a great water taxi that we hope to ride on our next visit.  Hotel is close to nice restaurants & Plubix to pick up last minute items.  The best part of our stay was Alli in the restaurant! We had breakfast & she was a ray of sunshine! Doubletree is know for their delicious cookies, when we checked in the lady who checked us in said they were out of cookies. My husband was so disappointed! We mentioned this to Alli & before we left breakfast she had cookies for us!  Great hotel, we'll be back!

title: Super friendly staff, amazing hotel & location!
review: The service at the front desk upon my arrival was outstanding. The upgrade to an intercoastal-view room was highly appreciated. Less than half a mile off the beach and with a great view of the Atlantic, the price was right and the accommodations well suited for my stay while attending three days of meetings nearby.   The hotel is not new and there were just a few things that distinguished GalleryOne as slightly less than top tier, but these would quickly fade if I were a parent trying to take my family on a beach vacation on a budget, or a college kid looking for a great Spring Break value.

title: Family Vacation
review: Loved my stay here. The moment we turned up we were given a free upgraded room, fresh warm cookies as part of a welcome bag and from that point on I knew this was one of the nicest hotels I've stayed in. The pool is in an awesome location close to the waterfront and you can watch all of the fancy boats pass by. I would highly recommend anyone planning on staying in the area to check out this hotel for a super nice experience. If I remember correctly it was Jeremy at the reception desk who upgraded our rooms without us even wanting one. Who doesn't love a freebie!

title: Incompetent staff
review: It has been like pulling teeth to get the billing done correctly for this stay. 3 different people in 3 different rooms should not be that difficult to Bill properly. The restaurant staff did not know how to properly credit honors members for a free breakfast. All in all this stay has been terrible.

title: Great View
review: Dear dalem383,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay and will reach out shortly to further assist. We hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Great location to beach
review: This hotel is extremely worn - nice staff, rooms are usually clean.   Only get a room with a balcony and view of the intercostal waterway (not next to bridge).   Parking prices are outrageous even for the area. The hotel has such potential, and at one time was one of my favorite hotel in the area - now it is showing its age and lack of maintenance - but the view is outstanding in the right room.

title: Doubtful value of the Hilton Name
review: Stayed here for 4 nights and while it is a great hotel in a great location to the beach and the galleria mall, there are some things that could be worked on.  First of all: be warned that if you have a car, you will have to pay $30 a night for parking.  We decided to forego a car and used Uber the whole time we were there which was great because we never had to wait for someone to come and the Uber Drivers seemed to know the area better than the hotel.  Second, I would not ask the hotel for recommendations on where to go to eat and shop. We made that mistake and the girl at the front counter told us to go in a section that turned out did not have much.  If you are looking for some good bars and restaurants, then I suggest going to Lauderdale by the Sea which was very nice or…

title: Leapin' Lizzards
review: I am Hilton Diamond Member. During check in I get no rewards and card is not recognised because I did book room through travel agent. Why does this matter? It is still my choice to go to Hilton, so much for loyalty !!! I decided not to bother and went up to room. I have already experienced poor room during my trip but did not expect that from Hilton. The room, they call it a suite, was in poor condition. Stains in sofa chairs and very damaged furniture. In main entrance the roof is leaking during rain. By the way my partner paid 199 Usd for 2 nights, me 329 euro. Nobody could explain me that with good arguments. The fact that I have to discuss this after so much loyalty......bye bye Hilton!!!

title: Location - Location - Location
review: The location is great - half mile to the beach, right across the street from the state park, there is a Publix grocery store down the street if you are staying for a long period, water taxi pick-up on-site, restaurants close by, right next to the mall, right on the intercostal waterway.  Drawback is the main drag that runs to the beach and creates a lot of road noise, specifically going over the bridge.  Take the complimentary breakfast but don't pay for the buffet, you are better off walking to one of the restaurants nearby.  The pool is small but you have the beach and we did not use the pool in the week that we were there.

title: Vacation Saved by Gallery One!
review: We started out about 8 hours at Ocean Point Suites at Key Largo and faced the worst nightmare - poor service, filthy unlivable conditions and much more that I won't go into. We moved up to Gallery One in Ft. Lauderdale and instantly felt the change!  The service was wonderful, it was clean and up to date.  Our room was perfect when we entered!  Kids ran to their room squealing with joy.  They even checked on us twice a week via text messaging to make sure our needs were met.  Very close to a public beach and wonderful places to enjoy dinner.  The housekeeping staff were so personable and kind. We will return!!!

title: Family Vacation
review: Thanks so much for your kind words. i am so pleased that we saved your vacation and that you enjoyed your stay. Hope to see you again soon!

title: Beautiful views, great staff
review: We travel once a year with a group of 15-20 family members. We stayed over night at the GALLERYone, a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton in Ft Lauderdale awaiting our cruise on Monday June 5 Th.. The hotel was very clean, our room was very nice & spacious. The entire hotel staff were polite and helpful. The ease of booking our stay- checking in - and departure were all hassle free and super easy. The breakfast was fantastic and the staff during breakfast were amazing with all of the kids. Would definitely stay there again and recommend this hotel for anyone especially families with children.

title: Nice
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Valet parking guys was great cleaning lady awesome
review: Very great location, close to the beach about 5 minute walk to Las Olas great night life, service at the hotel was really great  I was on the 11th floor the view was awesome ocean view!!!! Valet parking  guys was super super great, did not wait more than 2 minutes for my car, we had 2 Vehicles so they give us a discount on parking daily.

title: Pre-paid hotel for time share presentation
review: Thank you so much for your kind words regarding our valet team. I am so pleased that they took such good care of you and that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Late birthday present to myself
review: The convenience of the hotel was a good one.  The distance to the public beach was about a mile; it was about 2-3 miles further to where there were ample eating and shopping available.  Unfortunately, I cannot give the restaurant there a good review as a breakfast ticket for 4 exceeded $80. The buffet was $22.00 per person and we would have faired much better as those people were served water with ice and we were served water in a juice glass with no ice.  Also, we were offered no refills on our coffee and I have to say we tipped better than those eating at the buffet.   The first day we were there, we returned to the room after 4PM and it had not been serviced.  The telephone in the living room did not work and the TV in the bedroom did not work.   We did not report these.  The…

title: A great location and staff always friendly
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be a convenient location. However, I do apologize for the issues you experienced and I will share with my team. Next time you come, please ask our front desk for restaurant ideas as there are several right next door including Capitol Grill, Trulux, Seasons 52, etc. Thanks again and we do hope you come back!

title: CLASSY PLACE FOR A CLASS REUNION.
review: I stayed at this hotel for three nights, it is a good bargain for the price. The beach is about a 10-15 minute walk over the bridge. It has a restaurant and bar on site and I took the water taxi down to Hollywood, it is parked at the back of the hotel. The only thing I did not like was the noise from the busy highway.

title: Nice and convenient
review: We stayed here two years ago. Came back for two nights before a cruise and one for after the cruise. Got the nicer room for the two nights. The other night we did get in the room super early so I can't complain on that. It faced the road and part of the waterway. Both rooms were considered water views. Anyway the second room did not cool well in the bedroom. The toilet did not flush right. This room seemed more worn.   The people at the desk are very friendly.   The walk is not far from the ocean.   If you have laundry to be done, the third floor has washers and dryers. Not free though.   The shuttle to cruise ship is expensive unless you share with people.   Nice to have a little kitchen to have some food stored for lunch c  I would definitely go back.

title: Conference Visit
review: thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that the front desk team treated you so well. However, I do apologize for the issues you experienced and I will share with my staff. Hope to see you back again soon!

title: Best family vacation!
review: The staff at Gallery One was fabulous.  We were planning our first conference and they assisted us every step of the way.  On the day of the event, they made sure everything ran smoothly.  At the end of the day, we hated to leave!

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: I can't believe my luck!
review: From check-in to check-out, this hotel was top notch! The customer service and friendliness of the entire staff was beyond our expectations. We took the family (7 people) on a much needed vacation for a lot of R&R. We found it here. We had three rooms and each one was clean, spacious, and up to date. The fitness center, pool, restaurant, patio, and more were well maintained and enjoyed by all of us. The beach is only 4 blocks away, and the shopping center was even closer, yet it didn't feel like we were in a big city. We are definitely going back!

title: Try something different
review: Stayed for 3 days mixing business and pleasure. I brought the family with me. The hotel is oid but you can tell it had been renovated a while back. The rooms were fairly clean, little things here and there but not to be concerned. The website photos are much more pleasent to the eye but I guess thats reality and I tend to love "la la land" when traveling. The check in was simple but they forgot to give us a "check in letter" which supposedly had the  instructions on signing into the internet. Check in at 3 out at 11. Valet parking $30 bucks a day. You can go and come as many times as you like but each trip is 2 tips one for getting your vehicle and one when returning, it's not all inclusive. The hotel food not so good. Run of the mill breakfast  $22.. Dinner time I saw nobody in…

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. I am happy to hear that you found our staff to be "jolly". However, I am sorry that the hotel was not fully up to your expecatations. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Hidden Gem in Ft. Lauderdale
review: If your looking for a hotel that has all the amenties from short walk to beach, shopping, grocery store, causal and fine dining this is the place to stay. The galleria mall features h&m macys Neiman Marcus to a variety of stores. The dining and entertainment was great. Drinks at blue martini to dinner at trulucks where the oysters are so fresh it's like they picked then right outside.

title: Birthday!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am excited to see that you gave us a 5-star review and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Best Hilton Property to date.
review: I have stayed at this hotel many times and am never disappointed.  It is located on the Intercoastal and next to a fantastic Mall.  The Water Taxi picks up right at the hotel.  All the rooms are suites which makes you feel like you have an apartment.  Staff goes over and above all expectations.  All the comforts at an affordable price.  Restaurant on site for those of us that are road weary.

title: Great Hospitality
review: This hotel was great, the staff really  goes above & beyond to make sure that their guests are happy. This Hilton Double tree is in a grest great area. With an awesome mall within walking distance. We really had a pleasent stay.   Thank you Hilton.

title: Mold on ceiling
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that our team took such good care of you and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Huge suites
review: A/C problems in my room, the ceiling above A/c was black/mold Also the A/C was running extremely loud that is was tough to get a good night sleep , in the fridge was a old cup with pressed lemons .......

title: Florida 2016
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. However, I am a bit shocked with what you seem to have found in your room as this is not the norm for us. If you can call me direcly to let me know what room you were in, that would be wonderful. Mold is definately not an issue here and I would like to investigate. Thanks

title: 2 stays in one week - Night & Day
review: I was very pleased with the hotel rooms. Very large suites with living room and kitchenette. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. We were entitled to free internet and could not be connected to the hotel network despite repeated calls to the front desk. The following morning it was explained that there was no one at the hotel the night before to reset the router. We were pleased that we were given a credit on our room rate.  The only other complaint was that the carpet in the public hallways was filthy. The room itself was clean.

title: Good location, but...
review: With a HUGE, empty parking lot they only let you valet park your car for $30 a day, breakfast is $22, the room was average and the maid left the top sheet on my bed (in case I wanted to put it on myself, I guess). The hotel sends you texts every day rather than just asking how your stay was...dreadful. The beach is right over the bridge and that was great, but I will not be back. P.S. there were bugs in the room...ugh!

title: Wonderful, thoughtful service
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so sorry that you were not informed about the valet parking. We do keep it a bit less expensive than most other hotels on the beach. Regarding the texts, this is a service that we started offering a few months ago to better communicate with our guests. It has been well received and you are able to opt out at anytime during your stay. I am sorry that you found it intrusive but we do hope that you give us another chance.

title: Perfect get away!
review: Stayed here for 3 nights, they found out it was a big birthday and sent up complimentary champagne and chocolate dipped strawberries. The location is excellent for shopping and beaches. Water taxi takes you to other areas for eating/drinking. Staff are so thoughtful and helpful, highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great Service!
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay during your birthday and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location, even better staff
review: You can't go wrong staying at this hotel . Location is stunning with less than a five minute walk to the beach . Grounds are beautiful and well kept . Splurge for a balcony facing the intercoastal , ever changing view, just stunning. Lysette and Charisse will take very good care of you while dining or relaxing in the restaurant. Highly recommend this location.

title: great staff, very good location
review: I really recommend this hotel. Staff, especially Mr.Jeffry, very kind and outstanding giving solutions for us. We recommend this hotel, our stay was wonderful. Spacious rooms, very good location, near supermarket , shopping mall, beach, rental bikes

title: Great Weekend Getaway!
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Jeffrey took such good care of you. I will share your kind words and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location !!
review: I'm from nearby Miami and was looking for a great weekend getaway for Memorial Day Weekend. The GalleryOne was fantastic! The room was like a small apartment, it has a kitchen with everything you need. The bedroom is spacious and we had a huge balcony. The location is great, close to the beach and shops. The staff was super friendly and I can't forget to mention the delicious cookies they give you when you check in. Can't wait to come back again!

title: Overall a good stay
review: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday weekend with us and we look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: A Great Place to Stay Before Your Cruise
review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel during 6th-17th May; on arrival we found we did not have the large balcony suite we expected but Amoy (very helpful young lady) who checked us in promised us a change of room in two days. We moved into a suite overlooking the Inter-coastal waterway with a large balcony - great ! All the staff are professional and courtious, the hotel is very well maintained, the rooms spacious and are serviced every day to a high standard. We would recommend this hotel for it's quality and location - try Season 52 for great food and the Blue Martini for great drinks and atmosphere both in the Galleria, next door.

title: Great staff, beautiful lobby, spacious suites
review: Just stayed here again for the Memorial Day weekend.  The staff is so friendly, particularly Sharees downstairs at the coffee bar and the wonderful housekeeper Joycelin.  Pool is beautiful, right on the water.  Grocery store is across the street, which makes it easy to stock your refrigerator.  You do not need a car here as you can walk to the beach and to surrounding cafes etc...  Cannot wait to go back!

title: VACATION AWAY
review: Wow; thanks so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone treated you so well. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Not as "great" as everyone would have you believe
review: It is very convenient , location is great, service very good, the view from the run is very nice, just walking to the beach was a great experience, Kids have a good time, very close to the mall, we stay 2 days and had the feeling of 5 days on vacations

title: not happy
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your short vacation with us and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great pre cruise stay!
review: Let me begin by saying that with the exception of one member of the housekeeping staff, every employee I encountered during this stay was friendly, polite, and helpful. As you approach the hotel, it is gorgeous, as is the lobby once you get inside. And my suite was lovely, with a comfortable bed, a nice couch, and plenty of room to work on the table. And the view of the intercoastal canal was lovely. However, the the noise from the boats on the canal, the cars on US1, and the horn signally the raising and lowering of the drawbridge over said canal lasted all night long. I was on the 8th floor and I could hear the cars going over the metal bridge as clearly as if I were outside.  Also, while my suite was nice, the television in the bedroom did not work. (The one in the sitting…

title: Great Weekend  Getaway
review: Loved the Gallery One The customer service was impeccable!!! Melissa and Amy went above and beyond to insure our check in was prompt  It's a great location on the intercoastal  with a five minute walk to the beach. The hotel is beautiful  and well kept.   I will definitely be back to this location.

title: DON'T BOOK ONLINE
review: I booked a room with a balcony and ocean view then they changed it when i got there. As soon as the hotel manger seen that i was black he told them to change it to the room without a balcony, and i had to look at a lake during my stay. They still charged me for the same price as the balcony and ocean view. I love hilton hotels and resorts but this is the worst experience ever.

title: Local getaway
review: Once again, We had a great stay here. The front desk is always great, professional and greeted me as a HHonors member. I usually stay here at least couple times a year because of it's great location and the ease of the water taxi pick up. After a night of dinner and drinks we came back to our room to a bottle of wine and nice note that Claudio who brought it up for our anniversary. The next morning we had an excellent breakfast over looking the intercoastal waterway, followed by laying out by the pool- I will definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Rainy weather, sunny service
review: thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Claudio took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location with average amenities
review: when you think of Ft. Lauderdale, you think of sunshine - that was not the case during my week of business meetings.  The good news was a beautiful hotel with great employees and exceptional service.  Thank you double tree.  (A word to the wise, if you don't have Hilton status, the breakfast buffet is unusually expensive, and disappointing - although, again the staff is great.)

title: Great stay in Ft. Lauderdale!!
review: Our group of 10 had 5 rooms here on 5/21/2016. We were all very happy with our choice. We arrived early morning, our rooms weren't ready. They took care of our luggage while we went to the Galleria Mall. It was walkable and there was food places nearby and a Publix grocery store was close as well. We walked to the beach later in the evening and had dinner at a local restaurant across from beach. Would recommend without hesitation. Room was huge, clean and awesome view.

title: 15th Anniversary
review: Thank you so much for your  4-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the location worked for you. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Business trip
review: We stayed at this hotel 6 nights. We loved this hotel, but we loved the staff even more. My husband and I were celebrating our 15th wedding anniversary and the staff at this hotel made it awesome. From check in to check out, the front desk staff were very pleasant. They were very professional and very knowledgeable about the area attractions and the best places to eat. They also gave out delicious cookies 😍. They helped set up our excursions and confirmed the reservations for us. The food at the hotel was very good. The restaurant staff and the Starbucks barista  are also awesome. So here's my shout out to the nicest, kindest and most attentive staff that I have had the pleasure of meeting. This place would not be what it is with out : Melissa, Amoy, Jeffrey, Shareese,…

title: Great Staff
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. I will make sure I share your kind words regarding everyone that you mentioned. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Fort lauderdale
review: Nice hotel!  Staff is great!  Hotel is a little old but kept up nice. Furniture is uncomfortable and the draw bridge noise is what prevent a perfect score.  The breakfast buffet was really good and wait staff was very attentive! We will go back as we have a number of times.  We like it when they get to know you.....

title: Tracy
review: We  loved this hotel! It looked new was very clean. It's in a great location to walk or run for exercise, find a great place to eat, and shopping at the mall! The view of the intracoastal is beautiful 😊

title: Another Pleasant Stay
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the views. We do hope to see you again soon!

title: Hotel not as described
review: Once again, I really enjoyed my stay here. The service is always great. I was here previously back in April for three days and came back yesterday. I was glad to see Amoy's friendly face at the front desk again. She the best at providing excellent customer service and very knowledgeable. She's one the reason I would always choose this hotel over any other on the beach.

title: Great Location, Comforts of Home, Staff Who Aim to Please
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that Amoy and the rest of the team treated you so well. Hope to see you again soon!

title: Good Location and Space Value
review: I was very disappointed with this hotel. The only reason I am giving it a 4 rating is because of the wonderful staff. The room description was nothing of what we received. We spent 14 nights in room 909. We booked as a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom. The description of baths for example "The inviting bathrooms feature a separate marble bath and walk-in shower with rain showerhead. " I guess you can say we had this there was a tub in the room with king bed and the walk in shower was in the room with 2 queens. In all the pictures it shows a balcony with spacious living area. The balcony was off the bedroom with 2 beds so if the other person wanted to use it you had to invade the privacy of the other people in the room. Also the kitchen table was actually jammed under the big screen TV shown…

title: beautiful view
review: Very nice room. Has an equipped kitchen, 6 seated dinning room, sofa bead, 47 inch flat TV in living room and balcony with beautiful view of the canal.  Actual bedroom very comfortable bed with closest space. Very large bathroom.

title: Great experience
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great getaway
review: GALLERYone has it all:  a short walk from the beach, next door to a fabulous mall, steps from a Starbucks and several great eateries, a Publix, intercoastal is adjacent with a water taxi stop, too many things to list. In addition, the people you will be dealing with a fabulous; front desk, VUE dining ( ask for awesome Aly ), the valet parking staff; they all make you feel welcome. The rooms are equally great, with comfortable beds, lots of room, amazing bathrooms, TV, kitchen with fridge and dishwasher if you are so inclined. We have stayed in other places nearby and this one has them beat.

title: In the midst of it all
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We are all about service & we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Great Hotel and Staff
review: Great location and friendly staff. Lots to do within walking distance-- next to a very nice shopping mall. Great views overlooking the Intercoastal and water taxi stops at hotel. Just a short walk to the beach

title: Family & Business visit
review: Visited here for a week, we checked into a suite, 2 rooms, 2 baths and a living room.  Staff is nice & helpful, breakfast waitresses all were very nice and accommodating.  Rooms was kept clean, but we had to keep asking for more towels or bring them up from the pool.  Bathrooms were gorgeous but had marble floors which were extremely slippery.  Hence the need for extra towels so we wouldn't slip.  Pool area played some Christmas music in April?  Watch out for the beautiful large green iguanas.  Hot tub steps are angled down so they can be tricky to navigate and there is also a filter on the floor, I tripped on it first time in.  We will be back, though!

title: Clean full suite hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you would come back and we hope to see you again soon!

title: Wonderful Hotel and Excellent Staff
review: We stayed here post cruise for one night.  Clean hotel suite with full kitchenette, living room and large bedroom.  Everything was clean.  Paid about 225 for the night for four of us.  It is on the intercoastal and about a half mile from the beach.  Publix grocery store is about a two minute walk and there are plenty of restaurants in walking distance including upscale ones such as the Capital Grille.  Pool area is ok.  Clean but nothing fancy.  Water taxi stops at the hotel on the intercoastal which is great!  Overall I would have preferred to have paid around $175 for the night but it was a good experience and would stay there again.

title: Spacious
review: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our property to be so clean. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Friendly and accommodating
review: We stayed here for one night as we were taking a cruise the next day.We arrived around 8pm and were greeted by friendly Front Office staff.The accommodations were excellent  And very clean. We asked about transportation to the port next day,and that was taken care of immediately taken care of ,again in a friendly manner. We ten asked about where we could have a sandwich and a glass of wine ,we did not want to go to the dining room. In the same friendly manner it was suggested that the bartender would be more than pleased to look after us. In the bar we were greeted by an friendly,smiling gentleman(I think his name was Brad) He suggested a club sandwich and an excellent bottle of wine.It was a wonderful way to end the day. After a great night sleep we had a great breakfast served…

title: Great Hotel
review: Great Hotel, I would highly recommend this hotel.  The staff is outstanding.  The views on the inter costal are amazing.  Again this is a great place with a great and caring staff.  The out door bar is a great place to relax during the day.

title: First stay at this hotel
review: Wow; thanks so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that the staff was "outstanding" and that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Seriously bad....
review: I had read reviews about this hotel but I have to say it is a nice hotel, clean, great location, staff accommodating, perfect surroundings. We was welcomed at the hotel by Anisa on reception, she was very pleasant and helpful. The Galleria Mall is 5 minutes walk, the beach is 10 minutes walk, Publix supermarket 5 minutes walk?  The only problem I had was I was not aware that when they swipe your debit/ credit card they actually take a payments of $75 US dollars for incidentals.  I had 4 separate bookings with the hotel. So I was'not to pleased about that. The payments are reverted back into your account when you check out. My problem is because I live in the UK, I'm still waiting for mine.  Apart from that it's a lovely hotel, having a suite is a added bonus with a microwave, 2…

title: Doubltree Suites, Ft. Lauderdal
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that everything was perfect during your first stay at our property and we hope you continue to stay with us. See you soon!

title: Stay here
review: So I arrived at 230 in the am after flight delays and walked in past...shall we say... a lady of the evening... Took 10 min for the front desk to find information about the class I was attending.  Room carpet dingy for sure, hot water faucet lever came off in my hand and there was NO water pressure in the shower.... Shall I continue???

title: Convenient to shopping at Galleria on Sunrise Blvd
review: Good clean property. Only valet parking as some undetermined work being don on the West side of the entrance. If you book the package with valet you save $10 (prox) a night.  Nice balcony suite but stay away from the bridge. Noise all day from cars crossing the bridge.   Other noise is someone opening and closing the sliding door to the patio above us. Will have to use the white noise generator tonight for sure.  Water taxi docks here every 15 minutes - must try the Venice of America ride through the famous canals of Ft. Lauderdale.  Also connects to the Convention Center, though a slow ride.  Friendly staff. Don't expect accurate Starbucks coffee orders in the lobby. Just a machine that only puts out one mix.

title: Great service at the bar!
review: Thanks so much for your 4-star review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our property to be clean. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Bartender was great
review: After check in my boyfriend and I went to the bar in the lobby and we were greeted by the most pleasant man. Dany, our bartender, had such a great personality and was so courteous. you can tell that he loves what he does and he does it very well. Later that day we wanted to buy a bottle of alcohol that is sold in the lobby but there was no staff member to help us. Dany took initiative and tried to get someone to help us, he ultimately ended up helping us out instead. That being said, the rest of the staff did not seem too eager to help. When we first got there we ordered food and the staff were more concerned about their conversation than wanting to assist us. While we were sitting at the bar Dany actually went to check on the food for us. Overall, great room, service is…

title: Bar Drink Vodka Gimlet
review: Thank you so much for submitting your 4-star review. I am so pleased to hear that danny took such good care of you. I do apologize for the rest of the staff and I will discuss with my team. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Pre Cruise Vacation in FLL
review: Staff seemed to be stuck in their own world and didn't address guests as they approached.  Felt turned off by the staff until we found the bar.  Our bartender Dany was very outgoing, friendly, knowledgeable and courteous.  Bar set-up was clean and presentable; bottles where arranged by spirit and sub-spirit accurately.  Great job!

title: Almost 5 stars
review: This hotel is a good value.  It is only steps away from the beach and very close to a higher end shopping mall with multiple restaurants.  This is the second time we stayed at this property.  Front desk was very courteous and helpful.  At check-in, there were three very small cockroaches in our room.  The front desk changed our room right away.  (If there's a restaurant on-site, they're going to be there).  Breakfast buffet is good.  Wait staff was helpful.  We will likely come back with our kids.  The suite concept makes it easy to travel with children.

title: Great 4 Night Stay Here
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took a short time to correct your problem. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Fort Lauderdale Vacation
review: I stayed at this property last month for four night and five days.  Let me tell you i was blown away.  I am used to staying at nice upscale places but for the price I was paying to stay here, I really didn't know what to expect.  I am from New York so some might consider me a bit of a snob when it comes to hotels.  Well boy, was I blown away by how much value I got at this property.  The hotel was clean and friendly as soon as I arrived.  The suite was much larger and nicer than I would have ever imagined. It had a full kitchen, dining room/kitchen table, den with pull out sofa and balcony, separate large bedroom with another balcony.  The bathroom was also nice and spacious.  Downstairs they had a restaurant and bar, both of which I didn't try.  Out in the back of the hotel is…

title: Great Location,  Great People
review: Wow; thanks so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so happy that you were "blown away" and that you enjoyed your 4 nights with us. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Mrs
review: We booked the penthouse in Gallery One Double Tree through VRBO and it was an excellent place to stay.  The views from the room were amazing.  The suite is tastefully decorated and you are within walking distance of the Galleria and many fine restaurants.  The water taxi also makes a stop at this hotel so you can tour many different areas.  There are two bicycles in the suite that you can use for touring and riding along the beach which is very close. Would definitely stay here again. The penthouse suite is privately owned and the owner is very accommodating.

title: Great stay for family or couples!
review: Great view - Super friendly and accommodating staff - especially Claudio, the Manager. He went out of his way to make us feel welcome and at home during the entire stay. The room was clean and the view was spectacular - a walk to the beach and so many activities around it. We will be back for sure!

title: Great Find
review: Wow; we can't ask for a better review than this. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: The best thing about this hotel was the A/C Mechanic!!!!
review: This property is located within walking distance to many stores and restraurants, and only two blocks from the beach.  Spend the afternoon having a cocktail watching the yacht parade on the international waterway. A great place to stay.

title: nice but save your pennies for parking
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your views and we hope to host you again soon!

title: Excellent choice
review: Wow, I had such high hopes for this hotel. Great location, One of my favorite chains, DoubleTree, but man did they let me down. The bellman forgot my luggage, twice. My family and I tried to find a nice place to eat and that turned out to be embarrassing. One waitress seemed to be working the front of house as well as table service. The waitress never got us a seat, we ended up grabbing our own and after 10 minutes grabbed our own menus and then 15 minutes later just gave up. We went to our room and the A/C was not working. The A/C mechanic was the best thing this hotel had going for it. Great guy worked hard and after the first try failed he came back and replaced a fuse and life was good again. Sorry DoubleTree, all the cookies in the world could not fix this mess.

title: 3rd time the charm
review: This was my 3rd time staying at this Hotel.  And again I had a problem with the room.  It wasn't what I booked.  I booked a king bed suite and they put me in a queen bed suite.  I brought this to the attention and they changed my room the next day.  Also if you book the park & stay be sure to check your bill when checking out because they will try to still charge you for parking. Otherwise the stay was great. Will stay there again.

title: Doubletree Sunrise Blvd
review: I am so excited to hear that you enjoyed your 3rd stay with us. We hope to see you again for your 4th time!

title: Perfect location
review: nice property several blocks from beach.  Good views of intra coastal.  Easy access to water taxi.  Traffic a bit loud on north side of hotel.  Nice staff.  King suite very comfortable.  Nice pool deck with iguanas hanging around!

title: Great Hotel in Lauderdale
review: thanks so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to be able to host you again soon!

title: It was okay...
review: clean, staff friendly, easy access to water taxi, and beaches, shopping and restaurants.  Only problem I had was with valet not having my car available for early departure, miss communication between shifts, they corrected problem and I was able to get to airport in time for my flight

title: Great location but not quite the usual Hilton/Doubletree standard
review: The hotel is located 5min walk from the beach and 2min walk from the Gallery Mall where you have excellent restaurants. The reception staff is very helpful and friendly and by booking a DoubleTree hotel, you know what you can accept!  The downside to the hotel are   - The facilities which are extremely worn. Our AC in the room was dripping on a carpet which in general could do with a clean/replacement. The pool of water got bigger by the day and you could not enter the bedroom without getting wet feet.   - The maid service - during the weekend the maid service came to clean our room at 5.30 which yes is within the guidelines you are given but very late in the day as that is normally the time you return from the beach to shower and get ready to go out for the evening.…

title: A difficult start but excellent recovery
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I am pleased to hear that you found our staff to be "very friendly". However, I do apologize for the maintenance issues you experienced. I will look into these so they do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future!

title: family vacation
review: This Double Tree hotel is well situated within a very short walk to either The Galleria or the beach. We arrived a bit late on a Sunday and were not happy with the room - we have a fairy specific profile requirement. With nothing else available, we stayed in the allocated suite which was not great but, as compensation, we received breakfast vouchers for our whole stay - a very good breakfast, by the way. The staff moved all our luggage to a very nice suite the next day and we were happy with all other aspects nad services of the hotel.

title: Wonderful stay
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear that after a slight hiccup, you did enjoy your stay and that the staff treated you so well. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Stay here for fun not business...
review: great accomadation for family . also excellent location and good facilioties. breakfast adequate but WIFI terrible; Was not interested at check out when i indicated amount charged differed from reservation

title: Not satisfied
review: Our experience at this location wasn't what we expected.  We attended a wedding at the hotel and none of the staff knew what was going on making it more difficult for us to be present as necessary.  They need to better train the staff, and things could go much smoother.

title: Very nice
review: Dear heatherf281,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service.  We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Great Time at the DoubleTree by Hilton Fort Lauderdale-Galleria
review: Very nice hotel and friendly staff. If you have a problem they are there to help take care of you. It is nice to have to water taxi service just out the back of the hotel. This was my second stay there and I will be staying there again my next trip.

title: Amazing Hotel for Wedding Blocks
review: Thanks so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and that you will be with us again! We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Best  Hotel In Broward
review: Stayed 4/23 to 4/25.  We were welcomed by Jeffrey at the  front desk and since our room was not ready he accompanied us to an alternate room to see if it met our needs. We decided to wait for our original room and he gave us a couple complimentary beverages at the bar. Nice touch!  We had a great view of the intercoastal ( Room 1122) and in the evening you get a nice breeze on the balcony ! Comfortable room, clean, ( except for the items left in the refrigerator by previous guests).  Otherwise exceeded our expectations!   I would like to also mention the helpfulness of the staff , Jeffrey & Melissa both at the front desk ( others did as well but did not get their names).    In addition,  the valet did a very good job getting our car quickly,  Matt was very helpful with our…

title: Fantastic Service
review: Clean, modern rooms and very friendly staff makes this hotel stand out above the rest! Delicious warm cookies at check in and anytime you like! Our 2 bed 2 bath suite was very spacious and comfortable. Excellent value for the money. Easy walk to the beach.

title: Guess services
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that everyone took such good care of you and that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Excellent Services
review: Not the greatest guest services I had surgery told them detail prior to booking needed extra pillows and ice took forever to get pillows and was told employees were not allowed to get me some ice despite my distress I was in

title: Good and bad
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Tortuga 2016
review: The employees was  very diligent, nice and always pending of all  your need specially in the restaurant. Lissette was super nicely, of insurance I recommend it for visit of business and pleasure.  I will visit it again!

title: wedding reception of my wife's cousin
review: Great customer service from all staff members of the hotel. I booked a very nice suite, which included a kitchen, coffee maker, and refrigerator, at a reasonable price. Used room service one morning for breakfast and the food was excellent , delivered promptly, and topped off with a wonderful server named ALY.

title: Fantastic customer service
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite, our food and the service. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Beware of the fine print
review: Amoy at the front desk we the nicest, cheerful and most pleasant person working at any hotel I've ever stayed in. And I can easily mention that over my work career I have stayed at least over 1,000 hotels.

title: Happy 1st visit and 7 days later not happy with 2 visit
review: Wow; thanks so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that Amoy treated you so well and I will make sure I share with the entire team. Hope to see you back again soon!

title: Comfortable but ...
review: Valet parking not an optional choice at $30 per day.   It is required.  Way over priced to park. You hear and sometimes feel the patio door opening above you; maybe the doors need the track and rollers checked?  You need a user manual to operate the Directv service; no instructions provided and the remote isn't a Directv remote.

title: Pre cruise 4 days
review: Fantastic location brilliant for beach shops dining shopping,and the water taxi.Lovely friendly staff had a great stay.There's a mall next door which also has some nice places to eat,but the hotel restaurant was good too.

title: Nice
review: Wow; thanks so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you had such a great stay and our team treated you so well. We hope to be able to host you again soon!

title: Spacious rooms, good location
review: Nice hotel and wonderful, down to earth, staff. These people really like people. (I overheard other guests say that too). Always smiling, friendly, helpful and professional. They're the best I've ever seen. Very well managed hotel. They must pay staff very well to have such high quality, always happy, employees.

title: Awesome Stay
review: Wow; we can't ask for a better review than this one. Thank you so much and I will share your kind words with the entire team. See you again soon!

title: Tortuga music festival
review: Gallery One has some good things going for it but some drawbacks as well.  Good things:  very spacious rooms with all suite concept, small and handy kitchenette, some good to great water views, restaurants/bars in walking distance. Drawbacks: noisy on the bridge side - which has the best views - but every car going over the metal grates of the bridge can be very noisy. Hotel only has single pane windows but double-paned would be so much better for noise abatement. Also hotel could use some updating in furnishing and décor.

title: This Hotel Raised My Expectations
review: I can't say enough great things about this hotel and staff. I'm afraid this place may have ruined me for other hotels because I will now compare every other hotel I stay at to this one, and I have a feeling I will always be disappointed. Our suite was like an apartment - living room, dining table and chairs, galley kitchen, separate bedroom, two TVs. The kitchen had everything we could need. Not only plates, bowls, silverware, but also things like strainers, veggie steamers, and cheese graters! And a dishwasher, too. It was so convenient to be able to walk a block to Publix, get some groceries, and eat right in our suite. We had a bowl of cereal on our balcony overlooking the waterway every morning. Honestly, this suite was such a cozy, peaceful place to relax after a long day.…

title: Super comfortable suits with great view on the canal!
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and I am so happy to see all of the Team Members you spoke about. Our sole purpose is to make you feel special and I am so happy that we did. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great stay!
review: Extremely friendly staff!  Comfortable suit with nice kitchen. Great for families with young kids or if you are a couple looking for spacious rooms with a balcony overlooking the canal! We took unit #728 which had great view and very comfortable bed.

title: Fab staff and good location
review: Thank you so much for posting your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Chad T
review: The valet staff were especially helpful.  I visited during a huge event at the beach which tied up traffic.  They went out of their way to make sure that I got to my destination on time.  One of the valet staff even lent me his beach chairs so I didn't have to buy them for the weekend!  Thank you Ernesto!

title: Mostly good with a little not so good...
review: Overall, our recent stay at this hotel was a positive one. Check-in was quick, staff very pleasant, and 'welcome cookies' delicious. Valet/ bellboy was very friendly, and helpful in pointing out features of the hotel and area. Suite room effeciently laid out, very clean, basic supplies in kitcenette. Small balcony but nice view of the intercoastal waterway. Hotel located an easy 6-7 miniute walk to the beach, is one of the scheduled stops for the water taxi system, and a grocery store/ mall/ restaurants all within short walking distance. Pool area not huge, but pool clean and refreshing. The not so good was the noise from the traffic going over the draw bridge. Our room was on the end of the hotel closest to the bridge, and the rumbling noise was steady. Most disconcerting has…

title: Our gallery one stay
review: Thank you so much for submitting your review. I am happy to hear that you found your suite to be well laid out and clean. I am sorry that you had some challenges in retrieving your clothes. However, it is my understanding that we did finally get them to you. So sorry it took numerous calls. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Was a nice looking hotel and the staff were great especially the valet but the room we had was not very good at all drawers were falling apart the shower door didnt close and was chipped the curtains were so dirty they were black in some spots. we are hoping it was dirt and not mold. unfortunately we didnt notice till the day we were checking out how bad the curtains were because it was on the side facing out. and the bed was really uncomfortable. we talked to someone at check out who deducted some off our bill but for the cost of the room i really expect better from them.

title: Beautiful retreat
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am so happy to hear that everyone took such good care of you. However, I would like to apologize for the condition of your room as this is not the norm for us. I am happy to hear that the team compensated you and I will discuss with everyone so that this does not occur again. Thanks so much!

title: Old and dirty
review: This hotel was close to everything- the water taxi stop, beach and supermarket. It was lovely and clean and the view was lovely. It has facilities for cooking rather than eating out if you prefer. We also enjoyed the happy hours.

title: Always a great stay
review: I have stayed in this hotel on four separate occasions and it is always a great experience.  The front desk is very courteous and helpful.  The rooms/amenities are very clean and modern.  Location is great for access to the beach, shopping and excellent restaurants.  about 30 minutes from the airport (FLL).

title: Amazing!
review: Awesome! Thanks so much for your 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you keep coming back and we look forward to seeing you once again soon!

title: Lovely pre-cruise stay for our Anniversary!!
review: Property was great! Staff was awesome had some great recommendations of what was around. Ben at the valet was a great help. The view from my room was awesome. Nothing like waking up to some yachts in backyard!!

title: Thanks
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear how well the team took care of you and I will share your kind words with Ben. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent Treatment
review: Really excellent customer service when we stayed here the other week. The room we were initially shown was not what we'd hoped for (as this was a special holiday for our Anniversary)... but between them, the lovely Jeffrey (and his manager Anisa) not only immediately allocated us a really super room instead, but then Jeffrey went the extra mile and sent a bottle of champagne and fresh strawberries in chocolate to us the next day to celebrate!   The room we were given was more like a 1 bedroom apartment - a stylish and fully equipped kitchen area, large living/dining room with a wall mounted TV, balcony with both city and side waterfront views, large comfortable bedroom (another large TV...) and a beautifully appointed shower/bathroom. The high standard of service continued from…

title: Good stay in Ft. Lauderdale
review: The hotel staff was polite and attended to my needs. Being able to communicate via texting seemed odd at first but ended up being a plus that added to my good experience. The valet service was fast and polite. My car was always delivered within a minute of asking. My hotel room appliances, linen, bathroom were clean. However smudges on the walls and doors gave an unclean appearance. In room dining was a little pricey especially for the quantity of the food. However, the quality of the food made up for it.

title: Great customer service pre-cruise stay
review: Thanks so much for your kind words. I am so pleased to hear that our team treated you so well and that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice stay
review: We chose to stay here prior to our cruise and received great service from Kareen and staff. Close by to many things, clean, and very nice hotel. It has restaurants and stores near by so you can get last minute cruise things. Nice breakfast too! Great hotel, will book again even if not going on cruise.

title: GREAT STAFF BEAUTIFUL PROPERTY
review: Thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and that our team treated you so well before your cruise. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Did not receive what I reserved.
review: Rooms were nice, staff was very helpful. Manager was very accessible and very nice.  Location was very convenient, water taxi stop made it very easy to get around. Valet staff was very helpful.  Having the mall close by was a plus.

title: Perfect location for anyone taking a cruise from Port Everglades.
review: Ask for a room with a balcony overlooking the inland waterway.  You can pick up a "hop-on/hop-off" boat cruise at the rear of the Hotel and get off at Las Olas to shop or dine.  The Hotel is one block away from the Galleria Mall on Sunrise Blvd. with a Publix supermarket across the street and lots of restaurants.  The only drawback was that there was no "free" Hotel Shuttle Bus to Port Everglades or to the Ft. Lauderdale Airport.  A Shuttle Bus service to Port Everglades was available for approximately $8.00 per passenger.  Taxi service was also readily available.

title: DoubleTree was terrific
review: Thanks so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the Water Taxi. It really is a wonderful added nbenefit of staying at our property. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Third time and just as nice
review: We were most pleased during our stay at the Fort Lauderdale DoubleTree. We felt welcome and appreciated the cheerful staff that did a great job across the board. The property was very well kept and attractive. We highly recommend this hotel.

title: Ft. Lauderdale
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone treated you so well. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Wonderful stay
review: We stayed at this hotel for a third time.  This time we were actually cruising out of Miami but chose to fly into Fort Lauderdale just to stay at this hotel! As usual, we were warmly greeted (at 2:00 in the morning) by a friendly front desk clerk and were handed our warm cookies before heading up to our room.  We had a two bedroom suite and it was very large and comfortable.  although a little bit dated, it was definitely clean and just what we were looking for, The only small issue we had was with the air conditioning that made one bedroom feel like an igloo while the other bedroom (which shared the A/C with the living area) struggled to keep the bedroom cool. We di not eat in the hotel, we find the prices to be a bit high, so we simply went to Publix and bough breakfast items…

title: Great Place to Stay
review: This a great place to stay that is close to the beach and a nice shopping area.  Both are within walking distance.  There is a great view of the boats.  The staff is great.  I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Awsome Hotel
review: Wow; thank you so much for your awesome review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful views of the boats and that the team treated you so well. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: The best vacation ever.
review: This trip is not my first time at this hotel and as usual I had an excellent time, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful especially the staff in the dining room, they remember from previous days what I wanted, welcome me by name and before I even sit down my coffee and juice was in front of me. Just to name a few of the staff ....Javaline, Jackie, Galiona and Allison. I would recommend this hotel any time...  They recognize my Hilton Gold membership which entitle me to breakfast and WiFi

title: Great Location - would stay here again!
review: Wow; thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so pleased you continue to stay with us and that Javaline, Jackie, Galiona and Allison took such good care of you. We can't wait to host you again soon!

title: Excellent hotel. Great service. Good location
review: I stayed at this location and from the moment I arrived and to the moment I left I was made to feel very special. The place is amazing, clean, super friendly and very well located to everything. The staff there is simply amazing.  I made friends for a life time.  I will certainly return.  The sooner the better. The food on site was amazing and everything was well priced. Everyone went out of their way to make sure we had everything we could possibly ever need. We met the nicest bartender ever.  His name is Benn Ropp.  He was so polite and friendly. He took the time to get to know us and share a little about himself.   We also had an amazing waitress: Natalie Delgado.  She made us feel like family and arranged for the best service ever.  These two individuals are top notch for…

title: Great place to stay
review: We stayed here for a family vacation.  There was more than substantial room for all of us-2 adults, an 18 year old and a 13 year old.   We had a one bedroom with 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa in the living room.  Even the pull out was comfortable!!! The room was well maintained and clean at all times.  All of the staff were friendly and welcoming.  We were fortunate enough to have a water view with a full balcony.  The hotel is close to the beaches, shopping, etc.  Valet guys were funny and very accommodating.  Will definitely return here.

title: Great location
review: Wow; thanks so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your large suite and that you found it to be clean and well maintained. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great Place
review: This hotel is in a great location - near the waterways, the Galleria Mall and some excellent restaurants. The breakfast is excellent and the staff very efficient. Very good location for group meetings and conferences.

title: Won't stay ever again
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the staff and breakfast was enjoyable. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great Staff and nice rooms
review: Had a training class from thee 21st through the 25th.  So I came in on the 20th.  The motel was very clean, within walking distance to everything I needed and only 4 miles from the class.  My wife came with me and had a blast.  The rooms were a good size with private balconies.  The staff was excellent.  John T.

title: work and play
review: Great hotel.  The staff was exceptional and the room was clean and comfortable.  Parking was a bit pricey ($30 a day), but if you don't mind walking a few extra steps you can park in the mall garage and walk across the street to the hotel.  They charge $9.99 for internet service which I think is a little much in this day and age.  Both other than the parking and internet everything was fantastic. I highly recommend the hotel

title: No loyalty recognition
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you found your suite to be "clean and comfortable" and that our team treated you so well. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Great Location
review: We arrived at 10 in the morning. Did npt expect to get a room that early, but the reception told us that it was possible to get a room around noon. So we went for a walk and came back then. But the hotel could not give us a room until 3pm.  They did not recognise our Hilton gold membership and gave us a room in the category we ordred, but with the poorest view possible, meaning no upgrade at all.  We had to call the reception and complain about the traffic noise to get a better location.  Hotel is worn, but it is clean. Location is good.  Did not like the breakfast, but that may be a european/American mismatch.

title: Great Location before cruise
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Since this is our busiest time of the year, we do have some challenges with getting our valued guests in their room earlier than normal check-in and I do apologize for this. We do make every effort but when we are sold out the night before, it sometimes does not happen. My apologies once again. I would also like to apologize for not getting you the room you reserved. This is definitely not the norm for us. However, I am happy to see that you found your room to be clean and that our hotel is in a good location. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Gallery one Fort Lauderdale
review: Stayed two nights pre cruise - loved the location since it was close to the beach and a very nice mall.  Hotel room was clean, large and very nice.  Had a small gym, nice pool (although music was being played too loud to enjoy relaxing and reading)  Nice bar and decent restaurant for breakfast.

title: great visit
review: We upgraded to a view of the intercoastal waterway.  Defineately worthwhile.  The constuction on nearby apartment was very noisy.  Bridge noise didn't boter us.  In fact since the larger boats had to stop and wait, it gave us experience of the mega yachts!

title: bad service, $30 dollar to park car,
review: I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you upgraded to a water view. It really is a wonderful view and I am so pleased you enjoyed it. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Great find, best of everything
review: When I arrived I  tried to call front desk and it went twice in VM, when connected FD could not hear bc hand set was not working, she told me to use speakerphone to talk, Wifi password was given does not work, she ask me to bring computer down, I did then she says oh we don't have good reception this side of the building, by that time it was 11 pm and I was schedule to go to conference early am.  I requested to stay 2nd night bc when I booked no room was available for 2nd night stay, but when I was talking to another physician about hotel to stay he says he was also reserved for 1 day but was able to get another night bc he is Hilton honors member, I told him I am HH member but why I was not given room?  About restaurant food? all member were complaining how long everybody was…

title: Good location but needs updating
review: Dear 531abdullahf,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered and we’re working with our team to ensure the situation doesn’t happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

title: Beautiful property
review: I've stayed at this property several times over the years & each time I stay here, I like it more. It's strategically located, being a short stroll to the beach, adjacent to upscale shopping, & close to business centers, while only 20 minutes from the airport. The  extensively landscaped property is prime FL real estate fronting the wide Intracoastal, with lots of smaller boats & larger yachts passing by. Even the Water Taxi has scheduled stops at the hotel's dock. Very inviting, updated public areas, include a dining room, 2 bars (one in the lobby, another outdoor) & a large outdoor pool -all with a marine atmosphere. Also available on-site are party & convention facilities. Most of the nicely appointed units have balconies, some with interesting city views, others face…

title: Excellant 3 day stay
review: There were friends and family from both the Groom & Bride's side....some arrived Wednesday, most arrived Friday.... This place has the Greatest staff, friendly, helpful, and always a quick smile....I stay here again.

title: excellent staff, rooms, food,pool,
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that our team treated you so well. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice return to Galleryone DoubleTree
review: this hotel is one of the best doubletree I have ever stayed at! checking in was easy. there is also a water taxi stop at the back door of the hotel. Rooms are very nice and spacious!! the bathrooms are so nice and big. staff is the best!!!!

title: February 2016 Stay at GALLERYone
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and that the staff took such good care of you. I am also happy to hear that you took advantage of the Water Taxi and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Love this hotel
review: This was our second visit to the Galleryone Doubletree, and we had very good service and very nice room again.  Jeffrey at the front desk was very courteous and professional and got us checked in in minutes -- including the free cookies!  Our room was clean, and everything was in order.  We needed one additional bath towel, so we sent a text as directed to do, and we got the towel within 10 minutes.    It was a bit noisy at night, but we think that was because of drunk guests at one of the three weddings hosted at the hotel that night.  We also heard what might have been the sliding glass door of the room above us.  We had a great view of the Intracoastal and could see the ocean from our room on the ninth floor.  The breakfast at the hotel is one of the best.  Our server,…

title: I´d rather be here than on the beach !
review: And who wouldn´t. Galleria Mall is a five  minute walk away, Publix about the same, restaurants abound and one of Ft. Lauderdales top night spots is nearby, all are within a few minutes walk - including the beach. This was my sixth year running and I normally stay twice a year - says it all ! I like a two bedroom suite for that bit of extra room. Fantastic staff,  all of them. A big thanks to Ryan Kopp who went that extra mile for me.

title: Great location
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you continue to come back and that Ryan took such good care of you. I will make sure I share with the entire team and we hope to see you again soon!

title: getting old, needs updating
review: The hotel was located right on the water and was only a few blocks from the ocean. Get the water view suite with a balcony. For the price, I thought the rooms really needed to be updated.  The carpet was very old along with the living room furniture.

title: Excellent Location and Quality
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient and you enjoyed your water view room. We are working on some upgrades so we hope to see you back again soon to enjoy them.

title: Nice people but not Great hotel.
review: hotel is getting old and needs updating.  the room i had book was not available and they placed me in a room that smelled very strong of smoke.  the water pressure of the shower was very low.  overall not the experience i would expect from a double tree hotel.

title: Could Have Been Better
review: We stayed here twice in the past two weeks. Two nights before a cruise and two after in a two bedroom king suite. Loved the location and the hotel while a bit tired is still lovely. The first two night were great and the suite in good shape. Staff were very accommodating and helpful. However on our second stay was not so great. The staff were very good and accommodating for the most part and we appreciated an early checkin,however there were issues with the suite. Cutlery was missing and when we called they never showed up to replace it, a hairdryer was missing, the garbage disposal unit was not functioning and water backed up when the dishwasher was used and the Internet only worked in certain locations in the suite. Also no one arrived until after five o'clock to do the…

title: Great experience
review: Thanks so much for posting your review. I am happy to hear that the staff was very accommodating and you enjoyed our location. I do apologize for the issues that you experienced and I will share with my entire team. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Loved this hotel. Classy. Hospitable.
review: Really nice and helpful staff, nice rooms, great experience. Carpets need a deep clean and pool does too. Otherwise, very satisfied!   We stayed 4 night, valet was always courteous and convenient. Staff helped us with menus and direction. Can't say enough about atmosphere.

title: Could NOT Have Been Better
review: Wow; thanks so much for your wonderful review. We can't ask for more than that! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Had some hiccups with requests regarding the room
review: We flew into Fort Lauderdale a day early before we cruised, and decided on GalleryOne. We are so glad we did! We didn't have a rental car, so we took Uber from the airport to GalleryOne. Our room wasn't quite ready as we were early; so we left our bags with the valet, and proceeded to take the water taxi (which conveniently stops outside the doors of this hotel) on a little tour.  Troy had taken our cellphone number, and texted to say thank you for choosing this hotel, and later texted us when our room was ready. Nice touch.  The room itself was lovely, with a great view of the water and a nice balcony. The room and separate living space were both spacious, clean, and the bed was super comfortable. We will definitely stay here next time we're in Fort Lauderdale.

title: DoubleTree
review: Overall a very nice hotel with very nice, clean rooms.  The manager of the hotel - Phillipe is lovely and very attentive.  The location is perfect and it just a short walk to the beach and several dining places.  I would recommend the hotel for business or for personal travel.  It's in a really great location for everything.

title: Bait and switch
review: Wow; thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Philippe took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Friendly staff in a nice location.
review: The room I reserved a year ahead wasn't available at check in so I was given an inferior room and the rate did not change.  The room was extremely noisy. The porters didn't offer to help with luggage from our taxi. The Ac banged every time it turned on and didn't keep a constant temperature.

title: Came for a wedding on Sundream
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I do apologize for the issues you experienced with your reservation and the bellmen. I did research this and see that we did make a mistake and I apologize for this. I also see that you were compensated a small amount to make up for the room type mistake. Once again, my apologies as this very rarely happens.

title: Highs and lows and we can see why some say five stars  and some two stars
