review: Hotel location is about 5 - 7 minute walk from the beach (over a short Sunrise Blvd  bridge), 3 minutes from the mall (across the street) and within walking distance of several restaurants. The back of the hotel butts up against the river and a dock for water taxis and other water transportation. I was there for a 3-day business meeting of about 80 plus people and our rooms were arranged via our department staff. My first impression was via a shuttle from the Ft. Lauderdale airport and thought the hotel tucked away to the side of the bridge. Once I entered, however, I was greeted with a very nice lobby area and friendly and informative Front Desk staff. I am an HHonors member and was greeted accordingly. Jeffrey was the one who checked me in and his follow-up after initial check…

title: Our third year at DT Gallery One...
review: ...and we continue to enjoy our stay there. The location, adjacent to The Galleria and near the beach make this an ideal location...and we love those very large suites. Special thanks to our 11th floor housekeeping staff who did a top-notch job. Actually the entire staff is great! Hopefully, we'll be back next year.

title: Location , location
review: Wow; thanks so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you keep coming back due to our great location and our large suites. We look forward to seeing you for the 4th time!

title: Nice comfortable room, with friendly service....but
review: Great location, 5 min walk from ocean, Publix across the street, Galleria Mall is next door and the Water Taxi station is right at the hotel!! Has a bar with great happy hour:) Room was like an apt, it also has a restaurant, room service and everyone is so nice and friendly! I could not ask for more! I had a great vacation!

title: Second time not quite the charm
review: Thanks so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our suites to be "like an apartment". I am also happy to hear that everyone was very friendly and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Our wedding and reception was a total success!
review: Very pleased with the clean and well equipped suite.  The living/kitchen/dining room had a Juliette balcony looking out over the waterway and a nice view of the ocean in the distance.  Separate bedroom with on-suite.  Room service was fast and very good.  Nearby restaurants, mall, and beach.  Only one issue that prevented this from being a 5 star rating.  Hotel required use of valet service if parking vehicle.  Upon retrieving car when checking out, we discovered that the car had been rifled through.  We did not leave anything of value in the car, but the glove box and center console contents were in the passenger seat and floor.  The valet service manager was quick to take notes of the incident and refund our valet service fees.  However, it put a damper on an otherwise great…

title: Disappointed in Fort Lauderdale
review: This hotel missed the mark on almost everything- making mistake-free reservations, service, amenities (you have no way of watching a movie in your room unless you bring your own laptop or IPad to watch it on), helpfulness of staff, the shower was crazy-leaking all over the floor under the glass door, and you can NOT cancel your stay less than 72 hours out under you want to pay for a FULL NIGHT PLUS TAX... lots of problems!!! The best perk is that it is directly on the Water Taxi route which is very fun!

title: Beautiful Hotel and Property! Will Be Back!
review: We had a great stay at GalleryOne, We came here for a few days as a part of a Honeymoon prior to going on a cruise out of Miami. We had a 2 room suite with a King bed. The view from our balcony was stunning... We were able to see up across the intracoastal waterway, and was even more beautiful at night. There is plenty of shopping to be done next door at the Galleria Mall. Lots of nearby restaurants and stores. The starbucks kiosk on site was a nice touch! The rooms were impeccably clean. Our favorite part of the hotel though was the Water Taxi stop on site. We spent one day just travelling around on the water taxi seeing different things and going different places.

title: Disappointment
review: Thank you so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so happy you were able to spend part of your honeymoon with us and we hope you enjoyed your cruise. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

title: Good Property for Business, not so much for Leisure
review: Expensive but not luxurious. Problems with internet, TV and getting the phone to work required several visits to the lobby before they were finally resolved. Everything cost extra- even when we wanted a queen instead of 2 double beds.

title: Wedding Party
review: Dear irene s,  We appreciate your feedback on the speed and cost of our internet service at our hotel. We’re sorry for the inconvenience and are currently addressing this issue with our service provider. As well, we apologize for the issues encountered with the TV and phone and we’re working with our team to ensure the situation doesn’t happen again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope you’ll consider staying with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.

title: Wedding stay
review: Used this hotel as it hosted wedding party of friends. Cleanliness of kitchen and baths was an issue. Kitchen amenities and utensils were below average. Front desk people were well above average. Facility needs updating. Street side is very noisy from highway traffic.

title: Great Location, but stay should have been better for the price.
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that the front desk team treated you so well. However, I do apologize for the cleanliness issues you experienced. I will share with my entire team so that this does not occur again in the future.

title: Great Location, but disappointing service.
review: We stayed here because of the location and the suites have a kitchenette. The kitchen was mandatory for us for my wife's dietary needs to prepare her own meals. Unfortunately, they don't seem to make sure that each suite has the standard utensils required to prepare your own meals. We were told to call the restaurant for the items we were missing, but were informed it would be an hour for them to deliver, so we had to go down to pick up ourselves. My wife required a serrated knife to cut some pineapple and other things and they said they could only provide her with a regular table knife. The pool was nice, but they require more lounge chairs around the pool for the size of the hotel. One day there was no towels and we requested towels twice, but no one showed up. There were kids…

title: Has gone downhill
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Great location in Ft Lauderdale
review: My parents and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights prior to a cruise.  We had booked a 2 bedroom suite and the room was a perfect size for us.  We arrived early on February 18 and was not surprised that the room was not yet ready.  We left our bags with the valet and had lunch at Vue.  The service was a little on the slow side, but the food was good.  The location is very good next to the Galleria Mall and a short walk to the beach.  When the check-in time was near we checked with the front desk and was told 20 minutes. This is where one of the problems started.  We waited the 20 minutes and went back and was told it still wasn't ready.  There was 1 other group that was having the same problems as us in the lobby.  The 2 of us asked to speak to a manager, unfortunately didn't…

title: Vue on the Water Restaurant was fabulous!! (inside hotel)
review: Me, my 10 year old daughter and my 77 year old mother stayed at the Galleryone last week -- we purchased the cruise package which included the hotel night, transport to the cruise port and breakfast.  Loved the hotel!  The restaurant was a great treat -- especially our waitress Allison -- very personable and attentive!  Brandan the cook did a great job with the food - great selection and it was fresh.  Loved the cookies at check in.  Great view from our room.  My daughter loved the pool.  Just an overall great experience!  Bravo to the staff -- all friendly, all helpful!

title: Check before booking
review: Wow; thanks so much for your kind words about your experience and about Allison and Brandon. I will make sure I share with our entire team and we are so happy you enjoyed your stay!

title: A hotel that makes you feel like you're staying with a good friend that you really like.
review: We had been to this place before and liked it because we had some personal business to transact and the front desk staff had been extremely helpful to us. We chose to go back because of that experience and its convenient location.  Then we arrived by limo, this time by rental car, and immediately experienced a downside.  There is no self-parking so you have to use the valet service at $30 a pop plus tips.  A few moments later we knew were were going to be another $20 down (we were there two nights) because this place is one of the few it seems to me which still charges for wi-fi.  How management can justify that when wi-fi is such a commodity worldwide and offered free in so many places gets me.  There are 230 suites - not a bad earner each night when they are full...  Our suite…

title: Frist time stay
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. As with all hotels in our market, parking is not included in the rate and we keep our a bit lower than most. Regarding WiFi, we do charge unless you are a Hilton Honors member which is free to join. Again, most full service hotels do charge. I do apologize for the lack of supplies in your room. I will share with my team so this does not occur again. Thanks once again and we hope to see you back.

title: Overbooked
review: First I must say I have never ever written a review for any hotel.  I am not a person to be easily impressed by any person, place or thing.  I am the first to complain when something goes wrong or is not right but I must give credit where credit is due .   I came to Florida for The week of February 20 through the 27th, 2016. , to attend workshops and to enjoy the sun .  Tomorrow to my dismay I must return home. GALLERYone- A doubletree Hotel, at 2670 E. Sunrise Blvd. in Fort Lauderdale, has truly been my little oasis and home away from home. They knew I was traveling alone and anxious because I didn't know where anything was. They were so pleasantly accommodating and even checked on me several times by text.  I guess they just wanted to make sure that I was doing OK.  My suite…

title: Pre Cruise Stay
review: My wife and I stayed here one night with our large cruise group. We found the staff, hotel, bar and restaurant to be very good. Our room was clean and appeared   recently re-done or at least it was in great shape. The only negative was one sink was leaking a little bit at the faucet handle but that is a simple packing tightening. Nice shower. The room was clean and showed not much wear and tear. Though close to the Galleria Mall we elected to eat at the hotel. We were a bit tired plus I had reviewed the mall restaurants and found them to be VERY pricy. The hotel restaurant was surprisingly good for dinner. A shrimp appetizer was very well done. My main course of red Snapper was great. Skin was left on to confirm the fish type. The prices were very reasonable compared to others…

title: Poor maid service and front desk
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team treated you so well. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent staff
review: We have been staying at the GALLERYone's more expensive Hilton cousin on Beach Blvd the past three years for 3 week stays and walked by this property on a regular basis on our way to the mall and the grocery store. As we decided to do a 10 day cruise this year and book end the cruise with a 6 and 5 day pre and post cruise hotel stays, we thought that we should give this property a try for the post cruise portion of our stay in FLL. We stayed from February 8 to 13 in room 1020, a 2 queen bed balcony suite.  When we arrived around 10 AM we were very surprised to find that they had a room available for us. However, the room assigned to us was on the 5th floor and directly beside the lift bridge. I pointed out to Troy that I had requested a room on a high floor away from the bridge…

title: Desperate need of improvements
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to see that you found our hotel to be clean and the breakfast service to be good. However, I do apologize for the other issues you experienced and I will share with my entire team. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice Staff, Great Location, Tired & Tatty Hotel
review: This hotel has an excellent staff that went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful. Grounds were beautiful and the water taxi right outside hotel was great. Allison on the breakfast crew was great. The hotel manager was wonderful. Despite a few difficulties connecting with spotty internet in our room, I would look forward to staying at this property again.

title: Better off anywhere else
review: The property is poorly maintained.  There was actually a lighting fixture in the dining room that was broken and hanging over the table where guests were eating, and no one seemed to care.  My room was dirty, the furnishings were out of date, and when things did not work, I was told there was nothing that could be done.  This is not really a hotel so much as a condo that rents to travelers.  They are not prepared for and do not know how to cater to business travellers.  Do not stay here, you will feel completely ripped off, I know I did.

title: Great service
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate and I will make sure I share with my entire team so that these issues do not occur again. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: poor service
review: Great service, food was good, clean room. Stay was excellent, would recommend highly! The seminar rooms were comfortable and serviced well. Close to shopping and the beach, within walking distance to enjoyment.

title: My stay
review: Wow; thanks so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our food and that the team treated you so well. I am also pleased to hear that you found your room to be clean and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Not sure If I will stay again at this hotel!
review: Service was slow. If you have children they are not accomodating. We got stuck with a handicap room with an 8 month old. It took them 2 hours to get us a crib. I made the reservations months ahead of time. The pool area to was dirty and the chairs/tables were broken.

title: Significant Disappointment and Frustration
review: We stayed at this Hotel some 8 years ago or so, had a good experience. Decided to stay again with family. What a difference! The suite was in average to poor condition; there were insufficent dishes, cups, etc., the dishwasher didn't work, the toilets didn't flush properly, the service forgot paper towels, etc., but the two most glaring deficiences were that the refrigerator froze the fruits and vegetables for the grandchildren, even after it was supposedly repaired (loss of over $100) and the wifi did not work for the entire week even after bringing it to the hotel staff's attention on many occasions, their response was to blame AT&T for the entire week. In all, even as a Hilton Honors member I cannot recommend this place to anyone. In addition, on my future travels I will now…

title: Nice place
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to post your review. We love feedback, whether it be positive or negative and I do apologize for the issues that you experienced. Although we strive to deliver the perfect stay for each and every one of our valued guests, we can sometimes drop the ball and learn from our mistakes. This is definitely not how we normally operate. We did discuss this as a team and I do see that we sent up a fruit platter and also gave you 5 Breakfast Buffets for you and your family. I know that this is a small gesture of goodwill, but I do hope that it helped. Once again , my apologies and we do hope that you continue to stay with Hilton Hotels.

title: Great location, view
review: Been here a few times.  It's a great location near the beach.  The larger rooms and friendly staff make for a nice trip.  The Vue restaurant was great.  We had a few small issues that were quickly resolved.

title: Excellent customer service
review: Thank so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that the team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Not what I exspected fro HILTON!
review: I have been here twice for meetings.  Rooms, staff and views are wonderful.  I think the bar and restaurant could use a bit of help in quality of food and enough staff at the bar to handle sudden influx of people from boats. Rooms are very nice.  Recommend the ocean view, can't beat it.  Facilities for meetings are excellent as was the food and service for same.

title: Great stay after cruise
review: A large group, 14 people, needed a place to stay for 6 hours after a cruise before we caught a flight. We rented a one bedroom here so we had a place to put our luggage and relax. What a great choice it was to stay at this hotel. Friendly and courteous staff who gave everyone warm smile and a cookie upon check in. We needed a crib for an infant to have nap in. It was there in less than 5 minutes. The rooms are large and clean. Great little bar that has happy hour. The hotel sits on the intercostal with water taxi service right to its dock. It's also only one block to the beach and about two blocks from a great mall and restaurants. The pool and hot tub overlook the intercostal and all those wonderful big yachts floating buy. They had no problem with a short stay, bringing in…

title: Good Short Stay Hotel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the staff treated you so well. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: TOTAL RIP OFF!! Avoid at all costs!
review: Used this hotel for 2 nights prior to a cruise. The hotel is in an ideal location for access by car to the port. The hotel itself was clean but looking tired and in need of a refurbishment. The food in the restaurant was ok but a better selection is needed.

title: Wedding
review: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the location. We hope to be able to host you again soon!

title: Disappointed
review: $250+ a night for the most run down, poorly maintained hotel I have ever stayed in. ON top of being ripped off on price, they force you to valet, they force you to use their bellman, all so they can take more money from you. The room/bathroom had lots of stains, mold spores on the ceiling, paint on everything, and was loud. Such a disappointment in Hilton. We will not return and I encourage you to avoid.

title: Great wedding weekend
review: We had a great time...beautiful view on the waterside.  They were helpful in getting most of our wedding guests in a bit earlier than checkin time, and the front desk was friendly and helpful.  My tour before booking did show some wear and tear on the room we saw...but I didn't see that in any of the rooms we visited with our guests.  The hotel may still be remodeling some of the rooms and yes..it would be nice to have free wifi in all rooms when you pay that price for a room.  But overall...expect a beautiful view, very pretty lobby and great customer service!!

title: Ok visit
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so happy that we were able to accommodate some of your guests early and that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Please don't stay here
review: Nice hotel with friendly efficient staff. However as it was a business trip I was not impressed at the unavailability of free wifi, something that is now almost standard in most hotels worldwide. The rooms were quite nice and well cleaned. I had an awesome riverside view from my room overlooking the berthed yacht and bridge. Overall would recommend for stay.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your view and you found the rooms to be "quiet and clean". If you do join Hilton Honors, you do receive complimentary wifi as well as many other benefits. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Unfortunate this is part of the Hilton brand
review: If you want shabby, dirty, poorly maintained premises, useless wifi,overpriced charges stay here.Otherwise stay away.Rooms are worn out and poorly cleaned.Corridors not cleaned at all,wifi is non existent.

title: Our Stay-Cation
review: We needed to get away from home so decided to drive to Fort Lauderdale and stay at GalleryOne.  I was pleasantly surprised by how professional everyone was from the moment we got out of our car to the minute we left.  Even the hotel manager was visible most of the day greeting customers.  I was truly impressed.  The rooms were nice and had a kitchen where you could cook.  We chose not to cook because there were so many restaurants in walking distance and we were on a staycay!  We had an intercostal view that was beautiful.  We woke up the days we were there and walked over the bridge to run by the ocean.  After our run we ate at the hotel restaurant buffet.  The water taxi was my favorite part.  You could see all the sites on a boat for $25.  The pick up was at the hotel too so…

title: Great Pre-Cruise Holiday
review: Wow; thanks so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to here that you enjoyed your mini vacation! I am also happy to hear how well the staff treated you and that you enjoyed the Water Taxi. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: They did it again
review: We normally stay at Embassy Suites on 17th Street before a cruise but this time booked our flight and hotel with the cruise line and they didn't offer Embassy but did offer Gallery One so we booked this hotel. Upon arrival we were greeted at the front desk and offered warm cookies - nice touch. Our room was fantastic - massive - larger than the Embassy suites. Large bedroom with king size bed, large bathroom, separate living room and kitchen. The room would be perfect if you wanted to stay longer as the kitchen was well thought out for self catering. After a quick unpack we headed downstairs for a bit to eat. The restaurant was not busy and the service was fast and polite. The food was great. After dinner we went outside down to the waters edge and soaked up the atmosphere. The…

title: perfect stopover
review: Thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you would stay with us again. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location, great service but it is time for some property upgrades!
review: Our annual family vacation is right here. staff goes out of their way to help us many different ways. Outdoor pool and hot tub is fun, laundry on site helps, and convertible sofas make each one bedroom suite into useful family digs. Full kitchen except overnight, but icri wave works well, and stocked with dishes pots pans. Grocery across the street. And the oven is really 5 minutes walk from their front door, or the state park gives a continuum of ctivities for the kids. Can't say enough nice things about this place. Already booked for December 2016!

title: Very disappointed
review: Stayed for four nights. Stain on carpet and chair in room, Wifi was awful, even with a special access code given to us by the front desk.  The worst of it though was the mold in the living room above the air conditioning unit (Which I did not notice until the day before we were leaving)and the leak and wet carpet (more mold) in the king suite. One person in the room is highly allergic to mold and each day they stayed their symptoms got progressively worse. We did get one comp breakfast for our troubles but for the amount of money spent to stay their, this was hardly an adequate compensation.  Would not recommend.....

title: Refreshingly Great Customer Service
review: Wow, I am so sorry that you had a bad experience as this is not the norm for us. As you can see by our other reviews, we strive on providing impeccable service and clean rooms. I am so sorry we let you down. I will share with my team so that this does not occur again and we hope that you do give us another chance.

title: Exceptional facilities and customer experience!
review: Each & every interaction with a staff member was caring, personal & attentive. The accommodations were lovely. I had a suite which had everything you could need. Great view and very spacious. I also was pleasantly surprised by the food in the restaurant. It had numerous interesting items and the ones I tried were delicious!!  I highly recommend this hotel.

title: In addition to the Mayflower Hotel in London when I was eighteen, this was the most incredible hotel stay I have had!
review: Thank you so much for posting your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that the staff treated you so well and that you enjoyed our restaurant. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location
review: This hotel is a rare find...their attention to detail and outstanding customer service made our stay exceptional.  From the valet to the manager, they want to please and it is apparent!  I was there for a 3-day business trip and will definitely return for a leisurely stay!  Room service, bar, housekeeping, conference areas, and staff all aim to please and they deliver!

title: Great location an staff
review: Have stayed here many times an it's always exceptional. Starting with staff so welcoming an oh so helpful. The suites are exceptional with complete kitchen fully equipped. Huge bathroom. Large living area with balcony an great views. Huge bedroom area with double door that close if you want privacy from living area. Lots an lots of restaurants within walking distance. Breakfast buffet is typical but very good but awesome restaurant staff. Beautiful outdoor areas to sit an relax.

title: Convenient to Beach and shopping  but problems with  booking process
review: Wow; thank you so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Not worth the money - No Quality
review: We had a block of rooms reserved for our daughters wedding December 19. The pluses: The location was convenient to the Bonnett House  and beach  directly across the Intracoastal from the hotel and also to the Mall and restaurants nearby.  Our rooms were clean and the staff was friendly and efficient, especially Emily at the front desk who was able to straighten out some problems with reservations encountered by some of the wedding party.  The post wedding day brunch on the terrace Sunday morning was handled efficiently and the food was excellent.  On the downside,  several guests encountered frustrations booking rooms at the group rate reserved  for the wedding guests even though the block had not been filled and rooms were supposed to be available. Several calls were necessary…

title: They Never miss a beat
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the brunch the day after the wedding. I am so sorry that you experienced an issue booking rooms. I am very familiar with this wedding block and I know that some of your guests tried to book outside the block when we were almost sold-out. I also see that we were able to accommodate and for the ones that we didn't, there were some concessions made. I will look more into this so it doesn't happen again and thank you for staying with us.

title: I expected more
review: Stayed there five days. Toilet stopped up, air conditioner didn't work (report twice), wouldn't accept my military designation (thanks for not supporting your troops), had to ask on 4 different occasions for towels, bed not made when first arriving, Etc, etc, etc.

title: Luxury 5 star Hotel stay at a reasonable good deal rate!
review: Looking for a luxurious place to stay with fantastic views from each room at a reasonable price in Ft. Laderdale, Fla.? Look no further then the Double Tree Suites by Hilton Gallery 1 located at 2670 East  Sunrise Blvd. Why pay as much for a stay at other hotels such as the 3 and 4 star Holiday Inns or the Marriott Residence Inns and others when you can stay at a 5 Star hotel with it's large living room and separate  bedroom ( either Queen or King size comfortable beds. A separate   complete kitchen, and a large roomy  bathroom with a walk in shower your going to like!  Wonderful views from each room of the in land water way  with boats  and yachts of all types cruising by. Spectacular Christmas lights and decorations during our stay. Some rooms have balconies. Our corner unit #…

title: Good overnight stay
review: Wow; I am so excited that you had such a wonderful stay at our property. I am so pleased that you found your suite to be large and you enjoyed our spectacular views. I am also happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient to the mall and the Water Taxi. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Hotel needs an upgrade
review: Stayed after cruise with family in a 2 bedroom suite. Property looked older but inside the room looked renovated and modern. Several restaurants and beach within walking distance but lots of uber drivers around. Agree with other posts that bellmen may have arrangements with local shuttle services.  They tried to arrange the evening before leaving for the airport but took our chance with uber at 4:30 AM and had no issues.   Pool really needs a refresh and lounge chairs uncomfortable. Nice the water taxi stops at the hotel.

title: I'm a local resident: ideal if you want to explore Fort Lauderdale
review: Thanks so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our suites to be modern. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Hotel in worn out
review: Stayed end of Dec '15.  Checked into first room -- smelled damp and moldy.  Asked for a new room -- smelled damp, moldy, and like cigarettes.  Turned on fan to air our room and it got worse.  No self-part...hotel only offers $28 valet parking.  Workout room is kind of lame for a higher-end hotel.  Finally, thought breakfast was over-priced.  I know that hotels charge more than regular restaurants, but $24 for a regular breakfast buffet seems kind of ridiculous to me.  I will give the manager credit -- he asked me how my stay was while I was checking out and I politely told him about the rooms (didn't mention the other stuff).  He immediately credited me for my two nights of valet parking.  That was a nice, professional move on his part.  I left feeling much less angry.  However,…

title: Great Location with a mall next to it
review: Room was great with a mini kitchenette and living room. We were traveling with our child. So while mummy goes out to work, the sister does basic cooking (ingredients bought from grocery store nearby right across, we can always request for hotel's free ride there). As the mall was right next to the hotel, we did shopping, kill time there and by night, the elder sister gets to hit the bar after a long day babysitting. Place is not crowded, so very peaceful and safe. Maybe just a little problem with the wifi. Unable to connect at all for five days.

title: Dont hessitate, the right place to stay
review: Wow; thanks so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the full kitchen in your suite. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Worst hotel wish we were back at Bahia mar
review: An overall excellent experience and great value.  Walking distance to the beach but on the intercoastal with  a great view, Friendly and warm and highly recommend when going to Fort Lauderdale although its off the main drag.

title: Service with a Smile!
review: Thank you so much for posting your awesome 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: 2 Bedroom Suite December 2015 Stay
review: Ok this hotel should really be a five star but I have to give it a one star. Not sure if it's because we just stayed at Bahia mar and enjoyed it or if this hotel is poorly run.  Not sure as a guest I should have to alert the staff that the room smells like a garbage dump multiple times or if anyone cleaning the room should have noticed.  Not sure I should alert the staff that the shower door isn't closing in and floods the floor ? Don't they clean the shower.    I'm ok with having to ask for more pillows but the towel shortage is historic.  First day needed to get an extra towel since there are four of us - today had to get four towels as there aren't any.  Bahia mar gave me breakfast voucher for two adults and two Kids. This place only for two adults.  Switched hotels for a…

title: This hotel would not be my first choice again
review: Neither I or my family was impressed with this hotel, especially it being a Hilton brand. Twice during our 6 day stay we had to contact maintenance because the wall outlets in the kitchenette area did not work. The only ice machine was on the 4th floor and it was broken. You had to go to the front desk for ice. The shower leaked onto the bathroom floor, cleanliness was not up to par, and one day we returned to the room after it was serviced and there were no towels left. All in all, very disappointing. The best service during our stay ? The car valet people. The overnight parking fee was ridiculus $28.00 but the valet guys were always kind, smiling, and friendly. We had 7 rooms for a family wedding and everyone had some sort of issue at one time or another

title: Would not stay here again
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I would like to apologize for the issues that you experienced regarding the maintenance. I will discuss with my team so it does not occur again. I am happy to hear that the valet team took such good care of you. We do hope that you give us another chance in the future.

title: Okay hotel but not worth the money
review: We arrived from our flight at 930 at night to find that they had sold our room because they were "sold out" and "our credit card would not run to confirm."  I am a Hilton Honors member, and have stayed here before - and the problem was the credit card company had just sent a new card. They said they called - and that was a lie as I had no missed calls or messages while we were in the air.   I had picked this hotel - though it is out of the way from the cruise port - because they are in walking distance to Starbucks for breakfast and publix and we needed to pick up things before our cruise.  They said that they "had booked and paid for us to have a room at another hotel."  That makes zero sense in light of the above.  After I got angry, they magically found a king suite next to a…

title: GALLERYone -Excellent Choice for Business and Pleasure
review: I would like to apologize for the oversold situation that occurred during the time you stayed with us. This is an extreme rarity but does happen at all hotels from time to time as guests stay longer than anticipated. I am happy to hear that we were able to find you a room and do hope that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Absolutely horrible service
review: The location is great but overall hotel is okay. Hot tub is cool, they are constantly out of pool towels, rooms are nice and large with small kitchen. Air conditioning didn't work that great either.  Ask for room on higher floors you can watch the cruise ships come and go which is fun. Easy walk to the beach

title: Wonderful
review: Claudio the manager, was an amazing person! Helped us through checkout and everything! The staff was brilliant and the suite we had was beyond wonderful! We had a king suite with an ocean view. I can't wait to come back!

title: Nice spot - great location
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that Claudio too ksuch good care of you. I will share your kind words with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: dining at Vue
review: This is a nice spot to stay.  Right on the intracoastal with a nice view.  Rooms are very large as they are all suites.  Comfortable and clean all around.  My only negative is the bar service.  They need a better cocktail program with some specialty drinks.

title: We loved it!
review: Thank you so much for posting your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite and that you found it to be clean and comfortable. Regarding the bar, Hilton is rolling out a new drink menu and we hope you come back soon to try it out!

title: Nice hotel if you don't have a car
review: We went to the event at the Vue to watch the Winterfest Boat Parade. Nicole Wengert handled our reservation and was attentive and informative to our party of six from the reservation process through the excellent buffet dinner. we are repeat customers at this event and would recommend the Vue and their staff.

title: Excellent reception, beautiful views, and comfortable lobby
review: Upon entering the hotel, I was immediately welcomed and quickly taken care of. Any immediate issues (such as WIFI) were handled with attentiveness and care. Ralph helped assisted me upon our late arrival and Anisa continued the excellent customer service the following morning. A great destination spot! Just look at that view!

title: Great hotel and location
review: Wow; I am so happy to hear how well you were treated by our team and that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you so much for posting your review and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Lovely hotel
review: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Rooms were comfortable and the location can't be beat. Several restaurants within walking distance. The bar area is quite small but had a good selection of beers in the evening. Was not crowded and much quieter then a couple other nearby Hilton hotels. Would have stayed again and again but their rate is a bit higher then other Hilton properties.

title: Great Location and Property
review: Thanks so much for posting your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite and our location. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Good Price and Location, Inconsistent Service
review: We have just returned from a short stay at the Gallery One,from start to finish the staff could not have been more helpful especially Troy,Mellissa and Ryan all on the front desk..The hotel is in a good location for shopping,beaches,bars and restaurants only a short walk away. We had a 2 bedroom suite which was spacious and well presented,the only problem we came across is that the wifi in the room was very intermittent.

title: Very nice building and personel
review: Loved their staff and the location is perfect.  check out all the fun local attractions and most of all, the staff is always willing to help.  I'd definitely recommend and will come back soon.  Check out the mall too!

title: Best location and staff!!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Disaster boat show
review: Dione was very friendly and helpful in assisting my request.  Her service was above and beyond any I have experienced.  The hotel is clean and has a feeling of being at  home away from home.  The location is great and central to everything.   It is walking distance from the beach.

title: Wonderful views and great location
review: Wow; thanks so much for your awesome review and your kind words about Dione. I will make sure I share with my entire team and we hope to see you back again soon.

title: Chic!
review: This hotel is dirty. We went to see the boat show more employees than paid visitors and still long waits for service all over front desk outside bar. Recommend more managerial attention to detail. Bathroom filthy, food cold, outside deck dirty. Will not go here again who ever is in charge open your eyes changes are needed. Such a lovely hotel sad to see not managed properly.

title: Balling on a budget
review: This hotel just does not fit the price. Gallery One is a chic hotel with all the amenities a guest would need, in a great location, for a very reasonable price. The suites are big and comfortable, with a separate kitchen, living/dining combo with a sleeper sofa and a separate master bedroom with huge bathroom. The hotel is walking distance to the ocean, which is great for walks and swimming if the waves aren't too brutal. There are many restaurants and little eateries nearby, walking distance even, so you don't have to keep getting your car from the valet......the valet, one of the downfalls I have with this hotel. Don't get me wrong, I love driving up somewhere and just handing my keys to the valet and not have to worry about finding a parking spot, but at that price, for…

title: Nice suite with a nice view
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you had a great stay and that you would come back. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Beautiful hotel !!!
review: First time here. Front desk staff was welcoming and helpful. Was upgraded to a nice suite with a view of the Intercostal waterway. Food was good both in the bar and for breakfast. Will definitely stay again.

title: Family Reunion
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your first stay with us and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice Stay - Would Recommend for a Short Stay
review: We stayed here the night before our cruise which also happened to be during boat week so everything was priced sky high over on 17th street. We saw this hotel last year when we took the sun trolley to this area for lunch. We are so glad we booked this, the rooms are HUGE, full living room, kitchen, large separate bedroom and bathroom. Beautiful views right on the waterway. Our room faced the cruise port area, it was very quiet. Very short walk to the beach. There is a Starbucks across the street, along with a Publix that has a huge wine selection. Next door to the Galleria mall, PF Chang's and the Blue Martini, we will be back!

title: Great location & service
review: I stayed here in November this year. It was my first time in Fort Lauderdale. I stayed here for business, my company chose the hotel for me. I stayed for two nights in a water view suite. The suite was very spacious, better than I expected. I arrived in taxi and the valet greeted me right away and assisted with my luggage. Check in was smooth had no issues except that I am craving more of the cookies I received when I arrived!!!!! Very nice treat after a long day of travelling. Thank you! The location was great, I wish I had more time to check out the area. It was nice to see the yachts go by from my balcony. One issue I had was the wifi since I was there for business, had to go down to the lobby for better connection. The hotel could be updated in some areas, it is a little run…

title: Large Rooms
review: Wow; thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay and that Ashley took such good care of you. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Great location , tired hotel
review: The rooms are very large and have kitchens...Great for families.. I had a suite and a view of the water. There is a water taxi, which is a fun way to get to restaurants in the area. Restaurant is terrible with very poor service. Marcel is a great Manager.

title: Wonderful place to stay and relax
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Marcel took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Another successful group stay and play.
review: the hotel was reasonably clean , not spotless as two small scrap pieces of paper remained on the carpet for two days . The staff were friendly and helpful no issues at all with them Particularly at the bar where the young lady was especially pleasant . But the hotel decor needs renewing its 90s styling is showing its age and it's so tired it's almost asleep

title: Not Up to Standard
review: I stay at Hilton properties frequently and am generally quite pleased. My family and I stayed in a two bedroom suite prior to leaving on a cruise and were disappointed in this property. The suite was very dated and needed refurbishing. The restaurant is an overpriced disaster with understaffing and poor service. The Internet for our room at the end of the ball was so weak we could not even pick up the Hilton wifi connection.The desk personnel were pleasant and helpful - without their help we would have never gotten a taxi to the cruise port because the people at the bell stand were not helpful at all and just wanted to push people into the shuttles which did not work for our family (2 young children and my wife was traveling with a broken arm in a sling). It makes me wonder if…

title: May not be on the beach but many other advantages.
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so sorry that you experienced some issues during your stay. Most guests enjoy our suites as they have all upgraded furniture and full kitchens. I am sorry that this was not what you found to be the case. Regarding the restaurant, we are priced a bit lower than other hotels in our area but I do apologize the the lapse in service as this is not the norm. Once again, thank you for your candid review and we do hope you give us another chance.

title: OUTSTANDING
review: Reception staff couldn't have been more pleasant on arrival. Waterway and bridge was never really a disturbance. Kitchens well supplied with everything you need and unlike other hotels didn't need to ask for crockery and cutlery to be sent up. It was all there and spotlessly clean.  Yes - there's a five min walk to the beach but the views are of beach and waterways for the most part; not the hotel next door for majority of rooms in ocean front hotels. Added advantage is the Galleria Mall within yards and Publix supermarket across the road with Myapapaya - an excellent little health food cafe and juice bar stop. Ocean front hotels have none of these. Looking forward to returning here in New Year.

title: nice stay
review: Wow; thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the front desk staff treated you so well. I will be sure to share your kind words and we look forward to seeing you back in 2016.

title: Relaxing 2 week vacation
review: Just spent 4 nights at this hotel. Room was very clean and the staff couldn't do enough to make our stay special. Great location with several restaurants and the mall next door. There also is a Publix food store with in a 5 minute walk which is great if your room has a kitchen. Do not miss utilizing the water taxi. Go up and down on the inter-coastal to see all the great views. The only problem I see with staying here in the near future is that the sea wall behind the hotel has been flagged as unsafe and as a result the water taxi no longer stops at the hotel (stop #9). Your option - go to stop #10 (park) which closes at 6:30PM and will cost you $2 to walk thru the park to get to the closest water taxi stop. This was a big issue for me because after my 1st day I had to taxi to…

title: Nice place and excellent location!
review: The hotel staff was very attentive and helpful. The room was small but everything we need, the view to the Marine and the sea amazing. The location of this hotel is perfect to move around close to the beach and to malls and restaurants and bars.

title: Nice part of Lauderdale
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone took such good care of you. See you again soon!

title: Great Experience with Large Wedding Group
review: Went to the boat show and the location was great being on the north end away from the crowds.  Water taxi stops every 10-15 minutes right at the hotel.  great plus we didn't know about.  Great staff, again nice to see hotel management understanding the importance of this "amenity".  Food ended up being good enough that we ate most of our meals there.  Rooms had decent ocean views and suites with functioning kitchenette.  Would stay there again.

title: Great Location
review: So happy to hear that you stayed with us during the boat show and that you enjoyed our Food & Beverage. We hope to see you again soon and thank you so much!

title: Amazing staff!! Thank you to both Amoys!
review: I personally worked with Nicole (sales dept) and their front desk staff for a large wedding group and it went very smooth.  Everyone in the wedding party had a great experience.  Location was fantastic to our wedding venue (The Bonnet House).  They accommodated a lot of our requests with a can-do attitude to make our wedding weekend special (for example:  late check-outs for bridal party, handing out gift bags at the front desk, kept bar open later for our guests, etc).  I would highly recommend this venue to all

title: Poor
review: Very disappointed , I checked in the day before but when I arrived my room was not ready it was after 8pm when I got into my room. The hotel had let the previous guest have a late check out and they did not apologize. We asked to use  house phone the next day and they said once we check out we had no excess to a phone to call a cb, we were forced to use their high priced shuttle service.

title: Great Place!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am so sorry that we did not have a room for you until late. This is not how we normally operate and I will look into why this occurred. I would also like to apologize for the miscommunication regarding your transportation needs. We do have a valet desk out front that will call a taxi for you 24/7 and we do not have a shuttle. I am not sure how this happened but again, I will look into this. Thank you once again for letting us know.

title: Very Disappointed; Two Bedroom Suite with Balcony Overlooks Huge Dumpster
review: We have had occasion to visit this property for the second time. The staff, especially those at the front end, are exceptional.   This time I had need of a recommendation for a cheese/wine place downtown. Anisa, at the front desk, didn't just provide a name, but included a map, a wine recommendation and how/where to park. Thank You, Anisa!!  The downside of this property is the drawbridge next to it on Sunrise Blvd. As heavier vehicles (busses and trucks) pass over the bridge there is considerable clanking and clattering. Not important during the day, but at 2-3AM quite noticeable.

title: crashing after a month ocean cruise
review: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Anisa took such good care of you. We do hope to see you again soon!

title: Summer holiday
review: We have stayed at many Doubletree Hotels and have always had a great experience.  In fact, Hilton is our brand of choice for hotels.  But showing up at this one has just been a huge letdown.   First of all, the hotel must cater to large travel groups.  We were literally deluged at the front entrance by a swarm of tourist coming off of a bus, half of whom ended up in front of us at the registration desk.  I can chalk that up to poor timing.  The tourist were all Brits and seemed very nice.  However, it does seem that the hotel could have a better system for checking in -- literally -- a bus load of people without making everyone else wait so long.   There is a reason I don't do group travel.  But, I will say the young lady at the front desk was very polite even though I was…

title: great location
review: Fantastic place to stay we had a suite for 4 and so much room. lovely aspect, clean tidy, comfortable and close to everything, theme parks etc. Pool bar and restaurant was fantastic and the staff...what can I say they were GREAT.

title: Boat Show made Easy
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you found our property to be clean and that everyone took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great hotel and location with one exception
review: We do bad the Doubletree on the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show website and booked from there. We arrived late Friday night and Anisa welcomed us warmly. As Hilton Honors members we enjoyed Fresno cookies and bottled water. We were hungry but everything had closed so went to the bar in the Lobby. Julie was ready to close but graciously stayed open for us to have a glass of wine. Our room was changed to a water view which was great. From room 720 we had the view of the intercostal and the ocean. Nice room with full kitchen. We also had breakfast vouchers for a continental breakfast. We upgraded to the buffet where Galina and Jackie served us well the two morning we sat down for breakfast. Michael made awesome omelettes and Bryan cleared the tables. The water taxi for the…

title: Excellent Place and Value
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the F&B team took such good care of you. I will share with my entire staff and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Tired
review: My second stay at this property and overall was very satisfied.  I feel the hotel is very well located, close to Publix grocery store, the Galleria Mall with a wide choice of top-notch restaurants-highly recommend the Capital Grille-and perhaps best of all there is a landing spot for the water taxi which I highly recommend for a great tour of the Ft. Lauderdale waterways.  Unfortunately, there is a problem with the location, depending on where your room is located.  My room was on the tenth floor with a nice view of the intercoastal waterway and the ocean off to the East.  However, on this north end of the building there is a very busy road and metal drawbridge that makes for a very noisy situation.  The traffic noise is constant and roaring during the day, less so at night.  I…

title: Like Coming Home in Paradise
review: This property is perfectly located and the staff are amazing from the valets to the front desk to housekeeping.  The property is aging but all of the other advantages help compensate for this aspect. Bring your walking shoes as it is an easy jaunt to the beach, restaurants, grocery store and a large very busy mall.

title: What a Fantastic Hotel and The Staff Is Out of This World, especially Marcel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our location to be convenient. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Ok rooms horrible customer service from upper managament
review: I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel this past weekend.  I am in the hotel business, and I can tell when the staff at a hotel, has a fantastic quarterback, this quarterback is Stuart (General Manager) and his right hand Marcel compliments each others talents.  Every employee you come in contact with, you see the customer service beaming with their smiles, Melissa and Amy at the Front desk proves that.  Housekeeping does a fantastic job, my room was cleaned everyday, and they didn't miss one thing.   Stuart, you should be very proud of Marcel, and the rest of your staff, they do an outstanding JOB!  Thank you for a wonderful weekend.

title: Huge rooms close to the beach!
review: Wow; thank you so much for the kind words. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone took such good care of you. We hope to see you again soon!

title: great clean property
review: The location where great, the hotel rooms where ok, by bathroom had some wear and tear, which I would have overlooked. The valet was great but the management was terrible, long story short my car got damaged. There is no option to not valet park it. When I bought this up they told me it was my own fault for parking it there and leaving it before noticing it. They kept blaming each other and no one took responsibility or tried even to understand how I felt. I would never stay here again just because knowing that if another issue would come up they would not be able to Handel it or take care of their guest in the proper way. They even tried to "offer" me a deal.. not sure what the offer was against?

title: Cooking and Convenience
review: It was great to stay at Gallery One for the kitchen and the convenience of preparing meals for a week.  Grocery stores are nearby and we rented bicycles to get around.    Staff was great and very accommodating.  Rooms were kept clean.  Oh, the best part was the sliding doors to the terrace.  Having fresh air in the room and a nice place to sit outside was an added pleasant surprise.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Great location.
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you took advantage of your kitchen and that you found our property to be clean. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent
review: Perfect for a few lazy days, nice and quiet location close to all the things you may need. Water taxi stops right at the property. Nice pool, but not enough sunbeds though....... Too much AC cooling in the reception area, very cold when you want to relaxe in the bar for a drink or 5...:)

title: Wedding Experience
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you found our location to be "great" and that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Weak wifi & Hotel needs maintenance
review: From the Minute I pulled up to the parking lot the Valet staff was very attentive. Amy at the front desk was very friendly and accommodating with my request. Stu Levy the General Manager is the best!!

title: Great Customer Service!
review: Stopped into this hotel to purchase water taxi tickets. The woman at the desk Liliana Casanova was exceptional! She was friendly, courteous and went out of her way to help us with the service this hotel offered. We were staying at another hotel in the area and the service at our hotel was lacking. We were staying at a high end hotel that cost more per night. She quickly got our tickets, Gave my Mom a hug after finding out we were celebrating her 9oth birthday. To top off the encounter she gave each of us a warm cookie. Big hit!  Dealing with Liliana was a breath of fresh air. Cannot rave enough about her. She is an asset to this hotel and because of the service she provided I would stay here and highly recommend it to others.

title: Great place to stay before our cruise
review: Wow; thank you so much for your kind words regarding Liliana. I am so happy to hear that the service that she provided you was top notch and we do hope you decide to stay with us in the future!

title: Very nice
review: We only had one night here before our cruise but it was ideal.  Close to the Galleria Shopping Centre and a supermarket as well.  The first room we were given was too noisy and overlooking the highway so we asked for another room which was no problem at all and it was much better.  Our room was huge with a kitchen and lounger, very nice. There's a Water Taxi stop right at the hotel which was great as we got on that and did a lovely evening tour stopping for dinner at Las Olas Boulevard. Staff were friendly and helpful in arranging transport to the ship the next morning.

title: Excellent hotel with great views
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our location and that you found our staff to be friendly. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Some good, some not so good.
review: Hey everyone has it goin i work at the Hampton Inn. And by far were the Best standing so if you all ever in fort Lauderdale. Plz come check us out Hampton Inn airport north ask for Tiffany but were affiliated with nothin but the best and i stayed at the gallery one hotel by double tree on sunrise like a 5mins  away from fort Lauderdale beach walkin distance the room i had i could see the beach and everything is was a very nice get away very peaceful the inside is like a museum very nice very. Relaxing i try to stay all when i have time try it you'll love it

title: Good size room for the price but the propety & management need an overhaul
review: You do get a good sized suite for the price of a room but it seems more like a timeshare type of place than a real doubletree.   Location is good but next to a huge piece of the mall that was a Saks Fifth Ave that is now out of business with an overgrown lot between that and the hotel.  sign on the building faded out.  Just rough overall.  Room front door had to be kicked in to open.  It was broken and stuck.   entrance driveway- all lights are banged up and dented or broken, empty lot with overgrown weeds to the right as you drive in.  was cutoff by valet upon pulling up.  Oh and it is $28 to park, mandatory valet.  Bricks throughout driveway were loose and broken, tripped on one of them.  check in was a mess- each time we were in the lobby there are just loud party people all…

title: Good stay
review: We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.

title: Gallery One in need of thorough maintenance and better cleaning
review: Stayed for 7 nights. More than happy with our room.  Spacious living area, well equipped bathroom, very comfortable bed and small kitchenette.  Check in polite and professional and the housekeeping staff very pleasant.  We had breakfast twice in the restaurant and used the Starbucks facility a few times, all perfectly acceptable.  We found the outside pool area disappointing, an after thought area which was neglected.  Perhaps we went on wrong day.  The water taxi stop at the hotel was a bonus, very convenient. Our room was city view but didn't suffer any noise although we were in a high floor. With regard to costs during stay, we were aware of parking charges so cannot moan when we were billed.  We are Hilton members so WiFi was complimentary. Breakfast was quite expensive but…

title: Great Business Trip
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. I am so pleased to hear that you found our property to be clean and that our team treated you so well. I am sorry that you did not enjoy the city as we are one of the top destinations in the country. But we do hope that you give Ft. Lauderdale another chance as it is truly paradise.

title: Great Location and Helpful staff
review: We stayed in app. 1425, a private residence @ Gallery One. Top floor, great view ( sea and intracoastal) and as we discovered later on the right side of the complex (the other side is adjacent to a busy road and a lot of noise from the steel bridge). So travellers be aware of that! The design of the room was nice, but fingerprints and dust were everywhere (!) And since the appartement wasn't serviced during our 5-day stay this was a major disappointment.Good bed, ample bathroom and nice balcony.  The building itself (including the pool) has different issues regarding mainenance (cracks, loose tiles, broken parasols, bubbly carpet in the halway, worn out paint). The great location is Gallery One's USP: great mall, restaurants, Publix, provincial park, watertaxi-stop, the beach…

title: Great rooms, friendly staff
review: Stayed for one night on a business trip to Ft. Lauderdale. Checked in late but was tended to immediately and given the signature Doubletree cookie. Room was very spacious and clean and had a nice view overlooking the water. Will stay again when in town.

title: Very disappointing way to treat loyal customer
review: Thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you found our suites to be clean and spacious and that the front desk treated you so well. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: horrible experience .. never again
review: I have been staying at this hotel 5 or 6 weeks a year for the past 8 years and have Diamond status Hilton Honors membership.  However my recent experience has left me with a very bad taste such that I will probably never stay here again.  In short I always stay in a room with a balcony (most rooms have a balcony so its not been a problem in the past) but when I checked in on this occasion I was allocated a small angular shaped room with no balcony.  This has happened a few times in the past but the hotel staff have always resolved it immediately without any problem.  This time they would not change rooms unless I paid extra.   The Manager I spoke to was very unhelpful  The room itself has a kitchen but there are basics missing (cups, spoons!!) and some of the appliances do not…

title: family fun near the beach, on inland waterway
review: Thank you for your review. I am so sorry that you had this experience. I understand that you spoke to Marcel at the front desk and he explained  since you did book through a third party site, we can only give you the room you reserved which was a handicapped accessible room. Hilton Honors benefits are only available if you book through Hilton. We do appreciate your loyalty and do hope to see you again.

title: Excellent service and a friendly atmosphere
review: The room is nice  and clean  .. and .the view wonderful ,  But the  service  at breakfast area was horrible  , the food very poor and disgusting, the continental  breakfast   is " nothing" ,  they   treat us like  a homeless  ...  the pool  area  horrible  too ..It was bombed..most tiles  are broken  .. even at our bathroom. the internet  its not working all day..The phone line too NEVER AGAIN

title: Excellent suites
review: Very nice, suites are great, just the right size, and being right on the ICW makes for a great experience.  Business trip was very enjoyable in large part due to this facility being top-notch. Would gladly go back again.

title: Nice property, walking distance to shops, restaurants & beach--- unfortunately noisey.
review: Wow; thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you will be back. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Not the best not the worst
review: I'm a Hilton Diamond member and travel frequently for work and for pleasure. The Doubletree is in a great location within walking distance to shopping, great restaurants and the beach. The property is nice, very clean and the service was excellent. I had booked a city view and was upgraded to a water view on the 10th floor. While a very nice view, there was noise all night from the cars going over the bridge, not to mention the boats. Also worth noting, the sliding doors out to the balcony make a ton of noise when opening so it didn't help that the people above us were constantly going in and out of their balcony late at night. I will probably not return again as there are other Hilton properties in the area, however if I ever did I would definitely ask for a room on the very…

title: Excellent Stay
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. I am so happy to hear that you found your suite to be clean and that the staff treated you so well. I do apologize for the noise that you experienced. As we do not hear this complaint frequently, I will investigate. I assume some of the rooms on the side of the bridge may hear some type of noise. Thank you once again and we do hope to see you back.

title: awsome!
review: Well it's Fort Lauderdale, so it's expensive. That is the first thing you need to know. The worst part of this hotel is the valet parking $30.00 a day and you have no choice. They park your car about 40 feet away. This is a major fleecing. There is no need for this service. The hotel was full and there were plenty of spaces as I checked it out. The next issue is the bellman, they really try to give you no choice and are clearly working for tips, I digress. The staff at the front desk is nice and helpful. The lobby is spacious and has a bar, a Starbucks and a restaurant, all are way over priced. The room was a queen suite. The room was very clean and had a living room area and a bedroom. This room also has a small kitchenette. The kitchen has a small refrigerator, stove, full…

title: Great Service!
review: This was a fantastic hotel with a great location.  The front desk staff was very friendly and it had the fastest valet service of any hotel I have ever stayed at (awesome job!).  The rooms were very nice, had a fridge, microwave and dishwasher...so it was perfect for business travelers.  The workout room was a little crowded during peak times so I had trouble getting on some of the equipment.  But overall a great place to stay! Near the beach and lots of things to do within walking distance!

title: Home away from home
review: Thank you so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the front desk staff took such good care of you. We do hope to see you back again soon.

title: Wow...Clueless at the Front Desk!
review: We stayed one night pre-cruise. We had an early flight in and were at the hotel by 12:45. Even though check-in was at 3:00 pm, our room was ready. We were on the 9th floor and faced the waterway. We sprung for a balcony with french doors and it was totally worth it. We stocked up at the grocery store and had lunch and breakfast the next day in the room (there were basics available in the kitchen; plates, bowls, mugs, silverware, pots and pans). Since we are HiltonHonors members, we had free standard wi-fi, which worked fine and I was able to stream movies. I used the fitness center in the morning. There was no one else in there and the treadmill worked ok. We took the hotel offered shuttle to the crusie, but not before being offered those amazing chocolate chip cookies again.…

title: Excellent Hotel Excellent Location Excellent Service
review: Wow; thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the large suite. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Still a Great Find in te Ft. Lauderdale area
review: As a loyal Hilton Diamond Member travelling professionally for 14 years, I just experienced a true "first" when calling the Galleryone Doubletree Hotel.  Because some properties offer different benefits to loyal customers, I call ahead to see if there are executive lounges, etc.  The gal who answered the phone tonight had no clue.  She said to look at the website, call back during the day.  After expressing that she should be able to easily know what diamond benefits are offered.  When she realized this, she offered to take my number and have the manager call me tomorrow.  No thanks...  If you can't serve me on the phone, I'm not going to risk it on the property!  I'll pass.  Hotels are a dime a dozen.

title: Excellent facility
review: Love, love, love this hotel.  Probably wouldn't think of staying any where else.  The size of the suites is great.  The beds are very comfortable and linens are top quality.  Front desk agents are very friendly and love the warm chocolate chip cookies. Yes, a few items need updating but overall everything is nice.

title: Excellent property, ideal location
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your large suite and that the front desk team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Love the place
review: My sister and I recently stayed at this hotel while visiting family.  The location is IDEAL for the beach, shopping and restaurants/bars within easy walking distance.  The staff are warm and helpful at the front desk, valet and throughout the property.  Rooms are spacious and clean - love the balconies. Liliana was gracious and warm upon our check out (and that's not just because she offered us another warm cookie - ha).  Definitely will stay here again.

title: Family fun in Fort Lauderdale
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you and your sister totally enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Hilton DoublTree Ft Lauderdale
review: Good location, friendly employees! Specially the people at the front desk, very close to the beach you can go in 5 minutes walking perfect for the summer! Rooms were big spacious I definitely would come again if I was given the choice

title: Wonderful Hotel for Family
review: This was a fabulous hotel. My wife and I walked through the lobby 2 years ago when visiting Ft. Lauderdale and using the water taxi and decided to stay in the hotel during our visit this time. The rooms are super quiet and comfortable. The washrooms are spectacular and the front desk service is great. Highly recommend this hotel and we will stay there again when in town.

title: Really needs an overhaul
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our hotel to be "wonderful for family". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Good hotel
review: We stayed in a room for five nights.  The interior of the hotel was okay, but not as inviting as I expected for this hotel.  Restaurant was quite tasty.  Outdoors along the waterway was a disappointment.  The sidewalks along the river were falling apart, railings were rusted and the "benches" were almost ground level.  The pool area was very small and disappointing.  The room size was okay but no wifi in the rooms.. Also, the business center air conditioner was not working and it was difficult to get my work done.

title: Excellence!
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. However, I am a bit confused as we do not have railings along the waterway and there are no benches. Also, we do have WiFi in all of our rooms. I will try sending you an inbox message as I am wondering if you reviewed the wrong hotel. Thank you so much.

title: Valet parking only and no in-room wifi
review: Nice food. Lovely bed. Appropriate guest attention.  Could do with better iluminated rooms  The food was really good overall. Would recommend to others. The location is good, with nice restaurants nearby, nice bars and is also located near to the beach.  The Gym is quite small but other than that everything was good.

title: They Charge $10 for WIFI and $28 for Parking a day
review: Great hotel except for the EXTRA MADATORY charges per Day. I was not informed of the MANDATORY daily EXTRA charges when the room was booked online. Please call ahead and make sure you are aware of all the extra charges before booking this hotel. The Cookies were great and offered to me whenever I asked.

title: Visitor Beware!
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our property. I am sorry that you were under the impression that parking and wifi were included in the rate. We do offer complimentary wifi for all Hilton Honors guests so it may be a good idea to sign up for this free program. Our website clearly states the parking fee and wifi as well as any confirmation you receive after booking the room. All full service hotels charge for parking in our market and we tend to be a little less than most. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Awful!
review: I did not stay here this time but had a business meeting in the lobby. Lobby and staff are nice. There is no self parking so you are forced to valet. The visitor rate is $14 (I was there less than 2 hours). By the time you tip it is $20 as a guest. I don't mind paying for parking but I was not expecting this. I really dislike when hotels force valet parking!

title: I will be back
review: Thank you for taking the time to post your review. I am so happy to hear that you felt our hotel and staff were nice. However, I am sorry that you felt the parking fee was excessive. As with almost all hotels in our area, we do offer valet parking only as a service to our guests and do offer the discounted rate of $14.00 for daily parking as opposed to overnight. Although you only stayed 2 hours, you were able to stay all day and enjoy the property. Unfortunately, nobody offers hourly rates for parking. Once again, thank you for your review and we do hope you decide to stay with us in the future.

title: great hotel
review: I have stayed in hotels.all over the USA, usually in Hilton properties.  This place was a horrible choice.  It appears to be a renovated older building.  The lobby is nice and the staff is off the charts wonderful.  As far as the property goes, though,  it was horrible.  The hot tub was anything but hot, and there was no circulation. We tried it out several times during out two day stay and it was never any warmer than the pool.  The housekeeper for out room didn't even collect all the dirty towels,  and left NO fresh ones.  The only thing I could see that was done was that the beds were made. The worst thing was the fact that, with no indication,  the hotel puts a hold on your credit card for $200 per day of your stay to cover "incidentals".  I have NEVER had this done at any…

title: Watch the Boats Go By
review: The Hotel is beautiful, right on the Inter coastal water way. The rooms were clean and spacious with all of the amenities. Our room had a great view of the water way. There was a great pool and outside sitting area to watch the boats go by.
