We had a destination wedding for our son in Florida and blocked out a bunch of rooms for our out of town family and friends. The front desk was great and check-in for all our guests went smoothly.  A special thanks to Nicole Wengert the Hotels Event Manager. She managed our group stay and was unbelievable making sure all our out of town guests were taken care of.   Overall a great wedding, great weather, great Hotel and great staff.

title: Wonder stay!!
review: Thank you so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay during your family wedding. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Let's Sums of the Cons and Pros
review: I am from New York. I stayed at this hotel and I had an awesome experience. The rooms were modern. I stayed for six nights and it was quite comfortable the beds were very comfy, it's been the most comfortable Hotel bed I have slept in in a long time. The Hotel is clean and customer service is great. The Hotel is close to everything resturants, Shopping and the Beach was right down the block. I stayed on the 8th floor over looking the waterway the view us fabulous to wait up to every morning. Whenever I am in the Fort Lauderdale area this will definitely be the place for me to stay.

title: worn rooms, disgusting carpet, noisy
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our property to be clean. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Good location and a nice property
review: Yes, you can get a worn room with spots of old carpet, but then it was free upgrade suite with lots of room for 5  people with a great view. So there is the trade.   Very good location, you can walk to the mall, restaurants,  there is a nice sunset, close to beach , close to airport, happy hour at the bar The continental buffet for gold members is nice as well.  Very good coffee.   Yes, there are No good parking locations, to my surprise - I had no choice , but to use their parking garage. This was a bit of a shock.   But, lastly, what really annoyed me was they allowed smoking by the pool and they guests would drop their cigarettes on the pool side or on the food plates and no one all day long would clean up the plates.  It was really disgusting. Overall,  I slept well, they…

title: Nickle and Dime Institution
review: The hotel is fine enough and the staff are friendly and helpful. BUT they kill you on extras. ONLY Valet parking available at $28.00 per night. Despite 3 acres of vacant land they say belongs to the Mall. ( Lies ) They say if you stay a week  they can drop the charge to $18:00 but 9 nights in two rooms doesn't qualify. Head Valet Phillip rules this domain. Weak WiFi at $10.00 per night. Package receiving charge of $5.00 each. $21.00 breakfast is unconscionable. Shortsighted people. My last stay they got the full $28.00 for 9 nights in two rooms but they will never get another room night out of me.

title: Less than i expected
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you liked our hotel and that the staff treated you well. However, I am sorry that you found the prices of parking, internet and food to be expensive. All hotels in our market charge for parking and we tend to keep our fees a bit less expensive. Our breakfast buffet is abundant and for what you get, again we are a bit less expensive than others. I do hope that after researching other hotels in the area, you do decide to give us another chance.

title: GALLERY ONE DOUBLETREE SUITES by HILTON, Fort Lauderdale, Florida
review: So i try not to nitpick and only write about things that are good or can be corrected, with that being said i have been a Diamond member with Hilton for 5 years and the GalleryOne is a disappointment.   first off the building is old and worn and needs some love.  everything here is expensive (to be expected at a beach location), but $3.18 for a can of soda is a little much. $28.00 for overnight parking is also high   The power outlets in the room are not in convenient locations  The hotel staff needs to pay a little more attention to the Florida grime that collects near air conditioning units and faucets and make a point to clean it. If this was a Hampton inn i would not even mention that, but this is a DoubleTree and more is expected from them  *nitpicking As a diamond member i…

title: Great hotel, friendly staff
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your candid review. I am happy to hear that you found our valet and front desk staff to be "top notch". However, I do apologize for the inconsistencies in some areas which are a bit concerning. I will address these issues with my team so they do not occur again. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location and lovely views
review: Needed some me-time, and this was the right hotel to be at! The hotel was quiet, not crowded, "excellent customer service," blush and comfortable bedding, and the food and drinks was superb! I was also blessed to be upgraded to a water-view suite which made my stay even better!!

title: Great Location for adults! Not so much for families.
review: The Good: the hotel is located between The Galleria Mall and the beach!  It's nice for adults.  Happy Hour was okay $3 drinks, but the bartender played on his phone during our visit on 8/14, which was rather rude but a sign of the times I guest.   The Bad: NO free wi-fi for guests; NO free parking for guests and NO air or any type of ventilation in the bathrooms.  Housekeeping doesn't come daily for multiple night stays.  We checked in Thursday and only got our room cleaned once on Friday and that was it!!!  Nothing on Saturday while we were out and again nothing on Sunday even though we paid extra for a late check-out.  We had to call repeatedly for towels.

title: Highly Recommend
review: Thank you so  much for posting your 4-star review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the location of our property. Regarding the wifi and parking, we do charge less than most other hotels on the beach. In the Ft. Lauderdale market, hotels do not offer complimentary parking and I apologize that you were not made aware of this. I would also like to apologize for the slip in our housekeeping department. I will make sure I discuss with the entire team. We do hope to see you back again for another try.

title: Expensive!
review: I stayed in this hotel while on business at the end of July 2015.  Anisa was most helpful and provided a free upgrade due to my room not being available when I came in prior to normal check in times (without notice).  This afforded me the ability to get settled into the room before having to leave for an important meeting, which I sincerely appreciated.  The hotel was nice and the service was even better!  Thanks again!

title: Very Convenient for Business in Ft. Lauderdale
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and how well Anisa and the rest of the team took such good care of you. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Hotel is in a nice locattion but needs a facelift
review: This place has the rudest staff except for Julie the bartender. She's awesome. They don't change your linens, expensive & ridiculous menu. Idk. It was a nice room but I don't think I'd stay here again. Parking is $14/day and $28 overnight. I'm very dissatisfied.

title: Would return
review: A few days in Ft Lauderdale beach to celebrate my daughters 40th and our wedding anniversary. We'd told them in advance and we were given champagne and chocolate covered strawberries A lovely touch which was much appreciated . The suites are large and functional. Service was friendly. Breakfast was good,particularly for kids. Despite the efforts of the excellent server lady they were short of bacon both days,20 minutes between empty and being refilled. Not good. Overall,I was very pleased with this Doubletree and would return,although we would probably check out hotels on the beach road first

title: Great meeting rooms. Hotel rooms ok
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the team took such good care of you during your special day. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Ok, but ......
review: Nice Lobby, restaurant and meeting rooms.  Hotel rooms could be updated with cleaner bathrooms and carpet.  Outside bar and being on intercostal is nice. If you up to a walk beach is not too far.  Shopping is great. Right next door to hotel with macys, Neiman Marcus and Dillards

title: Be aware of loosing your belongings
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. Seems as if you enjoyed your stay except for the cleanliness issues. I will share with my entire team as this is not the norm for us. Thank you once again and we do hope to see you again soon!

title: Fabulous Location...Full Kitchen...Reasonable Rates...
review: Hotel was ok, rooms were of a good size....   Clean and functionable !!!!   We were a party of three adults and four children.    Breakfast was alright, but nothing special.    Don't get excited about the pool area, it was messy and untidy !!!  Lobby bar was supposed to be open for happy hour at 3.00, but nobody there, was told to use outside bar !!!!!  Would we use the hotel again, probably not .......

title: Pleasant stay and great hotel
review: While this hotel is not located on the beach, it is a short 2-3 block walk.  Behind hotel is a water taxi station, this is the way to navigate Ft. Lauderdale! All employees on taxi are helpful, and provide much information about the local and can suggest places to eat, drink, etc.  Water taxi is a must if you are visiting. The hotel itself is very nice, room comfortable, AC worked well, and great view from balcony.  Ask for a water view when you arrive, well worth the additional cost.  Hotel also has a bar, restaurant, Starbucks coffee, pool.  Room was clean and well appointed with LCD TV, internet access which was adequate, small kitchenette with necessities.  Additionally, the Galleria Mall is next door with more dining opportunities.

title: Old Hotel.  Somewhat Updated.  Terrible Wifi Connection
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so pleased to her that you enjoyed your suite and the location of our property. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: very comfortable and clean
review: The only thing that upset me about my stay was my room 1411 which had a terrible Wifi connection.  No matter where I sat in the room the Wifi was a moderate signal and VERY SLOW sometimes disconnecting.  Not good for a business traveler.    Probably would have changed rooms, but had already settled in and set up shop.    Hotel is clean and updated.    Staff are very friendly and helpful.

title: Party Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. I do apologize for the internet issue. We have plenty of bandwidth coming into our property so I am assuming that we may have had a glitch during your stay. I will share your comments with our IT team as this is not the norm for us. Thank you once again and we do hope to see you back!

title: Very comfortable, friendly, and has everything you need.
review: We stayed 10 days at this Double Tree.  I have to say, I was very impressed by the size of the suite, bedroom, bathroom, balcony. The kitchenette had the minimum we need but no bottle opener, can opener or corkscrew (be aware before you buy beer or wine at the closeby Publix). Pros: - the people at the front desk are very nice and helpful especially Liliana who booked two tours for us (the SawGrass Mills Mall and the Everglades.  Both tours were very good, on time and efficient.  Recommended. - we did not need valet parking but I can understand that it would be annoying at $28, especially when there is a big parking lot besides.  I don't understand why nobody is parking there.   -good location, not far from the beach and from a grocery store.  Cons: -the room was cleaned every…

title: Doubletree, Fort Lauderdale
review: Room location was fabulous, clean and provided me with everything I needed.  It was a suite which included a kitchenette, dining area, living room and bed room.  Staff at hotel was courteous and friendly and helpful especially in the restaurant.

title: "Great Place"
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: In a word skeevy
review: Just got back from a 2 week stay at this hotel.  We had a wonderful stay.  Anisa at the front desk welcomed us and gave us great service during our stay.  Very friendly, polite & always willing to help us if we had any questions.  Valet parking is not something my husband is a fan of, however the guys especially Mazen were great and so helpful.  Mazen always had a smile and whenever we would ask him for suggestions for diner he would always be happy to help us out. |Our room was great, clean, spacious and we had a nice view.  |You could not ask for a better location.  Great place, great staff, great location and very clean rooms!!!

title: Romantic Getaway and Family Friendly
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Anisa and the rest of the team took such good care of you. I will share your kind words with everyone and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Great stay, as always!
review: First very surprised by how run down the area has become. I would not be walking around there anytime soon. Upon arrival you see the valet parking only sign for $29. Then you get to wait 15 minutes for them to stop chit chatting and come help you. Upon check-in we asked for our Hilton honors upgrade but were told not available due to being sold out (more on this later). So we check in and go up to our room noticing how gross the halls were on our way there. Once inside the room our skin just started to crawl. Small bed that looked about 20 years old which perfectly matched the look of the carpets. They graciously left us 1/3 of a role of toilet paper, no back up. We very quickly decided to run and get the heck out of their. Upon informing the front desk of our decision we were…

title: It's all about location
review: Recently stayed at this property for its great location. Close to beach, shopping and dining. Airport near by as well as cruise port. Property is busy and staff is very friendly. However, it is in desperate need of renovation. The rooms and halls look tired and the carpets need changing. It was noisy too but that's not their fault more the guests and teens running up and down the halls. I would most likely stay again, but would like to see a bit put into this property.  It's a shame because it has a fantastic location.

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and the staff was friendly. I am sorry that you didn't find our hallways appealing. We are going to be changing out the carpet sometime soon. We also renovated all suites 2 years ago and they are in tip top shape. Thanks again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice Hotel But Alot of Extra Fees
review: Nice waterfront hotel, we arrived late evening for one night and  booked a rate with Valet  and Internet, a bit pricey, wish breakfast had been included at this price,and a water view room. We had an awful view to some parking lot. However the hotel is in a nice location next door to the Gallery One mall and to some upscale , expensive restaurants, could not find any less expensive kid friendly ones at that late hour, so dined at the PF Changs. The Publix grocery store opposite was convenient. Trevor and Anisa were very courteous and pleasant at checkin and checkout. Room was clean and nice. The hotel is right on the water taxi route, but we did not have time to avail of that service. All in all a good experience for a night.

title: Do not hesitate to stay in the Gallery one
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review. I am so pleased to hear that Anisa and Troy took such good care of you and you found our hotel to be clean and comfortable. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Gallery One Fort Lauderdale a great place to stay
review: Nice Location, Clean, To Many extra fees. Valet fees, Internet fees. Make sure to check with hotel before you book it to find out what all the fees are. The Valet fees are $28.00 per Day. No self Parking. The Internet Fees per day were $10-15 per day also. All the fees add up quick if you don't budget them in to your stay.

title: Bodybuilding Competition
review: This Hotel has been the host hotel of our NPC Southern States Bodybuilding Competition off and on for the past several years. The level of service my tanning company receive is above and beyond any expectations. From Chiara in the sales dept. to Eric in valet we always have a great experience.  The same employees have been working there for years and welcome us back by name.  We are in a different hotel each weekend for 9 months out of the year and this one by far is the best in service, reliability and  working with our needs and our meeting space. Alisa @ Hot Spot Tanning

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words Alisa. I am so happy to hear that you find the level of service to be the best at our property. You are a very important group to us and I am happy you enjoyed your stay/event. I will make sure I share your comments with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: The heart beat of Ft. Laud
review: This is a very lovely hotel with great views! Our family of 12 stayed here 2 nights after a cruise. We had 4 rooms and every one was very nice. The only issue we had was the trash was not emptied in our room. We had the 2 bedroom suite and had a view of the water. Great views from every window! The only bad thing I can say is the housekeeping staff were rude on 2 different occasions. Both times when we asked a question. All in all I would definitely book this hotel again.

title: Better choices closer to beach
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that your family enjoyed all 4 of their suites. I do apologize for the housekeeper as this is not the norm for us. We do hope to get the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Hotel experience
review: Very nice hotel with excellent staff and location. Many conveniences in walking distance. Suggest room with water view. Just one issue - valet only parking but not big enough for volume of patrons. Will stay again!

title: Nice but pricey
review: We chose to stay at this specific hotel because we needed a suite with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.  The room was very nice. One of the bedrooms a/c didn't work well. Housekeeping was very rude over a shirt my daughter left at pool. Never did resolve problem. Valet parking was kind of inconvenient at times. For the price, I thought the hotel should have been much more up and up.

title: Breath of Fresh Air
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite. However, I do apologize for the issues you experienced and I can assure you that I will share with my team so it doesn't happen again. Hope to see you back again soon!

title: A great family hotel
review: I would love to let you and the company know that my stay at the Double Tree was magnificent. I thoroughly enjoyed your desk agent with the red hair. I wish I remembered her name. She is short and latin. She was very helpful when I checked in and she even took the time to snap a photo for me of my guest and I. Little things like that make my heart happy.     We LOVED being put in the King room on the 14th floor. The balcony was perfect to view the fireworks on the 4th of July. Our view was beyond perfect. Your location to the beach is wonderful, we walked there several times.     Of course, we cannot leave out how wonderful the cookies are. Thank you and your staff for such an excellent stay. When we want to have another get away, this is the place to stay

title: Break of journey
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and how well our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Close to everything, especially water taxi
review: We had a wonderful time at Gallery One. The hotel is very clean, close to the beach, shops, great restaurants and water taxi. My kids love our room and the view. Checking in and out was quick and pleasant. The front desk staffs were super nice and always talked to us with big smile on their faces, and we would like to thank particularly TROY for his pleasant and professional attitude. He provided us with the information that we asked regarding what to do in the city.

title: Nice hotel, close to beach, perfect for families and couples, too!
review: Being Hilton Honors Members and having patronized numerous Hilton properties, I'd say that this hotel is not of a higher level Hilton accommodation, but it has been well maintained. Our room provided as nice view of the intercoastal waterway and the surrounding city. The service itself was certainly to be commended. Everyone was friendly and there were lots of smiles.  We requested extra towels and dinnerware for 4 when we booked our reservation, and they were available upon check-in. Other requests made to front desk/housekeeping were met in a timely manner.  Kitchenette was certainly a plus as we love to prepare our own food and purchase specialty foods and beverages vs. eating out. The kitchenette was stocked with almost everything we needed except a sharp knife/paring knife…

title: Great price for a great location
review: Wow, thank you so much for posting your wonderful review. After reading it, I was very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the area. I am also so happy to hear that our staff treated you so well and we hope to host you again soon!

title: GREAT Place to stay!  Luxurious Suites!!!
review: The first thing we noticed upon arrival was how pretty the landscaping was.  When you walk into the lobby you notice beautiful furniture and unique art.  The staff is very friendly.  Our room was supposed to be a city view, however we had a great view of the bay.  We stayed in a one room suite.  Our room was very clean and had a clean smell.  We loved our stay here.  The housekeeping service is very friendly and attended to our needs.  As always the fresh cookie is always an added bonus.  The only negative comment I will add is towards the valet service.  Valet is mandatory and cost us $28 per day.  It was not convenient for us.

title: Very nice
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Very Nice
review: This hotel is WONDERFUL!  Great location--just 4 blocks from the beach.  Incredible rooms--suites!  Love that the Water Taxi stops out back.  The pool is nice outside, but I went to the beach everyday.  Great view from the balcony.  Good price. Grocery store nearby to fill the fridge.  Nice car rental place nearby as well as some good restaurants, bars and shops.  The other guests were friendly and diverse as well.  The staff at the desk continued to mention my third party purchase, which was a bit annoying, but alas.  Enjoy!

title: Great Hotel Extremely Poor Location.
review: For a quasi Hilton this has too many cons to ever stay here again. Spoiler alert! The hotel sits next to a draw bridge. Every time it goes up you can hear the equipment running; ALL of the equipment. Warning bells, announcements, and the bridge motors whining away. So you can guess what's next.....the road. So much traffic. You hear every car go by. The room looks really nice until you close the door and start looking around. Holes in the carpet and in the room darkening drapes they were perforated. Mold on the A/C registers, for cooling the suite down it was about as worthless as a box fan on a summer day in South Florida. They have restricted water flow to a point of using a wash cloth and the sink is a better option than taking a shower. We will definitely x this place off…

title: Nice location, nice customer service
review: Thank you for taking the time to share you experience. I am happy to hear that you found our property to be a "great hotel". However, I am sorry that you experienced noise issues. This has not been an issue here but I will look into it. Regarding the water pressure, I will also look into this as we do not restrict flow and I have not heard this either. I am assuming that it may have been a bad shower head. Thank you for sharing so that I can discuss with my team to make it better.

title: Not Much to Offer But a Great Hotel! Highly Recommended!
review: We checked into the hotel a day late.  We were paying with Hilton points so if you show up late they will cancel the reservation and use the points.  We were not aware of this.  The front desk fixed this problem (reservation and restored our points) for us and we were very appreciative.  The beach was about a 5 to 10 mile walk from the hotel.  There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance also.  Room and hotel were clean.  There is a water taxi stop at the hotel also.

title: Beautiful rooms
review: Thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our hotel. I am also happy to hear that you took advantage of the water taxi. It is a great way to see our beautiful city. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Disappointed
review: Stayed here on the 4th of July in a 2bd/2bath Suite on the 12th Floor. The hotel itself doesn't have much to offer but we found it to be a fantastic place to say in Ft Lauderdale. The pool is very small (expected though since it's not a resort). Very few chairs and one that we had was broken but was still able to function. They offer a bar at the pool but it wasn't open. Which I found surprising since it was the 4th of July. We had to go to the inside bar to get drinks for sitting by the pool. They have 1 Bar, 1 Restaurant and no store inside. However, it's right across the street from a plaza that has a grocery store and a liquor store. The room had a great view and was very clean and decorated well. Also very spacious.  The beds were comfortable and the kitchen had all the…

title: Very nice property but absurd parking charges
review: Staff is top notch, starting at the registration desk to the food service to  and housekeeping. HOWEVER, hotel closed their self parking for good and now makes guest pay $28 for Valet. I have friends and family come visit and paid almost $100 for parking.  Reason I stay at other hotels now when in Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Top Notch From Beginning to End
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you found our staff to be "top notch". I am sorry that you felt our parking prices were high. However, we do provide valet parking only as a service to our guests with unlimited in & out service. We are also less expensive than most hotels on Ft. Lauderdale Beach at $28 per night. Most are $35. Thanks once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Spacious Convenience
review: Upon arrival we were greeted with incredible kindness and excitement from the front desk staff for us to be staying there. Almost immediately we were served with DoubleTree's signature chocolate chip cookies. This lead to us going up into our room and having one of those "Booking.com" moments when you enter the room you immediately know you got it right! The suite was lovely with a great view of the marina and the room itself was nothing short of quality. Once we left you understand why this place is rated so well on Trip Advisor. If you really want to have a hassle free stay and get to the beach of FLL pretty easily then GalleryONE is your place to be. I'm sure there are other places that are great to stay at but Id rely on the consistent product from DoubleTree hotels.

title: 4th of July Holiday Trip
review: Wow, thank you so much for your posting your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you had a spectacular view. We do hope to get the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Pleasant hotel and location.
review: Being a suite hotel, all rooms came with a living area and kitchen. Ours had a lounge with a flat screen TV, a dining area and a fully functional kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave and dishwasher. The bedroom was spacious with its own TV and a large bathroom. Had a good night’s sleep on a comfortable bed with fine linens and pillows. However, the bath towels did not smell fresh having a slight unpleasant acetic odor. The balcony provided a good view of the waterway.  It’s only a short walk to the beach about 5 minutes away. Across the road is the Publix supermarket, shops, Starbucks and a Chinese restaurant called Jade Palace serving Cantonese cuisine. On the same side of the hotel further along the street is the Galleria shopping mall, where you’ll find Macy’s, Neiman Marcus…

title: July 4th View!
review: Nice place to stay with an awesome view on the intercoastal and ocean. Service is very good. Valet service as well. Great happy hr at the outside bar with a friendly bartender with a nice view. Nice and relaxing. I think it is worth checking out

title: Worst Hilton Property
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our Tiki bartender took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Just wonderful!
review: I am a frequent Hilton Honors member and used all my points to book a water view 2 room suite at the Doubletree Gallery One Suites. What an awful hotel.  They stuck me on the 3rd floor with no view except the street. The WIFI was not available.  Our room was hot and had no sheets for the couch. The pool is ok but nothing exciting. Do not stay at this hotel unless you get a great rate.   It is close to the Galleria Mall and has a Water Taxi pickup but this is an average hotel and not worth a premium price.

title: Visit to Galleria one
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel Roscoejames. I am quite surprised and shocked that you booked a water view room and you were placed in a city view. When the room is booked, you should automatically be placed in the room type you reserved. I also see that you were unable to get WiFi in your room. We have had no reported outages at all during the past several months. I tried using your screen name to locate your stay but I am not sure if that is your real name. I do apologize for these issues and this never occurs. Please contact me at the hotel at your convenience so I can better understand what went wrong and once again, my apologies.

title: super location
review: I booked this hotel for a couple of nights for family members visiting from overseas.  I had stayed here when I first moved to Ft. Lauderdale and was waiting to close on my house and had a great time. This place is wonderful.   My aunt and uncle liked it so much, they decided to extend their Ft. Lauderdale visit by 5 more days and cancelled going to Orlando! All the management, front desk and food service staff was very kind and helpful to them and to me. In addition, you can't beat the location ... next to Birch Park, the Bonnet House, the beach, the water taxi and the Galleria!  All this for a great rate compared to the hotels just a few blocks away. Yes, this place is a gem.  Thanks!

title: Big room, really big
review: This is a suite hotel...and not one of those that put up a half dividing wall and call it a suite. It's got a living room, kitchen, bedroom, and a really large bathroom. The rooms were updated a couple of years ago so the bathtub is now a glass encased shower stall, the kitchen open up to the dining area, and there are flat screen TV's in both the living room and bedroom.  The cost is the same as the other near the beach hotels and the room is twice the size.  The front desk couldn't be nicer. And did I mention it is three blocks from the beach ?

title: Spacious suites
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so excited to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and your large suite. I am also happy to hear that our team treated you so well and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice Family Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel directly following a cruise for a couple of days.  The location is convenient walking to both shopping, the beach, and the water taxi picks up at the hotel.   The two bedroom suite is great while travelling with children or friends. The drawbacks to this hotel included the wifi speed and coverage, as well as the overpriced breakfast buffet.  Make sure to get a room with a view of the water, it makes for a relaxing evening on the balcony.

title: Nice for the price
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your large suite and the spectacular view. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Once you get pass the front desk the service is fine.
review: Great hotel for young families. The efficiency kitchen was great as it allowed us to grocery shop, avoid eating out for every meal, and provide our child with healthy foods that she is used to. Water Taxi stop at the hotel was convenient and fun. Housekeeping was inconsistent as far as replacing room amenities (towels, shampoo, dishwasher detergent, paper towels, etc). This required at least 5 phone calls over the course of our stay in order to rectify the issues. Pool chemicals are very harsh and bleached out all of my daughter's swim suits. I fully support cleanliness and proper chemical treating of a pool but have never had this issue at other hotels. Very disappointing.

title: Not friendly nor efficient staff
review: Nice rooms complete with good kitchen integrated into living room. Spacious suite. Nice views right on the intercoastal. Walking distance to beach and Galleria mall. Negatives: inefficient/ unfriendly front desk, thermostat of aircon not functioning at night, forced payment for parking (only valet - at 28USD +tx + tips, all for unfriendly staff), charges for wifi, charge for receiving letters, etc. Overall all adding up to high rate- price/value relation therefore not worthwhile any more.

title: Excellent experience at Double Tree, Sunrise
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite. However, I am so sorry that you found some negatives during your stay. I am quite surprised that you found our staff to be "unfriendly". As you can see by all past reviews, our staff is what keeps our guests from coming back. I will address this with the entire team. Regarding the parking, yes we do offer valet as a service to our guests and for security reasons. We keep our prices a bit less than most beach hotels.  Thank you once again and we hope you do give us another chance.

title: r than the Meat Locker Temp in the Room
review: I will recommed you stay at Double Tree, Sunrise, for the most enjoyable experience. Close to supermaket, the best restaurants, mall, beach, transportation, boat trips along the intracoastal... The beds were comfortable, bathrooms very clean.

title: Nice place to stay, large rooms
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you had an "excellent experience". We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Place of Excellence
review: Could not get the thermostat set above 66 degrees even with a complaint to the front desk. Felt like sleeping in a meat locker. Another irritant is the racket created by the very heavy patio doors. We had twits above us who enjoyed in and out the balcony as a game even till 1 AM. Call to security got that addressed. Rooms are a good size reasonably clean but in need of updating. Comfortable bed and great shower pressure even on the tenth floor. Overall not bad. Parking a bit stiff at 28.00 a day. Stay away from the 22.00 breakfast walk two blocks and get better for 6.25

title: Wonderful Hotel You Won't  Be Disappointed
review: Our stay here was wonderful. The staff was very accommodating. The room was spacious, bed was like heaven. The room was cleaned every day with fresh linen. The hotel is just a couple of blocks from the beach. We will come back for our next stay in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Good location off the beach
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your suite and that everyone treated you so well. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Went Down
review: I just returned from the Galleryone and found my stay to be average. The location is a few blocks from the beach, but is within walking distance to restaurants, the mall, a grocery store, and Starbucks. The best part is that all the rooms are suites with a small kitchenette. The property does not offer free wi-fi ($9.95 a day) unless you are a Hilton Honors member. The property will not overwhelm you with updated decor, but it is nice considering the price. I would stay here again, as the price is more than reasonable.

title: Do Not Use a Debit Card
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite and the location of our property. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent 3 day stay!!
review: We stayed there in 2009  ,but since then it really went down..I'm still actually still  feeling ill.We had suites 411 and 611.They both poured water on the floor while taking a shower.611 poured on the floor and flowed like a river on the floor and in the wall.The room smelled of mold and made our clothes stink.The AC in 611 kicked on and off every 3 minutes.The other suite 411 the whole family got ate up by some kind of bugs.

title: Great location and service
review: We stayed 3 nights at the end of our Florida trip and the service was good. The rooms are maybe a little dated but Jackie who looked after us at breakfast was awesome. The kids loved the pool and the beach was a short walk away. It was handy to have a Publix over the road and we ate in the apartment one night.

title: A great hotel with lousy WiFi
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of our beautiful pool and walk to the beach. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Weekend Special
review: The hotel is very convenient with a Publix grocery store across the street. The rooms are suites, including a kitchenette and balcony. All of that was excellent and would have gotten them a 5 star rating. BUT, their WiFi is horrible. Every time your computer or tablet goes to sleep, you have to sign it from scratch. After a few sign in attempts, you reach their daily limit. At the conference I attended there, no one could get on and actually stay on. When I complained, after reaching the limit early in the day, they gave me a new code that lasted longer. Nonetheless, it was rediculous trying to sign back in every few minutes. Also, they have manditory valet parking, which makes no sense when the parking lot is right in front of the hotel. This is not in a dense city area where a…

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and and your suite. I do apologize for the internet issue. This is the first I heard about this so I will get with my team to see if there is a problem. Regarding the parking, all Ft. Lauderdale hotels in our area do charge for parking and we are less than most. We do provide valet only as a service to our guests and for security reasons. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back.

title: Beautiful
review: I will always stay here whenever I am in the Ft. Lauderdale area. The accommodations were excellent. The staff person (upon my arrival) made me feel so comforting. Especially, coming from the airport.

title: Getaway from it all!
review: Tagged along with the Hubby while he was on business. Very clean hotel!!! Extremely friendly staff. Very clean and nicely decorated through the hotel and in the suite! Beautiful time sitting by the waterway! Perfectly located to beach and to a grocery store and mall!!

title: Most  Professional  and Accommodating staff
review: Wow, thank you so much for your 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you found our hotel to be clean with a friendly staff. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great property, great location, great staff (thanks Marcel!)
review: Most professional and accommodating staff.  The young lady Anisa, at the desk was exceptional from check in to check out, As was the entire staff with whom I came into contact. My three day stay was exceptional in every way. helping with business center needs, restaurant suggestions etc. Gallery One Doubletree will be my only hotel in the  Fort Lauderdale area.

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Anisa took such good care of you. She is definitely one of our best and I will make sure I share your kind words with the entire team. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Luxury hotel with hidden costs!!
review: This is my 3rd time staying at this hotel because of it's fantastic location. It is directly on the Intercoastal Waterway (ICW) and only 1.5 blocks walk from Ft.Lauderdale Beach. The rooms are always spacious and clean and the staff always try to help you with whatever your needs are.    On this stay, the front desk manager, Marcel Paul, worked hard to accommodate my wife's request for an early check-in even though the hotel was sold out the night before. Marcel worked with his housekeeping staff to ensure we got checked in to the first clean room available and we enjoyed a delightful lunch in the Vue Cafe (overlooking the water) while we waited. As others have written, this hotel is a short 5-min. walk to a Publix grocery store for provisions, which is great because all the…

title: Not Sure I'd Return
review: Great location on the intercoastal waterway, great restaurant food and staff, however our room appeared worn, annoying A/C system and damaged door.  Not sure the hotel was worth $210 per night.  Great view and easy access to water taxi and beaches.

title: Absolutely wonderful.
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. Although I am quite pleased that you enjoyed most of your stay, I am so sorry that you had some issues with your room. This is not the norm for us as all of our suites have been recently renovated. Once again, thank you for letting us know and I will discuss with my team.

title: One Night Stay
review: We are thoroughly enjoying our 3-night stay at this spacious, luxe-feeling (without the luxe price tag!) hotel in Fort Lauderdale. Each room is a suite with a complete kitchen - including pots, pans, flatware, cutlery and plates! - and make us feel like we were in a swank apartment in South Florida. We love the pool that overlooks the bay where the water taxi and other yachts float by as well as the fact that it is incredibly convenient in location to the beach, shopping and of course...Publix :) The parking is valet only and $28 a day, but so worth it to have your car safe and secure...and ready for you whenever you want it, day or night. Definitely will make this our go-to spot whenever we visit the area.

title: Waiting for friends
review: Thank you so much for your awesome 5-star review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found your suite to be just what you needed. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Vacation
review: I have been staying here numerous times since 2005 and have yet to have a bad experience. The location is great - near the beach, restaurants and the Galleria (shopping). The staff is always friendly and welcoming - Liliana at the front desk was great! The rooms (suites) are tastefully appointed...beds are comfortable as well. Ask for a room with a balcony facing the intercoastal waterway - sit back with a cocktail and relax and enjoy.

title: Pretty views, large rooms
review: This is a lovely hotel, a little dated but suites are very roomy.  We had a room facing the waterway which was delightful.  However, beware the bridge traffic is noisy.  Staff are very helpful and quick to take care of us after a very long day of travelling.

title: Overall a nice place to stay
review: I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your large suite and the views. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Lovely water views
review: Nice hotel.  Rooms have a kitchenette.  The price is a little high but is in a nice location.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  Only one block from a high end mall and three blocks to the beach.  The Galleria mall is nearby.  You may want to try PF Changs in the mall for good Asian cuisine.  There is also a grocery store nearby so there is groceries available to make your own food in the room.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our location to be convenient. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: East Coast Vacation
review: We arrived stressed from a long flight delay and we were quickly welcomed and to make us feel even better (it was our wedding anniversary) they sent us a cold bottle of bubbles and chocolate coated strawberries.  Very nice indeed.  Our room faced the waterway which was very pleasant but there was noise from the bridge traffic.  The air-con wasn't great but apart from that it was a very nice suite.  The coffee maker was also very welcome.

title: Attitude is #1
review: We practically live in hotels, though we don't often get to choose which one (many events), and Hilton always makes us feel like they are trying hard to make our stay worthwhile for us.  We had some minor slipups on this last stay, but the staff was eager to help or make amends as necessary, and that means everything to us!  Good attitudes are worth more than a slipup or two!

title: Almost perfect
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear that the team took care of your issue and that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Smelly Room
review: I have stayed at the Gallery One many times in the past and love the rooms, the view and the service from everyone I have encountered there.  The hotel is in a great location, convenient to most everything in Fort Lauderdale and I give it high marks on everything.....well almost everything.  Who decided that the hotel provided bath amenities are to be rose scented? Excuse me but at least half your guests are men and I suspect that the other half, the women, have another half who do not like that scent.  I am not asking for Old Spice but someone should give this one a second thought before the next order is placed.

title: Feeling High Class
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the team treated you so well. I will make sure I share your kind words with everyone. Regarding the amenities in your room, I am so sorry that were not to your liking. These same amenities are in every DoubleTree across the globe and we really don't have much say. We do get positive feedback about the line of products but I understand not everyone will like them. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon.

title: Decent Hotel With Great Access to More
review: Probably the worst Hilton I've stayed in. First room they gave us already had people staying in it. Second room smelled like stale mildew. Interior was in need of repair. Starbucks barista was especially rude. Definitely won't be going back.

title: Warm cookie welcome!
review: DoubleTree staff is top notch, starting at the registration desk to the food service to valets and housekeeping--everyone was well trained and friendly and quite wonderful to deal with.  Janice--I do hope I have her name correct--and Krystal made mealtimes in the dining room very very pleasant.  (Oh, and the blue cheese on the appetizer platter is terrific.) We had a great mini-vacation.

title: Wedding block. A+++++
review: Thank you so much for submitting your 5-star review. I am very pleased to hear that the service was "top notch" and the restaurant staff took such good care of you. I will make sure I share your kind words with our entire team and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Relaxing in trendy Ft. Lauderdale
review: My family and friends had a great experience with gallery one doubletree this weekend for the wedding block. The service staff and quality of the rooms was superb. Thank you this great experience. You will have returning customers in the future. A+++++

title: Great one night birthday stay
review: Thank you so much for submitting your 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay during the wedding and that our staff took such good care of you. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Best Location in Fort Lauderdale!
review: My husband and I needed four days away from home to destress.  Having stayed at the DoublTree FLL before, we thought this would be a great place for an escape.  We were not disappointed.  From the moment we checked into our suite on the 12th floor, we knew we had come to the right place.  We spent a lot of time on the balcony enjoying both the view of the ocean and the beauty of the yachts that navigated the Intracoastal Waterway right below us.  Our rooms were roomy yet cozy, and we enjoyed the small kitchenette for making early morning coffee which we enjoyed on that wonderful balcony.  We will go back.  Thank you DoubleTree.

title: Staff needs customer services training!!!
review: First, let me begin by saying that I have a degree in Hotel and Restaurant Management, and have been in a Management role for over 12 years in various departments. Because of my career path, I can justify my negative review as a warranted critique, rather than the proverbial rant and rave.   During the first week of April, I attended a wedding as a guest. We had a "Meet and Greet" the day before the wedding at the hotel; and then the reception was held the day of the wedding, which was also at the Double Tree. I cannot complain about the food, because the food was amazing... however; I was completely put off by the Valet Supervisor, the Banquet Sales Manager/ESM, and the evening Bartender. Their rudeness and utter disrespect for a paying guest was unacceptable and unbecoming of…

title: Managament very repsonsive and caring
review: Thank you so much for posting your review. I did investigate this today as this is not how we normally operate. I did find out that we had some billing issues with the valet and I do understand that my accounting team is working on fixing this. My deepest apologies for this. Regarding the wedding, I am a bit confused as the bride & groom wrote thank you notes to our Senior Catering Manager who was handling the event as well as the Front Office Manager and other Team Members. They were very happy with their event. I do apologize if you felt that the staff was rude. We always provide the best service to all of our guests and have a very professional sales team who work very hard to make all of our events special. By the notes we received from the wedding contacts, we feel that our team did a magnificent job.  Once again, I do apologize for the valet issues as this should have never happened. Thank you once again for posting your review and we do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Hilton Honors Member finds RUDENESS
review: Was nice to spend time in a nice hotel and away from the hustle and bustle of the beach.  A small issue arose with my room and the hotel quickly lived up to the motto of "making it right"  Thanks for a nice weekend

title: Nice hotel...good location
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. Although we don't like the fact that our guests may experience issues, I am thrilled that one of our managers resolved it right away. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: One night close to the beach
review: I am a frequent traveler and Hilton Honors member.  The culture of this property is just rudeness. If they answer your questions, it is after four requests, and then they give an incorrect answer just to dismiss you.  The front desk manager, AnnMarie, sets this standard.  She will interrupt you when you are speaking because she is just plain rude.  This property does not belong in the Hilton family.  A fun getaway is diminished with a not-so-fun attitude

title: Flashy on the bottom
review: Hi gang,     Prior to our cruise we opted to spend a day of unwinding in Ft. Lauderdale.   The lobby is spectacular, friendly check-in with a warm chocolate chip cookie awaiting your arrival !!!   Pato area very friendly and open.  Good view of the canal, nearby bridge and condos across the way.  There's the constant flow of personal watercraft to occupy your eyes.  The nearby bridge is a draw bridge so it's cool to watch for that 'tween sips of your Mai Tai.        However, upstairs lacks the pizazz found in the lobby.  The hallways aren't as cleaned as they should be.  I saw small bits of paper, etc not picked up in two days that we were there.  The room we got had a few cosmetic issues.  Although clean and tidy, there were things like a wiggly toilet seat, mirror had…

title: Guest
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our lobby and that the staff treated you so well. I am also pleased to hear that your suite was clean and you found our location to be convenient. I do apologize for the shortcomings in your room and I will share with my engineering team so that we can make it better. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Pre and Post accomodation after Cruise
review: Great location and service. Valerie was very accommodating and helpful at the front desk and so was every staff member. Easy walk to the beach and access to restaurants, shopping, water taxi etc. enjoyed my stay!

title: A Suite Experience
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Valerie took such good care of you. I will make sure I share your kind words with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great Hotel
review: My wife and I just loved all aspects of the hotel, the size of the room was big and very clean with full kitchen attached, the view from the room was stunning, all the staff from reception,room service,bar and dining were most helpful and friendly, would recommend staying there . The position of the hotel was central for all activities.

title: Amazing Stay/Great Location
review: I truly enjoyed my stay at the DoubleTree/Hilton in Ft. Lauderdale, FL. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. For the amount I paid, I was very pleased with my room, service and the amenities. My only complaint would be the lack of free wifi in guest rooms, and the $28/night valet charge. It's the only parking option.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. We hope we get the opportunity to host you again soon!

title: Perfect pre cruise hotel
review: Very nice stay! Nice room  with a beautiful view! Great location. Loved the water taxi on the canal. We ate at the restaurant 1 time and did not go back. The menu seemed very boring and unappealing yet prices were still very high. That was the only negative. Staff was very friendly and did a great job of making you feel valued.

title: Very good for pre-cruise stay.
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you had one of our amazing rooms with a view. I am also pleased to hear that you took advantage of the water taxi that is right at our back deck. We hope to host you again soon!

title: Excellent value, friendly staff, great experience
review: We stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights pre cruise in April. Normally we stay closer to the cruise terminal, but this time our agent booked us into this hotel.  On arrival we were greeted by very pleasant, helpful, friendly staff, one of whom was in training, but appeared very competent. Our room, we had requested a high room, was on the highest floor overlooking the city, not waterway. If we ever return to this place, we shall pay extra for the water view. Having said that, our room was perfect, not noisy at all,and the balcony was a pleasant place to sit, both in the morning with our coffee, and in the evening with our glass of wine. The fact that Publix, albeit a smaller one than usual,was almost across the road made it easy to cater for our meals. The kitchen area in…

title: Trial stay
review: Checked out this hotel on a short stay to plan a longer one in the winter.  It exceeded expectations and looking forward to our next stay.  There is ample storage for clothing for longer stays and an equipment stocked kitchen.  It's across from a supermarket and next to a mall.  The walk to the beach is easy if you like walking.  There are nature parks nearby and the hotel has a Water Taxi stop.  The pool has an outdoor bar but is not large.  However the size of the pool is comparable to the size of the hotel.  Each room is nicely decorated in unique art pieces to fit the name of the hotel...

title: Nice for pre-cruise
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you found our location to be convenient. I am also pleased to hear that you like our art work in the rooms. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Bad experience
review: We stayed 2 nights before sailing from Miami.  It's a little off the beaten path (not near a ton of other hotels) which actually suited us just fine.  Lobby and front desk staff were great.  Rooms were spacious, well appointed and clean.  The marble shower with rain shower head was awesome!  The location was convenient to the mall, grocery store, and the beach.  It was too chilly to use the pool but we thoroughly enjoyed the seating area by the water taxi stop.  We even saw some manatees swim by.   We enjoyed the bar area and the artwork in the lobby.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Good precruise stopover
review: Wow; thank you so much for your glowing review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found your suite to be large and clean. I am also happy to hear that you were able to see Florida's great Manatees. We also have a few Dolphin friends drop by once in a while. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Pleasant experience
review: I am an Hilton Honnor member since many years and it was my first bad experience with Hilton (Doublle Tree). This hotel is not very well located if you look for tranquility because the canal and the bridge that is very noisy.

title: Very Nice Place to Stay
review: This is a very nice hotel in a very good location.  This hotel is walking distance to the Mall as well as to the beach.  The hotel has beautiful artwork adorning the lobby.  Great breakfast but make sure you ask whether you qualify for breakfast vouchers as the staff may forget to offer them unless you ask.

title: A very welcoming place
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you found our location to be convenient. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed all of the art work in our lobby. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Not so good, not so bad.
review: We checked into this lovely place prior to our cruise. Valerie at reception made us feel welcome right away. She answered all of our questions and gave us a very nice room with a spectular water view. The warm chocolate chip cookies sealed the deal that we made a very wise choice staying here. The shopping and food nearby were an added bonus!

title: our stay at Double Tree One
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Valerie took such good care of you. I will share your kind words with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: No hassle stay
review: Some good aspects: large room, good bed, good facilities for business meetings, close to the Galleria Mall. What was not so good: a bit run down, could use a renovation. Conference rooms: chairs are incredibly bad (no support for the back), air conditioning is not good (sometimes not cold enough, sometimes freezing cold). Food was ok. Wi-fi is really bad, would cease to work every couple of minutes. Service is ok.

title: Beautiful Fort Lauderdale
review: Great Hotel, Wonderful location, Friendly Staff and of course Delicious Cookies. This was my first stay at the Double Tree Fort Lauderdale but wont be my last. Having its own water taxi stop on Property is a big plus too. The Hotel is also connected to the Galleria, so shops and restaurants are just steps away.

title: Exceptional Customer Service!
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the water taxi. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Nice simple hotel close to the beach
review: We had a Fantastic trip...As soon as we arrived we were treated so wonderful. The customer service is amazing.. Everyone was so pleasant and Liliana went out of her way to make our Anniversary stay a memorable one..  Just so refreshing to be around such a caring staff!  Our room was beautiful, right on the water with plenty of boats and water sports to enjoy.  The restaurants were in walking distance as well as the beach.  Can't wait to visit again next year!   Be proud of your staff Double Tree, they deserve some serious recognition!!!

title: Great Stay
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear how our entire staff treated you and how much you enjoyed your stay. I am also thrilled to hear how Liliana took care of you on your anniversary. I will make sure we recognize her in front of the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Shelia took great care of us
review: We stayed only one night but the experience was very positive. The room was clean, very spacy, and the two good beds, for the two of us, huge. Balcony is always nice. Staff was very helpful. Breakfast better than average and the breakfast room and terrace nice. Overall, no negative observations or feelings. Liked it!

title: Friendly service and warm atmosphere
review: I attended a 3-day conference at the Galleryone in March.  The service was excellent all around -  cocktail hour, buffet breakfasts and lunches, and coffee breaks were lovely.  The location is walking distance to the beach, several restaurants and a mall.  Conference rooms are well appointed and my suite was very comfortable.  Two people made my stay at Galleryone especially enjoyable: Cleopatra and Arlene.  They were just wonderful every day.  I highly recommend this hotel for business or leisure.

title: Loved!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your conference. I am also so happy to hear how well Cleopatra and Arlene took care of you and I will make sure I share your kind words with the entire tea. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: Double Tree -Galleria
review: We stayed here for our friends wedding, everything was perfect! We enjoyed the valet parking, the staff was amazing-They helped with cabs/shuttles to accomadate our big group. We were minutes from the beach! The view was amazing! We had a 2 bedroom suite and it was beautiful!!

title: Felt like the place was under construction
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Thanks to Arlene
review: The hotel is in an excellent location. The room was fairly noisy, both traffic noise and guests next door. The bathroom needs better lighting and a magnifying mirror for women to apply make up. The phones in the room did not work. I tried to call the front desk from both the bedroom and living room phones. The receptionist could not hear me. A maintenance person was sent and said he would get it fixed the next day. That didn't happen.

title: Impressive!
review: Very impressive hotel in a great location.  We received genuinely friendly service from everyone we dealt with, and the room (water view with balcony) was spacious, well maintained and clean.  The hotel is an easy 5 min walk across a bridge to the beach, and 5 min walk in the other direction to the shopping mall, a Publix supermarket and several restaurants.  The only downside we found was a very slow wi-fi service.  Worth getting a water view room, a city view would have been across a car park and onto the mall. Also worth getting a room away from the bridge or I would guess it could be pretty noisy.  Highly recommended.

title: Great Location But the Hotel Needs Much Improvement
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found your suite to be "clean and well maintained". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Very nice
review: From the time we drove up to the front door and the parking staff looked at us, not offering to help, we knew we might not be at the right hotel. We had the assistance of a very helpful trainee at the front desk but still had to wait until 5 PM to go to our room, a 1 1/2 hours wait.  The one bedroom had a large stain on the floor that appeared to have been fairly fresh . The handle on the dresser drawer was broken and hanging down by one screw.  Both of the showers were backing up while we showered.   We were eager to leave the next morning.

title: FAMILY VACATION
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient however, I do apologize for the issues you experienced. I will make sure I share with the entire team so these issues don't occur again. I can assure you that this is not the norm for us and we will make the necessary changes. Thank you once again and we do hope you give us another chance in the future.

title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
review: We enjoyed our stay there very much.  The beach was very close, supermarket, galleria mall and many restaurants.  The view was beautiful.  The room was clean and comfortable.  My only complaint is if you plan on using the pool and want to lounge around; you must show up early to secure a place to sit.  I had a bad experience because people came down early and put towels and came down 2 hours later. There are not enough chairs & a system is not in place to prevent the abuse of securing chairs and not using them

title: Lots of small issues, but also spacious rooms
review: I stayed at this hotel while attending a conference in Ft. Lauderdale. The rooms were spacious - suites, with a kitchen, and balcony. It's convenient if you want to walk to the beach or take the water taxi, which you can do from the back of the hotel. But there were also numerous problems, some are small, others are more significant. The entire hotel was a bit outdated (even the lights in the elevator buttons don't seem to work) and the food at the hotel restaurant is both extraordinarily overpriced and not very good. The most challenging thing though was the incorrect advice I received from the concierge about local restaurants (he sent me to a restaurant that wasn't open for lunch AND gave me incorrect directions. The pool area was also not very clean. There was an unsanitary…

title: Best hotel in Fort Lauderdale!☀️
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite. However, I do apologize for the issues you experienced. I have shared them with my entire team and we will work on addressing them. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Again and again....
review: This hotel was amazing the room was awesome the service was great! It was on the intercostal also and was very convenient. The staff was very friendly and so accommodating. Troy made our stay extra special! Thanks Gallery One Fort Lauderdale! We come every year for our cruise and will stay here every time!

title: Great Hotel - Excellent Staff!
review: I stay here twice a year and have done for years. The Hotel rooms were recently tastefully refurbished and are in excellent order. All of the staff from receptionists to the room maids are very friendly and efficient. Located near to a mall, restaurants,Publix and the beach - well it says it all. I like a two bedroom, two bathroom suite as it feels more like my own apartment than a hotel room, which with self catering, it is. I will be back again in the fall. My favorite member of the staff is the maid Cynthia. She always remembers me and makes me most welcome.

title: Very well located.
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words. I am so pleased to hear that we keep delivering our promises and that Cynthia took such good care of you. We look forward to seeing you back in the Fall!

title: Nice location and clean bedrooms. But no deep rest expected
review: Got 2 bed suites. Hotel is clean. Room was clean. A/C system was incredibly loud so had to turn it off. Right next to the mall and has water taxi as you step outside.  Staffs are good.  Noise from outside is severe. Trash pick up in the morning to the every dialect from the pool area can be heard. Smell of trash area was an addition. This hotel was booked tight so no rooms avail for switch. No later check out was avail neither to make up our family's sleepless night.   PRO: location and cleaness, cookies CON: noise  everywhere, no free wifi, outdated systems. Only restaurant and no snack store or spot in the hotel, waters at costy prices (1 bottle of water 4$)  unless go to 4th floor vending machine that never seems to take bills easy.  VERDICT: high priced hotel with Days Inn…

title: Comfort on the Intercoastal
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location and that you found your suite to be clean. I do apologize for the noise. I have not heard this before but I will review with my entire team. Also, we do have a large Starbucks and cafe in our hotel where we sell snacks, candy bars, sandwiches and many various items. I am so sorry that you missed this. We do hope to see you again so that you can give us another chance.

title: Will book again next year
review: 3 nights here at a fairly expensive rate even for a conference. Not very competent front desk staff - No water, breakfast vouchers or WiFi offered at check-in - all of which were paid for or earned. Lovely location and reasonable meeting rooms as well as decent room itself..

title: Unnecessary Snafu's
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am so happy that you enjoyed your suite. However, I do apologize that you had some issues with the front desk. This is not the norm for us and I will make sure I share your comments with our entire staff so that we can make things better. Hope to see you back again soon!

title: Ft. Lauderdale Family Fun
review: The Hotel was perfect for our needs. Well positioned as we needed to get to the various Marinas in Ft. Lauderdale. The Staff was extremely pleasant and helpful from the moment we arrived to the moment we left.   We were given free access to Wifi as our stay lasted for 10 days, which was much appreciated.   The rooms were bright and well cleaned everyday and the fact that there is a kitchen in the suite allowed us to eat in once and again whilst we were there. The bathrooms were in good condition all round and the towels were nice an soft amd changed everyday.  My colleague enjoyed the Jacuzzi next to the pool, I unfortunately did not have the time to use any outdoor facililies but they all looked clean and fun for who was on Holiday. The valet parking was always on the spot,…

title: Best Advice you can be given is.....
review: .....STAY AT THIS HOTEL!!!     My husband and I saved for two years to take the trip of our dreams.  We interviewed hotels to stay at like we were interviewing someone to care for our child.  Let me tell you a bit about our stay because it was extraordinary.  I find that people usually post on TripAdvisor only when things are wrong.  I need to say how awesome this hotel is.  Because of Johannes Linder we chose the Gallery One.  His patience on the phone with me when I called from Canada, asking him one hundred questions from "what is the cleanliness to are there good restaurants nearby".  Every single question was answered with patience and with ease.  It was his professionalism, and how kind he was, that made me choose the Gallery One.  He described the hotel as if it was his…

title: helpful
review: Wow, thank you so much for you awesome review. I am so happy to hear you mention all of the names and it was a pleasure meeting you. We look forward to seeing you back again soon!

title: Nice precruise stay
review: A seemingly run of the mill chail hotel this hotel is made outstanding by the superb staff front of hose seving in bar and restaurant prompt repairs to shower they could not be faulted. Also a water taxi stop on the fort lauderdale waterways. if you are visiting Fort Lauderdale this is the place to stay

title: Great hotel...but the restaurant service...
review: Thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so pleased to hear that everyone treated you so well and I will make sure I share with the entire team. Hope to see you back again soon!

title: lovely hotel
review: I stayed at the gallery one prior to my cruise from Fort Lauderdale.    The hotel is nice but older.  The room is quite large and very clean.  It has a nice kitchen complete with a microwave so if you wanted to make some meals it would be great for that.  The checkin staff was very welcoming.  Loved the cookie you get when you check in.  Yum.  Had breakfast in the hotel.  I ordered off the menu because I didn't care to have the buffet.  I got a grilled cheese and egg sandwich.  It seemed to take a long time to get it and then it was on the lukewarm side.  I expected it would be quite hot based on the length of time.  I had to ask for refills of coffee and water.  She left the bill which I quickly paid and I included a 15% tip.  As I was walking out of the restaurant she called…

title: Beautiful Suite
review: I was pleasantly surprised when we opened the door to our room.  It was decorated nicely with a great view.  The kitchenette with stove was a huge plus during our stay.  The staff was amazing and extremely friendly and helpful.  This hotel sits on a harbor and the water taxi literally picks you up right there.

title: enjoy the hotel and surroundings very much
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your large suite and that our team treated you so well. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Gorgeous property; excellent service
review: We are baby boomers and recently  vacationed in FL for the third time in 3 years.  We just love it there! We find everything we need and want for a pleasant and relaxing time away from home - a perfect get-away from  very cold and rough winter months. The hotel location could not be better, a 10 min. drive from FL airport, a 10 min. walk to the beach and a 5 min. walk to the Galleria shopping mall, with its 100 shops, surrounded by great restaurants to please every palate and pocket.  And in case you miss picking up your own groceries, Publix is just across the street. A boat ride on the water taxi is a must.  A one-day pass connects you to 11 stops, each with its own attractions, restaurants and other beaches. The water canal is called the 'Venice of America'.  The highlight of…

title: Average Hotel Exceptional Care from Management
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. I will make sure that I share your kind words regarding Galina, Aliona, Liliana & Zeynep with our entire team. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

title: 2 meetings held here, some minor issues but overall very good
review: Prior to a cruise, we stayed two nights at this property.  It is well-appointed with original art though the public areas - some a little out there, but interesting nonetheless.  It is right on the inland waterway, with a comfortable, though not very big pool (about 16-18 yards long).  The room was large, the bed very comfortable, and the bathroom of good size with sufficient amenities.  It was close - next door - to the Galleria with all its shops and restaurants.  We walked to the ocean and Bonnet House nearby (a 35-acre estate with a wonderful eclectic collection from a wealthy family).  The staff was very pleasant and helpful, even giving us wi-fi access when we were having a lot of trouble connecting.

title: Could do better
review: We arrived at this hotel late in the evening and was greeted by a very nice receptionist Anne Marie who expediated our room very promptly. The room however was a little disappointing being well overdue for a makeover and only brightened up with some nice prints on the wall. The furnishings were quite shabby and really could do with replacing.  The good points are that the hotel is very well located is close to a large galleria shopping mall as well as restaurants. There is a publix supermarket across the road. You are able to walk to the beach in 10 minutes or catch the trolley bus for a dollar. Overall the hotel was OK but would not choose it for a long stay again.

title: Overall, nice hotel. Great location, but UNORGANIZED
review: We stayed here for one night. The location is great. The mall is next door. The waterway balcony rooms have a great view of the intracoastal waterway. Our room also had a view of the ocean in the distance.  It was so peaceful and quiet. The hotel is only a 10 minute walk from the beach.  The lobby was packed with people, some were complaining, and it seemed like there was not enough staff checking in.  Rooms were not ready at check-in time. This hotel is valet parking only at $28/night.  Handicapped parking is free, but there are only about 4 spaces by the door. The pool is very small.
