The patio is large, has a bar, a man-made beach area, and a view of the waterway. The hotel is a stop for the water taxi.  The rooms are definitely showing signs of wear and tear and could use…

title: Sister Get Away
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that found our location to be to be "great". I am also happy to hear that you liked our water-view suites; they really are spectacular. I do apologize for the long check-in time. It is spring break and we do get times when everyone wants to check-in at once. Our front desk is always fully staffed, but there are only so many terminals. I can assure you that this is not the norm and once again, my apologies. We do hope to see you again soon!

title: We had corporate function and it was wonderful!
review: Would definitely book here again next time I visit Ft. Lauderdale. Location was great, walking distance to Galleria Mall and restaurants. Stayed here with my sister and the room allowed us plenty of private space between the bedroom and living room/kitchen area. Our balcony overlooked the Intercoastal with a view of the ocean as well. When we booked our room we paid an additional $7 each for breakfast, which included a nice variety of fruit, breakfast muffins and sweets, oatmeal, yogurt and toppings along with cooked to order omelettes. The only negatives was the additional  $29 per day cost for overnight parking. Although they have free Wi-Fi in the lobby and business area, there was an additional fee of $9.95 per day to access the internet in your room.

title: The perfect choice for our pre-cruise stay!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the beautiful views from your suite. We do hope to see you back again when you are in our area!

title: Good location to shopping, eating and the beaches
review: Clean and comfortable, the rooms were "roomy" and the staff was pleasant....unfortunately, nothing really stood out. However, for the price it is more than fair and just as much there is absolutely nothing wrong with this hotel.

title: Suite hotel, great location!
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you found your suite to be "clean and comfortable" and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Highly Recommend
review: Good location, clean hotel, on the water taxi route.  Very few hotels in the area have 2 bedroom accomodations, so this was our primary reason for consideration of this hotel.  Reasonable price for a spring break week, except only valet parking.  Staff was excellent, going out of their way to assist.

title: Sadly not much improvement.
review: Thank so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you found our hotel to be clean and you enjoyed your suite. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Way overpriced for the value
review: We recently stayed here for 3 night .  We arrived late and Ann Marie at the front desk went above and beyond to ensure we had a easy check in and provided us a gorgeous suite that overlooked the inter coastal.  Room was huge and clean, service was amazing. Everyone in this hotel goes above and beyond! Breakfast in the restaurant was also amazing.. the location, views and waterfront is gorgeous.. you can catch a boat here and cruise up and down the waterways! Walk across the parking lot to the Galleria Mall which is also awesome!! Cant say enough about this hotel and location>  We will be back and be staying at this hotel

title: Great hotel, great views!
review: This hotel is in a great location to have access to the waterway canal. You can walk right outside the back of the hotel and get on a boat to ride by all the mansions. Great hotel, pool is also right by waterway, amazing views!

title: Disappointing Stay at Galleryone Double Trees Ft Lauderdale
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you also liked our breathtaking views. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent in every way!
review: My wife and I decided to stay at this hotel once again prior to meeting a cruise in Miami having previously stayed in August 2014. We reserved a Queen sized room with a water view (canal) believing it would be ample in size for the two of us. Sadly the room was quite small even though there was a separate bedroom to the entry and kitchenette. Room prices at this hotel are at a premium at this time of the year apparently although I cannot understand why. We paid over $300.00 per day plus $28.00 per day for valet parking and frankly the cost is a rip-off although the season apparently dictates the cost of accommodation. The hotel is looking somewhat tired to me as was our room with shabby doors and cracked walls and tiles in the bathroom. We were very disappointed with this hotel…

title: Preferred Business Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so sorry that you found that your room was not big enough. All of our rooms are suites and much larger than most other hotel rooms in Ft. Lauderdale. As you stated, if you need more room I would suggest reserving a king room next time. Also, our rates are very competitive for this time of the year. We do hope that you give us another chance. Thank you once again!

title: Great place in great location
review: We recently stayed here for 1 night before a cruise, we arrived late and they were wonderful, upgraded to a gorgeous suite.  Room was huge and clean, service was amazing.  Everyone in this hotel goes above and beyond!  Breakfast in the restaurant was also amazing..  the location, views and waterfront is gorgeous.. you can catch a boat here and cruise up and down the waterways! Walk across the parking lot to the Galleria Mall which is also awesome!!  Cant say enough about this hotel and location..  its simply Awesome :)

title: One night before cruising
review: We were 6 perssons in 3 rooms. All found the rooms terrific. Aftert a long flight from sweden this was the perfect sleepover. The hotel had a transfer bus that took us to the terminal for only USD 8 /person. Breakfast cost was not included and was too expensive due to our experience from other Ft Lauerdale hotels. However it was of high quality. There are a couple of malls and restaurants a few yards from the hotel but no shopping Mecca. The surrounding is nice beside the canal, but the bridge about 150 yards from the hotel can be disturbing for some rooms when heavy traffic is passing.  We would choose this hotel in a similar situation. It can be recommended.

title: Highly remended
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to accommodate all of your guests. I am also happy to hear that you found our food to be "high quality". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Every disappointed with Hilton
review: I had an awesome time, the staff is extremely friendly and helpful, I had lost my suit case and they were right there to offer the basic need ...eg toothbrush, toothpaste. The water taxi was really an experience taking you from one location to the other for a nominal fee all day ride.

title: Outstanding Service
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear how the team took such good care of you and that you enjoyed your time on the water taxi. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again in the near future!

title: 4 years of excellence and consistency.
review: I stay at Hilton resorts all the time and this is the first time that I have ever received not one but two wake up calls at 4 o'clock in the morning when I never requested them. The staff was very friendly as Hilton always is but the fact that I got woken up with a wake up call 4 o'clock in the morning and also the air conditioning going on and off all night and the noise that was ridiculous was not up to my hilton standard. I don't believe we will stay here again

title: Nice hotel, convenient location
review: We really enjoyed the suite, since with the dining area and kitchenette it made our stay so much more comfortable and pleasant. This is a really nice place to stay. Monique Williams at the reception/concierge is to be highly recommended. She's very helpful, knowledgeable, professional with the customers and patient with her colleagues who depend on her for so many topics. We'd like to suggest the hotel train the other staff in the reception/ concierge desk better, as they seem not to be very knowledgeable about things and locations in the area or they were quite dismissive.

title: Pre-Cruise Two bedroom Suite
review: Thank you so much for your review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you took advantage of the full kitchen. I am also pleased to hear that Monique took such good care of you. I will make sure I share your kind words with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Could be better
review: We travel with two kids. There are few options available to us that let us stay together. This hotel has a two bedroom suite that met our needs. The room was a good size. When we arrived it was busy, but it is a very popular pre and post cruise hotel. The restaurant in the lobby had good breakfast options.  The vicinity to the mall gave us an option to kill time and to find a place to eat. Our room overlooked a highway and bridge and there was substantial noise. However we travel with noise machines, so we only noticed when we turned them off or went out on the balcony. The shower pressure was just okay, nothing great. The bedrooms did get pretty dark, but we needed to use one of my wife's hair clips to keep the curtains shut.

title: Nice suits, pretty average
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay in our two-bedroom suite. It certainly is a large suite with plenty of room. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Excellent Experience, except for the restaurant
review: Stayed here for 5 days in March, we stayed in a rental apartment side not in a hotel room. The room was clean, the staff at the front desk were amazing. Traffic noise was loud regardless of time of day as the sliding doors on the balcony is super thin and hard to open. Business center and work out room are well equipped. Small pool that is absolutely freezing and the hottub was broken. Drinks even pop, are not allowed on the pool deck and must be purchased from the bar for 4 bucks. Good sun though throughout the day and if you like boats the views of the waterway are amazing. Ten minute walk to mall and to beach. Only bad thing was upon our return home we got called and asked if we stole the coffee maker! Really? It was investigated and found that cleaning staff took it and it's…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: The Hotel was beautiful, clean and staff very friendly. I would definately recommend this hotel to a friend. The lobby has beautiful paintings and different works of art. I enjoyed walking around and taking pictures of the beautiful piees that were displayed.

title: Betty H
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our property to be clean and friendly. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Business trip to Fort Lauderdale
review: Love the location.  We experienced excellent customer service by   Ann - Marie Knott @ the front desk as well as Karesha Brislott in housekeeping. They  delivered prompt , courteousg and  quality  customer service.

title: Family Visit
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that Anne-Marie and Karesha took such good care of you. They are definitely the "best of the best" and I will make sure I share your kind words with our entire team. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: manatee
review: Terrific.  Especially loved the heated outdoor pool - being able to swim outdoors in February was a dream come true for this resident of chilly Ottawa!  Also nice that it was a short walk to the beach.  Nice business facilities and great views from the rooms

title: Wonderful service! Great stay!
review: We recently visited the Doubletree for one night pre-cruise. The suites were spacious with fully stocked kitchen, living room and bedroom. Great  distant views of the beach as well as the intercoastal  waterway. But what really made it a great stay was the warm and friendly service throughout the hotel, particularly at the front desk. Liliana Casanova was so helpful and really went that extra mile with a sunny pleasant attitude  to accommodate our every need. We are looking to returning often to this great place.

title: Unfortunately it rained, so having a perfect stay becomes that much more important. Thanks!  Brian L
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite and that Lilianna took such good care of you. I will make sure I share your comments with the entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Wedding overnight
review: Great hotel, great room, great breakfast. The hotel team was very kind and helpful, always going the extra mile to make sure all was perfect. Thanks Marcel, Monique and the rest of the team, it's the people that make the difference!  Brian L and family

title: Enjoyable stay in all-suite hotel
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. Although we did have a rainy weekend, I am happy to hear that you still enjoyed your stay. I will make sure I share your kind words regarding Marcel and Monique and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: A good mid-way point, near Lauderdale Airport and on the Water Taxi route
review: We stayed at the Double tree for 2 nights for our sons, wedding. Rooms were average but liked the suite idea especiallly having a refrigerater. We had a handicap King room which was fine but they need something to keep water from going out of shower into bathroom.! Very convenient for our wedding needs.

title: Great Hotel, best location
review: This was our first stay here & it won't be our last, wonderful front desk and housekeeping staff. The location is perfect, situated on the intercoastal waterway and just a few blocks both off the beach and the Galleria Mall.

title: Initially enjoyable but spoilt by item Missing on last day.
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that everyone took such good care of you. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: An almost ideal hotel in an almost ideal location
review: We enjoyed the break but several times we where told we owed money when we did not .For most of the week the room door could be opened without a keycard and this was only fixed on the day of our checking out after numerous complaints to the front desk.( a whole keycard block needed to be replaced) What finally cheesed us off was when packing we found a present we had bought in Nassau was missing from our room and when we complained to the staff the item suddenly appeared behind the front desk having been supposdly handed in two days after we had arrived . If we had left it in the lobby by mistake on our arrival day of Saturday we think it would have been handed in before Monday ? The lobby / pool area is small so easy to spot an item. We think we know what happened but…

title: Nice hotel to visit
review: Thank you for taking the time to submit your review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I do apologize for your lost item. I did research it and found that the item was left at the front desk. Regardless, I am happy that you were able to get it back and we hope to see you again soon!

title: Dirty Rooms, loud party
review: True- nothing is perfect in life! This Doubletree Suites Hotel however is reasonably close to perfect...and they DO try with a wonderful front desk and housekeeping staff. The location however is perfect. Situated on the intercoastal waterway and just a few blocks both off the beach and the Galleria Mall gives one the best of several worlds. This was our second season at the hotel. We spent a week there last year and a week this year after our cruises.  Downsides ...a "cold" lobby with drab furniture (beautify it) and especially those dirty cushions outside as you arrive (dump them).  Hint... overnight parking there is expensive. There is however a small car  rental agency on the other side of the bridge which, upon request lets you park in their facility overnight free of…

title: Very Nice
review: The hotel was VERY clean and the staff was super friendly. The one bad things I can say is: there was little water pressure in the shower and the bed was harder than we would have liked. Would definitely choose to stay here again!

title: We found a Jewel!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy that you found our property to be "very clean" with a "super friendly staff". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Expensive and dirty
review: My husband and I have been travelling to Fort Lauderdale/ Pompano area for years now and can say that we have finally found the perfect location for us!. We are active, like to walk the beach, walk to  shopping etc.  This location is ideal.   The Publix grocery store is across the road,the pharmacy is 10 minute walk, the mall is right next door. Great restaurants and walking to the beach.  Its perfect!   The staff here are obviously well trained.  Never an unhappy face, always speak and reach out to lend a hand.  Again, no other place we have stayed, can compare to this hotel. we have already reserved again for next year!  We wont need a rental car, there is the water taxi and sun trolley and everything else is so close,

title: Excellent experience
review: This property was quite dirty and not very nice, it was noisy as we were overlooking the drawbridge. The toilet blocked up one morning and water flooded the bathroom and out into the bedroom. Maintenance was fairly quick and once fixed said he would get housekeeping to clean everything and vacuum up,the water as we were heading out. On our return the bedroom carpet was still sopping wet and we had to call housekeeping again they came up and then we had to tell them to please get a wet vac to clean it up. Finally this was finished but all this made for a very uncomfortable experience. These things happen but the handling of the situation was poor. God location near the gallery shopping centre. Overpriced for what is offered.

title: Great location very nice hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I do apologize for the way that your situation was handled. Yes, these thing do happen but we should have followed up better. I will share with my team so that this does not occur again. Thank you once again and we do hope you give us another chance.

title: Stayed in a 2 bedroom suite prior to cruise
review: Nice hotel. There were 4 of us and so we opted for a 2 bedroom suite with a center family room and a kitchentte. All of the staff were friendly. It was clean. I would stay there again. The only down side is that we stayed on the street side with the view of the Intercoastal and the ocean but the street noise was very loud. We were on the 7th floor. Maybe if we would have been higher it would have been better. I really liked the large bathroom in the master bedroom and the walk in shower.

title: Super staff! Especially Lilliana!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found everything to be clean. I am also happy to hear that our team treated you so well. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Didn't meet expectations.
review: Front desk representative Lilliana Casanova really took care of my wife and I who were celebrating a special occasion. So amazing!  The rest of the staff were great too, very friendly.  The hotel is conveniently located a couple of blocks from the beach which is very convenient, especially if you want to go for a great oceanfront run!  The rooms were a comfortable size.  Like other Hilton Suites hotels we found the housekeeping to be kind of hit and miss, not very timely or thorough, but not horrible.  The restaurant and bar were very nice.  The pool area might be a little disappointing for some travellers, but you're so close to the beach who cares!  It gets a bit noisy due to being right beside the bridge, but you get used to it and it quiets out around 11pm.  TIP:  Don't buy…

title: TJ mad our stay
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Lilianna took such good care of you. She is definitely one of our best and I will share your kind words with our entire team. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: very good hotel
review: Multiple things were wrong in room , shower leaked on the floor, paint peeling in bathroom , toilet bowl was dirty, lights did not work in dining area, coffee pot leaked and did not work, toaster did not work Had to call on a daily basis to be sure the room was made. Heat blew cold air and when called to be fixed only worked temporarily. The location is good but for a Hilton needs better up keep.

title: Doubletree is the best hotel in Ft.Lauderdale
review: It was like being on vacation all over again and we loved everything about the hotel.  We had been staying at the Westin and hated that experience. What a shabby hotel this is, the carpets in the hallways were filthy but the Doubletree was like a breath of fresh air and having the water taxi in the back of hotel was most convenient. Everybody we encountered at the hotel was very pleasant.

title: Oh my....
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am so happy that you decided to stay with us and that you enjoyed your stay. I am also pleased to hear that you found our team to be "pleasant". We hope to see you back again soon!!

title: Hotel is terrific; internet connection terrible
review: Checked in to the hotel and the rooms were not very clean; terrible cleaner smell; the carpet was worn out and stained and basically the rooms were NOT good.  However their staff were great. Hilton needs to do a major refurbishing of this hotel.   If you have allergies be careful as the room smell and mold were not good

title: Slipped just a little for me this trip
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so sorry you found your guest room unacceptable. Our housekeepers work very hard to keep our guest rooms clean and an unacceptable guest room is not the standard at our hotel. I am however happy to hear that the service was good.   My sincerest apologies. I hope you consider staying with us again. We’d love to have you as our guest the next time you are in Fort Lauderdale.

title: What a surprise............
review: Nice location, very comfortable bed/room. Nice that unit had a small kitchen. Room was quiet. Service, including valet was nice. Pool/hot tub in great condition and very relaxing. TVs were great. However, the internet connection was spotty and very slow.

title: Manager was Awesome!!!
review: Marcel the Manager made our stay wonderful! He made us aware if we need anything to please contact him directly. This is what I call service, being alway from him in to have somebody like that give you service like that is so amazing.

title: Business Stay
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words regarding Marcel. Yes, I agree he is one of our "best of the best" and we are very lucky to have him. I did share your review with our entire team and we hope you come see us again soon!

title: Awesome Service
review: I stayed here for business but I would suggest it for personal travel as well. A bit set a part from the beaches but still close access. The food in the restaurant wasn't half bad.   There is noise at night though. When the trucks go over the drawbridge a light sleeper will probably have some issues.

title: Great time! Would do it again in a heartbeat.
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay and you like the food in our restaurant. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: our first night together
review: Staff (outside of the business luncheon) was amazing, helpful and professional.  Loved the minute I walked in and was greeted with a smile - helpful and courteous service with a smile and a warm cookie.

title: Gorgeous Accommodations for a Price!
review: We were met by valet service who were courteous and efficient. ($28). The king bed suite with full kitchen and view of the intercostal waterway was lovely but $317 before the buffet breakfast for $52 for two which was not included in the price of the room. SO, we did have a lovely time but suffered a little sticker shock. If this is a part of your normal travel expectations, you will have a wonderful experience.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team took such good care of you. I am also happy to hear that you did reserve a room with a spectacular view. They truly are wonderful. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Comfortable stay
review: as a diamond member from Hilton this is a nice hotel, due to all the cruise guests the hotel is ready for a room facelift,   It is in a good location near a high end mall and grocery store (a 5 min walk)  - but if you have a car it can only be parked by the valet which is now $28 per day so you have to figure that cost into your stay - the breakfast bar is just average......not sure if I will stay there again i

title: perfect location
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you consider us to be a "nice hotel" and that you enjoyed your stay. I am also happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: The Numbers Don't Add Up
review: Very welcoming staff.  Super helpful.  Rooms are spacious and clean.  Lots to do near by.  Warm cookie on arrival is a nice touch.  The view from the balcony is amazing. The rooms are furnished like a mini apartment with fully functioning kitchen to make longer stays more comfortable.

title: Love this property!
review: I've stayed many times at this Doubletree and love it. The rooms are spacious, clean, and feature kitchens and balconies. There is a separate sitting area and bedroom area..great for longer stays and spreading out if you have family. Staff is always friendly. Nothing beats sitting on the balcony in the evening watching the boat traffic go by in the waterway, or waking up in the morning with a cup of coffee to watch the sunrise and dolphins swimming by.   The one very frustrating part of this property is their charge for parking. They have LOTS of vacant property, a double-tiered lot, and gated off, vacant parking area that I've never seen used in the many times I've stayed at this property.    Only expensive, valet only parking is offered. While this is understandable on…

title: Great!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review and kind words. I am so happy to hear that you continue to stay with us and that you enjoy your accommodations.  Regarding the parking, we do provide this as a service to our guests. We also charge a bit less than most other hotels in our area. Your vehicle is always safe and secure and you may request it 24/7.  Thanks again and we hope to see you back soon!

title: Buyer beware
review: One of the best hotels I have ever been to. The associates were top notch! Very accommodating and friendly . The young lady who checked us in, Lillianna(I'm sure I'm spelling this wrong) was amazing. She was told that it was my birthday and sent a yummy gift, and card, to our room. The location is perfect. Away from the hustle of the oceanfront, but close enough to walk there. Small beach area to watch the beautiful boats go by. And the water taxi stops right in front of the hotel. We never drove anywhere. Very clean, room was spotless, beds were great! We will stay again on our next visit. In fact, we tried to stay an extra night but they were booked. This place is on the top if my list of favorite hotels!

title: More a case of branding than real value
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and how great Liliana took care of you. I am also so happy to hear that you found your room to be "spotless" and the bed to be "great". We look forward to seeing you back again soon! Thank you so much once again!!

title: Not Bad But Could Use an Upgrade
review: Call the hotel to make your reservations. Reservation service is terrible and WILL not help in any way, shape, or form!!!!  For the money you spend, bang for your buck, is not there!!!  The CITY view is a view of a broke down parking lot.

title: Great location, excellent renovation
review: I've been staying at this Doubletree for the past 20 years. I've seen it go trough so many name changes and renovations. I can say that my last stay was wonderful. Since the last time I was here (a year) the few glitches I experienced have been improved. There is no longer a towel problem at the pool or in the rooms and the customer service is excellent.   I stayed in a water view room and was very happy with my stay.   All in all the rooms are fully renovated and customer care was always ready to answer any question, concern or request I may have.   The only negative aspect I can complain with at the moment is that we have to pay for wireless internet in our room. There's a wonderful business Center in the hotel and free wireless access in the lobby but I would love to be able…

title: Wow....VERY, VERY Average
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and that you continue to stay with us over the years. I am also happy to hear that you noticed our renovations. All suites have been upgraded and we truly believe that we have the best property in Ft. Lauderdale.  Thank you once again and I am sure we will see you again soon!

title: Works for Pre Cruise Stay
review: I needed to stay near the Blue Martini as I had a date lined up for a quick overnight visit and I didn't want to mess with a cab, so I booked a room at the DoubleTree Suites hotel at GALLERYone.  Here's the short summary that says it all....  If you MUST have the location - then get ready to pay the freight ($269/night) for a very average hotel.  Pros: Beautiful LOBBY.  Great location.  Nice outdoors area for a cocktail by the water.  Cons: Carpets are shoddy and very worn looking.  Shower dribbles water - no power.  VERY worn looking overall (ie, paint scratched everywhere),    Bottom line - for the money, I was expecting MUCH more.  I read some similar reviews, but needed to have this waling distance location for my date.  I'll plan better next time.

title: getting run down
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and our outside patio. I do apologize for the carpet as we are starting that project shortly and I do hope you return to see the positive changes. Thank you once again and we look forward to hosting you in the future!

title: A solid hotel
review: We stayed here for two nights before our 11 day cruise.  We paid $25 for the taxi from the airport and about $15 for the taxi to the cruise terminal.  We found the hotel in good condition with a need for a few touch ups.  Be sure to book a room facing away from from the main road and canal bridge as the traffic can get noisy and you hear it in your room.  We stayed in a King suite and found it to be large and comfortable.  We enjoyed dinner and breakfast in their in house restaurant. It is a short walk to the Galleria mall and their is a Publix grocery story within walking distance as well.  You can take about a 10-15 minute walk and be at the beach.  We recommend the Truluck's restaurant if you are looking for a good seafood dinner.

title: Would never stay there again!
review: We stayed two nights in this hotel.one night prior to our cruise and one night after our cruise.  First night was December 26, second night was Jan 3. Though the hotel is beautiful and location is nice the service is terrible, and it is not well maintained. Both rooms we stayed in had problems with proper drainage in the showers. The first room we had TV issues with many of the channels not working. You have to pay for wifi if you want it which is rather silly considering the room cost $259 a night. They lost our reservation for the second night then over charged us by $20. After talking to them about it they did give us their quoted price.  In addition, I asked front desk to send up two pillows and blanket, and the only sent up a blanket. Their communication with each other and…

title: wouldn't choose this hotel again
review: Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service and quality of amenities. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

title: Not the best, outdated
review: My husband booked a little getaway for us a few months back checking in Dec. 31 and leaving on Jan. 4...A time to rejuvenate before getting back in to the swing of things with our four children.  When we got to the hotel at 7pm our room wasn't ready.  We booked in advance knowing it was new years eve that we were checking in and we still couldn't get the room we reserved. After talking with three people to try and figure it out they said they didn't know what happened but they could get us in that room the next day and we would have to stay in a different room the first night.  We were told to go have a drink in the bar on them while they tried to make sure we had a room.  The first night my husband was not feeling well and there was no little shop or way of getting ibuprofen…

title: Happy Holiday
review: Thank you so much for submitting your review. I am so sorry that you experienced these issues while you stayed with us. I have discussed your review with the entire team so that we can make it better and I greatly appreciate your feedback. We do hope you give us another chance after we fix these shortcomings. Thank you once again and we do hope to see you back!

title: Ok hotel with good views of the water
review: Was disappointed in the hotel.  It is about a 30 dollar cab ride to the hotel from the airport.  Rooms a little outdated, dirty - housekeeping definitely was not up to their best.  Location ok, next to mall and Publix, short walk to beach.  Would choose another hotel and area in the future though.  Internet not good at all in the rooms.  AC did not work well.

title: Intention was business with some pleasure...result was the biggest headache to date.
review: I booked months in advance for my December 13, 2014 check-in. In this weekend stay I was a coordinator for an event, scheduled a shoot and business meeting...and since I'm here I'll watch the winterfest boat parade at night.  I have booked clients into this hotel previously....was given good reviews (not great). Still decided to give them a try at least for one night.   When traveling a hotel is an extension of your home. It's supposed to be home away from home. Not so in this case. With the ability to make loads of money from locals wanting to see the boat parade this hotel became a club. Paying guests were forced to wear wristbands or not allowed entry. Tables were set up as a make shift velvet rope and security, by way of hotel management, was in place.  I was more than…

title: Nickel and Dimed for a very average Hotel
review: Thank you so much for your review. I am so sorry that you were not aware of our policy during the annual Winterfest event. We did send emails to all of our guests arriving and I do apologize if you did not receive it. We do this every year so our guests can enjoy the boat parade without having the public come into our property and taking up all of the outdoor viewing area. We also had a large private party in-house and we need to put controls in place. If we didn't do this, we would have had hundreds of people here and there would be no room for our guests. We were told that it was handled very well and all of our guests were very happy that they had a view. I am so sorry that youw ere charged extra for your guests. We issued bracelets to "registered guests" and if there are more guests registered, the room rate goes up. However, if you can call me directly at 954-335-4500, I would be more than happy to discuss with you and come up with a solution. I don't know which manager you spoke with and I do apologize for the lack of empathy. I hope to hear from you soon!

title: Great staff
review: HBO service that cut in and out, very plain King-sized suite, rough towels, poor water pressure, thin walls... this place feels more like a Motel 6 than a DoubleTree.  On top of a very average facility, they force you to valet park at $30/day... charge $20 for old movies on your TV... Charge $4 for a 12 oz can of Coke in the lobby... Wi Fi only free to ultra super dooper Hilton Honors members (not just ordinary Hilton members)... don't trust the room rate specials, they'll get you in other ways.  Not enough chairs at pool area ...Also, you  can't cross Sunrise from this location..anytime you need to travel west you have to go over a drawbridge and make a u Turn.

title: Great hotel for the family getaway
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. I am so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. We strive to deliver the best accommodations and service in Ft. Lauderdale and most of our guests are very happy with their stay. Yes, we do charge for parking just like every hotel in our market. In fact, the other hotel that you mentioned charges $4.00 a night more. We are a full-service property and we do offer complimentary internet in all common areas including the lobby, restaurant and outside. We also have a complimentary business center. I will share all of your comments with my team as they do help us to provide a better experience for all of our guests. I appreciate the feedback and we do hope you give us another chance.

title: WATCH YOUR WALLET
review: I had a wonderful stay here in December which also happened to occur over the weekend of the boat parade.  Prior to coming I had great help from Monique whose friendliness, patience and answers to my questions helped me decide on staying at this hotel instead of the original hotel I had booked.  I was not disappointed with my decision.  Check in with Liliana went very smoothly and the cookies were a big hit with us throughout our stay.  Gallery one is in a good location for access to the beach and shopping.  It has a great view of the intercoastal waterway which was perfect to view the parade.  As it turned out, the hotel also provided space by the pool area to view the parade which was a very good location. You did not need to have a balcony view with this spot.  The hotel was…

title: weekend get-away
review: To Ft. Lauderdale for the weekend - Doubletree was convenient, clean, comfortable.  The 2-room suite was perfect for us.  The Balcony facing the ICW was perfect for watching water traffic.  Close to the Galleria for shopping and restaurants.  Perfect!

title: Excellent service very friendley staff
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that you found our property to be "convenient, clean, & comfortable". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed all of the options within walking distance. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Quality service in a perfect location
review: We had a wonderfull time. The staf was very friendley . Special the dutch Girl . Sanne de vries. The food was great en the rooms were clean. I would recomend this hotel to my friends. I wil come bag to this place.

title: Could be really better
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our staff to be friendly, especially Sanne. I am also happy to hear that you found your suite to be clean and that you enjoyed our food. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: May want to stay longer...
review: My wife and I booked this hotel for 2 nights prior to setting off on a cruise. This hotel and the service provided by the staff were excellent to very good. We reserved a balcony room overlooking the water- the room was immaculate as was the main entrance of the hotel. It was fully appointed, very nicely decorated and on the water taxi stop that allows guests easy access to many of the Fort Lauderdale sites. The onsite restaurant (Vu) was a pleasant and convenient location to have supper when we arrived late on our first evening. The proximity of the hotel to the beach is an easy 10-15 minutes walk and to the major shopping mall ( 2-3 minutes). There is also a grocery store very close. The room view was impressive, and the the size, amenities and other provisions in the room…

title: Will not stay there again
review: First of all the hotel did not accommodate my needs based on the room type I booked previously so I was forced to settle for a room location I was not happy with. Because of a special event they implemented a very strange rule of only allowing 4 guests total which since I booked the room to celebrate the special event I was forced to use my under the table tipping tactics in order to get around this dumb rule which was just implemented for this event only but yet they used a fire code excuse so that guest would argue much. That isn't a very professional way to conduct business in my book. Lastly, I was charged an obscene amount for local phone calls I was forced to make because I had poor reception on my cell phone and they wouldn't budge even a bit which these days with all the…

title: It was suppossed to be a Non Smoking room
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so sorry that you were unable to bring more guests to our property. As you know, this was the Winterfest Boat Parade and we were at full capacity. We did send an email to every guest arriving stating our policy and I apologize if you did not receive this email. We allowed the 2 guests that were on the reservation plus 2 extra guests to enjoy the event. We feel this is more than fair so all of our registered guests can view and enjoy the Parade. Thank you once again and I do hope that you understand that our guests always come first. Have a wonderful holiday!

title: Felt Like Home!
review: I am at suite 1219 and this was a NON SMOKING room, well smell like someone being smoking many days and the room has not being cleaned well, Worse I called reception at 11:12 pm and no one answer to let them know that we had this problem. Too bad was a nice hotel

title: Brilliant
review: Thank you for sharing your feedback about our hotel. We apologize for the odor you encountered during your stay, and we’re taking steps to make sure it won’t happen again. We are a 100% non-smoking property and I am sorry we did not catch this. We know that travel can be stressful, and we try hard to make sure all our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. I also apologize the front desk was not available. Based on your comments, it appears you are still a guest at our hotel. Please reach out to our front desk for assistance so that we can make it right. We hope you’ll stay with us again in the future.

title: Nice hotel, good location, pretty good staff - maybe $30-$50 too expensive
review: Traveling regularly can be a lot of wear and tear on your body, and when staff at a hotel to go above and beyond to make it more comfortable for you, it doesn't go unnoticed.  My recent stay with the DoubleTree in Ft Lauderdate was extremely impressive with all of the staff taking care to make sure my stay was perfect.  One individual that went above and beyond was the housekeeper who was on my 7th floor EVERY day (12/8, 9 and 10) and I am so sorry that I do not have her name.  But, I am sure you have received other comments on her because she has a smile as wide as the gulf and her willingness to do whatever it took to keep me happy was something I will not forget.  If I'm in Ft. Lauderdale again, you can bet I will be praying that my visit includes a stay with your wonderful…

title: Good location
review: Enjoyed our stay.  Overall very good.  Only negative was price and wifi, not good at all.    Paid for it, but was very very slow to use.    They should have this updated asap.  People need this more and more.  Bed very comfortable.  Near elevator, but still pretty quiet.  Would go again - yes.

title: Nice hotel, close to galleria Mall
review: Thank you so much for submitting your review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found your bed to be comfortable. I will look into the internet issue as we do normally have lightning fast service. Thank you for bringing that to our attention and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Upkeep of hotel not worth the $230+ a night
review: Friendly staff at reception , nice welcome. The room we got was far better than expected , HUGE ..... seperate bedroom, living room with kitchen ( coffee maker, toaster,fridge .... and much more. Hotel has been renovated, but has to pay extra attention to cleaning as we found many strange looking spots al over the room, on doors , on wall etc (stains on doors who appeared there to be longer than a few days ..........) Also dust , at certain spots more than 1 cm , brrrrr) It s a shame, realyy should pay attention to it as hotel is great for its location, (small)pool area , watertaxi stop and walking distance to beach. Galleria Mall , 5 min walk , more shops close to hotel even a publix supermarket.  and for the shop/a/holics .... the Sawgrass Mill Mall can be reached by…

title: Great Gallery
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our large suites and you noticed the complete renovation that we just finished last year. I am also thrilled to hear that you were treated so well by our staff. I truly believe we have the BEST team in Ft. Lauderdale. I will share your cleanliness comments with our Director of Housekeeping so that these issues do not occur again. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great location.
review: As a family of four we stayed her for 7 days. The double queen suite was perfect for us with plenty of room with two balcony doors.   Pros : Ten minute walk to the narrow - touristy beach.  Publix right across the street.  Excellent full kitchen with dishwasher. Made a regular family meal one night.  Right on the beautiful waterway. Sunrises from the balcony from room 820. I think . Watched the big and small boats go by.  Pool and hot tub is handicap accessible with a chair lift.  Friendly valets.  Yummy cookie on arrival.  Bar and starbucks basics in the lobby.  Don't need a car - taxi or eco shuttle it.   Cons: The room needed to be spackled and painted. Tons of scuff marks and cracks on walls and ceilings. Moldy shower door. Housekeeping just needs to check the inside of the…

title: Old and worn out
review: The staff is indifferent and no hospitality comes across while interacting with them.  I found a roach in my bathroom and the rooms need to be refurbished.  The hotel grounds and pool are mediocre at best and need to be redesigned.

title: Pleasant and spacious hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We’re very sorry your experience wasn't up to our usual high standards. We've addressed the problems you mentioned with the front desk. Thank you for alerting us to the pest issue which will allow us to correct this immediately with our pest control company. I am not quite sure as to why you feel our rooms need to be updated as they are all brand new having been renovated last year. However, we do appreciate your feedback and we hope you do give us another chance.

title: Last minute trip
review: Nice suites hotel, suites including kitchen. Attractive location in Fort Lauderdale, adjacent to a modern and big mall, short walking distance to the beach. A smaller swimming pool, water taxi at the doorstep.

title: It Was Nice, But Not Great
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our suites to be "nice" and "spacious". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the shopping and beach within walking distance and we do hope to see you again soon!

title: average
review: We fell in love with the room my husband loved the balcony the most I loved the spacious room bedroom was huge with doors to the balcony at night was really nice outside sitting out there relaxed we ordered pizza from a great place over there will def be back there :)

title: With room to spare
review: Stayed at this hotel for 2 days, then had a 7 day cruise followed by a further 5 days in Fort Lauderdale.  The room was terrific. A large bedroom, with bathroom en suite, with a brilliant King or Queen size bed, plus loads of hanging and drawer space.  A separate living room with a kitchen, excellent lounge and a very welcome balcony overlooking the pool and inter coastal. The water taxi stopped right outside, and 2 minutes away was the Galleria Mall with a great array of restaurants and shops. The staff couldn't have been more helpful, especially the Manager Stuart Levy, Valet/Concierge and the front desk.  My only criticism is that the substantial pool area suffers slightly because buildings around mean that you have to move  to maximise the sun bathing.  Excellent pool, but…

title: Perfectly placed for the water
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our large suites and that everyone treated you so well. It was a pleasure meeting you and we hope to see you again the next time you are in the states.

title: Fantastic Accomodation
review: A great stay here. The hotel is perfectly placed for exploring Ft. Lauderdale as the wonderful water taxis stop right outside. Just back from the beach also. The suites are spacious and well equiped. Go for the waterfront view suites - much more interesting! The staff are really helpful especially if you are new to the area (as we were). The only minor downside is that the restaurant is very limited as to menu and the service can be slow. Great breakfasts though.

title: Good Hotel, Good Location, Great Staff!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay and you enjoyed our large suites. I am also happy to hear that our staff treated you so well and that you enjoyed breakfast. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: excelent
review: Superb luxury where all rooms are suites incorporating an excellent dining/sitting room with large screen TV alongside a small kitchenette. The bedroom had two large comfortable beds with another large screen TV and an en suite large shower room. Superbly located for the water taxis and the beach but as the weather was so good spent very little time in our suite which was a shame but would definitely recommend.

title: Incredible Service
review: As soon as we walked in the door to our annual sales convention, we were greeted by beautiful art work, a friendly staff and warm cookies! :)  From that point on, throughout our weekend meetings, the staff came nothing short of catering to our every need. The food was delicious, the rooms were very spacious, the entire staff were beyond courteous!  Everyone was upbeat and made you feel as though they were there to serve only you-- even the valet drivers catered to any need I had to retrieve items (several times) from my car! I highly recommend this hotel to any corporations in need of a venue for a meeting, out of town vacationers, even the locals for an enjoyable stay-cation! 

title: Nice spot for a meeting
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hotel during your annual convention. I am also happy to hear that you received "incredible service" throughout your stay and that everyone treated you so well. I will share your kind words with my entire team and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: We spent a splendid time
review: Everyone was super friendly and accommodating, especially Helia and Chiara.  We had a small meeting in a boardroom and everything went off without a hitch. The restaurant had great lunch options, the meeting room was spacious without being too large and the pre-planning of the meeting was very detailed.  I would recommend this property for business and pleasure as the beach is just a short walk over the causeway.   The only complaint I have was there was no air conditioning on in the gym in the mornings, which made my workouts unbearable.   If the weather cooperated that would have made it perfect!

title: Awesome Service!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that your meeting went well and that Chiara and Helia took such good care of you. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant and that the you found our meeting rooms to be "spacious". Thank you for recommending our great property and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Amazing Service
review: We had stayed at this hotel some time ago, and I must say that it continues to be an excellent alternative; well kept, perfect room and view and, very specially, a great experience. The staff is always extremely helpful, efficient and couteous.

title: Nice stay in great location
review: Chose this hotel for post-cruise stay based on root rate, location to beach and favorite restaurants (~10 min walk).  Very pleased with suite room and service at front desk and bar.  Balcony was nice but not a great view from west-facing room (621).  Pool area is fine but nothing special.  Adjacent to Intercostal waterway with WaterTaxi stop so convenient access to other spots around Ft. Lauderdale.   Only negative was able to faintly hear music from weekend wedding/party from on 6th floor. Plan to use again on future trips.

title: Super Service
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay. I am also happy to hear that you were "very pleased" with your suite and the service. We strive to deliver first-class service and I am thrilled we took good care of you. We do hope to see you back again soon!

title: Place was great.
review: everyone from Vivian to bartender especially valet boys....super accommodating and friendly...very professional The housekeepers were friendly and respectful The entire place was immaculate...we were visiting for a wedding that was held by the water and it was lovely.  Thank you for your time. I highly recommend this hotel and would visit again 100%

title: Poor Service
review: Wow, thank you so much for your five-star review titled "super service". I am thrilled to hear how our team treated you and that you found our hotel to be "immaculate". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the wedding. It really is a great place to host an event and I am happy that everything was perfect. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Convenient and Comfortable
review: Great hotel. Everyone was very hospitable. I'd stay here again, but, just don't plan on renting a car for your stay. They charge $30/night to keep your car there. On top of the already expensive hotel room. it made it a little hard to swallow. Besides that, it was a good place to relax.

title: Very nice hotel!
review: When you check in, you will receive the cookies, very delicious!  Very nice service and very nice room. There are microwave oven and dish washing machine in the room, so I can cook in this hotel.  There are many restaurants nearby. Pf Chang, Big Louis Pizzeria are very good restaurant, just five minutes away. There is a big Pub lix super market nearby.   I will choose this hotel again for sure if I go to Fort Lauder dale again.

title: Fernando
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review titled "very nice hotel". I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and that your room and the service were great. We strive to deliver the BEST service in Ft. Lauderdale and thanks so much for your kind words. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Family adventures can begin here
review: He is the best. I only will stay again because of him.   Love this place.  Food is lovely. Front desk is great.  Rooms are sexy. You get a cookie. And it's good. The overall service is great. Location is just perfecto. Water taxi is right at my the doorstep. There is only one drawback. No free beer.  !!

title: Double Tree Fort Lauderdale
review: Wow, thank you so much for your awesome review. I am thrilled that Fernando took such great care of you. He is definitely one of our "best of the best". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and dined in our restaurant. I will share your kind words with Fernando as well as the rest of our team. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great Place for Families!
review: I stayed as a business traveler at beginning of year and decided to bring family back for December. Liliana made the stay immensely better than before. Not only did I have a lovely room overlooking water, but we were able to get a whole breakfast buffet this time. Her enthusiasm to please was welcome, and enhanced the stay. Lots of windows to enjoy the Florida sunshine, big front room, and large bedroom with shower stall, no tub. Full mini kitchen, in this suites only property means families can stay comfortably. Hide a bed in the living room adds sleeping space for kids, and 2 bedroom units available for a price. Washing machines in property. Walking distance to groceries, reasonable ,and fancy restaurants, and a pricy boutique fashion mall means you don't need a car. Car and…

title: Double Tree at Sunrise Blvd. Fort Lauderfale
review: There were three of us in the room and had a wonderful experience with it.  It had a nice dining and living room and a full kitchen with a nice size refrigerator, two range stove, pots and pans and the coffee maker had every morning the coffee envelopes, cream and sugars.

title: Nice place
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of your kitchen. All of our suites have kitchens and I am so happy that you used it. Thank you once again and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

title: Beach Close By
review: Went to Florida for a family wedding. Stayed here one night. room was clean, nice big bathroom with walk in shower. Small kitchenette if you wanted to bring food in. The bed was extremely comfortable. Nothing special however, a bit pricy however would stay again if needed to.

title: Just Average
review: Thank you so much for your review titled "nice place". I am so happy to here that you found your suite to be "clean" with a "nice big bathroom with walk in shower". I am also happy that you found your bed to be comfortable. We do hope to see you again soon!

title: Worst Stay Ever!
review: I spent one night here in a business trip.   The hotel is located within a short walk to the beach.   Overall the hotel was good. I didn't have a few issues. When I arrived the person at the front desk was not that helpful. I arrived about 2 and she said there were no rooms ready. She was supposed to call me when one became ready. I waited and hour and she never called. When I went back to the front desk she said there were still no rooms. Thank goodness someone else was there to help her. She also used the wrong hilton honors number after I have it to her twice. I know these aren't major issues but it's not the service I expect from the Doubletree.   My room was clean and I had a great view. I had some noisy neighbors that were up pretty late. I paid them back when I got up at…

title: Nice Fort Lauderdale Hotel
review: I stayed at The Galleryone Doubletree by Hilton for 4 nights. The hotel is on The Intercoastal, and a short 10 minute walk to the beach. A short 5 minute walk takes you to The Galleria Mall with its high end shops. The hotel is clean and comfortable, and is an all suite hotel that includes separate bedrooms and kitchens. The staff is friendly and helpful. My only complaint is the breakfast buffet. The scrambled eggs were cold, and the coffee was horrible. I would stay at this hotel again, but would eat elsewhere.

title: Great location
review: Thank you so much for your kind review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our suites to be "clean and comfortable" and our staff to be "friendly and helpful". I do apologize for the temperature of the eggs and I will look into that. I am sad to hear that you did not enjoy the coffee as most people do like Starbucks. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Again and again and again.
review: Great location on the waterway. The water taxi stops at the hotel which is super convenient.  Quick check in and our room was ready at 12:30!  Had a suite that was very nice and spacious. The pool was heated and had plenty of chairs.  Wished that breakfast was included as many other hotels offered this.  Glad we stayed but will probably go elsewhere next time - valet parking for the night was $28.

title: Beautiful
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite and our heated pool. I am also happy to hear that you took advantage of the water taxi that stops right at our back deck. I am sorry that you were upset about the breakfast and the parking, but we do offer packages online that do include breakfast. Also, we do provide valet parking as a service to our guests which is less expensive than most hotels in Ft. Lauderdale. Thanks again and we do hope to see you back soon!

title: Double tree gallery one fort lauderdale, fl
review: I have stayed at Gallery One more times than I can remember and it gets better all the time. From the moment I step out of the car at the valet to a warm greeting at reception, the enthusiasm of the staff for their hotel is obvious. Where else would I find a maid who remembers me each time I go there and asks how my daughter is ! All of the staff are dedicated to making their hotel the  best in Ft.Lauderdale and I think that is fantastic.  Great  team work, keep it up !

title: Convenient and nice.
review: I spent 6 days with my sister and nieces at Doubletree. We stayed in a large two bedroom apartment with all the facilities needed to feel at home. The only drawback was that the apartment was facing a fairly highly trafficked road. So make sure to ask for the city view side. The staff was friendly and helpful. The location was perfect pool area was nice and not crowded at all. With 7 minutes to the beach and 2 minutes to the galleria mall and grocery store. If you want a nice place to stay without too much luxury this is a great deal.

title: Loved and will return to the Galleria One Double Tree
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your two bedroom suite and that you found our staff to be "friendly and helpful". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed our tropical pool and you found our location to be "convenient". We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Galleryone Fort Lauderdale.
review: My sister and I received a balcony room facing the intercoastal. We LOVED the views. The room with two doubles and a small kitchen was perfect. The staff was pleasant and accommodating. We received full breakfast coupons with our HH Diamond status. Breakfast was really good, but the friendly service was very slow. The pool is on the small side, but nice. It is shaded in the earlier part of the day. We were able to walk to the beach, maybe 1/2 mi? The water taxi picks up right at the hotel. We did hear some street noise at  night, but not enough to be a problem.  I'll definitely stay there again.

title: Need to include Free Wi-Fi
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you "LOVED the views". I am also happy to hear that you found our team to be "friendly and accommodating" and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: Decent hotel. Great location.  Knock off the valet gimmick!
review: Stopped overnight prior to cruise ex Port Lauderdale. Lovely suite, huge walk in shower, and small well equipped kitchen. Couldn't get the coffeemaker working so reported to reception and given two complimentary coffees from the coffee bar. Alisha the barista was really helpful and produced probably the finest coffee we enjoyed all week. Well done Aliona. Son and grandson first visit to states and they had a whale of a time. They walked to the beach whilst wife and I enjoyed the shopping mall almost opposite. Check out the view of Ford Lauderdale roofs. We Sat on the balcony at 0600 in 26degrees C If you are accommodated here prior to a cruise I don't think you would be disappointed

title: Recent Stay
review: flushing toilet had an issue, this was very annoying and disturbing. Hotel was extremely cold downstairs in lobby.  Bar area was not good service for ordering food. Did not appear to be interested in servicing customers.

title: Great experience
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. Our first priority is to offer all of our guests a perfect suite with first-class service. I will share your concerns with my entire team and I do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Double Tree Hilton Ft Lauderdale
review: I stayed at the GalleryOne hotel this past march.  I really liked this hotel. You can take the watertaxi from the hotel and there is also a mall right in front. The walk to beach is only a 5 - 10 minute walk.  The service was great and the rooms are really nice! The pool is also great!  I loved this hotel and would definitely go back if I could.

title: Roaches
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our service to be "great" and the rooms to be "really nice". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the water taxi and the mall which is right next door. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: laid back
review: Very clean, quiet, comfortable rooms.  Staff was friendly, helpful.  Check in and check out very quick and efficient.  Hotel is within walking distance of the beach, nicer upscale mall, good restaurants and shops.

title: Location, Location, Location!
review: This hotel is very nice and the free cookies help! However, the selling point for us was the location. We booked for a short vaca ( 3 days/2 nights) prior to our cruise. We could walked to restaurants, banks, and The Galleria Mall. It is a great location!

title: Very pleased with Gallery One
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our location to be perfect. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Love the view
review: Stayed 2 nights pre cruise in October.  Loved the large rooms with dining table and kitchenette and seperate bedroom.  Good location to water Taxis, Galleria mall, publix.  Breakfast expensive but good also loved the Starbucks in reception so I could grab a latte and a ciggarette and sit outside with a view of the intercoastal.  Definately reccommend this hotel

title: Destination Wedding
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that you were "very pleased". I am also happy to hear that you loved our large suites and you took the time to dine in our restaurant and enjoyed our Starbucks in the lobby. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Perfect Wedding Event!!
review: This is a great hotel and the desk staff are always very friendly.  Just be sure you book a room with a view of the Intracostal  Waterway (not bridge water view).   I suggest you get a higher floor away from some of the noise and also you will have a distant view of the ocean.    The quirky drawbacks:  valet parking is expensive, the elevator lights do not work properly (never have on my many stays here), the only ice machine is on the 4th floor (really annoying), and you will hear the watertaxis and the bridge being raised (but kind of adds to the charm).

title: Perfect
review: Sadly I could only stay one night due to business travel.  It was great from valet, to check in, warm cookies to Blue Hawaiin overlooking the sea in the morning.  Great staff, geat views, great cookies.

title: Comfortable stay and great location
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that your stay was "perfect" and that you enjoyed your views of the water. I am also happy to hear that our staff treated you so well. We hope to see you back again real soon!

title: Excellent "Suite" Hotel
review: For the most part I give the Galleryone a 5 star review. The welcome when we arrived (which was late evening) was friendly and welcoming. Our check in went smoothly (and quickly) and the warm chocolate chip cookies were a great treat after traveling and not having much time to eat. Our suite that we had booked was clean and ready for us upon our arrival. When we entered we were so happy to see the spaciousness of the Living/eating area and the separate bedroom was spacious as well. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom had plenty of room for 5 peoples belongings. Our balcony had a great view either way I looked. To the right the city skyline, to the left the intracoastal. Down was the pool.  It was nice to be able to move stuff around and make it safe enough for our…

title: Great place to stay
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Seems like you took advantage of everything our property has to offer as well as the local area. I am also happy to hear that you found our suites to be spacious and comfortable.  I will look into the issues that you mentioned so thank you for bringing them to our attention. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Trip for Miami Dolphins Game
review: Stayed at GALLERYone for a couple of days prior to leaving on a cruise with 6 other family members. We stayed in 3 separate rooms and were very comfortable.   Our check-in was nice and accommodating, we were welcomed upon walking into the lobby with a warm "Hello" and a yummy cookie.  The front desk staff exceeded our expectations and made sure that our rooms were all on the same floor and right next to each other.  The only complaint that I would have is that our rooms were on the 5th floor and with a street view.  I didn't need a wake-up call in the morning, because I woke up to the road noise (I am a very light sleeper).  Guess that next time I would request a room on a higher floor to be further away from the street noise. The hotel was lovely, the bed was extremely…

title: great place to stay in Ft Lauderdale
review: Only stayed a couple of nights after a cruise with family, but enjoyed it very much. Good location with water taxi stop right outside the door and only a coup le of mins to the beach. Good size rooms with sep living area and useful kitchen. lge comfy beds and good bathroom. staff were friendly and helpful. very reasonable rates

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am also happy to hear that you took advantage of the water taxi that is docked right outside of our hotel. It really is a fun ride. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back soon!

title: First Class Hotel
review: We stayed here for 2 nights prior to a cruise out of Fort Lauderdale.  This was our first experience with Gallery-one.  Check-in was speedy and friendly.  Plus we were offered warm chocolate chip cookies, yum!  We went to our room, which was a 2 room suite which was very well appointed, clean and comfortable.  The valet service was friendly and very speedy, we never waited for our vehicle.  I would absolutely stay here again.

title: nice place to stay
review: Thank you so much for your review titled "Great Hotel". I am thrilled to hear that your check-in experience was "speedy and friendly" and that you enjoyed our world famous DoubleTree cookie. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Rude and indifferent
review: We stayed here for 2 days prior to our cruise.  Knew it was supposed to be a Suite Hotel but were not sure what to expect.  Well, it far exceeded all of our expectations.  Check-in was super simple and very friendly.  When we got our room I was more then satisfied.  Suite was very well appointed and very comfortable.  Even the Valet service was outstanding.  Never waited very long for our vehicles.  We will certainly return to the DoubleTree Galaria in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Very comfortable and good location
review: We stayed for 5 nights, combining business (annual sales meeting) and pleasure. Depending on your needs and budget, it might actually be a perfect location.  First, it’s on the inter coastal and one of the water taxi stops which a terrific way to see and get around Fort Lauderdale (see other review on water taxi.). It’s a three block walk to the beach, the Gallery Mall with restaurants galore and a Publix supermarket are literally across the street.  The Bonnet House is also walking distance.       The suite we were in was actually a nicely appointed one bedroom apartment.  The front desk staff confirmed my thoughts that these rooms are condos contracted for rental.  It contained a fairly complete and kitchen – dishwasher, microwave, range,(no oven), small fridge (no freezer). …

title: Robbin's Review
review: I can't thank you enough for you wonderful detailed review. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and you were able to take advantage of the water taxi and the views. I am also happy to hear that you had a nice ride down A1A and that you visited some of the local restaurants and the Galleria Mall which is right next door. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Problems
review: This hotel is a must stay.  The staff is very professional the rooms are big and very clean.  The Kitchen is stocked with everything that you need to prepare a light meal.  The pool is is right near the intercostal, the mall is next door, lots of restaurants in the area.  Or if you choose Publix is right across the street.  An as an extra plus you can walk to the beach.

title: Great HOTEL!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that you feel that our hotel is a "must stay" and that you enjoyed your in-room kitchen. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed all of the shopping and dining options that are a short walk from our hotel. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great Service
review: When we got to the room, there was loud knocking in the air condition the manager on duty took the filter out but it only muffled the sound.  Maintenance fixed it the next day, but when we went out for a few hours to eat and returned I noticed some bugs running around in the kitchen area.  I spoke to the manager and he immediately moved me, but I didn't expect this from a DoubleTree hotel brand.  Staff is very nice but hotel needs some maintenance and remodeling.

title: fort lauderdale
review: the rooms were ok.big and neat.the only thing they didnt have international adapters.had to go and buy one to use my shaver.the internet was disconnecting too often.the rooms had a microwave,fridge. the coffee in the room was bad.had to go everyday and buy a cup of coffee.

title: Stay review
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so pleased to hear that you found our suites to be "big and neat" and that you utilized the fridge and microwave. I am sorry that we did not have an international adapter for you to use but I am going to make sure we purchase some to have on property. Thank you once again and we hope to see you back again soon!

title: My spacious suite and helpful employees
review: Room and service was excellent.  The television in the living room had some issues until it warmed up and cigarette smoke came through around the connecting room door but otherwise very nice.  I would stay there again when visiting Fort Lauderdale.  I came down with my husband for business purposes but extended it a day to enjoy the area.

title: Good Getaway
review: Thank you so much for your review. I am so happy to hear that your suite and service were "excellent". I am also happy to hear that you extended your stay with us and you would come back..We do hope to see you again soon!

title: service
review: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. I was within walks of the mall and the hot club spot, Blue Martini. I was also just a water taxi boat ride away from the beach. My room was so spacious and I really liked that. The Galleryone name of the hotel is very fitting for the unique art décor around the lobby. I experienced a problem with my phone and microwave. Lilianna C. and Karnesha B. went over and beyond to assist me. Huge thank you and KUDOS to those ladies. Perfect stay at a perfect hotel!! :-)

title: Great Hotel with Tremendous Staff & Location
review: Stayed 4 nights in this hotel attending a sales meeting.  Each day breakfast and lunch was catered by the hotel.  The meals provided were truly excellent.  I always have only cereal and fruit for breakfast but in the otherwise excellent breakfasts, there was no cereal.  I commented to our waitress, Helila, with some frustration of no cereal available.  She immediately told me not to worry, asked what kind of cereal I liked best and returned promptly with it With a glass of milk.  This was repeated for three other mornings.  The two-room suite that I had felt like home, and I couldn't have asked for better.  I mention Helila because I learned her name.  All the staff was very accommodating and friendly, but I didn't get their names.  Hotel is located on the canal in walking…

title: staff
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review! I am thrilled to hear that you consider us to be a “Great Hotel with Tremendous Staff & Location”. I am also so happy to hear that our staff treated you so well and you enjoyed your breakfast and lunch. I truly feel that we have the best team in Ft. Lauderdale and I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind words. We hope to see you back again soon!

title: HOTEL REVIEW
review: the staff at this hotel were amazing..... Steph, Kendra and Ben went above and beyond.. the hotel room gets a 6.....the maid was very accommodating, but the shower pressure was horrible .. balcony was a concrete slab and couldn't see out, wasn't too happy with that, we should have gone to floor 5...

title: Great hotel-great value
