review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that you found our staff to be "amazing" and that Steph, Kendra and Ben went above and beyond. I do apologize for the water pressure as this has never been an issue. I will look into this immediately but I believe it was an isolated incident. Next time you come and visit, ask for a "waterview" room. I am sure you will be impressed. Thank you once again and we do look forward to seeing you next time!

title: Perfection
review: This hotel was awesome. The location was walking distance from great resturants and a mall. The beach is also within walking distance. The services were above average and the valet parking is a plus. Would reccomend with enthusiasim.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: One word: Exceptional.  Pros: Location of this hotel; Mall walkabale distance; Beach nearby; God looking women around the corner at Blue Martini.   Cons: Parking rates through the roof. Please reduce your parking rate at any cost. This is exceptional hotel with amazing customer service & amazing rooms & quality of stay.

title: Great value
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be "exceptional" with "amazing customer service & amazing rooms". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the beach and all the restaurants within walking distance. Regarding the parking, we do offer valet as a service to our guests and keep all of the vehicles in a covered parking area for your security. We also have done extensive market research and our valet fees are lower than most other hotels on the beach.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you back soon!

title: Fun on the waterway
review: We really enjoyed our stay at the DoubleTree. Clean and comfortable room, great service, very friendly staff from housekeeping to sales people, nice overall. What else do you need? Will definitely recommend to a friend.

title: Very Shakey Start
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you considered us to be a "great value" and that you found your suite to be "clean and comfortable". I am also thrilled to hear that our staff treated you so well and you would recommend us.  We hope to see you back again soon!

title: Great hotel, great location, great service
review: We cruise a lot so visit Ft. Lauderdale at least once a year.  We first noticed this place on a previous visit because it is one of the stops (#9) for the water taxi on the intercostal waterway.   This trip we wanted a two bedroom because we were traveling with his 90 year old mother.  Our suite had two bedrooms and had a kitchen with stove and refrigerator.  Felt like a timeshare.  Beds were comfy, although the pillows were mushy.  It was past time to replace them.  We usually ask for memory foam pillows where we stay, but for some reason we didn't this time, so maybe we would have been happier with our preferred pillows.  Our two initial issues  were only one luggage rack for three people, and the closet in the master bedroom was locked.  It took several attempts but both…

title: Great Location, Property, Staff and Cleanliness
review: I stay at this property often.  You have everything right outside your door.  Great Mall, Publix across the street to stock up on food and drinks for the room, great restaurants like Trulucks, Seasons 52, PF Changs and Blue Martini outside the door, great view of intercoastal to watch the yachts go by, water taxi stop behind the hotel, 3 blocks from beach, great pool and spa, starbucks in the lobby, good restaurant in lobby, clean rooms, great beds, balcony, great staff and service.  It's really one of the best hotels I've stayed in as far as convenience.  Park your car and don't move it until you check-out.

title: Great location
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am thrilled to hear that you found our property to have "clean rooms, great beds, balcony, great staff and service". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed everything the area has to offer and that you enjoyed the views. I am impartial but I do agree that the Intracoastal is a wonderful place to be and the views are some of the best in Ft. Lauderdale. Thank you for your continued business and we will see you again soon!.

title: Nice hotel, great staff, not the best location for beach access
review: Stayed here 2-6th September prior to cruise from Miami.  Great hotel, perfect location for restaurants, beach, sights, water taxis.  Wonderful staff - so pleasant and helpful.  Spacious suites - comfy beds. Great kitchen facilities and spacious bathrooms.

title: Pre-cruise Stay
review: Wow, thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you found our suites to be "spacious" with "comfy beds". I am also pleased to hear that our staff treated you so well and that you enjoyed all of the sights within walking distance.  We do hope to see you again soon!

title: over night stay
review: Very comfortable rooms and impressive lobby area with lots of interesting art on display.  Hotel does not offer self parking, only valet and it can get quite hectic and busy when dropping off or picking up your car.  But the valet staff is excellent.  Front desk staff was also friendly and efficient.  Only drawback to this resort is that it is a 10 minute walk to beach, but this is reflected in the competitive pricing they offer.  Rooms are all suites and large with excellent A/C and updated kitchens and bathrooms.  Would stay again especially if I'm going on a cruise from Fort Lauderdale cruise port.

title: classic friendly hotel
review: We stayed prior to going on a cruise. The room was large, bedroom, lounge, bathroom and kitchen. All very clean and comfortable. Overlooking the waterway and moments from the beach. Across the road from a late night supermarket for cheap drinks, snacks. Several restaurants within walking distance, we found a great "healthy" burger bar across the street.  The mall next door has lots of shops and again more restaurants.   The hotel does provide a cruise shuttle to the port for $8 each, unfortunately they told us there were two shuttles a day when in fact there is only one a 11am. We requested a regular taxi and it cost $22. Be aware to ask for a regular taxi as they tried to get us to take a car service for $30 plus tip which I think runs from the hotel. We were given free Wi-Fi,…

title: Vacation
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found your suite to be "large, clean and comfortable". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed all of the sights and restaurants within walking distance. I truly believe that we are have the best location in Ft. Lauderdale and I am so happy you took the time to explore.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you back soon!

title: Great Value and Good Location
review: The hotel was  clean and the painting and  art sculptures were lovely in the lobby.   The painting  in my suite were also very nice.  The suite was very nice and had great view looking out at ocean The staff was friendly and professional .  The cookies are great.  This is a very nice hotel next to a upscale mall. The hotel is only couple blocks from the beach you can walk to beach.  I will be stay again at this hotel.  Also you can get on  a  water taxi  at this hotel and tour the intercostal waterways.     Melvin Thomas

title: Great Valet and Bellman Staff
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be clean and that you enjoyed the art sculptures. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the water view from your suite and that you found our staff to be "friendly and professional".  Thank you once again and we hope to see you back soon!

title: great stay
review: It is a very nice hotel with excellent staff. It is within walking distance to the Galleria Mall and beach. You can pick up the water taxi here. You can catch the Sun Trolley at the Galleria for $1 one way or $3 all day. You need towels and chairs for the beach. There are places at the beach that rent them out. Head to the beach for lower cost dining or Publix for groceries near the mall.

title: Wonderful stay!!
review: Stayed in this hotel for two nights before a cruise. I wanted a location near the beach and preferred to stay in a Hilton brand hotel for the points. After reading reviews on this hotel, decided to book. I was very happy with our stay. I was actually impressed before we even left home...a few days prior to our arrival, I received an email from someone at the hotel asking if I had any preferences (room location, view, what I wanted our thermostat set at). Talk about customer service! I have never had any other hotel ever do this.   Check in was a breeze, and they had our room ready early. I loved getting a delicious cookie when we checked in! The room was clean which is the most important thing to me when staying at hotels. The bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was spacious,…

title: I loved this hotel!
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy the you read all of our reviews online and you decided to stay with us. I am also happy to hear that you had a "wonderful stay" and that you found our hotel to be clean and to have comfortable beds. We do realize that you had so many choices and I am thrilled that you chose us. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Very nice hotel.
review: The staff were very attentive, the room was spacious and well-appointed and very clean. I loved the separate living area and full kitchen. The view was wonderful with a balcony and the beds were very comfortable. If big televisions are important to you, you'll be in heaven with two large flat screens. The couch was big enough to be comfortable and the beds were lovely.

title: parking
review: Wow, thank you so much for your kind words! I am thrilled to hear that you "loved" our hotel and that you found your room to be "spacious and well-appointed and very clean". I am also so happy to hear that you found our staff to be "attentive". I truly believe that we have the best team in south Florida and I am glad they treated you so well.  We hope to see you back again real soon!

title: Excellent Service
review: A good value for the travelers willing to pay a little extra. Our suite was very clean and we'll appointed. Be prepared for the 23 dollar valet only parking though. Misplaced my car, but I guess that can happen anywhere. Would prefer to have the choice to self park. Nice pool area with towels and bar.

title: Great Stay!!!!
review: My boyfriend and I stayed for the week at the Gallery hotel! Loved our room, we stayed in 1024. The balcony overlooked the canal and the ocean. It was such a beautiful view. Timothy that checked us in did such a great job! Thank you once again for one of the best stays. Def recommend this hotel and will stay here again. The comments below disregard. You have to see it for yourself before you judge a place.

title: Wonderful stay
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you had a "great stay" and that enjoyed the view from your balcony. I am also thrilled that Timothy took such good care of you and that you will recommend our hotel.  We do hope to see you again soon!

title: Skylight room is just what it says....
review: Excellent staff.  Kudos to Monique -pleasant, welcoming and professional.  My children were very pleased with room service and service from the restaurant.  Thanks to our Russian waitress, enjoyed the conversation and service.  Housekeeping rocks.

title: Perfect Stay
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled that you had a "wonderful stay" and that you found our staff to be "excellent". I am also happy to hear that Monique and our server took such good care of you. I will make sure I share your comments with our entire team.  We hope to see you again soon!

title: Excellent stay
review: Overall, this is a nice hotel. I booked a waterview skylight room on the top floor. When we arrived in the room, there were skylights in the living room and bedroom. However, there are no curtains to cover them up. Perfect if your ok with the sun blaring in at 7am..lol.  We switched to a room on the 10th floor. It was not as nice and the AC was lacking. It never got the room cool enough. Overall it was clean and in a convenient location.

title: Nice rooms
review: The rooms were done to a high standard, very comfortable bed and a huge bathroom. The kitchen area was done to a high standard also.   Only slight down point would be the pool and area by the intercostal was a little disappointing in my opinion. The pool looked on the small side and I noticed that loungers that used to be in place on previous photos were no longer there.  The valet parking system was efficient and had pleasant encounters with every staff member during our stay. Would stay again

title: Clean & Comfortable Hotel
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be done to a "high standard" and that they had a  "very comfortable bed and a huge bathroom". I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the use of our full kitchen that is in every room. I truly believe that we have the best suites in our area and I am happy you enjoyed your stay.   I would also like to thank you for your comment regarding the efficiency of our valet team. I will make sure I share your review with my entire staff and we hope to see you again soon!

title: Nice place, nice stay
review: My wife & I stayed at the Gallery One Double Tree Suites for 3 nights prior to taking a cruise from Port Everglades Fort Lauderdale. I can confidently say it's a great hotel close to just about everything and within walking distance to Ft Lauderdale Beach. Liliana checked us in and was extremely helpful and welcoming on our arrival. The hotel is very comfortable and clean, the rooms have separate living room, bedroom, bathroom and a kitchenette. The hotel is excellent value for money in an area where accommodation can be quite expensive. The only draw back is you have to pay for valet parking which is $25.00 per day as there is no self parking available but just about every hotel in Ft Lauderdale is the same so one has no choice but to pay for "the privilege". It's a ridiculous…

title: Excellent Hotel - Excellent Value
review: Thank you so much for making the decision to stay with us before your cruise. I am so happy to hear that you found our hotel to be "clean and comfortable" and that Liliana treated you so well. She is definitely one of our "best of the best" and I will make sure I share your comments with the entire team. I am also happy to hear that you found us to be a good value.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you soon!

title: Monique at the front desk is a rock star
review: I can't say enough good things about the front desk staff and the valet staff.  All of the folks at the front desk were very helpful, and the guys doing the valet parking are professional, speedy, and pleasant.  I had some minor, annoying housekeeping glitches in our room, and while housekeeping wasn't exactly "on top" of these, the front desk assured me that Management would be working with housekeeping to improve customer service.  However, I'm reserving my highest praise for Galina in the restaurant.  She goes out of her way to make guests feel like they are guests in her home, not in a hotel.  She is personable, attentive, and just plain nice!  She seems to take a personal interest in the guests.  Management should have her teach customer service!!  The hotel is in a great…

title: Nice Stay
review: Liliana at the front desk was very helpful and nice. She signed me up for Hilton Honors and told me about the benefits. Valet guy remembered my name the morning i checked in. The lobby was very cool. location was great

title: Wonderful staff!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that Liliana took such good care of you. She is one of our "best of the best" and we are very lucky to have her. I am also happy to hear that the valet crew treated you well. They are our "welcome ambassadors " and very friendly. I will make sure I share your comment with the entire team.  We hope to see you again soon!

title: don't expect hilton standards of service or cleanliness
review: This hotel is perfectly positioned to explore the nicest parts of Fort Lauderdale and has everything you might need for a long or short stay. The real jewell of this hotel however, lies with its' staff members. From the valet to the most welcoming host (Liliana Casonova), nothing was too much trouble for them. Once they discovered we were on honeymoon, we were treated like royalty and I would like to thank them for making our brief stay so memorable. Highly recommended.

title: Not bad for the price
review: Good afternoon and congratulations on your marriage! I am so happy that you enjoyed our property and that you found our location to be "perfectly positioned". As the General Manager, I was thrilled to hear that you were treated so well by our team. I will make sure that I share your wonderful review with the valet team and Liliana at the front desk.  Thank you once again and we hope to see you soon!

title: Precruise
review: If you are on the celebrity cruise do upgrade but this is a holiday in not a Hilton. The food is terrible covered with flies, the bathrooms need renovations,  the same towel was under a deck chair for 4 days even though I told them to clean the pool area. I was served with dirty cutlery and the breakfast buffet had flies all over the food and the plates were dirty.

title: Suite Stay
review: The staff at this Doubletree was excellent. The views were phenomenal. You can walk to the beach and to a few restaurants within minutes. Liliana at the front desk was top notch and explained all of the hotel ammenities. There is a water taxi right outside to take you around the city. High value hotel.

title: Excellent stay
review: Thank you so much for sharing your review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our staff to be "excellent". Yes, the water taxi that is docked at our property is very convenient and I am happy you took advantage of it. I will also share your kind words regarding Liliana with my entire team. We hope to see you again soon!

title: VERY DISAPPOINTING BEWARE
review: We just stayed there for 2 nights from 31st July 2014 - 2nd August 2014. It was just before my cruise. The room were extremely spacious and clean. The staff was very sweet as well. Overall it was an amazing stay for us. Would recommend and go again anytime.

title: Good value but noisy and charges for extras
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our rooms to be spacious and clean. I am also happy to hear that our staff treated you so well. I do hope you enjoyed your cruise and we hope to see you again soon!

title: Noisy, but otherwise good
review: Although I stay at Hilton branded properties every week and will continue to do so I was disappointed with the service level I received at this property.   I called down twice for someone to look at my air conditioner and my TV in the bedroom and both time I was told they were on their way up.   I called down a few time and was told the same thing.  I asked to speak to a manager but the manager was busy and would get back with me.   I finally gave up and told myself I’ll never stay here again.     The other issue I have is the parking fee, its 25.00 + tax per night.   I can’t for the life of me understand why there is a fee for parking.   It doesn’t make sense to me.   If a hotel is going to charge for parking add it to the price of the room and advertise the price of the room…

title: What a letdown!
review: First off, the hotel itself isn't bad at all. It actually looks very nice. It's the people that really ruin this place. The front desk staff (more the night shift) is rude, short tempered, and dismissive. It was very obvious to me that the level of politeness in the front desk staff increased based on what you drove in, what jewelry you have, or what kind of purse your wife has. Seriously let down by the food quality as well. Given who owns this chain, I rightfully expected more across the board. Sad, because it's a great location.

title: Not impressed
review: Dear Joe N.,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We appreciate your feedback and regret that our customer service fell short of meeting your expectations. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a comfortable and rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in Ft. Lauderdale; you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.   Best regards,  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Nice hilton
review: Our check-in started with a snooty clerk who told me my card was declined for the $50 amenities charge. It took me showing him my bank balance on my phone to get him to run it again to be approved. It was an embarrassing exchange in front of other guests and really started the stay off on a sour note. The rooms are nice but need some serious tlc. There were pock marks in the wall and the facia of the bathroom counter peeled off when I tried to open a drawer. We had a king bed with itty bitty hard-as-rocks pillows (definitely bring your own). We ordered a couple of burgers from room service ($50) and would have been better off just going out, except that the required valet ($25) made it a hassle. All in all our quick business trip doubled in price with a quickness and the…

title: Great location
review: Dear Rebecca N.,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We’re very sorry your experience at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton wasn’t up to our usual high standards. We’ve addressed the problems you mentioned with our Front Office Team Members. Also, thank you for suggestion regarding pillows. We appreciate that you brought this to our attention. Again, we are terribly sorry we did not meet your expectations, and still hope you will reconsider staying with us next time. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Kind regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Lovely room, lovely staff - bit noisy
review: We stayed here for a friends wedding in May. My husband and I initially booked a large two bedroom suite as we had our one year old daughter with us, however as we had friends in the hotel we realised pretty quickly that their one bedroom suites were in fact nicer than ours so we moved rooms after a couple of days. Our second room was much brighter and looked more recently decorated. It is worth mentioning that it pays to shop around as we were initially paying far more than some friends, however this was addressed quickly with reception once we queried this. The pool was actually out of action for our entire stay, but we were able to use the Hilton near the beach to swim. If I were to return to FL I would probably book that Hilton next time around, purely based on the location…

title: Disappointed
review: As a hilton diamond member, I was very excited to finally be able to stay in a nice hotel for pleasure as opposed to business.  I was highly disappointed.  The only pro is that the rooms are nice size and clean. Cons: diamond member supposed to get upgraded rooms if available, but guy that checked us in said we really don't need a 2 bedroom suite since only me and someone else.  We got a king suite on the 3rd floor with a blocked water view (palm tree in way).  Pool area extremely small and the first day there, there was construction going on in next building, so very loud and not relaxing.  Cleaning service did not give us new towels, so had to call down for them.  Opening balcony door extremely loud and we heard every time they opened the door in the room above us (and woke us…

title: 7-28-14 stay
review: Dear Ross L.,  Thank you for submitting your review and for stay at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. Your feedback, as a valued Diamond HHonors member, is truly important to us because it helps us to realize both our strengths and weaknesses from our guests' point of view. We apologize for the noise issue you encountered during your stay and very sorry that we did not exceed your expectations throughout your stay. We strive to provide the quality accommodations and atmosphere you expect from our brand and regret this was not your experience. We appreciate that you brought this to our attention and still hope you will reconsider staying with us next time. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.   Best regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Family trip
review: a lot of the hotels on the beach front were booked and decided to drive in a little.  I saw the Double Tree and decided to check it out.   I am so glad I did.    This is a First Class Hotel!!!  Had a very nice suite, very, very reasonably priced.     Great view of the ocean.  Rooms were very spacious, and very clean.   The staff was excellent.  A very high class hotel reasonably priced!!!!

title: AMAZING HOTEL WITH AMAZING STAFF FROM MANAGERS TO HOUSEKEEPING!!!
review: Dear Norvel S.,  Thank you very much for your review and for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton . It was our pleasure to have been able to provide you with a high level of service and great location to help make your stay special. We are delighted you enjoyed your visit and hope that you will return soon.  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Nice hotel, nice location, large room!
review: Pros: Great location, beach at walking distance, great restaurants around, this hotel has a great location.  Room was clean, service ok.  Cons: Price of the parking, pool cleanliness, pool surroundings (dangerous when barefoot), not enough chairs and umbrellas outside, drinks not generous with alcohol.

title: Anniversery Vacation
review: Check in is extremely slow if you arrive earlier than the normal 3pm check-in time even if you pre-paid the $25 early check-in fee. Once you get pass that bump in the road, it's smooth sailing! The Doubletree is located next to an amazing mall, only a short walk to the beach and a water taxi is right outside the back door of the hotel that will take you on a wonderful ride up and down the waterways. We had a room with a water view and it was worth the extra cost. All-in-All we had a great time.

title: Great Suite
review: Dear Gerlinda D.,  Thank you for posting a review. I am very pleased to hear about your experience with us! It appears that you had a great time on this special occasion trip. We’re sorry you encountered slow check in upon arrival. We appreciate that you brought this to our attention. Thanks again for taking time to post a review. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Ann Marie Knott Front Office Supervisor

title: Great Hotel with Spacious Rooms!
review: Just stayed there one night before an early FLL flight. The 2 bedroom suite is great. Large and clean. Walking distance to the mall. The front desk service was courteous and kind. The parking valets could not be any more attentive to my needs. They helped with my bags and were very quick to retrieve my car.

title: Excellent hotel, would definitely stay there again!
review: Dear Rrrkw,  Thank you for your nice comments. I’m happy to hear our Valet Team made your stay more comfortable. I’ll pass it on. Thanks for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  Tiffany S. Davis Director of Operations

title: Fab hotel!
review: We got in late Thursday night (en route to Miami). We were able to find this gem of a hotel only 10 short minutes from the Airport and right near some great restaurants and shopping in Fort Lauderdale. The staff was very friendly, the rooms were CLEAN and Spacious suites which was awesome for our 4 total guests. Would definitely recommend this hotel!!

title: Repeat performer
review: I've stayed here many, many times, as the hotel is conveniently located for my errands when in town, and it's always nice to have the extra space of a suite.  Although it was quite lovely when renovated a number of years ago, some of the rooms now show a little wear and tear, and the hotel, in general, is beginning to show it's age a bit.  The room service, menu selection and food quality have deteriorated as well.  Sometimes the hotel is a decent value, but recently, more often than not, it's rather expensive for the level of service and amenities offered.

title: Roaches and a little dated in room...25 bucks a night for parking..what!
review: Dear Diane H.,  Thank you for your honest review of your recent stay and we appreciate your loyalty to the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We are pleased that your experience was positive overall. At our Hotel we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. We appreciate your feedback and we’ll keep it in mind as we work to make our services better.  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Decent overall
review: I am a diamond member and got in late. I was excited to get up to my room and rest. I put the lights on and the roaches started to scatter..I thought maybe it was palmetto bugs but they didn't fly and they were small...plus quick. Killed two of them but the res got away. Also, I was a little bit frustrated because I don't like to pay for parking/valet and here you have too...there is NO parking yourself at all...You either pay for valet or you don't park...odd. I stay in a LOT of hotels and I advice that you skip here.

title: Left me wanting more
review: Dear Anthony C.,  Thank you for your loyalty and for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. Also, I would like to acknowledge you as our Diamond Hilton Honors Member. We regret to hear that you were disappointed with our property. It is very important for us to receive feedback, so we can work to ensure we are doing all we can to uphold the high standards. We apologize for the very unfortunate experience, our guests’ health and safety is extremely important to us and we focus a great deal of our time and attention on them. We work closely with a professional pest control company to address and correct any pest situation that might occur. We have shared your comments with our staff and promise the situation has been successfully addressed.  Best regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Wind down after a cruise
review: We recently stayed here after a cruise for 2 nights. Overall the room was fine. The suite was big enough for a family of 4, but could use some updating.  A lampshade in the livingroom looked liked it barely survived a 90's springbreak party. The bathroom was really nice though, and the shower was amazing. Linens were crisp, white and clean. The toilettries provided were a nice bonus - Crabtree Citron soaps/shampoo. I'm now addicted. The lobby was very pleasant  - Starbucks coffee area, and a bar with a happy hour 3 -7... since we were rained in off and on - it was a pleasant lobby to have to hang out in if we weren't in our room.  Beautiful art pieces in the lobby - an artistic look at dresses made from different mediums. I was amazed.  The pool area was fun for the kids, and…

title: August stay.
review: Stayed here for a week and the stay was not bad not was it great.   I was a little disappointed in the rooms, they claim suites but a little small to have that title in my opinion.  The hotel is clean and the staff was very helpful.  The rooms are not too quite, especially on the road side.  Heard the roar/buzz of cars all night long. None of these were deal breakers but kind of expected better.

title: Roaches
review: Dear  Thank you for your review of your past stay at the GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton We always appreciate hearing from our guests, since we work hard to make sure all our guests have a rewarding experience. We see that noise was an issue during your stay. We also encourage guests to contact the front office so that we can address noise issues to ensure comfort and safety. We are glad to hear that our team members took good care of you. We hope that the next time you return to Ft. Lauderdale, you’ll stay with us again.  Best regards,  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Nice property and comfortable stay
review: Room with a view .. but when you turn your lights on from coming back to the room, then roaches scatter quickly.  Hotel has issues with roaches and need to get a better contract for pest control issues or business will decrease.

title: Excellent place to stay
review: Dear Lenny A.,  We sincerely apologize for the very unfortunate experience you had during your stay at the GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We appreciate that you brought this to our attention promptly and our pest control company has addressed the situation. If we can help in any way, please let us know. Thank you again for feedback.  Best regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Awesome Hotel
review: Very comfortable room and superb views. My husband uses a wheelchair. Bellman Eric was extra nice and offered service above and beyond. Galleria Mall is in walking distance and offered many dining options. Lack of airport shuttle was disappointing, though.

title: This was a very nice vacation
review: My fiance and i stayed here from july 26-28. This Hotel was not far from the Airport we paid $30 in a taxi. When we arived check in was short and sweat. The room was really clean and had great views. we booked a king ocean view room and we had a 360 degree view of the area. The beach was only a ten minute walk from the Hotel. The water was beautiful. The people who live in this town are so nice from every store to every resturant we stepped foot in we felt warm and welcome. The only part of this stay i didnt like where the roaches in the kitcken of our hotel room. We have stayed at plenty of hotels and i have never seen a roach. The front desk claims they cant get rid of them. I would love to stay here again but i think the pest problem may stop me from coming back.

title: Our Experience
review: Dear Raven E,  Thank you for the great comments about your recent stay at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. It appears your experience was enjoyable and comfortable. I'm sorry for the circumstances you encountered. We appreciate that you brought this to our attention promptly and our pest control company has addressed the situation. Thanks again for taking time to post a review.  Kind regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Enjoyed our stay
review: Great experience. Way better service compared to the last hotel we stayed in Miami. Lovely pool and location. spacy and fast service. Friendly staff. Clean and pleasant smell. We had breakfast at IHOP and called we may be late for discharge time staff informed us to take our time. Its okay no problem. Appreciate their service.

title: Lousy housekeeping and Disorganized front desk staff
review: Dear Sujeeta S,  Thank you for the great comments about your recent stay. We know it’s the little things that make your stay more comfortable (along with our great location). I am very pleased that our team provided the type of service you should expect from GALLERYone Double Tree Suites by Hilton, I will share your kind comments with our entire Team members. Hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards,  Tiffany S. Davis Director of Operations

title: Very good place
review: We (a family of 5) stayed at the hotel for a week this July. We had a good time at this hotel. the location is perfect with only a short walk to Galleria shopping mall and a short walk in the other direction to get to the beach. Our room was a good size, had 2 bedrooms and i little kitchen so we could make our own meals if we wanted to. Service at the front desk and restaurant was very good.  A couple of negative things: The Wifi should be free. We managed to find some complementary wifi by the pool but had to pay ¤10 pr. day for wifi in the room. And parking, only valet parking at $25 pr. day is available. Since I'm still able to park my own car there should be a self park alternative I think.  But we had a  very nice stay and enjoyed the pool area.

title: Pay attention please
review: OK hotel.   I thought the 2 bedroom suite was sufficiently space and updated.  Staff was friendly...cheers in particular to the morning coffee lady, always a smile.  Main complaint is lack of attentiveness at the pool.  Sat there for 3 hours and watched as many people came looking for towels to find none.  We made request for towels (twice), and there was a 45 minute response time.  After which, they brought out exactly 5 towels that vanished in seconds.  Then we watched the march of people looking for towels again.  Here is a tip to hotel management.  Spend around 10k and buy more towels!   Your a beach hotel.  Anyway, also stingy on towels in the rooms so perhaps they don't like doing laundry.

title: BUYER BEWARE
review: Dear KWLV,  Our apologies that we were not able provide you with the quality of service and amenities you were expecting during your recent stay at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We do thrive to resolve any concerns our guests may have throughout their stay, especially for things as serious as a lack of pool towels or slow service in their replenishment. GalleryOne DoubleTree Suites is not considered a beach hotel, so we do not have sufficient towels to supply for beach use, but we definitely do provide pool towels for our guests use on property.  This is not typical for our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention and we will reevaluate our supply of towels. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.  Best regards,  Tiffany Davis Director of Operations

title: Not worth the price
review: Lovely hotel with great location BUT they do not disclose one very important point:  the rooms are owned by individual owners over which the hotel has no control.  For example, we booked a two-bedroom suite for a week at $269 per night to accommodate family and guests coming into town for my father's funeral.  The closet in one of the bedrooms was locked as it contained items of the owners.  Good for the owner, but bad for us.  No place to hang clothes or store suitcases, so no one wanted to stay in that bedroom.  Essentially we paid for a two-bedroom suite with one functional bedroom.  It took me three days to get a response from management, only to be told there was nothing they could do, since the room was technically owned by a third party.  I requested what I thought was a…

title: A Nice Gem with a Water View
review: Dear yachtygirl,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We are very sorry you were unhappy with the limited number of closets in our suites. We appreciate your detailed feedback and regret the circumstances surrounding your visit to our area. We've shared your comments and concerns with the appropriate members of our staff for further review. If you have any additional comments or concerns, certainly let us know.  Best regards,  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: This room rocked!
review: We had our family reunion here this past weekend and the hotel is in a good location, very nice staff, rooms are clean, but only one ice maker for the entire hotel!!! This is crazy!!!  Nice hotel, but not close to a great DoubleTree.

title: Roaches
review: I stayed at the Gallery one this past weekend for a family reunion. We stayed Thursday to Sunday and saw at least 2 roaches in our room each day. This place is infested. The worst part is our 3 month old son was with us and roaches crawled in his diaper bag. I called to complain and the front desk said that they would send someone from housekeeping but no one ever came. When we checked out, the staff was nice enough to comp a small part of our stay due to the inconvenience. I actually recommended this hotel for our family reunion. The event planning staff were phenomenal but it is unfortunate that the roach issue ruined our stay.

title: Horrible Service
review: Dear Moniquedmsw,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We regret to hear that you had unacceptable experience at our property. We’re sorry you encountered insect challenges. This is not typical for our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. We work closely with a professional pest control company to address and correct any pest situation that might occur. We have shared your comments with our staff and promise the situation has been successfully addressed. By the way, thank you for your nice comments about our Catering and Event Managers. It appears that our team took good care of you on this special trip.   Tiffany Davis Director of Operations

title: Nice room
review: This incompetently run hotel messed up big time My son was getting married  I made gift baskets -- for each of the guest rooms After tipping the doorman generously, I was told that there would be additional charges for each basket THEY WERE NEVER DELIVERED  Two days later as people were leaving random baskets were given to the wrong people.   Hotel's response "we will take off the delivery charges"  These bags were expensive, hand made and full of individually selected items--- At the end of the ordeal - they paid for my sons room and gave us a free night -- Not worth the headache.  They were thoughtless and rude and I spent hours putting the added touches on everything for nothing  BTW- they charge a fortune for parking and serve breakfast on dirty dishes.

title: Never a noise problem
review: Dear Jill B,  Thank you for your review of your stay in December 2013 at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We’re very sorry that you encountered issues with gift bags. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Since then we’ve addressed these issues with our staff and reevaluated delivery process and it has been more efficient today. We hope that next time you’re in Ft. Lauderdale area; you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.  Best regards,  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Great stop after cruise
review: Very good hotel, big room. The attendant did not replace the used cutlery or the coffee but overhaul great experience. Nice hotel and good food in the restaurant. I was welcome very nicely in the reception. Helia, the cleaner was very nice, kind and attentive to requests. Great hotel.

title: Excellent service
review: Every DoubleTree Galeria one employee from valet parking guys, front desk, breakfast, the girl from the pool bar to the cleaning Ladies were very helpful and we were amazed! My special thanks to all! We had a wonderful time!

title: Good Stay-Parking Disaster
review: Dear Mauricio C,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your great experience at GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. I’m happy to hear that our entire Team made your stay more comfortable. I will share your kind comments with everyone. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Great hotel…. except for the horrible noise problem
review: Over all the stay was nice, except they forgot to clean our room one day, and shorted us on coffee. But we brought it to their attention and they fixed it. HOWEVER, our car was held hostage with a required valet parking at a daily rate of $25! Even when we needed our sunglasses out of our car we were not "allowed" to get it without going through a valet (who expected a tip).That added over $120 to our fee and we had to pay for internet daily. So by the end of our visit we felt as if we had been "held up" at gun point for services that are included in most other hotels.

title: Location Locaton Location
review: Dear Linda S,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at the GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton and see that parking cost was a concern. We apologize if the parking charges weren’t clear when you booked the room. Parking cost in the area can be high due to our location, so we try to offer the lowest price possible for parking and sa competitive. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we try hard to make sure all our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. We hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll stay with us again.Thank you again for your review.  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Nice place, nice stay
review: Let me start by saying this:  The hotel is beautiful, the rooms nicely decorated, and the bedrooms are comfortable. It's exceptionally clean and is located in a truly ideal location. The staff were amazing the entire time - from valet to management, each individual always had a smile and a kind word. The food was above average, and the room service was very prompt. In all those ways, it really could not have been better.   However, this hotel has absolutely no sound barrier between the rooms. And we had the unfortunate experience of being located directly underneath an extremely loud, very inconsiderate group of people who had absolutely no respect for anyone else in the hotel. They were up until 3-4am every night, talking loudly on the balcony, stomping through their rooms and…

title: A very relaxing and calm environment!!
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for one night on way to our cruise .. we arrived very late due to a delay in our flight from Montreal Canada.  upon arriving at the hotel, the staff very quickly got us settled and even opened the bar to get us a drink and some snacks from the on sight restaurant.  They were very willing to make sure we were settled quickly and easily.  The suite was amazing.. very clean and comfortable.  The ambiance was relaxing after being in airports from 9am til we arrived at 11:pm.  Quiet too .. didn't feel like we were a big hotel at all!!  Next day breakfast was good .. pricey but good and then we had to leave :(  for our cruise :) !!! Would definitely recommend to our friends and stay again!!

title: If you are a lover of bugs, this hotel is the place to stay.
review: Dear mee-and-bee28,  Thank you for your nice comments. I’m happy to hear that we've made your stay comfortable and relaxing. I’ll pass it on. Thanks for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.   Kind regards,  Kevin Stabile Guest Relations Manager

title: Disappointed in Double Tree
review: Words cannot describe how disappointed my mother and I were after staying 5 days in this hotel.  After the 2nd day we found a live cock roach in our fridge and housekeeping was called.  Front desk attempted to find us a more suitable room but 3 of the 4 rooms had bugs crawling in them as well.  I should also mention there was a dead bug inside the art work on the wall in our room, cobwebs in the bedroom and holes in the lampshades and only some lamps worked.  My mother pointed out to the supervisor how filthy the suite was and it was never cleaned.  My mother is a world traveller and has never been in such a poor hotel as this one.  Although the front desk Manager was nice enough to reduce our hotel bill, I will always remember this trip from hell.  No sleep in fear of a…

title: Small pool not enough chairs
review: Dear dee h,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. It is very important for us to receive comments, so we can work to ensure we are doing all we can to uphold the high standards in customer service and overall appearance of rooms and property. My apologies for the issues experienced. The comfort and health of our guests is extremely important to us and we're working with a local pest control company to rectify any pest situation. Thank you again for your review. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Tiffany S. Davis Director of Operations

title: Good value for money
review: Bad omen for beginning my stay when the parking attendant said, "Can I help you?" after I drove into the hotel driveway in my rental car.  How about, "Hello, Checking in today?" Different attendant upon check out verifies with front desk that I am checking out before handing over my keys.  Like he is security making sure I have paid my bill.    I did not expect this from the Double Tree.

title: Great!
review: I was very pleased with the accommodations; all of the staff was exceedingly pleasant and you could not beat the location, especially for the price. I was close to a wide variety of options. As a Hilton Honors member, the room was more than expected - a full suite!

title: Not the best stay I've had at this location.
review: Dear Stacy K,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suite bu Hilton. We are happy to hear that our service and our great amenities made your stay more comfortable. Thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to write a review. Hope to see you again soon.  Kevin Stabile Owner/Guest Relations Manager

title: Horrible
review: While I have stayed at this Double Tree several times without issue, there were issues during this past stay;  1) Multiple trips to the front desk (at least four) to get tax exemption paperwork completed,  2) Valet left my truck running for no less than 30 minutes, during the check in process.  The truck was sitting in front of the hotel, unlocked, running and window down while I was checking in and getting room situated.  I notice on one of my trips back to the front desk, that my truck was still running and not parked.   3) The room initially lacked a floor towel for the shower.  This was added on  the 2nd day.  Not a huge deal, but something that lacked in the room preparations.   **4) Two men came into the room with my wife and  two little daughters, stating they were…

title: I could almost live there.
review: Dear Kevin L,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton again. Also, I would like to acknowledge you as our Gold Hilton Honors Member. We regret to hear that you were disappointed with our property this time. It is very important for us to receive comments, so we can work to ensure we are doing all we can to uphold the high standards in customer service. My apologies for the issues experienced. I have taken note of your Valet parking comments and will share with the Manager. I’m terribly sorry we did not meet your expectations, and I still hope you will reconsider staying with us again next time. Thank you for your continued loyalty. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Best regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Family Reunion 2014
review: Our room was located above the drawbridge on the intercoastal waterway with very loud bells all hours of day & night. The shower drain was stopped up, the shower head was unadjustable and could take your skin off and the hair dryer was broken. Having to wait on the plumber made us late for our friends get together. The carpet was obviously were not vacuumed because there were topnail clippings on the floors and on the outside terrace. The hotel did not have any rooms to move us. We left a day earlier than planned because of all of the issues we were having.

title: Family Reunion
review: We hosted our 2014 family reunion at this hotel.  The staff was SUPER - some of the best in the business.  They went above and beyond - great job to everyone who works at this hotel.  We felt welcomed from check-in to check-out.  Although, I am local to the Fort Lauderdale area, the front desk clerk still advised me on many ways to make my stay enjoyable and affordable.  it is a full service hotel, however they definetely mentioned alternatives to dinning in hotel.  I think that speaks volumes to Hilton brand and how they treat their guest.  The rooms were a little more basic for my taste but the water view room was great.

title: Real Nice Stay
review: Dear Kelsey J,  Thank you for choosing GALLERYone a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton for your reunion – we’re happy to hear it was a success! Thank you for the great comments. We look forward to welcoming your group again to Ft. Lauderdale – we enjoyed taking care of you.   Thanks again,   Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: wonderful fairy tale wedding on the yacht
review: My wife and I stayed at Gallery One Hotel from June 17 - 21, 2014.  Upon arrival, we were greeted by a lovely front desk woman, Monique.  She was so friendly with a beautiful smile and was very accommodating.  We were assigned room 1130 (king suite water view with balcony) but due to noise from traffic on the road we had to change rooms and Monique was very helpful and switched our room to 824 which was at the rear of the hotel overlooking the water and pool. Here is a description of our suite.  Bedroom had a large closet with an iron. ironing board and safe enclosed.  King bed with 2 end tables with lamps, a stand up lamp, chair, 5 drawer bureau, and TV.  The bathroom had a large vanity, toilet and a walk in shower. The living room had a sofa, two end table with lamps, coffee…

title: Not Bad
review: Dear BobbyZ29,  We are very pleased that our team provided the type of service you should expect from our Hotel, and will ensure that the Team Members mentioned receive the recognition they deserve. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Pleasant Extended Stay Surprise
review: The double tree felt a forest filled with comfort and surprises.  Double Tree's Yacht Wedding was elegant and unique.  The accommodations were wonderful.  The first vacation we took in a long time was like being in paradise while attending a fairy tale ceremony.  Kudos to you!  Thanks for the memories.  My wife loved your bed and pillows--best sleep she had in years.  Dr Stephen Swetech

title: Great place!
review: 10 minute walk from a fabulous beach with white soft sand and lovely warm waters.  Within extremely close distance to shops, supermarkets adn restaurants and a brilliant hotel with all the comforts of home (kitchemn, lounge and balcony in your room.

title: Genuinely friendly staff
review: Dear Gareth D,  Thank you for your positive comments about your recent stay at the GALLERYone Double Tree Suites by Hilton. We hope to see you again soon.   Kind regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: wedding trip
review: This is a relatively standard hotel in terms of rooms, bar, restaurant, pool etc - I was on a business trip.  The location is great, and the staff were really friendly and genuine - everyone from the cleaners and porters, through to the receptionists and waiters.  This really made a difference - as I often find the staff in hotel chains to be indifferent at best!

title: BLESSINGS, BARGAINS AND BEYOND…
review: Dear VH73,  Thank you for posting such a great review. I am very pleased to hear about your experience with us! It appears that our entire team took good care of you on this special trip. We look forward to your return.  Best regards,  Tiffany S Davis Director of F&B/Operations

title: helpful staff
review: Never received our welcome gift from bride & groom.  Dinning service was slow and expensive.  Food was sparce, service took over 1 hour to receive after ordering. The lobby was used for a Audi reception. Very noisy when we were trying to eat.

title: Good hotel, well localted at reasonable price
review: We spent a week at the hotel and everything went ok, friendly staff, well located and sunny days !! Beach, National Park, Supermarket, shopping center and pharmacy near by. Nice view from some bedroom.  Easy to find.

title: Seriously in need of renovation
review: Dear Arturo B,  Thanks for taking the time to send us this great review. We hope to see you again soon at the GALLERYone Double Tree by Hilton Ft. Lauderdale!  Kind regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Lots of space!!
review: I have stayed at Gallery One many times, first in 1996 and each time I visit the hotel gets less and less attractive which is bad because the hotel used to be great. Last year I stayed in July for 3 weeks with my 2 teenagers. We had to change rooms because of insects under the fridge. The hotel staff was friendly but the service was bad, we had to wait for hours for clean towels. The rooms and bathroom need renovation, cracks in the walls, broken furniture. After my last visit I will never visit this hotel again and seriously doubt trusting the Doubletree brand as well, the standard for the brand seems to be at all time low. I wrote a review on Tripadvisor when I was staying at the hotel and the manager called my room during my stay so I deleted the review but now that I'm…

title: Wonderful Weekend
review: Dear Gudrun B,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing GALLERYone DoubleTree by Hilton. We regret to hear that you were disappointed with our property. We've made a lot of changes since your last stay in 2013 and based upon your feedback, your comments have helped us to improve our processes. We’re sorry you encountered challenges for a second time in regards to the condition of your room and the property appearance. We are actually finished renovating and actively working on upgrading the interior of our rooms at the moment. Our housekeeping team makes every effort that our rooms and common areas of the hotel meet the highest housekeeping standards. We would really love to have you back for a true Hilton experience next time. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Best regards,  Tiffany S. Davis Director of F&B/Operations

title: Lovely facilities
review: We have been staying at the Gallery One for years. Slipped my mind to ever review. We enjoy our stay each time. The staff is very friendly, rooms very spacious, pool lovely. Water taxi picks up at back door and is a great option for seeing the area. Breakfast is quite pricey, like most hotels, so we grab snacks and drinks and make use of the kitchenettes. Walk to the beach over the bridge. A bit far for small kids, but great for anyone else. Enjoy this hotel each time.

title: My Day
review: Once a quarter I take a day to myself and get a hotel room.  I lay by the pool, order roomservice, go to the beach or just lay around doing whatever I want for the day.  I have chosen this hotel several times now because of its proximity to the airport for when I fly home, the mall, and the beach for some much needed "toes in the sand time"  I find the staff accomodating and very friendly.  The suites I have stayed in have exceeded all my needs and are just what I want.

title: Not up to its usual standard
review: We are pleased you had another great stay!!! It feels so good to read such a great comments about our Hotel. We appreciate your loyalty to the GALLERYone. I will share your kind comments with our entire Team members. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Tiffany S. Davis Director of F&B/Operations

title: Nice Hotel/Business or Pleasure
review: We have stayed at this Hilton property many times and have seen a gradual decline in overall service. Checked in to find only one hangar in the closet. No response from housekeeping after requesting more. Tried 3 times. Front desk attendant handed me a dry cleaning hangar they had in the back office - really? Next came no face cloths or hand towels on day 2 along with no pool towels available for any one. Cabinet stood empty all morning. Internet is $10 a day (please) and a bottle of water is $6. Sensed a general apathy with most staff, just didn't seem too concerned about customer satisfaction. Almost felt as if the hotel is "winding down".  Sold?

title: All Around Great Place
review: Thank you for your review of your recent stay at GALLERYone Double Tree Suites by Hilton. We try hard to provide personalized experiences for each of our guests, and apologize about the housekeeping and guestroom issues. We are working on different housekeeping aspects and actually lack of guest towels are not typical at our Hotel. I appreciate your review as it provides feedback that I need to re-evaluate guest needs and make the necessary adjustments. I hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to demonstrate our commitment to satisfaction in all areas of the guest experience.  Best regards,  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Magnifenct service!!!!
review: Stayed at hotel to attend a function and purchased the "romance" package which included breakfast.  Room was nice, buffet breakfast was excellent, service great!  Will definitely stay again on a leisure trip.

title: Anniversary Trip
review: This hotel was definitely worth every penny. Comfortable, clean, helpful staff and close to everything. My husband and I went to South Beach Miami and ended our trip in Ft. Lauderdale. The area was so nice we wanted to extend our trip!

title: Good location but not Hilton Standard
review: Unfortunatley this Hotel does not live put to the Hilton standard you would expect.  The room smelt from the air conditioner, the walls had scuff marks on them and appeared dated.  There were not enough towels in the room for all the guests and it took 2 phone calls over 5 hours to get more towels.  Our room service breakfast was 15 mins late past the time frame we requested.  The pool was dirty too.  The location of the Hotel is great - close to beach and adjacent to shopping mall.

title: Business Trip
review: We're very sorry to hear that your experience while staying with us did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your comments about the room conditions and service missteps. It is very important for us to receive comments, so we can work to ensure we are doing all we can to uphold the high standards in customer service and overall appearance of rooms and property. We truly hope that we'll have another chance to serve you and demonstrate our commitment to your comfort. We hope we can welcome you back to our improvements.  Kind regards,   Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Great location, fantastic suites
review: I was in Ft Lauderdale for business, and was working with a client at One Financial Plaza.  This hotel was reasonably priced, and has a mall, Publix grocery store, Starbucks, and Eurobread Cafe all within a couple minute walk from the hotel.  Cab fare to the Financial Plaza was about $13 including tip.  I was upgraded to the 14th (top) floor and found the room to be nice, but in need of some modest repairs/touch-ups.  I really like the DoubleTree Suite hotels, with their separate bedroom and living area.  I moved the coffee table in the living room against the wall and had plenty of room for my morning workouts...no need to head to the gym.  The people at the front desk were very friendly and were able to put me in a king room even though I had reserved two queens...this doesn't…

title: #1 hotel in lauderdale
review: Dear Dave,  Thank you for staying at GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your business trip while staying with us. Thank you for your great comments. Hope to welcoming you next time.  Ann Marie Knott Front Office Supervisor

title: Great place to stay :)
review: We chose this hotel based on other reviews for a pre-cruise, two-night stay. It was a really good choice. The room was clean and pleasant with a comfortable bed. We will stay at this hotel again if we go on another cruise from Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Very suprising
review: We stayed here for one night prior to our Cruise. The Hotel was in a nice setting and very comfortable. Checking in was well organised and swift, Had a good spacious suite, Lounge Bedroom with en-suit bathroom. Breakfast was also very good and plenty to choose from. Would stay here again. John

title: UNREAL HOTEL!!!
review: Dear Iordan2008,  Thank you for sharing your comments at GALLERYone Double Tree Suites by Hilton. We are happy to hear that our rooms, service and great amenities made your stay more comfortable. Hope to see you again soon.   Merle Martinez  Director of Housekeeping

title: Could have been better, could have been worse.
review: My family and I haven't had a vacation in a long time and Ft Lauderdale seemed like the place to make our destination for a trip. This hotel was unbelievable! When we first got here I was amazed at the lobby area and the front of the building. The bell staff, Jose and Paul, were very nice and accommodating. At the front desk, not only was Stephanie gorgeous, she was very sweet and helpful and gave us those delicious cookies double tree gives out. My favorite staff member was fernando at the outside bar. He was so nice and hilarious! We had a great first day to the hotel because of him. Served my mom and I great drinks at the bar.   The rooms were very homey and comfortable as well as the amazing beds. The views from the rooms were out of this world. Weather you have a city view,…

title: Great hotel but cruise package is useless
review: Dear Evan,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review about your recent stay at GALLERYone Double Tree Suites by Hilton. It sounds like you had a wonderful time with us and we are so glad to hear that or staff went above and beyond to make you stay even more relaxing. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kevin Mugridge  Front Office Manager

title: Stunning Lobby/Gallery
review: We so enjoyed the outstanding works of art throughout the lobby -- so diverse and so exhilarating an experience.  Why can't all hotel lobbies be so creative and entertaining with extraordinary pieces created by some outstanding noteworthy professionals!

title: Great location, enjoy the rats while you wait for the water taxi
review: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding outstanding artwork and the appearance of the lobby in general. We are happy to hear it was a success!!!Thanks again for taking time to post a review.  Kevin Stabile Owner/Guest Relations Manager

title: Excellent stay. Excellent service.
review: This is a GREAT location for your Ft Lauderdale stay. The valet personnel age very nice and courteous. That is where it stops. Our living room TV was not working correctly and never got fixed the entire week we stayed. The bedroom TV finally was repaired the day after we arrived. The maid did not fill the toilet paper or kleenex without us asking the desk. She never cleaned the floors or wiped the table. She did put the glasses in the dishwasher.  When we called the desk, we had to call at least 2 times. We had a wake up call at the desk and they never called in the morning. The alarm clock did not work. The bartenders were new but not very pleasant. Fernando was probably the only one who new how to tend bar and he was waiting tables. We tried to get a bite to eat at 8 pm and…

title: Amazing Experience!!!
review: Dear jalexander42,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing GALLERYone DoubleTree by Hilton. We regret to hear that you were disappointed with our property and service. It is very important for us to receive comments, so we can work to ensure we are doing all we can to maintain the high standards in customer service and overall appearance of rooms and property. I’m terribly sorry we did not meet your expectations, and I still hope you will reconsider staying with us next time. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Merle Martinez Director of Housekeeping

title: Love the chocolate cookies!
review: Got in late Thursday night and had an issue with our room. Called the front desk the next morning and the manager on duty, Kevin, was able to block off an Honors Suite for my wife and I to swap into later in the afternoon. The room was awesome. Thank you, Kevin. Front desk employee Lilliana was also very friendly and provided us with some extra cookies on our second day in town. Thanks for the great experience and service guys! We will be back.

title: Nice location for local restaurants
review: Our family stayed for one night. We enjoyed having a suite. The rooms are fine and comfortable. The service and staff are wonderful. We would have enjoyed taking a water taxi to do some exploring but did not have the time. It was also a great location for dining options.

title: Nice hotel but staff was kind of "bland"
review: Dear Ardeth,  Thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to write a review. I appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.  Kevin Mugridge Front Office Manager

title: Excellent staff, well appointed rooms.
review: Facility was awesome but staff seemed to be running on "automatic" since they serve so many people. I like the modern décor and location to the canals and boating community. Lots of things to do in the area, beach is 2 blocks away, mall is 1 block away, supermarket (Publix) across the street although they were extremely high but cheaper than hotel food and you can choose to eat healthy.

title: Ft. Lauderdale At It's Best
review: Attentive, friendly staff.  Quite accomodating to our 5 year old son.  Got insider advice on local shopping spots and places to get good Caribbean and Puerto Rico food. Excellent customer service.  Nice view of pool and intercoastal.

title: Think twice
review: Dear Nakizito,  We are pleased that your experience was positive. We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Kevin Stabile Owner/Guest Relations Manager

title: Don't stay!
review: My boyfriend and I stayed in the suite and since I live here I brought my $500 slow juicer so we could make our own juice for breakfast. However, when checking out we forgot it there on the counter. A few days after I realized that I had left it there I called. Was given the run around, spoke with someone who does not understand English, then finally, the next day of calling and calling they essentially wanted me to believe that my juicer grew legs and walked out!!!! Bunch of thieves!! One day they did not clean our room and instead of apologizing, they made every excuse to justify it and were also very rude!!! Never staying there again!!

title: awesome housekeeping crew
review: Thank you for you feedback and for choosing the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Ft. Lauderdale.  We're very sorry about the unfortunate experience you had and that we were unable to locate your lost item. We are reviewing our processes with our staff and will make any feasible changes to improve our item recovery retention. I would be happy to speak with you in greater detail and invite you to contact me directly. My direct line is 954-335-4610.  Kind regards,  Kevin Stabile Owner Relations Manager

title: Family vacation
review: My wife and I were taking a water taxi tour (recommended) and got caught in very heavy rains. We were soaked! We had a flight in 3 hours, and were with no luggage because we had it valeted from the ship. Well, the housekeeping supervisor, Karesha Briseeh and her assistant Anna Layure realized our predicament and had us on our way in a half hour with dry clothes. Truly, were it not for their thoughtfulness, we would have had a very uncomfortable flight. Great customer service ladies.

title: Wedding and rooms
review: Stayed three nights in May this year, overall was very good a couple small things that I was not happy with. The front desk staff were very good and friendly. When we arrived we were greeted and made us feel very comfortable, and welcome. I traveled with my sister in laws and there family, my wife and I. The two things I was disappointed with, the housekeeping was very slow. Our first night stay was good but the second day and third we left the hotel around 8 am and when we returned around 4 PM our room was still not ready. We finally got it done around 4:30 pm both nights. The other issue was the air conditioner was not working I spoke to the front desk and they sent a service tech up he switched the AC to auto and left? If he held his hand in front of the fan he would have…

title: Great Hotel, Awesome Staff!
review: The wedding was beautiful and the room we stayed in was over the top excellent.  We had the most comfortable nights sleep. We wish we could have stayed a few more days.  We did not have breakfast there or use the spa so I did not rate them but everything else was just wonderful.

title: Location, location, location
review: After one or two bad hotel experiences in Fort Lauderdale we thought we would try somewhere new and generally we were very pleased with what we found.  Gallery One is a Doubletree suite hotel and hence part of the Hilton Group.  That gave us an upgrade to an Intracoastal view room because of our Hilton Honors membership.  Strangely, when wifi has become a commodity and very many hotels offer it free, we did not have high enough Honors status to avoid having to pay $10 a day.  It was the only black mark however. Hopefully they will soon follow what is now becoming the norm elsewhere.  We were delighted with the location.  It was exactly three minutes walk to a number of good restaurants including the excellent seafood at Trulucks.  These form part of the Galleria Mall which…

title: Great place and awesome location.
review: Eric the valet was amazing. He went out of his way to make sure I didn't get wet when getting out of my car. He took my umbrella and kept me covered. Then when I forgot something, went back to my car to get it for me. He was very sweet and courteous.

title: Cocktails & Dinner- Poor service
review: I am very pleased that our team provided the type of service you should expect from our hotel, and will ensure that the Team Member mentioned receive the recognition they deserve. Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Best regards,  Martin Hoellrigl General Manager

title: New Yorker
review: Friends from Scotland were staying here before boarding a transatlantic cruise. We live nearby so we met them at the hotel for cocktails and dinner on a Saturday evening.  At the Gallery Lounge in the lobby we had cocktails. Ordered the first round at the bar since the bartender did not walk a few feet to our table. When we wanted a second round, there was no bartender because she had gone to chat with other employees at the restaurant. I found her there and ordered a second round. Several people sitting at the bar were also happy that I found the bartender and immediately ordered more drinks. Then we walked to the Vue Restaurant across the lobby. Our friends had earlier scouted the restaurant and reserved a corner table overlooking the water, but we were 5 minutes later than…

title: A real hidden Gem
review: Thank you for your review of your recent experience at GALLERYone DoubleTree by Hilton. We are very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. This is not typical of our hotel staff, and we have addressed this issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great stay and your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback, and we that next time you will visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service.   King regards,  Martin Hoellrigl General Manager

title: nice large rooms and good location
review: We stayed in a king suite with separate bedroom and full kitchen. Plenty of room with nice living room area with balcony (small) with a nice view (city view but if you walked on the balcony you could see the water from the canals).  Positives: nice location about 3 blocks from beach, large rooms, good customer service, pool, located on canal. Negatives: valet parking only $25/day - although if you are planning to just stay in the area you don't need a car as you can walk to beach, mall, restaurants and they are quick to hail a cab if needed. However, valet team is great and helpful for directions or recommendations. You can also use the water taxi. No breakfast included, pricey for room service and restaurant is not cheap.

title: Great Service, Great Location
review: We stayed here a night after our cruise returned but before our flight left and it was great. The staff allowed us to check in early and which was great. We were able to walk to the beach and shopping. The staff recommended some great places to dine then they arranged for a car service to take us which was actually cheaper than a taxi would have cost. The room was huge and so was our balcony. We had a view facing downtown which was perfect if you could see past the ugly buildings next door (not much they can really do about that). Overall it was a great stay and we would stay again if we are in the area!

title: Internet is terrible, but the rest is very nice
review: The internet was an additional $10, which I found to be insulting having paid $400 for the 3 bedroom suite already.  So once we paid we were told we could use unlimited devices, which really means 3 devices......and you all three have to stand in the kitchen to stay connected.  We were connected to the help desk, who would not talk to us because we were not the actual hotel employee.  45 minutes later, we were told that we would have to pay for an upgrade in order to use more than 3 devices.  This suite sleeps 6 people and should easily accommodate internet usage.  They finally took the $10 charge off of our bill when we complained about it.  Other than that, the rooms and the grounds are beautiful.

title: April stay
review: Just stayed here recently with my husband and another couple, the beginning of our trip was rough due to the airline losing a bag of ours but as soon as we arrived to the gallery one in fort lauderdale we were greeted by manager Kevin Stabile. He was able to turn around our trip in just minutes, he made us feel at home immediately. We had the 2 bedroom suite which was more than enough for the four of us, but everything here was amazing and would recommend this hotel to friends.

title: Not that great
review: I stayed at this hotel on April 17th and 18th. First of all, for an all suite hotel, the rooms are small. The carpet in our room was old and stained. The TV channels are limited. I would rather  have a full refrigerator that can make ice than a dishwasher. I didn't use any of the restaurants and the pool bar was never opened when i was there. $25.00 for valet  parking is ridiculous and ocean view room with a balcony faces the street, so that if you  leave  the balcony doors open the street traffic is really loud. In my opinion this hotel  is very average and way overpriced. I would not stay there again or recommend it to any of my friends..

title: Would stay here again!
review: Great location, pretty view of waterway clean and service was great.  Water taxi pickup right out back.  Beware, water taxi is $22 pp but is all day pass... Only worth it for a day tour.  Pool was clean and pretty but crowded during day.  Bar was quiet and overpriced at best.  Our room was beautiful,  king oceanfront suite and we really enjoyed it.

title: Best hotel of our holiday
