The Valet staff, especially Caesar, were attentive and courteous.  Our room attendants were so friendly--always greeting us as if we were friends.  The location is perfect. No need for a car.  I got my retail therapy, grocery shopping--to cook in the kitchenettes, and other needs without needing a car.  This property is not to be overlooked.

title: Old air conditioning & plumbing
review: Have to say the suite was very attractive and the linens were great. Unfortunately, the air conditioning left a lot to be desired. One bed room had a thermostat . The other did not. The thermostat was in the kitchen area. Upon closing our bedroom door, it became unbearably HOT!! We slept with our door open all nite just to be able to breathe. When flushing the toilet, the tank took FOREVER to refill. We had to listen to the toilet running for at least 3 minutes each time it was flushed-very annoying!! We were promised WiFi and after checking in found it was only available to either Gold or Platinum card holders. Found this not only disappointing but also irritating. Used their computers in the business section but kept getting booted off the internet - aggravating. The staff was…

title: Great Stay
review: Stayed at this hotel to watch the Winterfest Boat Parade.  I booked a room for me and my girlfriend on the water side so we could watch from our balcony.  Everything was great from a quick check-in to a easy check out.  The staff was well prepared for the influx of people who showed up for the parade.  You would not have even known if it was not for the increased security that it was a busy weekend for the hotel.

title: Overall Great Find for the Price!  Only a Few Complaints.
review: My girlfriend and I recently went on a five night trip to Ft. Lauderdale.  We found a great rate at this hotel on Priceline,and after carefully reading Tripadvisor reviews, we booked a suite with two queen sized beds.  Room  517.  I had some slight reservations about the hotel after reading some of the reviews, but we were pleasantly surprised upon our arrival!  There were a few minor cosmetic details revealing the age of the hotel, but for the most part the property was very well kept up.  From the lobby, to the room, to public areas inside and out, all rooms have been recently renovated.  Employees were friendly and professional.  As mentioned in other reviews, there is a Publix grocery store and assorted shops less than five minutes walk ( 300 meters) from the front door. The…

title: Great time
review: Andresa, one of the best bar tender ever, she shares such a positive attitude that makes you want to stay at the counter forever. Her smile is contagious, her courtesy is limitless, her simplicity is just amazing.  She engages you like you have know each other forever making you feel home. She definitely goes the extra mile to deliver you the best vacation  I would love  to come back and share another laugh with her

title: Perfect Accommodations
review: What a treat!  The hotel was bustling with people and I was truly impressed with the service.    Kevin Stabile, Owner Relations Manager,  went over the edge to make sure his guest were ensured a flawless experience during the Ft. Lauderdale Boat Parade. I will return again to this hotel and recommend to my friends.

title: wow what a pleasant surprise
review: We booked this property through one of the "name your own price" web sites for a place to stay pre-cruise.  We got in and expected to go up to just relax.  What a nice place.  This place had everything we could have imagined.  It is always nice to have GOOD coffee in the morning before getting dressed.  I think next time we'll stay an extra day or two.  We walked across the street to the mall.  Starbucks is just across the other street!  Definitely will stay there again!

title: Second visit
review: With this visit at Gallery One I have been reminded that a couple of years can make a big difference to a hotel. What I still appreciate with Gallery One is the easy access to The Galleria (with many nice dining opportunities) and the beach. We also enjoy the fact that you have a small kitchenette and a seating area, besides the bedroom.  The pool area is quite boring and the pool is always cold.  They do make good drinks in the patio bar. Last time we visited, parking was free. Now it was not and it seemed a bit heavy: $25/ night. Not a nice surprise.  The cleaning service bothered us. After the first night our room wasn't cleaned until 4:30 pm. The second and third day they missed coffee, toilet paper, several kitchen utensils and wash powder.  In short it seems that this…

title: Doubletree in Fort Lauderdale
review: My friend and I stayed here after leaving a cruise.  We selected the hotel due to its proximity to the Galleria Mall.  I wish that we could have stayed longer.  The hotel didn't disappoint.  It was very clean and our suite was well appointed.

title: Close to the beach
review: A nice hotell close to the beach,canals and the galleria mall.We booked a superior room but we ended up with a rooftop suite for free:).The Thanksgiving buffé Was also wery good.They also have a swimmingpool and a outside whirlpool with sunchairs.

title: Amazing
review: Amazing Ryann!!!!!  Ryann gave us the best service we ever had in a hotel.  We will come here every time we are in lauderdale because of Ryan!  Best experience ever. This vacation was beyond what we expected.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Stayed 1 week in November. Arrived early (11:30am) but a room was allocated immediately and we were given a complimentary chocolate chip cookie each - lovely touch. Excellent location. Shopping mall and restaurants across road, Publix across road for supplies, 2 blocks from beach and only 20 minute walk to "Beach Place". Half hour drive to Sawgrass Mills, Gulfstream Park and Miami Dolphins stadium. Staff very friendly and helpful. Hotel has nice atmosphere. Water taxi stops at hotel so easy access to attractions in Fort Lauderdale. Rooms are lovely - separate sitting room and kitchen - more of an apartment than a hotel room. Would definitely stay there again. Good value and comfortable. Only "downside" is having to pay $25 per night for valet parking when there is a car park…

title: had a lovely room on foor 10
review: Stayed here for one night pre cruise, 14th Nov, we arrived early in a group of 12. First of all the baggage boys were were nice and helpful, we had to wait a good while for our room but that was fair enough we did arrive a.m. The man on the desk did his very best for us I think he was called Giannis? anyway he found us a lovely room I think it was 1023 it had a massive corner balcony  looking down onto the entrance roof, you could see miles up the street and at night it was a lovely view when all lit up in the dark. It had a lovely bathroom a nice big bed, big living room and a kitchenette. Wish we could have stayed longer, didnt use the restaurant a bit expensive for us so went to publix across the road(we love this store and wish we had them in England, lovely staff there…

title: Love this Place!
review: Dear Mr. and Mrs. Straker,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the GALLERYone.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed our service and your guest suite.  Your nice comments about Johannes and the valet staff has been shared with them.  We wish you could have stayed longer also.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future!  Kind regards,  Ryann Love Front Office Manager

title: More than satisfied with first stay @GalleryOne.......already booked second stay
review: My husbands first trip to Ft Lauderdale and our stay was great. We where satisfied with our room choose city views it was less, kitchenette spacious suites, pool great  Kichen.....had almost everything but we're on vacation we made due with minimal items made a few meals, not many hotels offer   Bedroom..... spacious, comfortable with a large flat screen tv in livingroom and bedroom  Towels......we had as much as we needed, we'll tell housekeeping if we needed to change them washcloth shortage..... minor infractions  Location........can't beat the beat it mall next door, short drive to Sawgrass mills, Publix across the street.......10 minute walk to the beach Sunrise Blvd more resturants some are 24 hours and inexpensive  Resturant...... average......stayed in and made meal or…

title: Dissapointed
review: Dear mkcephas,  Thank you so much for the nice review!  I’m glad you enjoyed your guest suite and our location.  We truly look forward to welcoming you back!  Manuel Lugo Executive Housekeeper

title: Needs more work
review: Dirty, aged hotel. Lures you in with reasonable rates then hits for parking,internet,and every other thing you might want. They seem to think a free warm cookie makes up for it all. The staff is complacent and will not go out of their way to help. The answer was always that the hotel was too busy to deal with me. The only thing keeping them going in my opinion is the great location. but I suggest that you shop around, and remember to add 40+ per night for things that other hotels include.

title: Very satisfied! Great renovation!
review: Dear Joe W,  Thank you for your feedback.  We are deeply concerned of your rating of a “2”.  We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service.  We do our best to make sure all of our  guests have a rewarding stay.  We see that you were unhappy with some of the charges, and we apologize if the charges weren’t clear when you booked the room.  We hope that the next time you're in Fort Lauderdale you'll consider staying with us again.  Kind regards,  Lianette Aqui Director of Revenue Management

title: Our Second Stay
review: Gallery One at Doubletree needs more renovation.  Lobby furniture stained in some areas.  Tile in bathroom loosening from walls.  Floors are uneven in Living area and bedroom.  Very dusty on lamps.  Loved the cookies and the close proximity to airport and cruise terminal.  Front desk personnel could be more friendly.

title: Right on the intercoastal, blocks from the beach
review: I just returned from a business stay at this hotel and wish it was for pleasure and not business. My room had a great balcony overlooking the intercoastal where I could sit and peacefully watch the boats pass and see the sunrise and sunset over the beach, just 2 blocks or so away. Everyone from the valet to the front desk to the housekeeping personnel did a great job making you feel welcome. The rooms are awesome as they appear to be all mini apartments. I had a living room / dining room, kitchen and separate bedroom, all nicely appointed. The bed was superbly comfortable with great pillows; so unlike many hotel beds. If I could change any one thing it would be the parking. Basically it's valet only and I enjoy coming and going without calling for my car each and every time. As…

title: Great Staff and European Ambiance
review: Dear Isacpa,  Thank you for the great review of your stay at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  It was our pleasure to have been able to provide you with a high level of service and great location to help make your stay special.  Thank you for your suggestion of self parking; I will share this review with our Parking Manager.  We’re delighted that you enjoyed your visit and hope that you will return soon.  Warm regards,  Ryann Love Front Office Manager

title: Perfect
review: The location is perfect as you can walk to the beach, mall and many cafes and bars.  What sets this hotel apart is the quality of the staff.  Fernando captains the pool and bar and frequently walks around to ask if guests need anything.  He sometimes prepares samples of "virgin" drinks for guests to taste and enjoy.  He keeps the beach area pristine and is a true pleasure.  It doesn't stop there.  The front desk staff is so friendly. The maid service is exceptional.  Our housekeeper, Joycelin, on the 7th floor, treats us like family, and the general manager welcomes all.  One might notice a large european contingency at this hotel and I believe it is the service that makes the difference.  We also ate Thanksgiving Dinner on the property.  The food was delicious and again, the…

title: Great location and friendly/helpful staff
review: Dear W S,  Wow!  What a wonderful review!  Thank you so much for rating the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton a “5”.  Fernando will be so excited to hear your nice comments.  I will also share your review with Joycelin, Martin Hoellrigl (our General Manager), and the rest of the team!  I’m happy that you spent your Thanksgiving holiday with us and enjoyed the meal.  We hope to welcome you back “home” soon.  Kind regards,  Tiffany S. Davis Director of Food & Beverage

title: Average Hotel
review: We had booked 2 nights here after aTransatlantic/ Caribbean cruise. Had never been to Fort Lauderdale and didn't know much about it so I had no idea about whether the hotel was in a good location or not. What a pleasant surprise! It was situated right on the waterway with a water taxi stop right outside. I hadn't really registered that it was a suite hotel so our room was a great surprise after 2 weeks in a cabin. Huge lounge/diner, kitchen, bedroom and large shower room.... Doors from both lounge and bedroom out on to a super size balcony. I loved it. We only ate one night in the hotel and food was excellent of its kind... Not haute cuisine, but delicious. The Galleria Mall was right across  the carpark. There was a great selection of shops and restaurants there. Across the…

title: Beautiful location, nice accomodations
review: Aside from the bed being too soft and the transmitted rumble noise of neighboring sliding doors opening and closing, this is a very nice hotel. Great view and pleasant, helpful staff. Corporate rate + Gold Member Hilton Honors upgrade made this a steal at $89/night.

title: Birthday
review: Dear Brett R,  Thank you for your review of the GALLERYone. I apologize for the noise that you experienced from the balcony doors.  Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback about this.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the view from your guest suite and the service from our wonderful staff.  We love our HHonors members and I’m thrilled that you enjoyed the complimentary upgrade.  We hope to see you again soon!  Ryann Love Front Office Manager

title: 1 nt stay between Cruises
review: Hotel was great and the staff were too! We stayed over night as a birthday gift to my daughter. Her and her little friends really enjoyed the room and especially the pool. I plan to bring my husband back next year for our anniversary

title: A J Mathews
review: Dear Sharon M,  Your review made me smile.  We’re so glad you enjoyed your stay at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  Thank you for the nice review.  Please let us know when you’ll be returning for your anniversary!  You can contact me directly at ryann.love@hilton.com.  Kind regards,  Ryann Love Front Office Manager

title: First View
review: Had a 1nt stay between Cruises at this hotel booked thro Royal Caribbean 6 rooms 12 persons. Hotel was excellent with everything you needed(malls-restaurants etc) within walking distance. We arrived at the hotel at 1030am and were able to leave our bags with the valet as our rooms were not available until 3pm, some were ready from 2-30pm. The hotel is placed perfectly for the Water Taxi which stops at the hotel dock, Mall within 5-10min walk with restaurants there or just over the bridge on the street.  Rooms were perfect small suite type of room with sitting room and bedroom TV in each room, rooms were very clean and comfortable with plenty of space, no Balcony on ours but some of our group had one and they were very pleased with them.  Bed was very comfortable and we had a…

title: Hotel Suites
review: We stayed at this hotel 5 years ago, and thought we would have our first 2 night's in Ft Lauderdale there, staff where very friendly they have amazing chocolate chip cookies at reception. The one bed suite was still looking good after our last stay 5 years ago.  Bathroom was modern big walk in shower bed was very comfy, We had a nice view of the water way watching the boats.  I felt the reception could do with a bit of a revamp a little boring, after the B Ocean. Great location to the Galleria restaurants shops and beach.

title: Galleria Doubletree Fort Lauderdale
review: We arrived at the hotel and immediately received a delicious, warm cookie and friendly greetings from the staff.  The suites (a living room, bedroom, and kitchenette) were modern in style and very clean and well appointed.  I especially liked the kitchen, which contained a two burner stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, coffee maker, and dinnerware.  The king-size bed was wonderful.  I would definitely stay at this property again when travelling to Fort Lauderdale.

title: Tastefully refurbished
review: The rooms have been tastefully refurbished since my last visit and they are really lovely. I always take a two bedroom suite as I use the second bedroom as a place to keep my bags and my clothes. It is lovely to have that extra space. The suite allows me to have my own living room, kitchen,sofa and I use the dining table as my office desk, Normal hotel rooms will never be the same again ! 1109 must be the quietest suite in the hotel as it is at the end of a corridor where you can close the double doors and it is like having the hotel to yourself. Enough has been said about the wonderful location, food and service. Overall Gallery One is second to none in Ft. Lauderdale and Front Office Manager Ryann Love is doing a fantastic job.

title: Great service from Sales and Catering department
review: Just completed hosting a group meeting at Gallery ONE/Doubletree in Ft. Lauderdale and wanted to just say Thanks to Chiara Tacca-Hess for all her assistance.   The whole staff at this hotel was great....from check in to valet to engineering....but Chiara really stood out.  We had a large group coming and booked multiple meeting rooms.  All details met or exceeded my expectations. Chiara was attentive, helpful and concerned about our event.....and went out of her way to see that we were taken care of.   We tried to have lunch outside....regrettably it started raining 5 minutes before lunch so the entire staff scrambled to move everything inside quickly.  Chiara handled it with no fuss.   And the final touch.....at the end of a long, tiring day of meetings and packing up, she…

title: Great service
review: The overall esperience was great, i just want remark the great quality of the food at the restaurant, and the terrific service received by Raisa,Rudy and Kendra,and of course Brenda the Assistant F&B Manager, se Was always around,making sure everything Was great.Good job guys !

title: Great Place to Be
review: This hotel is in a wonderful location.  Close to the beach, shopping, (the Galleria Mall is next door). restaurants (lots of happy hour deals 1/2 block away and great food).  Transportation is convenient, the beach trolley stops next door and the water taxi stops out back.  The water view rooms are great and the higher up the better, because you can see the ocean and the parks across the water.  I understand that it is in the process of being updated, worn out furniture and carpets being replaced, can't wait to see when I go back for my return this winter.

title: Best Hotel Staff in FL
review: Dear Bearaway,  Thank you for your nice comments and beautiful pictures of the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and the view from your guest suite.  The water view suites are amazing!  All suites are completely renovated now and we can’t wait for you to see them.  When will you be returning?  Sincerely,  Mya Cramer Sales Coordinator

title: Thanks to Ryann Love
review: For the second year in a row, the staff at Gallery ONE has proven to not only be the most professional group I have worked, with but the kindest, most energetic group. The recent room upgrades are fantastic, but the people who clean them come with a warm smile and an offer to assist with anything thing you need.  The Chefs - belongs in a five star restaurant.  Their attention to detail and culinary talents are amazing.  Chef even carved our logo into a pumpkin!  Who takes the time to do that as a courtesy? A new GM joins an event planning team and rock star banquet manager - all who roll up their sleeves and do whatever it takes to get a job done.  I have attended and hosted conferences all over the country and have very high standards for hospitality...  the staff at Gallery…

title: Nice Stay
review: Dear Elizabeth,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  It was our pleasure to have hosted your Summit for the 2nd year in a row.  I shared your comments with our management team and they all had huge smiles on their faces.  Our team and I truly look forward to having you back in 2014!   Sunny regards,   Deanna Sylvestri Senior Sales Manager

title: Our stay at the Gallery 1
review: If it wasn´t beacuse of Ryan Love, my stay would have been just nice. Ryan defenitely made the difference by providing personalized customer service. He is a best in clase quality manager, specially if compared with the rest of the staff.

title: Our Top Choice in Ft. Lauderdale
review: We are convinced that GalleryONE is truly a great place to stay.  We've had many long-term stays over the last 2 plus years.  The front desk staff are friendly, helpful, and as accommodating as possible.  We especially appreciate Aasha for her incredible attention to detail.  WOW!  Deanna too has gone above and beyond to arrange wonderful stays for our crew.  We are grateful for Kanesha's leadersip as housekeeping supervisor.  She does an amazing job.  Medilia, our housekeeper is a gem!  The suites are spacious.  Bedding and towels good.  While these units are not new, they are quite lovely and very comfortable.  The location is fantastic.  We are thankful for the restaurant onsite.  After a long day of work there are healthy, yummy options without leaving the property.  Servers…

title: Pre-cruise stay
review: Dear Steve P,  Wow!  THANK YOU so much for the great review and for your loyalty to GALLERYone and to the Hilton brand!  We're thrilled to be your top choice in Fort Lauderdale.  I have shared your comments with the management team and our awesome team members especially Aasha, Deanna, Karesha, Medilia, Galina, Jackie, Andresa, Lillian, Brian, Edriss, and Caesar.  They will be so happy to hear that their service is appreciated.  We truly look forward to welcoming you back.  Tiffany S. Davis Director of Food & Beverage

title: Bad service
review: I booked here to be close to the water taxi for sightseeing pre-cruise. Really happy with the hotel. The rooms are nicer than pictured (seem new). Location is great within walking distance to Galleria and several nice restaurants. Be prepared for $25 valet required, but overall very pleased.

title: Good choice for a meeting
review: Checked in a told my room was upgraded. Upgraded to a two bedroom unit which doesn't mean much being one person in my party. Had a nice view of the dumpsters which the staff insisted on slamming the doors during the night. So lack of sleep and then got poor service in the restaurant the following morning but thank goodness it was a buffet. I was able to eat my entire meal before ever getting coffee. I have stayed at this hotel many times before and it was not like this. I spoke to the front desk and they didn't seem to even care or offer any solutions.

title: No Bueno!
review: Dear clydegeek,  We are so sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve.  This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned in regards to the noise at night and the service in the restaurant.  We try to make each guest experience a great one at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  We truly do care about you and your satisfaction is important to us.  Thank you for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity soon to make your stay the best it can be.   Kind regards,  Martin Hoellrigl General Manager 954-335-4632

title: Customer/Guest Reception at its worse!!!
review: Talk about first impressions!!! My husband and I approached the front reception only to be met by Ann Marie, Bruna and another female from the dining room. The immediate reception that I received was almost indignant. I had requested in advance a specific location of a room. With a condescending smile I was told by Ann Marie, without even checking, that the room was not available, nor had they received any special request. I pleaded my case and yet Ann Marie would have nothing to do with it other than shoving 2 cookies across the counter. I would have at least appreciated if Ann Marie could have at least "pretended" to check on the availability!! However she chose not to make any effort whatsoever. Instead, tried again to pass us 2 cookies!! At that point I truly believed that…

title: First Class
review: I feel like I am the most important guest from the time I arrive until I depart.  First class accommodations and absolutely first class staff.  I travel for business so the convenience of the location matched with the gorgeous views and resort feel make it a great combination.

title: Gallery One Overnight Stay
review: The hotel location is excellent. The staff varied, some were very outgoing and attentive and others were short and bordering on rude.  Unfortunately for $350 a night finding roaches in my room was disturbing. The weekend I was there was also the boat show so maybe they were just overwhelmed.

title: Nice Location
review: I really loved this property because of it's proximity to the beach, waterways, mall and restaurants. The room was immaculate and better than the average Doubletree. In fact, it felt like I was in a super upscale hotel. Due to limited parking the only parking available is valet only at $20/day. The valet team is great and you can call them to bring the car up before you come down from your room. But at $20/day plus $3-$4 tip each time I had to come in and out of the hotel each day doe add up.

title: Great place in FLL
review: We have booked the GalleryONE as post-cruise hotel for 6 nights to enjoy some of S. Florida after a transatlantic cruise with NCL EPIC. Being a HHonors Diamond member I booked the hotel in advance at very reasonable rate (related to other Hilton places in Ft. L.). And we had a very pleasant and relaxing stay there.  We arrived arrived early (at noon) so our assigned room was not ready (check-in time is 3pm). After 10 minutes we were surprised that a lady from the frontdesk told us, they made a suite available and we could proceed into a nice two bedroom suite with a balcony overlooking the wide landside. Perfect to spend the sunset with a nice glass of wine (or two). So we did finish the warm complimentary cookie we got at check-in and did proceed to the room.   The 2 room suite…

title: Nice Hotel with Intracoastal Waterway Access
review: We stayed at the Gallery ONE DoubleTree Hotel while visiting the Ft Lauderdale International Boat Show. The boat show is a busy time of the year for the city and all of it's merchants due to the enormous size of the show and we were told that every room in the hotel was booked. Nevertheless, the Gallery ONE did a nice job of handling the load and taking care of our needs.   The hotel is one of several which abuts the Intracoastal Waterway (ICW), which on this side of the state is a strip of Atlantic Ocean which runs between the barrier islands and the mainland. It is calm water, without wake or waves. With the hotel being situated here, it is one of the main stops for the Water Taxi boats, which make regular runs up and down the ICW. This makes the hotel a convenient place to…

title: Pre-cruise stay at a great hotel
review: I am currently at the Gallery One for three nights waiting for my sisters to arrive from The Netherlands. We typically cruise once a year together :) I booked the hotel through Hotwire. Once I received the confirmation I called the hotel and spoke with Ryan in reservations and asked if it was possible to get two queens. He put in the request and also for a nice balcony view. This was in July. Then a week or so before my departure I called the hotel and spoke with Isaac and he confirmed the requests. I arrived yesterday with no luggage (Southwest forgot to load it for me and others). Vanessa checked me in and she asked for advice from one of the managers and lo and behold I was upgraded to a two bedroom suite room 409 with a lovely view of the waterway and pool. The suite has…

title: Great Experience, Great Location
review: This hotel was a great place to stay. It was walking distance to the Galleria Mall and great restaurants and clubs. It was a short drive to the beach. The staff was first class.  I would suggest getting a bay front room. The rooms facing the highway are a little noisy from the traffic.

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: This is our 2nd year at this hotel for a large business meeting.  It was even better this year than last year!  Starting with Eric the bellman.  He was courteous, helpful and made a great first impression!  The hotel is beautiful with lots of areas to sit and visit  with friends.  Perfectly located on the Intercoastal waterway with a view of the Ocean.  The entire staff is cheerful and accomodating.  The rooms are clean and very large.  Can't imagine how anything could be better!!

title: Boat Show Trip
review: The Gallery One was a great Hotel.. I loved the location( next to the mall) The rooms were priced right and clean.. Very nice accommodations. There was also a nice outside bar area and the lobby was nice.

title: Hands down, great experience
review: We hold our company's annual convention / summit for our customers from all over the world every year.  This is our second year here and hands down I do not believe you can get any better when it comes to excellent customer service and attention to detail. Deanna and the rest of the crew there go above and beyond to make you feel " at home" ! There is someone always asking you if they can get something for you.  They really pay attention to your needs.   Well done and I look forward to another successful year in 2014.

title: Great service
review: Staff went out of its way to be helpful and make it a positive experience. Thank you! Also, furnishings were much improved from my previous visit. Food still midlin', but the service is above and beyond. The location is wonderful with a water taxi just downstairs.

title: Good location and nice staff
review: My husband and I stayed for two nights - end of October.   Had a nice buffet breakfast included in our rate and the water taxi is right out the door.,   The Galeria Mall is right across the street and very handy for shopping and a great food court with lots of choices.  Great location and cost about $25.00 for a taxi to the airport.   About the same amount to the cruise port.  In the business centre there are two computers and it's free.   If you want Wifi in your  hotel room I think it costs an extra $10 per day.

title: Very poorly stocked kitchen, very underwhelmed
review: The kitchen has 1 bowl, 1 wine glass and one cup. SERIOUSLY??? 3 items in a kitchen???? It has 5 mismatched cheap plates of different sizes. The cutlery is thrown in the back of a drawer(WITH NO CUTLERY HOLDER) and is mismatched and the thin type you get in the cheapest of diners. 1 dirty fry pan AND THATS IT. I feel im in a motel 8 it is so appalling. There is only a bar fridge and freezer in it. Cheap furniture with unsafe thin glass. No pot to even boil water and no knives to cut anything. Why bother calling it a kitchen. Very small too. Only reason i gave 2 stars was Vanesa on checkin was an absolute gem. Seriously save your money and go elsewhere

title: Our home away from home!
review: We appreciate your feedback and regret your disappointment in the condition of your guest room. It's our goal to help provide guests with the best experience possible and your comments have been addressed with our staff. We welcome any additional suggestions you may have and hope that we'll have another chance to serve you.  Karesha Brissett Housekeeping Supervisor

title: Hotel Stay
review: Hotel staff was very friendly and for the most part hotel appared clean however room was located near garbage dumpsters and there was alot of noise and some construction. Other than that the suites were very nice and  clean and spaceious.

title: Poor customer service handling
review: The rooms were great! The service when things go wrong is very poor, even if the hotel is at fault. If you have a concern the attitude by the workers/management is that they couldn't care less. Some if not the majority of the staff I dealt with need customer service training.

title: Best hotel stay.
review: Good customer service !!!!, awesome CLEAN VERY CLEAN ROOMS starbucks in lobby everything 5star,good food, good drinks, right by water taxi as well. the mall is right around the corner too publix. Just parking was expensive but it always is in fll

title: Did not meet expectations
review: We booked a king bed 2 room suite with waterfront view. On arrival we were advised we were being upgraded to a 3 room suite. Room had no real view other than a disused car park & room was worn. Complained and they found a satisfactory room with view and upgraded us from continental to full breakfast. Service at breakfast was so slow we were on point of leaving having seen the meals sitting on chefs hot plate for about 20 mins. This hotel has only valet parking. As soon as I had picked up the car it was showing the tank virtually empty. I have nothing to prove it but had thought I had enough fuel for next leg of our journey before arrival the previous day. Location is good 10 mins from great beaches and close to restaurants and large mall.

title: Fernando! King of the Mojitos!
review: We're sorry to hear that you did not have an enjoyable stay and we regret that your breakfast experience was anything less than superb. We've shared your feedback with our staff and addressed your concerns accordingly. We hope we can invite you back for a much better stay.  Tiffany Davis Director of Food & Beverage

title: Great location
review: Have stayed at this hotel several times for leisure and business - rooms facing the water are a good choice.  Convenient to local high end restaurants and shops as well as Publix (Grocery) and Beach.  Several local pubs are friendly and fun

title: Fun time.
review: We stayed for two nights before a cruise.  The room was very comfortable, and it had a nice.   view. The staff was also friendly and helpful. We chose to stay there so that we could walk to, and ride a bike, in Hugh Taylor Birch state Park. MCruz Rental, located within the park, had a wonderful tandem bike that we rode everywhere.  The water taxi was also fun and convenient.  I would stay there again.

title: My home away from home
review: My daughter rehearses endlessly near this delightful place.  After tiring of the food court at the mall, Starbucks and a patch of grass in an abandoned parking lot -- I discovered the restaurants and lounges of the Doubletree.  Everyone is incredibly nice.  The food is delicious.  The place is immaculate.  And Jake and Fernando keep the bars hopping.  I'll be back soon.  No really... like tonight.

title: Perfect
review: The room was great and the staff friendly and helpful.  Hope to go back. Would strongly suggest getting the highest floor you can to watch the river and the draw bridge.  You can see the ocean and city as well.

title: Spacious suites with kitchenettes make travel comfortable
review: We stayed at the Ft. Lauderdale DoubleTree to help our family celebrate our nephew's wedding.  The property is nicely maintained.  The suite was spacious, clean and comfortable.  We especially appreciated the close access to a Publix grocery to stock our small refrigerator in the suite.  There are plates, pots, glasses, microwave, 2-burner surface cooking elements and an automatic dishwasher.  The rates for the wedding were remarkably moderate (less than $150 per night double occupancy) the first week of October.  One negative to the property:  you are required to park your car with the valet at $25 per day.  Another item:  The wash cloths had to be "ordered" from housekeeping.  Others in our party experienced the same.

title: Room With A View
review: My wife and I stayed for 7 nights earlier this month. We were on 8th floor looking onto a busy road. The traffic noise could be an issue for some but didnt bother us. We witnessed the bridge outside the hotel opening up several times a day to allow cruises through and were able to look out further to the sea. There is a water taxi stop at the hotel. The room was very good with seperate kitchen and bedroom - like a small apartment. The kitchen was well equiped with 2 cup coffee maker, dishwasher, fridge and 2 ring hob. We had 2 issues with the room whilst there but both were rectified very quickly so couldnt complain. I was glad I didnt have a car as it is valet parking only at $25 plus tax per day - and there is no self parking! Having said that, the valet guys were always very…

title: Best Stay in Florida
review: I had an exceptional experience during my stay.  The gym could definitely use additional equipment but the pros for me certainly outweigh the cons.  Johnathan and the others Valet servixe is superb which allowed me to cherish the fee.  After hearing that service at the restaurant was disappointing, I took my chances and was rewarded by the A-Class service and the cooked to perfection dishes I devoured, thanks to Raisa and her team.  It would be my pleasure to stay here for all of my visits to Florida!

title: Seen better days
review: Property generally not well maintained / managed..  Room plugs not working, bulb in lamp not working, dishes from previous occupant left in dishwasher instead of being put away.  Printer in Business Centre was not working - all of these problems were in a 24-hour stay.  This property is not up to normal Hilton standards.

title: Great location / renovated rooms, lousy service
review: The entire team of the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton are regretful to read your perception of the hotel, which did not comply with your expectations.   We are sincerely sorry that we were not able to make your stay a big success as we have done with thousands of other regular guests as well as first -time visitors.  I will discuss all of your concerns with the management team.  If you have time we would like the opportunity to speak with you about your stay that way we can correct the issues with the room plugs and lamps in a timely manner.  Please call us at 954-335-4632 if it is not an inconvenience.  The ink in the printer has now been replaced in the Business Center.  I do apologize that that was an inconvenience during your stay and we will have a quantity of toner stored so that this does not happen in the future.  I hope we will have another opportunity soon to welcome you again as our guest at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites Fort Lauderdale.   Very best regards,   Martin Hoellrigl General Manager

title: Never disappoints
review: The rooms were very large, newly remodeled and well-equiped, but the service was lacking and extra fees made the low price of the rooms not as affordable - $10 per day PER DEVICE for wifi and $25 per day for parking.

title: Mixed bag for traveling with young toddler
review: We booked a City View Balcony Suite with 1 King Bed for a 7 night stay.   PROS: Overall, the room was nicely appointed.  The kitchenette had a mini refrigerator, a cooktop, a microwave, dishwasher, and a one cup coffee maker.  The living room, bedroom and bathroom were spacious.  Closet space was tight but we managed to squeeze our suitcases in there (barely).  We enjoyed the location which was in close proximity to everything that we wanted to do.  The walk to the beach is 10 minutes or less, there is a grocery store across the street and the mall next door.  All of that being said, had I paid a higher price I would have reduced the rating to three stars.  Traveling off season we were able to find a rate for $76 per night plus tax.    CONS: The grout and caulk in the shower was…

title: Straight talk on this hotel
review: Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the room amenities, our location, and the valet service.  We are very sorry that you were disappointed with the cleanliness of your guest room.  We will discuss this with our staff.  Bathtubs are located in all two-bedroom suites; showers are in all one-bedroom suites.  I apologize that you were given incorrect information.  I will share this review with the management team and again thank you for the feedback.  We hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.  Martin Hoellrigl General Manager

title: Wow was suprised
review: This property has some flaws. Not sure how it gets 4 stars on TA.  As soon as you pull in the first thing you notice about the entry courtyard are all of the broken pavers. Definitely a tripping hazard, so watch your step.  Another huge negative is the $25 per day parking fee.  This is outrageous in an area that is overrun with hotels.  Factor that $25 per day into your room rate.  The bedding in our room was not clean at all.  All of these hotels are now doing this thing where they have a dirty down comforter sandwiched between two clean white flat sheets. I pulled up some of the bedding and I saw stains and hair all over the mattress pad/cover.  We were in room 1109 which is a 2 bedroom suite and the bathroom to the king bedroom needed work.  There was a painted-over water…

title: A refreshing stay in Ft. Laudy
review: Thank you for your candid feedback of your stay at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I am very sorry that we did not meet expectations and I have shared this review with senior management in the Housekeeping, Engineering, and Food & Beverage Departments.  We would truly like to speak with you.  If it’s not an inconvenience please call 954-335-4632 as we would like to hear from you.  Martin Hoellrigl General Manager

title: Enjoyed our stay
review: haven't been here since it was renovated and wow it is great. had the corner suite so my views of the water were spectacular.. bed was comfortable and room was huge...great property great stay. will defiantly be back

title: hotel review
review: Very professional staff. Well operated property. Centrally located. Would definately return. Rooms were immaculate, stff was very friendly and the view of the intercoastal was beautiful. would return in a heartbeat.

title: convienent hotel on the waterway
review: we have stayed at this about 13 years ago and it has be renovated since.  renovated rooms look great and the kitchen is well appointed with burners but no oven.  staff were very accommodating and had automatically upgraded our room before we even checked in.  I prefer not to have valet parking but it is not an option here.  the room was a one king bedroom suite with balcony.  the balcony is large and overlooks the waterway.  however balconies are not very private as no divder between you and the next room over.  there is a water taxi that can take you down the waterway for shops and restaurants.

title: Excellent hotel
review: I stayed with my family for 2 days to enjoy a relaxing weekend. The hotel location is excellent. I can walk to the mall, spa, the beach and lots of restaurants within 5 minutes. Hotel staff are very helpful and friendly. I got an upgrade to a water view room and the view is beautiful.

title: A Great Stay and Location
review: Did not see any of the issues discussed in other reviews. Not the newest hotel, but the rooms were clean, service was good and location was near many good restaurants. Had some issues with towels not being left in the room after housekeeping was there, but not the end of the world. Will stay there if back in the area.

title: In Need of a refurbishment
review: Reception area nice and clean and staff friendly . Rooms def in need of a refurb I cut my leg on a metal post sticking out from the bed !! which was covered by the undersheet ! My leg bled and have still a scar today 3 weeks after my visit ! Told the management about this and they said oh sorry to hear we will get that sorted ! Wouldnt stay here again as didnt like the standard of this hotel and we where in an upgrade from the standard room too!  Drinks in the Hotel bar evening time have over inflated prices.

title: A little tired
review: I booked my week at this hotel several months prior and looked at trip advisor photos of mouldy bathrooms and disturbing torn bed heads but I thought they would most likely have been fixed by the time my stay came around, I was wrong. At checkin I asked for an upgrade and was granted one for $20 a night, expecting Hilton quality I was disappointed about the mouldy tiles and torn bed heads. However, staff were accomodating when I asked for crockery and cutlery (only one dinner plate in the cupboard and no spoons) Doubletree's famous cookies were delicious as usual. Positioned close to all ameneties we enjoyed our stay at the hotel, my upgrade to a water side unit was worth it as lots of interesting happenings on the water front. Beds comfortable, water taxi handy. Because I…

title: Great Hotel, Will Be Back
review: Stayed at Gallery One for a weekend in early September and every member of staff that I encountered from the front desk to the maids and bell boys were friendly and helpful. It is a very convenient location. Galleria Mall is a short walk away. There are several great restaurants located there and in the surrounding areas. If you have the time make sure to take a trip on the water taxi located right outside the hotel! It was a lovely way to spend the day. The Starbucks in the lobby and the warm cookie at check in just topped everything off. I will definitely be back next time I'm in Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Stellar Accomodations–Great value
review: Great location, situated on a canal, 2 blocks to the beach, 1 block to Galleria Shopping, multiple fine dining options, and The Blue Martini Club...walking distance to everything.  Staff at every level were friendly, helpful and accommodating.  Our suite was very nice with extremely comfortable beds, granite baths and kitchen. Our view of the ocean and city were great–especially at night with the skyline and lights.. I was truly shocked at the value.

title: Gallery One Double Tree
review: Place was excellent and staff made it above and beyond!!!  The only downfall was the lack of a closet or place to hang up my clothes. Not all rooms are like that . I would recommend this DoubleTree to anyone. An especially fun part was taxing the water taxi up and down the InterCoastal Waterway to dinner and drinks, way cheaper than a cab and much prettier!!!!!

title: Horrible odor in room and no internet
review: A work colleague suggested I stay here.  She said the location was great and that is was very near the Galleria Shopping Center.  When I arrived I was very impressed by the friendliness of the front desk personnel.  They told me that I was upgraded to a 2 bedroom suite which was nice of them.  Upon arriving to the room I opened the door and it smelled so strongly of rubbing alcohol that it immediately gave me a headache but I thought this is only 1 night I can get through this.  Next I started to hear the traffic outside the window.  You would think when one is "upgraded" that they may consider where they put you - away from a major road.  When I returned from dinner I tried to get on the internet.  This was pretty important since I am here for work.  I put in my code and I have…

title: Family Getaway
review: We stayed here as family, 4 adults, 1 teen. The rooms are clean and spacious, friendly staff, full kitchen was a plus. We love the jacuzzi available night time. Water taxi was excellent, good price. Little far away from the beach, if you don't have a car. Mall and restaurants, food shop are steps from hotel, trolley can bring to the beach area. The hotel could offer free shuttle service.

title: Galleria One - Fort Lauderdale
review: Brilliant location, friendly staff, excellent water taxi, restaurant service slow but worth the wait! The hotel is clean, secure and close to Fort Lauderdales many facilities - shopping, sight seeing, water sports!

title: My Surprise 50th BDay Party
review: My wife had been apparently planning a surprise party for my 50th birthday.  I had absolutely no clue.  I will admit I am still in shock with a smile in my face, since she was able to invite and gather family and friends from all over the US. The Double Tree staff acted like normal, although my wife had preplanned the arrival.  They helped setup a party at a Ship Taxi throughout the bay area.  There was about 55 of us parting and having great dinner.  Upon return from boat dinner ride, we continued to have a great time at the lounge area.  Security was around, but they were very receptive of our good time with good conduct.  The rooms were excellent.  Comfortable sleeping area and bedding as well.  Quite in the room.  Which is very important to us.  Of course we made some noise…

title: Our Home away from Home!
review: This was our third trip to the Doubletree Gallery One. We were upgraded to the 2 bedroom suite, with a balcony which overlooks the waterway. The room ending in "34" are the best! These are huge rooms, and with 2 kids, we had lots of place!.We spent 5 days there this time. However most of the staff remembered us from our previous stays.   ON our last night there, we were even invited to dinner by the TIffany, the Director of F&B for the hotel. She is the best in the business!! I stay at many, many hotels, and nobody even comes close. The food was awesome, and the wine was fabulous!  I would recommend this hotel to anybody, its a 7 minute walk to the ocean/beach, or sit by the pool which overlooks the intercoastal waterway.  We are definitely going back there on our next vacation!

title: Great hotel and location before our cruise
review: We really enjoyed this hotel and where it was located. The water taxi was great to travel to different parts of Fort Lauderdale. The rooms are very clean and the beds are very comfortable. We were treated very well by all of the staff.  Loved the warm cookies  upon check in and other times too! We would stay here again before our next cruise.

title: Feels like home
review: Homewood suites rooms provide plenty of room. A kitchen, table, living and bedroom gives the feeling of home. Always a nice place to stay but recently they have updated some of the older furniture and it's made it even nicer. Amanda at the front desk was very accomodating and pleasant.

title: I love the bartenders at the pool!
review: Fernando and Andresa are so helpful and hospitable! I loved hanging out here during my stay! My room is 1009. Rooms were clean and the staff was so helpful! I loved the views of the boats and the bay and the beach bar!

title: gem
review: This is a great hotel....just a couple blocks from the beach & from the galleria...not hidden but not over run with tourists.  I find it very convenient for business ... dinner ...& EARLY morning runs along the beach or beach road.  I try to stay here on almost all my trips (4-5 times a year) to Ft Lauderdale.

title: Gallery one Fort Lauderdale-A Doubletree Suites Hotel "Amazing time and Staff"
review: As soon I arrived at the Gallery One Fort Lauderdale Doubletree Suites Hotel I was truly impressed by the accommodating and pleasant staff that was at the front desk.  Amanda, Ann Marie and Vanessa were extremely friendly and after my exhausting trip to get there,I knew that this hotel with their very professional and warm staff was going to help to make my stay the type that I wanted, expected and needed( the delicious chocolate chip cookies didn't hurt either).  I was staying there for a special event and everything from the beautiful, immaculate clean room,  attractive and comfortable lobby and nice pool helped to make my time there very nice.  I did have a minor issue with the room and as soon it was mentioned to the front desk girls,previously mentioned in this review,…

title: Beautifully Remodeled
review: I booked this hotel for my Mother's visit. The hotel is beautifully appointed and everything in the rooms were shiny and new. She actually sated one night and then we left for the Florida Keys and she came back for a 2nd night. Both rooms were in fantastic shape and the staff were very welcoming and gracious during all our interactions. I will definitely be using this hotel for all her trips from now on. Also having the Ft. Lauderdale Water Taxi stop at the hotel is very convient.

title: Great Deal!!!
review: Very nice Hotel, Close to almost all attractions. The suite is very good, clean, two TV's, kitchen with basic appliances. Services is great at the hotel!! I really recommend for anyone in Fort Lauderdale area.

title: Need some restoration
review: It is a good hotel but the rooms are a little outdated and you can see the necessity of some restoration but nothing at the point to maculate our trip. The staff is very nice and my only complain is the high price of parking when there are plent of space and you could easily park by yourself with extra charge. The location of the hotel is quite convinient with easy access to the beaches and also to the shops.

title: Excellent vacation
review: This was one exceptional vacation.  The view from our balcony was breathtaking and the poolside bar, with a very friendly bartender, made our vacation a true vacation. The restaurant had excellent service and the breakfast buffet was delicious.  The chai tea from the Starbucks in the lobby was the icing on the cake!! I would definitely recommend this Hotel !!

title: Great hotel
review: Lovely hotel!!  rooms were immaculate and the view was breathtaking!!  Service was great and the hotel is very close to the beach.  I would recommend this hotel for anyone going to Fort Lauderdale area. Close to all the restaurants and shops too.

title: Very good hotel and value!
review: Wow, thank you for the great review!  We truly appreciate your nice comments about the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  Thank you for recommending us and we hope to have you again in the future!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Can't Get Complimentary WiFi or Breakfast
review: Was extremely disappointed that THAT amount of money for a room would not get you complimentary WiFi or breakfast.  I could have spent much less and received those nice little perks.  It was a beautiful location, and had a wonderful time with the friends that we came to see, but resented feeling gouged at every turn.

title: Kudos to the staff with culture delivering its best!!!
review: Thank you for your feedback.  Please contact us at 954-335-4632; we would like the opportunity to speak with you.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Convenient
review: Aside from the location of this hotel were a lot of great restaurant options available in the area, access to the beach is so close, night life locations within walking distance, shopping mall next to it, I really do like to stay at this hotel every time I am in the area. Starbucks coffee inside that I am loving it as I can't begin my day without my double shots of Caramel Machiato. LOL.....I want to make mention that the staff especially Aasha is very accommodating and friendly, very sensitive to the guest needs  ensuring high costumer satisfaction is delivered. The valet guys were very quick and nice. The cleaning lady, I think her name is Marie was also very quick of my request in cleaning my room. The only issue I had encountered during my stay was the wifi connection and…

title: Great place to stay in Fort Lauderdale
review: Thank you for the great review! I will share your nice comments with our team members.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Honeymooning in South Florida
review: We stayed here one night Sept 12, 2012 based reviews on Trip Advisor. A very nice property located less than a block from the Galleria for end of summer sales and a meal at Truluck's Seafood next to the Galleria. The hotel desk staff was excellent. We just missed the water taxi that stops on the back terrace of the hotel but enjoyed ourselves at the Galleria. So convenient. About a $22 taxi ride for two from the Ft. Lauderdale Airport (FLL).  Great hot showers, marble baths, glass shower doors, nice decor in the rooms and lobby, a comfortable bed, nice linens.....we did not stay long enough to use the suite's kitchen but it would be great for those staying longer as there is a Public's market 1/2 block across the street, another convenience.  We especially appreciated the two…

title: Great location
review: Stay here whenever visiting South Florida. Always a good time.Location, staff and accommodations are the best! Grounds are well kept and it is only a short walk to the beach,mall and several restaurants.

title: Good Hotel
review: Thank you for the great review!  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again soon!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: beautiful hotel
review: It's convenient to have the kitchen/dining/sitting area and a separate bedroom. The headboard in the bedroom really needed re-covering as the fabric was peeling off and looked awful.  Other than that, the rooms are quite good. Parking is quite high at $25 per night.

title: Great vacation
review: Thank you for your review of the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  We are currently replacing all headboards in the guest suites.  We hope you’ll stay with us again on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Much better than expected
review: my husband and I stayed at this hotel this past Saturday, we were there for a wedding, the reception took place on the boat that is located in the back . Very beautiful, peaceful , and the staff were all very nice.One thing that we noticed was that the drainage was very slow, the toilet took almost forever to fill back up after flushing. ( minor stuff, but could be irritating) valet staff was fast and pleasant. the only thing is , the place is over price especially that they charge $25.00 a day for parking.The only reason I would not be back is because We usually spend 3-4 days in a hotel, and I don't see paying an extra $100.00 just to park.

title: Great Hotel -
review: We have stayed at this hotel numerous times and we have always had a pleasant experience. Staff is always friendly; and the rooms always clean and well maintained. The location is AMAZING. 2 minute walk to beach; next door to a mall; across the street from Starbucks; and Publixs; many, many restaurants near by. Water Taxi is available right at the hotel...could not ask for a better place to stay. I would not hesitate in the least to stay here again. Keep up the great work and hospitality Gallery One - the staff is AMAZING...

title: Beautiful View
review: Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  It means so much to us that you had a pleasant experience.  I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, the room, and our staff.  We hope to have you again in the near future!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: The best thing this hotel has going for it is the view - always request  a balcony room overlooking the Intracoastal Waterway with a view of the Atlantic Ocean in the foreground.   I have stayed here often when in the area on business.  It is a nice break from the "airport hotels" and during off season the price is not bad.   Rooms are always clean and the staff helpful.  Each suite has a small kitchen area.  Drawbacks are for some reason there is an ice machine only on the 4th floor, which is an inconvenience.  The restaurant is merely "okay" - but, there are several good options in the area.   The valet parking is $25.00 per night.  You are also next to a draw bridge - so you hear the announcements of the raising of the bridge each time a yacht, with a high antenna, passes. …

title: Doubletree Suites
review: Thank you for your loyalty to the GALLERYone!  I have to agree that reserving a water view suite is the best way to go and I’m glad that you enjoyed the views from your suite.  Thank you for the review and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Wedding Host Hotel-PERFECT!
review: We had a wonderful stay at Gallery One Hotel during our 7 day vacation.. Everything was perfect. The service was very proffesional. We loved the size of the room with excellent air conditioning and extremely comfortable. Vallet parking was very convenient  We liked the location next to ther shopping mall and very close to the beach. The pool and the service around it was excellent. Fernando (Bar tender from Barcelona, Spain) always went beyond the line of duty and was eager to help in anything we needed. In summary, we are very happy to have chosen this hotel. Guillermo and Elisabeth C

title: Not worth the monel paid
review: The overall setting of the hotel is very nice with friendly staff. The vallets parking attendents miss placed my vehical serveral times and caused me to wait each of those times for up to ten minutes. Nice but average room, some things were missing such as towels but other than that standard but do not think it was worth the amount spent, $25.00 day for parking plus another $15.00 dollars a day in tax alone not to include the room, save your money.

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you for your feedback.  We would like the opportunity to speak with you directly in regards to your stay.  Please call us at 954-335-4632 at your earliest convenience.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Labor Day Weekend
review: I was there for a wedding and spent a week at the hotel. Great proximity to the beach for the price. Great size of room, extremely comfortable. Hotel is close to starbucks and 7-11 so you can grocery shop and kitchen in room worked perfectly. We had  about 15 rooms and the hotel made it a great family reunion.

title: Great location
review: Thanks for the great review!  I’m so happy to hear you enjoyed our location and the guest suites.  We hope to see you again soon!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Family stopover before Cruise
review: I was admitted into my 2 bedroom suite by Ryann Love, Owner Relations Manager and I must say my stay absolutely amazing. Beautiful room, very clean and tidy the staff was friendly and attended to my many needs. Fully booked that weekend they made sure everyone was comfortable in the midst of the craziness. Very professional and courteous. I could not have asked for a better experience than this. THANK YOU GALLERY ONE!

title: Great service
review: Hotel gave us great service, clean rooms and it was a suite which we needed for our friends and us.The hotel was located on the intercoastal.  Near all the shops you want Galleria Mall etc. Front desk help was extremely helpful in recommending places to eat and go.  Valet service was right on the money with having car there by the time we got downstairs from our room.   Bar service was good for food after 10PM.  They had a children's menu which worked for us, as we had 3 children with us.

title: Guest Services
review: Thank you for rating the GALLERYone a 5 out of 5!  I’m so happy to hear that you enjoyed your guest suite, our location and our service.  We hope to have you again in the near future!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Great but there's room for improvement
review: This was my second stay at this property and I could not have been more impressed with the customer service I was afforded. The staff at this property goes over and above to make everyone feel welcomed and appreciated.  We had a little problem with a food and beverage issue and it was immediately handled by the Asst. F&B Manager.  The front desk staff was awsome and made you feel welcomed every time you came in or left the property. My thanks to Amanada for all her help.  Great property with a great view and I recommend if your in Ft Lauderdale you should consider staying at this property

title: ANOTHER GREAT Visit to GALLERIA DOUBLETREE
review: Thank you very much for your review of the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  It was our pleasure to have been able to provide you with a high level of service to make your stay special.  I will share your nice comments with Brenda (Asst. F&B Manager) and Amanda.  We hope to see you again soon!    Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Ok for families not singles
review: Pros :  -Excellent location. 5 minutes walk to the beach. Lots of good restaurants within walking distance. Publix market (10 minutes walk), Water Taxi stop right by the hotel bar.  -Personnel was extremely professional and offered incredible service, from the front desk to the bellboys, to the maids. Bravo!!! -Really big suites (even for the basic ones) with kitchen, 2 flatscreen TVs, sofa, balcony, huge bathroom ect -Incredible view (we had a room on the 11th floor facing the intracostal waterway). -Reasonable price for the room only (see comment about parking and WIFI in cons)  Cons :  -Expensive valet service (25$) and WIFI (10$ per device per day). If you plan to use both, add a good 40$ per night tot he price of the room. -Rooms would need a good troughout cleaning and a…

title: Favorite beach hotel!!!
review: Just arrived today to this hotel, after a very long and grueling flight from Korea. My flight was cancelled the day prior so I needed to change my hotel reservations, the process was very easy. I received great customer service from Miss Aasha, she was very helpful and kind. For appreciation of my military service they gave me a free room upgrade which was awesome!! So military personnel this is the hotel that I recommend to you all. Excellent hotel, staff and customer service, always a pleasant stay here :-)

title: Wonderful, as always
review: Thanks for staying with us at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Aasha was helpful!  I’ll be sure to share your comments with her.  We hope to see you again soon.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Greatest Place - My Second Home
review: Remains my favorite hotel in South Florida. This hotel can do no wrong! Wonderful staff and lovely accommodations. I love this place! Oh and the breakfast from in-room dining....delicious!! i always enjoy the semi-private balcony and the spacious rooms.

title: great property
review: Thank you for sharing your experience at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I’m happy to hear that our service and our great amenities made your stay more comfortable.  Hope to see you again soon!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: BELOW EXPECTATIONS
review: I stay in Fort Lauderdale often enough that I call the Gallery One my second home. As soon as I arrive, the Valet guys out front greet me warmly (Caesar, Billy, Jose, Matt and others). The valet guys just rock - always offering If I need directions or suggest a great restaurant – they give the meaning to great service. When I arrive inside, it is always clean and inviting. The customer service staff at the front desk are awesome. They are very professional, knowledgeable and give great personal service. I am always greeted by name and with a smile. What makes this hotel really great is the staff. The customer service staff....Aasha, Lauren, Vanesa, Bruna, Cassia (going to miss you Cassia), Andresa, Brenda and a host of others are awesome and give a new meaning to personal touch…

title: Hotel for tourists
review: I have stayed here many times for business and loved it.  This time the service was poor, and the glass awning was power washed from midnight to 3am! Very very noisy and when I called the front desk in the middle of the night I was told it would be another 30 minutes! The next morning with very little sleep I went to the front desk to let them no I would never stay again because I slept about 3 hours and I was offered a free cup of coffee.  What a disapointment.

title: wow!! What an experience!!
review: We’re very sorry for the noise issue you encountered during your stay at the GALLERYone.  Your satisfaction is very important to us, and we appreciate your feedback.  We would really like the opportunity to speak with you.  Please contact me at 954-335-4632 at your earliest convenience.  Thank you,  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Better than I hoped for
review: Thank you so much for an amazing experience!! The best staff!! Amazing resort style hotel with every amenity within walking distance! You gotta stay here... This place really does have it all. The pool, hot tub, gym, resturants, and the rooms!

title: HOME AWAY FROM HOME
review: Thank you for the high rating of a “5” for the GALLERYone!  We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience.  Please visit us again soon as it would be our pleasure to welcome you back!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Best accomodations experienced
review: The service was outstanding, the front desk crew walked me to the elevator.  After reading the reviews, I came with low expectations. But...breakfast was great, I ate one night for dinner, food was good.  The room was clean, had a spotless kitchen, everything worked. The valets were awesome, I liked how they made sure I had my seatbelt on.  The pool was unexpected wonder.    The location is why I picked the hotel, it is near the beach and the Galleria and the highways.  But I was pleasantly surprised by the property, even though a little dated the service makes up for it.

title: EXCELLENT LOCATION/GREAT FOR FAMILIES
review: Great hotel, rooms are spacious and clean and great for families. Staff is friendly most of the time. You have to pay for Wi-Fi on EVERY device, didn't know that, and got charged, staff weren't understanding and still let the charge stick, I learnt my lesson. Close to shops and great restaurants and beaches.

title: Great location; hotel not so much
review: Thank you for your review of the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites and location.  We hope to have you again in the future.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Fla vaca...
review: The room was nice and it was also nice being so close to the beach.  The housekeeping was not up to par.  We had to ask for fresh towels every night and the used towels were left in the room.  I had a perfume bottle that started off as more than half full when I arrived.  The next day it was completely empty..not sure how that happened?!   The hotel goes overboard with the fees. The wi-fi was $9.95 per night per device!  It's only complimentary in the lobby and when I logged into the lobby wi-fi  it seemed that was only good for 24 hours.   Valet parking $25 per night.  The valet staff was very courteous. There is no option to self park.  When we made our reservation, we thought that valet parking was an option and we were was surprised (like many other guests we heard at the…

title: I like it here!
review: Thank you for your feedback.  Your review concerns us and we would like to speak with you directly in regards to your stay.  Please contact me at 954-335-4632 at your earliest convenience.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Location, value, service, comfort
review: our stay was wonderful.  the staff, particularly Tiffany Davis, the Director of Food and Beverage, was very attentive. would definitely stay again. the location is very convenient. the restaurant in the hotel was excellent, and there are several choices within walking distance.  the room was spacious, clean, and had modern electronics, tv, etc.

title: Treated Like A Royalty
review: Staying at Gallery One is ALWAYS a great experience.  The entire facility is spotless, immaculate rooms, most comfortable beds and quiet environment.  The restaurant staff treats each customer like royalty.  Brenda Stanley is one of the most pleasant members of management and will certainly brighten your day.   I love Gallery One!!

title: Fantastic Staff!  Wonderful "home" away from home
review: What a great review!  Thank you for taking time to share your comments with us about your stay at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  We are thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful experience at our hotel.  I have also shared this review with Brenda and the rest of our Food & Beverage team.  We look forward to having you again in the future!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Good value for money paid
review: I stay in Fort Lauderdale about 125 nights a year and nearly all of them are at this hotel.  Clean, spacious rooms, and with a great location close to many restaurants and my work, it is an ideal spot.  What makes this hotel really great though is the front desk and customer service staff....Aasha, Lauren, Vanesa, Bruna, Cassia, Andresa, and a host of others always make me feel special and are a pleasure to visit with.  It makes a tough heavy travel schedule a little easier to have such pleasant, knowledgeable, and professional service team.  I can't recommend them high enough!  Regards, Tom Blackburn

title: Excellent location with nice and spacious rooms
review: Dear Mr. Blackburn,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  We know that traveling can be hard on many, especially those who travel for business, and the ultimate feeling that we want all of our guests to feel about the GALLERYone is “a home away from home”.  We can’t thank you enough for your loyalty to us and I will share your wonderful comments with our entire staff; they will be happy to hear this.  Thanks again and enjoy your stay!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: A wonderful stay
review: It is a good choice, based on the location: close to the beach, shopping, restaurants etc.  It is better than the reviews I had read on the trip advisor.  I would recommend this hotel for families on the budget.

title: Extremely Family Friendly
review: This hotel is perfect if you are hosting a family reunion.  Staff is friendly, hotel is nice, ammenities are great and the food is delicious!  Chiara Tacca and her staff were excellent in helping us plan our reunion activities.

title: Great with some minor setbacks.
review: Thank you so much for the great review!  I’m happy to hear that your family reunion was a great success.  I will share your nice review with Chiara and all of our staff.  It was a pleasure to host your event and we hope to have you again in the future.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Required Valet Parking @ $25 + tax a day....
review: I loved the location of this hotel. Great shopping and restaurants all within walking distance. The beach is a couple blocks away too!! The stag was very very friendly and I felt they did a good job trying to make up for a few minor problems. There were some plumbing issues in multiple rooms. The showers leaked so bad it took a lot of towels to clean it up. Ethernet hotel had been booked to capacity and there was ALWAYS a towel shortage. But I felt they as a hotel they should have been prepared for it. The rooms did need some upgrading but they were very clean. The food in the hotel for breakfast and dinner was soo good. I would come but hopefully it has been upgraded a little by then.

title: Great Front Desk Staff
review: Thank you for your feedback and review of the GALLERYone Fort Lauderdale - a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton.  Our location is in the middle of it all and I’m happy that you loved that about our hotel.  Thank you for the nice comments about our staff and the restaurant food; I will share your review with them.  I apologize for the issues you experienced and we are working with our maintenance and housekeeping teams.  We are happy to say that we are currently renovating all guest suites.  We hope to have you again the next time you’re in Fort Lauderdale.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Stayed here on my wedding night.
review: My room rate was great, $101.00, but the required Valet Parking at $25.00 plus tax a day made the stay horrible.   The parking staff overall were nice with the exception of Phillip and another guy in a white shirt who was rude ("everywhere charges to park sir") but obviously they are understaffed as on Wednesday 8/7 no one answered the phone for prevail pick up (since it takes so long to get your car they recommend for you to call ahead to get your own car), so they took 20 minutes to get my car, making me late for work.   I had to ask the hotel staff for help with the parking attendants to get my car as there were only 2 runners and one guy who runs the station.  I stay in Ft Lauderdale every 2 weeks and trust me, not everyone charges, and as a Diamond Member with Hilton, very…

title: Enjoyed my stay, again!
review: When I visit this property, I normally book a waterfront room. But, last week's visit  was for a family vacation; so I booked the 2 bed/2 bath. I was a little skeptical, because these suites were not waterfront rooms. They were more of a water view. The 2 bedrooms did not disappoint! They were spacious & clean. The balcony was spacious as well. I thought the traffic & bridge noise would be a problem. It wasn't. It didn't interfere with our rest at all. Thanks Gallery ONE!! I hope to see you again in the very near future!

title: Friendly staff and convenience
review: Thank you for review and the high rating of the GALLERYone!  It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the two bedroom suite.  We love welcoming back our loyal guests and hope to see you in the very near future as well!  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: You will never want to leave
review: My wife and I just spent 6 nights here. The staff were exceptionally pleasant and helpful. Also the walking distance to the beach and many other attractions including The Galleria Mall, was most convenient.There is a Water Taxi service that docks at the Hotel, every 20-30 minutes, and offers a guided tour of the entire intracoastal waterway,with several stops along the way at Dining spots and The famous Las Olas "the Action Boulevard". I highly recommend this Hotel for your next trip, where the "front staff treat you like family" Roge

title: Convenient location, but...
review: Thank you for your high rating of a “5” for the GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Fort Lauderdale.  I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay and the convenience of our location.  I will share your nice comments with our team!  We truly hope to have you again in the future.  Andreas A. Ioannou General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel
review: I love this hotel. I had such a great time. The staff was super helpful and sincerely courteous. They took care of my family of 5. I didn't want to leave. We ate well in the dining room. As well as having breakfast in our own room.  Its nice to have your own kitchen with 3 children under the age of 6. To give the kids a bit of normalcy and routine.

title: Nice hotel with a surprise
